translation.en: Occupation contracts by notice - An occupation contract that would not be an occupation contract unless notice of that fact had been given under paragraph 1 or 3 of Schedule 2 (see notes above).

translation.cy: tir sydd wedi ei gaffael ar gyfer datblygu – Contract meddiannaeth mewn perthynas â llety a ddarperir ar sail dros dro ar dir sydd wedi ei gaffael ar gyfer ei ddatblygu.
translation.en: land acquired for development - An occupation contract relating to accommodation which is being provided on a temporary basis on land which has been acquired for development.

translation.cy: Cymdeithas dai yw cymdeithas dai gwbl gydfuddiannol neu gymdeithas dai gydweithredol lle mae’r preswylwyr hefyd yn aelodau o’r gymdeithas, ac felly’n llywio’r modd y’i rheolir (gweler adran 1(2) o Ddeddf Cymdeithasau Tai 1985).
translation.en: A fully mutual housing association or co-operative housing association is a housing association where the residents are also members of the association and therefore direct its management (see section 1(2) of the Housing Associations Act 1985).

translation.cy: Mae’r contract yn gontract safonol ymddygiad gwaharddedig o ganlyniad i orchymyn o dan adran 116 (pan grëir contract safonol gan orchymyn llys o ganlyniad i ymddygiad gwaharddedig – gweler isod).
translation.en: The contract is a prohibited conduct standard contract because of an order under section 116 (where a standard contract is created by order of the court as a result of prohibited conduct - see below).

translation.cy: Mae tresmaswr yn meddiannu’r eiddo fel ei gartref ac yn gwneud taliadau a dderbynnir gan y landlord cymunedol sy’n berchen ar yr eiddo (gweler adran 238).
translation.en: A trespasser is occupying the property as his or her home and makes payments which are accepted by the community landlord that owns the property (see section 238).

translation.cy: Adran 13 – Hysbysiad o gontract safonol
translation.en: Section 13 – Notice of standard contract

translation.cy: Os yw’r llys yn diddymu’r hysbysiad gwreiddiol, caiff y landlord roi hysbysiad pellach.
translation.en: If the court quashes the original notice, the landlord may give a further notice.

translation.cy: Math o gontract safonol cyfnodol yw contractau safonol rhagarweiniol y caiff landlordiaid cymunedol eu dyroddi, am gyfnod rhagarweiniol o 12 mis yn y lle cyntaf, yn hytrach na dyroddi contract diogel.
translation.en: Introductory standard contracts are a type of periodic standard contract that can be issued by community landlords, in the first instance for an introductory period of 12 months, instead of issuing a secure contract.

translation.cy: Paragraff 1
translation.en: Paragraph 1

translation.cy: Mae’r paragraff hwn yn nodi sut y pennir dyddiad dechrau’r cyfnod rhagarweiniol os oedd deiliad y contract yn barti i gontract safonol rhagarweiniol a ddaeth i ben ar yr union adeg yr oedd yr hawl i feddiannu’r annedd o dan y contract safonol rhagarweiniol newydd yn cychwyn.
translation.en: This paragraph sets out how the date on which the introductory period starts is determined if the contract-holder was a party to an introductory standard contract which ended just as the right to occupy the dwelling under the new introductory standard contract began.

translation.cy: Pan fo adolygiad wedi ei gynnal a’r landlord yn rhoi hysbysiad i ddeiliad y contract sy’n cadarnhau’r penderfyniad gwreiddiol, neu os yw’r landlord yn methu â hysbysu deiliad y contract o’r canlyniad, caiff deiliad y contract wneud cais i’r llys sirol adolygu’r penderfyniad i roi’r hysbysiad o estyniad.
translation.en: Where a review has taken place and the landlord gives the contract-holder notice confirming the original decision, or where the landlord fails to notify the contract-holder of the outcome, the contract-holder may apply to the county court for a review of the decision to give the notice of extension.

translation.cy: Nid yw hyn yn effeithio ar y terfyn amser pan gaiff deiliad y contract ofyn am adolygiad felly, yn ymarferol, mae hawl y deiliad contract i ofyn i’r landlord (o fewn 14 diwrnod i gael yr hysbysiad) adolygu’r penderfyniad i roi’r hysbysiad yn gymwys unwaith eto.
translation.en: This does not affect the time limit within which the contract-holder may seek a review so, in practice, the contract-holder’s right to ask the landlord (within 14 days of receiving the notice) to review the decision to give the notice then applies again.

translation.cy: Adran 18 – Darpariaethau sylfaenol ac Adran 19 – Telerau sylfaenol a darpariaethau sylfaenol:
translation.en: Section 18 - Fundamental provisions and Section 19 – Fundamental terms and fundamental provisions:

translation.cy: Mae darpariaethau sylfaenol yn un o agweddau allweddol y Ddeddf hon, a byddant yn elfen allweddol mewn contract meddiannaeth, drwy gael eu cynnwys fel telerau sylfaenol.
translation.en: Fundamental provisions are one of the key aspects of this Act and will be a key component of an occupation contract, where they will be reflected as fundamental terms.

translation.cy: Mae’r Ddeddf yn pennu pa ddarpariaethau sylfaenol sy’n gymwys i ba gontractau.
translation.en: The Act specifies which fundamental provisions apply to which contracts.

translation.cy: Mewn rhai achosion bydd gofyn ymgorffori darpariaethau sylfaenol ym mhob contract meddiannaeth (yr angen i ddarparu datganiad ysgrifenedig o’r contract, er enghraifft), ac mewn achosion eraill ceir darpariaethau sy’n gymwys i gontractau penodol yn unig.
translation.en: In some cases fundamental provisions are to be incorporated into all occupation contracts (for example the need to provide a written statement of the contract) and in other cases there are provisions which apply only to certain contracts.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn caniatáu i landlordiaid a deiliaid contract gytuno i beidio ag ymgorffori darpariaethau sylfaenol mewn contract meddiannaeth (ac eithrio’r darpariaethau sylfaenol a restrir yn is-adran (3), y mae’n rhaid eu hymgorffori heb eu haddasu bob tro).
translation.en: This allows landlords and contract-holders to agree not to incorporate fundamental provisions into an occupation contract (with the exception of the fundamental provisions listed in subsection (3), which must always be incorporated without modification).

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mae hyn yn ddarostyngedig i’r prawf bod deiliad y contract o’r farn y byddai peidio ag ymgorffori’r teler yn gwella ei sefyllfa.
translation.en: However, this is subject to the test that, in the opinion of the contract-holder, non-incorporation of the term would improve his or her position.

translation.cy: Rhaid ymgorffori’r darpariaethau sylfaenol a bennir yn adran 20(3) fel telerau sylfaenol ym mhob contract meddiannaeth y maent yn gymwys iddo, heb eu haddasu.
translation.en: The fundamental provisions set out in section 20(3) must be incorporated as fundamental terms of every occupation contract to which they apply, without any modification.

translation.cy: ni ddylent arwain at addasu neu beidio ag ymgorffori unrhyw un o’r darpariaethau sylfaenol a restrir yn adran 20(3).
translation.en: they must not result in the modification or non-incorporation of any of the fundamental provisions listed in section 20(3).

translation.cy: Gellir newid telerau sylfaenol contract meddiannaeth ar ôl gwneud y contract hefyd (cyfeirir at hyn yn y Ddeddf fel ‘amrywiad’).
translation.en: The fundamental terms of an occupation contract can also be changed after the contract is made (and this is referred to in the Act as a ‘variation’).

translation.cy: Adran 23 – Darpariaethau atodol
translation.en: Section 23 – Supplementary provisions

translation.cy: Adran 24 – Ymgorffori ac addasu darpariaethau atodol
translation.en: Section 24 – Incorporation and modification of supplementary provisions

translation.cy: Os yw landlord yn methu â darparu datganiad ysgrifenedig o’r contract, neu’n darparu datganiad anghyflawn, mae adrannau 34 a 36 yn galluogi deiliad y contract i wneud cais i’r llys am ddatganiad o’r telerau.
translation.en: If a landlord fails to provide a written statement of the contract, or provides an incomplete statement, sections 34 and 36 allow the contract-holder to apply to the court for a declaration of the terms.

translation.cy: cyfeiriad yr annedd;
translation.en: the address of the dwelling;

translation.cy: unrhyw gyfnodau pan na fydd hawl gan ddeiliad y contract i feddiannu’r annedd fel cartref (er enghraifft i ganiatáu defnyddio llety myfyrwyr at ddibenion eraill yn ystod gwyliau).
translation.en: any periods during which the contract-holder is not entitled to occupy the dwelling as a home (for example, to allow student accommodation to be used for other purposes during vacations periods).

translation.cy: Adran 29 – Datganiadau ysgrifenedig enghreifftiol o gontractau
translation.en: Section 29 – Model written statement of contract

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn rhoi trosolwg o Ran 3, sy’n pennu’r darpariaethau sy’n gymwys i bob contract meddiannaeth.
translation.en: This section provides an overview of Part 3, which sets out provisions that apply to all occupation contracts.

translation.cy: Os nad oedd landlord yn ymwybodol bod deiliad y contract wedi newid, rhaid darparu datganiad ysgrifenedig o’r contract o fewn 14 diwrnod i’r diwrnod y daeth y landlord yn ymwybodol o’r newid hwnnw (neu, yn achos cyd-landlordiaid, o fewn 14 diwrnod i’r diwrnod y daeth unrhyw un o’r landlordiaid yn ymwybodol o’r newid).
translation.en: Where a landlord was unaware that the identity of the contract-holder had changed, a written statement of the contract must be provided within 14 days of the landlord becoming aware (or, in the case of joint landlords, within 14 days of any one of the landlords becoming aware) of the change of identity.

translation.cy: digolledu
translation.en: compensation

translation.cy: Pan fo landlord cymunedol wedi darparu hysbysiad i ddeiliad contract o dan adran 13 (hysbysiad o gontract safonol) ond drwy gamgymeriad wedi darparu datganiad ysgrifenedig ar gyfer contract diogel, caiff y landlord wneud cais i’r llys am i’r camgymeriad gael ei unioni.
translation.en: Where a community landlord has provided a notice to a contract-holder under section 13 (notice of standard contract) but has mistakenly provided a written statement of a secure contract, the landlord may apply to the court to have this rectified.

translation.cy: Adran 39 – Y landlord yn darparu gwybodaeth am y landlord ac Adran 40 – Digolledu am dorri amodau adran 39
translation.en: Section 39 – Provision by landlord of information about the landlord and Section 40 - Compensation for breach of section 39

translation.cy: Adran 42 – Pryd y gellir gorfodi telerau contract meddiannaeth
translation.en: Section 42 – When terms of occupation contract become enforceable

translation.cy: Yn gryno, bydd un o delerau’r contract sy’n ymgorffori adran 177 yn rhwystro landlord sydd wedi ymrwymo i gontract safonol cyfnodol rhag dyroddi hysbysiad adennill meddiant (o dan y teler o’r contract sy’n ymgorffori adran 173) os nad yw’r landlord yn cydymffurfio â gofynion adran 43 neu adran 45.
translation.en: In summary, a term of the contract which incorporates section 177 will prevent a landlord who has entered into a periodic standard contract from issuing a notice for possession (under the term of the contract which incorporates section 173) if the landlord is not complying with the requirements of section 43 or section 45.

translation.cy: Paragraffau 2 a 3
translation.en: Paragraphs 2 and 3

translation.cy: Pan fo’r landlord a deiliad y contract yn ymrwymo i gontract meddiannaeth sy’n dilyn yn union ar ôl contract blaenorol (mewn perthynas â’r un annedd, neu’r un annedd i raddau helaeth), mae paragraff 4 yn darparu y caiff y blaendal a dalwyd ar gyfer y contract cyntaf fod yn gymwys i’r contract sy’n cymryd ei le, ynghyd ag unrhyw gontractau sy’n cymryd ei le wedi hynny.
translation.en: Where the landlord and contract-holder enter into an occupation contract that immediately follows a previous contract (in relation to the same, or substantially the same, dwelling), paragraph 4 provides for the deposit paid in relation to the first contract to apply to the substitute contract, and any further substitute contracts.

translation.cy: yr annedd (ee maint ac addasrwydd yr annedd ar gyfer y trafodiad arfaethedig);
translation.en: the dwelling (e.g., the size and suitability of the dwelling for the transactionbeing proposed);

translation.cy: Os oes cyd-landlordiaid, mae pob un ohonynt yn llwyr atebol am gyflawni’r rhwymedigaethau sy’n ddyledus i ddeiliad y contract o dan y contract.
translation.en: Where there are joint landlords, each of them is fully responsible for the performance of the obligations owed to the contract-holder under the contract.

translation.cy: Adran 54 – Yr hawl i feddiannu heb ymyrraeth gan y landlord
translation.en: Section 54 – Right to occupy without interference from landlord

translation.cy: Cyfeirir at hyn hefyd fel hawl deiliad y contract i ‘fwynhau’r eiddo yn dawel’.
translation.en: This is also known as the contract-holder’s right to ‘quiet enjoyment’ of the property.

translation.cy: Er mwyn sicrhau y cymhwysir y ddarpariaeth hon yn gyffredinol, rhaid ymgorffori’r ddarpariaeth hon yn adran 55 heb ei haddasu fel un o delerau sylfaenol pob contract meddiannaeth.
translation.en: To ensure universal application, this provision in section 55 must be incorporated without modification as a fundamental term of all occupation contracts.

translation.cy: Bydd unrhyw ôl-ddyledion rhent (neu ordaliadau) o dan y contract diogel yn dod yn daladwy o dan y contract safonol cyfnodol (neu’n cael eu credydu iddo).
translation.en: Any rent arrears (or overpayments) under the secure contract become payable under (or are credited to) the periodic standard contract.

translation.cy: Os yw’r adolygiad yn cadarnhau’r penderfyniad i ymestyn, rhaid i’r landlord ddarparu hysbysiad i ddeiliad y contract sy’n cynnwys yr wybodaeth a bennir ym mharagraff 5(6).
translation.en: If the review confirms the decision to extend, the landlord must provide the contract-holder with a notice including the information set out in paragraph 5(6).

translation.cy: dehongli
translation.en: interpretation

translation.cy: Pan fo’r prif landlord yn dewis trin y contract isfeddiannaeth fel contract safonol cyfnodol, rhaid rhoi hysbysiad o’r penderfyniad hwn i ddeiliad y contract wedi i’r contract isfeddiannaeth gael ei wneud, ond yn ddim hwyrach na dau fis wedi’r diwrnod y daw’r prif gontract i ben.
translation.en: Where the head landlord chooses to treat the sub-occupation contract as a periodic standard contract, notice of this decision must be given to the contract-holder after the sub-occupation contract is made, but no later than two months after the day the head contract ends.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, nid yw’r contract isfeddiannaeth yn parhau os yw’r prif gontract yn gontract safonol cyfnod penodol, a’i fod wedi dod i ben ar ddiwedd y cyfnod penodol.
translation.en: However, the sub-occupation contract does not continue if the head contract is a fixed term standard contract, and it has ended at the end of the fixed term.

translation.cy: Effaith hynny fydd trosglwyddo hawliau a rhwymedigaethau deiliad y contract (fel landlord o dan y contract isfeddiannaeth) i’r prif landlord.
translation.en: The effect of this will be to transfer the contract-holder’s rights and obligations (as landlord under the sub-occupation contract) to the head landlord.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r hysbysiad roi gwybod i ddeiliad y contract y caniateir iddo ‘gyfnod rhybuddio’ o bedair wythnos, ac y bydd rhaid iddo gadarnhau, yn ystod y cyfnod hwnnw, ei fod yn parhau’n barti i’r contractau.
translation.en: The notice must inform the contract-holder that he or she has a four-week ‘warning period’ during which he or she must confirm that he or she is still a party to the contracts.

translation.cy: Adran 73 – Olynu yn dilyn marwolaeth
translation.en: Section 73 – Succession on death

translation.cy: Mae’r egwyddor hon yn gymwys i bob contract meddiannaeth ar wahân i:
translation.en: This principle applies to all occupation contracts apart from:

translation.cy: Yn ymarferol, yng nghyflawnder amser, effaith hyn yw y gall dwy olyniaeth i gontract meddiannaeth ddigwydd (ond dim mwy na hynny).
translation.en: This will mean that in practice there may, in the fullness of time, be two successions to an occupation contract (but no more).

translation.cy: Mae hynny oherwydd,
translation.en: That is because,

translation.cy: priod neu bartner sifil deiliad y contract, neu rywun sy’n byw gyda deiliad y contract fel priod neu bartner sifil;
translation.en: the spouse or civil partner of the contract-holder, or someone living with the contract-holder as a spouse or civil partner;

translation.cy: Adran 77 – Olynydd wrth gefn:
translation.en: Section 77 – Reserve successor:

translation.cy: Os yw unrhyw un o’r cyd-landlordiaid yn ymwybodol o unrhyw olynydd posibl, bydd y gofyniad o dan yr adran hon i hysbysu’r person hwnnw yn berthnasol.
translation.en: If any one of the joint landlords is aware of any potential successor, the requirement under this section to notify that person will arise.

translation.cy: Adran 85 – Cais i’r llys yn ymwneud â chydsyniad
translation.en: Section 85 - Application to court relating to consent

translation.cy: PENNOD 10 - DIGOLLEDU
translation.en: CHAPTER 10 - COMPENSATION

translation.cy: RHAN 4 - CYFLWR ANHEDDAU
translation.en: PART 4 - CONDITION OF DWELLING

translation.cy: Mae’r darpariaethau hyn yn gymwys i gontractau diogel, contractau safonol cyfnodol a chontractau safonol cyfnod penodol a wneir am gyfnod sy’n llai na saith mlynedd.
translation.en: These provisions apply to secure contracts, periodic standard contracts and fixed term standard contracts made for a period of less than seven years.

translation.cy: Os yw contract safonol cyfnod penodol yn rhoi’r opsiwn i ddeiliad y contract adnewyddu’r contract ar ddiwedd y cyfnod, ac y byddai’r cyfnod cychwynnol a’r cyfnod adnewyddedig, gyda’i gilydd, yn hwy na saith mlynedd pe byddai deiliad y contract yn penderfynu arfer yr opsiwn, mae isadran (5) yn darparu y caiff y contract ei drin fel pe bai wedi ei wneud am gyfnod hwy na saith mlynedd.
translation.en: Subsection (5) provides that if a fixed term standard contract gives the contract-holder an option of renewing the contract at the end of the term and, if the contract-holder chose to exercise it exercise it, the initial term and the renewed term taken together would be for a period of more than seven years, the contract is treated as being made for a period of more than seven years.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, ni chaiff y landlord gynnwys teler yn y contract sy’n ei gwneud yn ofynnol bod deiliad y contract yn talu am unrhyw atgyweiriadau a fyddai’n ofynnol yn sgil teler yn y contract sy’n ymgorffori adrannau 91 neu 92.
translation.en: For example, the landlord cannot include a term in the contract which requires the contract-holder to pay for any repairs which would be required because of a term of the contract that incorporates sections 91 or 92.

translation.cy: Rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru bennu mewn rheoliadau faterion penodol sydd i’w hystyried wrth benderfynu a yw annedd yn ffit i bobl fyw ynddi.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers must set out specific matters in regulations to be considered in determining whether a dwelling is fit for human habitation.

translation.cy: At hynny, caiff Gweinidogion Cymru, drwy reoliadau, osod gofynion ar landlordiaid er mwyn atal amgylchiadau a allai beri i annedd fod yn anaddas i bobl fyw ynddi.
translation.en: Furthermore, the Welsh Ministers may by regulation impose requirements on landlords for the purposes of preventing circumstances from arising which could cause a dwelling to be unfit for human habitation.

translation.cy: cyffredino!
translation.en: general

translation.cy: bai dei!iad y contract
translation.en: contract-holders fault

translation.cy: Os yw’r adran hon wedi ei hymgorffori fel un o delerau’r contract heb ei haddasu, mae hawl gan y landlord i fynd i’r annedd ar unrhyw adeg resymol i archwilio neu wneud atgyweiriadau, ond rhaid iddo roi o leiaf 24 awr o rybudd i ddeiliad y contract cyn gwneud hynny (os bydd argyfwng, mae gan y landlord hawliau eraill o dan y gyfraith i fynd i’r eiddo heb roi hysbysiad).
translation.en: If this section is incorporated as a term of the contract without modification, the landlord has the right to enter the dwelling at any reasonable time to inspect or undertake repairs, but must give the contract-holder at least 24 hours’ notice before doing so (in the event of an emergency, the landlord has other rights under the law to access the property without giving notice).

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, ni fydd y landlord yn atebol am fethu â chydymffurfio â’r gofynion o ran ffitrwydd i bobl fyw ac atgyweiriadau os oes angen mynediad i ran o’r adeilad nad oes gan y landlord hawl i fynd iddi, ac na lwyddodd y landlord i gael mynediad iddi ar ôl gwneud ymdrech resymol.
translation.en: However, the landlord will not be liable for failing to comply with the fitness for human habitation and repairing obligations if the necessary works or repairs require access to a part of the building which the landlord does not have a right to access, and the landlord has been unable to gain access after making reasonable effort.

translation.cy: Mae adrannau 103 i 110 yn pennu darpariaethau sy’n gymwys i gontractau diogel yn unig.
translation.en: Sections 103 to 110 set out provisions relating only to secure contracts.

translation.cy: Bydd telerau sylfaenol sy’n ymgorffori is-adrannau (1) a (2) yn gwahardd amrywio telerau sylfaenol penodol o dan unrhyw amgylchiadau (oni bai y cânt eu hamrywio o ganlyniad i ddeddfwriaeth).
translation.en: Fundamental terms incorporating subsections (1) and (2) will prohibit certain fundamental terms from being varied under any circumstances (unless they are varied as a result of legislation).

translation.cy: Adran 112 - Tynnu'n ôl:
translation.en: Section 112 - Withdrawal:

translation.cy: Mae Pennod 4 yn nodi darpariaethau penodol sy’n ymwneud â delio o dan gontractau diogel sef, yn benodol, y gallu i gymryd lletywr ac i drosglwyddo’r contract i olynydd posibl.
translation.en: Chapter 4 sets out specific provisions relating to dealing under secure contracts, specifically the ability to take in a lodger and to transfer the contract to a potential successor.

translation.cy: Os yw’r adran hon wedi ei hymgorffori fel un o delerau contract diogel heb ei haddasu, caiff deiliad y contract o dan gontract diogel gymryd lletywr heb gael caniatâd y landlord.
translation.en: If this section is incorporated as a term of a secure contract without modification, a contract-holder under a secure contract may take in a lodger without obtaining the landlord’s permission.

translation.cy: Bydd contract safonol ymddygiad gwaharddedig yn para 12 mis, y cyfeirir ato fel y ‘cyfnod prawf’.
translation.en: A prohibited conduct standard contract will last for 12 months, referred to as the ‘probation period’.

translation.cy: Ar ddiwedd y cyfnod prawf daw contract safonol ymddygiad gwaharddedig i ben a bydd contract diogel yn cymryd ei le, ac eithrio pan fo paragraff 3(9) o Atodlen 7 yn gymwys.
translation.en: At the end of the probationary period a prohibited conduct standard contract ends and is replaced by a secure contract, except where paragraph 3(9) of Schedule 7 applies.

translation.cy: Gweler y nodiadau ar y darpariaethau hynny yn Atodlen 4 uchod.
translation.en: See the notes on those provisions in Schedule 4 above.

translation.cy: Effaith hyn yw atal unrhyw hysbysiad rhag cael effaith fel hysbysiad landlord yn ceisio meddiant (gweler adran 173) o fewn chwe mis cyntaf meddiannaeth.
translation.en: This has the effect of preventing any notice taking effect as a landlord’s notice seeking possession (see section 173) within the first six months of occupancy.

translation.cy: Adran 127 - Cyfyngiad ar amrywio
translation.en: Section 127 - Limitation on variation

translation.cy: Bydd telerau sylfaenol sy’n ymgorffori is-adrannau (1) a (2) yn gwahardd amrywio telerau sylfaenol penodol o dan unrhyw amgylchiadau (oni bai eu bod yn cael eu hamrywio o ganlyniad i ddeddfwriaeth).
translation.en: Fundamental terms incorporating subsections (1) and (2) will prohibit certain fundamental terms from being varied under any circumstances (unless they are varied as a result of legislation).

translation.cy: Ond oni bai bod deiliad y contract o’r farn fod yr addasiad (neu’r hepgoriad) yn gwella ei sefyllfa, mae’n debyg mai dim ond newidiadau cyfyngedig iawn a ganiateir.
translation.en: But unless the contract-holder is of the opinion that the modification (or removal) improves his or her position, only very limited changes are likely to be permissible.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon hefyd yn darparu y bydd llog yn cronni ar y tâl digolledu os bydd y landlord yn methu â darparu’r datganiad.
translation.en: This section also provides that interest accrues on the compensation if the landlord fails to provide the statement.

translation.cy: Pan fo’r adran hon wedi ei hymgorffori fel un o delerau contract safonol cyfnodol heb ei haddasu, os oes mwy nag un deiliad contract o dan y contract meddiannaeth, gall unrhyw un o’r deiliaid contract hynny roi’r gorau i fod yn barti i’r contract, heb ddwyn y contract i ben.
translation.en: 325. Where this section is incorporated as a term of a periodic standard contract without modification, if there is more than one contract-holder under the occupation contract, any of those contract-holders may cease to be a party to the contract without bringing the contract to an end.

translation.cy: Rhaid gwneud unrhyw amrywiad yn unol â’r teler yn y contract sy’n ymgorffori adran 135.
translation.en: Any variations must be made in accordance with the term of the contract that incorporates section 135.

translation.cy: Mae nifer o ymchwiliadau ac adolygiadau sy’n ymwneud â darparu gofal cymdeithasol wedi eu cynnal yn y blynyddoedd cyn pasio’r Ddeddf hon ac sydd o’r herwydd wedi dylanwadu ar gynnwys y Ddeddf ei hun.
translation.en: There have been a number of inquiries and reviews relating to the provision of social care which were conducted in the years preceding the passing of the Act and which therefore influenced the content of the Act itself.

translation.cy: Yr ymateb i Southern Cross, pan gaewyd nifer fawr o gartrefi gofal ar rybudd byr iawn oherwydd penderfyniad y darparwr i orffen darparu gwasanaethau,
translation.en: The response to Southern Cross where a large number of care homes were closed at extremely short notice due to the decision of the provider to end its service provision.

translation.en: Part 8 – Social Care Wales:

translation.cy: Rhan 10 – Amrywiol a chyffredinol
translation.en: Part 10 – Miscellaneous and general

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 3 yn ailenwi Cyngor Gofal Cymru yn Gofal Cymdeithasol Cymru (“GCC”).
translation.en: Part 3 renames the Care Council for Wales as Social Care Wales (“SCW”).

translation.cy: mae pwerau GCC i wneud rheolau o dan y Ddeddf yn ymwneud yn bennaf â materion gweithdrefnol.
translation.en: SCW’s powers to make rules under the Act are mostly related to procedural matters.

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 9 yn cynnwys darpariaeth ynghylch rhannu gwybodaeth a chydweithio rhwng Gweinidogion Cymru fel rheoleiddiwr gwasanaethau gofal cymdeithasol, GCC a chyrff perthnasol eraill.
translation.en: Part 9 contains provision about information sharing and joint working between the Welsh Ministers as the regulator of social care services, SCW and other relevant bodies.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn cynnwys darpariaeth ynghylch sut y mae dogfennau i gael eu hanfon a phryd y cânt eu trin fel rhai sydd wedi eu dosbarthu at ddibenion y Ddeddf.
translation.en: It also contains provision about how documents are to be sent and when they are treated as delivered for the purposes of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 1 (Penodau 1-5 a 7) o’r Ddeddf yn disodli’r system gofrestru a nodir yn
translation.en: Part 1 (Chapters 1-5 and 7) of the Act replace the system of registration set out in

translation.cy: Adran 3 - Termau allweddol eraill
translation.en: Section 3 - Other key terms

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn diffinio nifer o dermau pwysig sy’n cael eu defnyddio yn y Rhan hon o’r Ddeddf, gan gynnwys y termau “gofal” a “cymorth”.
translation.en: This section defines a number of important terms used in this Part of the Act including the terms “care” and ”support” .

translation.cy: Ni fwriedir i’r diffiniad o “gofal” ddiffinio sut y mae gofal yn cael ei ddarparu neu ei asesu.
translation.en: The definition of “care” is not intended to define how care is delivered or assessed.

translation.cy: Mae adran 7 yn nodi’r camau y mae rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru eu cymryd mewn cysylltiad â chais a geir yn unol ag adran 6.
translation.en: Section 7 sets out the actions that the Welsh Ministers must take in respect of an application received in accordance with section 6.

translation.cy: O ran caniatáu’r cais, mae is-adran (3)(a)(i) yn pennu bod rhaid iddo fod yn ddarostyngedig i amod sy’n pennu’r mannau y mae’r gwasanaeth i’w ddarparu “ynddynt, ohonynt neu mewn perthynas â hwy”.
translation.en: In granting the application, subsection (3)(a)(i) specifies that the granting of the application must be subject to a condition specifying the places “at, from or in relation to which” the service is to be provided.

translation.cy: Mae adran 8 yn nodi manylion yr ymgymeriad y mae rhaid i berson sy’n ceisio ymgeisio i ddod yn ddarparwr gwasanaeth cymorth cartref ei roi pa un ai hyn yw’r gwasanaeth cyntaf a’r unig wasanaeth y mae’n yn ymgeisio i’w ddarparu neu’n wasanaeth dilynol y mae’n ceisio ei ddarparu yn rhinwedd cais i amrywio ei gofrestriad cychwynnol.
translation.en: Section 8 sets out the detail of the undertaking that must be given by a person seeking to apply to become a service provider of a domiciliary support service whether that is the first and only service that they apply to provide or a subsequent service that they seek to provide by virtue of an application to vary their initial registration.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (3) yn nodi Amod A.
translation.en: Subsection (3) sets out Condition A.

translation.cy: Nid oes gwahaniaeth pa un a yw person yn talu’n breifat neu’n talu drwy ddefnyddio taliadau uniongyrchol a wneir iddo gan awdurdod lleol o dan adrannau 50 neu 51 o Ddeddf 2014.
translation.en: It does not make a difference whether a person is paying privately or is paying using direct payments made to them by a local authority under sections 50 or 51 of the 2014 Act.

translation.cy: Rhaid dyroddi Hysbysiad o Benderfyniad i’r darparwr gwasanaeth sy’n ei hysbysu am y penderfyniad i beidio â chanslo neu amrywio cofrestriad y darparwr (adran 17(1)).
translation.en: A Notice of Decision must be issued to the service provider informing the provider of the decision not to cancel or vary the provider’s registration (section 17(1)).

translation.cy: Os na wneir apêl, mae’r penderfyniad yn cymryd effaith y diwrnod ar ôl y cyfnod o 28 o ddiwrnodau yn adran 26(2) (a19(7)(a)).
translation.en: If no appeal is made, decision takes effect the day after the 28 day period in section 26(2) (s19(7)(a)).

translation.cy: Ar yr adeg pan fo’r darparwr gwasanaeth yn gwneud cais i gael ei gofrestru, bydd rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru fod wedi eu bodloni bod y person a ddynodir yn unigolyn cyfrifol yn gallu cyflawni’r dyletswyddau hynny (gweler adran 7(1)(c)).
translation.en: At the time the service provider applies to be registered, the Welsh Ministers will need to be satisfied that the person designated as responsible individual is capable of performing those duties (see section 7(1)(c)).

translation.cy: Os nad yw’r unigolyn yn gallu gwneud hynny, ym marn Gweinidogion Cymru, yna bydd yn ofynnol i’r darparwr ddynodi unigolyn gwahanol ar gyfer y ddau fan.
translation.en: If, in the opinion of the Welsh Ministers, the individual is not so capable, then the provider will be required to designate a different individual for each of the places.

translation.cy: Mewn achos pan all bywyd, iechyd corfforol neu iechyd meddwl person fod mewn perygl neu pan fo perygl i gamdriniaeth neu esgeulustod ddigwydd, caiff Gweinidogion Cymru, o dan yr adran hon, amrywio amod cofrestriad neu osod amod newydd ar frys.
translation.en: In a case where a person's life or physical or mental health may be at risk or where there is a risk of abuse or neglect occurring the Welsh Ministers may, under this section, urgently vary a condition of registration or impose a new condition.

translation.cy: Gall hyn gynnwys atal dros dro effaith y penderfyniad a wnaed gan Weinidogion Cymru.
translation.en: This may include suspending the effect of the decision made by the Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Darperir y p*er i’r Tribiwnlys i gadarnhau penderfyniad gan Weinidogion Cymru, cyfarwyddo na fydd y penderfyniad yn cael effaith neu y bydd yn peidio â chael effaith os yw eisoes wedi cael effaith.
translation.en: The Tribunal is provided with the power to confirm a decision of the Welsh Ministers, direct that the decision will not have effect or will cease to have effect if it has already.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (3) yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i’r safonau hynny fod yn gysylltiedig â’r datganiad ynghylch canlyniadau llesiant a ddyroddir gan Weinidogion Cymru yn unol ag adran 8 o Ddeddf 2014 a rhoi sylw i bwysigrwydd llesiant unigolion sy’n cael gofal a chymorth drwy’r gwasanaeth rheoleiddiedig o dan sylw.
translation.en: Subsection (3) requires that those standards will be linked to the well being outcomes statement issued by the Welsh Ministers pursuant to section 8 of the 2014 Act and have regard to the importance of the well-being of individuals who receive care and support via the regulated service in question.

translation.cy: Mae adran 29 o’r Ddeddf yn gosod dyletswydd ar ddarparwyr i ystyried y canllawiau a gyhoeddir gan Weinidogion Cymru o dan yr adran hon.
translation.en: Section 29 of the Act places a duty on providers to have regard to guidance published by the Welsh Ministers under this section .

translation.cy: Pennod 3:
translation.en: Chapter 3:

translation.cy: 88.Mae adran 34 yn nodi pwerau mynediad ac arolygu arolygydd.
translation.en: 88.Section 34 sets out an inspector’s powers of entry and inspection.

translation.cy: Pan fo arolygydd am arolygu cartref person, rhaid i’r meddiannydd gydsynio i’r arolygydd fynd i mewn i’r cartref at ddiben arolygiad.
translation.en: Where an inspector wants to inspect a person’s home, the occupier must consent to an inspector entering the home for the purpose of an inspection.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (1) yn darparu p*er i’r arolygydd i’w gwneud yn ofynnol cyf-weld ag unrhyw un yn breifat.
translation.en: Subsection (1) provides a power to the inspector to require anyone to be interviewed in private.

translation.cy: Os cyflwynir system o’r fath, yna mae adran 36(2)(d) yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i’r arolygydd roi’r radd honno yn yr adroddiad arolygu y mae rhaid ei gyhoeddi.
translation.en: In the event that such a system is introduced then section 36(2)(d) requires the inspector to put that rating in the inspection report which must be published.

translation.cy: Mae’r p*er hwn yn atgynhyrchu p*er sydd eisoes yn bodoli yn adran 36(3) o Ddeddf 2000 a gallai gael ei ddefnyddio, er enghraifft, i gyfyngu ar gyhoeddi gwybodaeth feddygol am ddarparwyr neu fanylion am sefydliadau sy’n ymwneud â phant.
translation.en: This power replicates an existing power in section 36(3) of the 2000 Act and could, for example, be used to restrict publication of medical information about providers or details about establishments relating to children.

translation.cy: Mae gwahaniaeth rhwng y drosedd yn adran 5 o ddarparu gwasanaeth rheoleiddiedig heb fod wedi ei gofrestru a’r drosedd yn adran 44 o esgus bod yn ddarparwr gwasanaeth neu esgus bod man yn un y mae gwasanaeth rheoleiddiedig yn cael ei ddarparu ynddo, ohono neu mewn perthynas ag ef.
translation.en: There is a distinction between the offence in section 5 of providing a regulated service without being registered and the offence in section 44 of pretending to be a service provider or pretending that a place is one at from or in relation to which a regulated service is provided.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, efallai y byddai trosedd o dan adran 44(1)(a) yn cael ei chyflawni pe bai person yn esgus ei fod wedi ei gofrestru er mwyn cael contract awdurdod lleol, er enghraifft.
translation.en: However, an offence under section 44(1)(a) might be committed if a person was pretending to be registered in order to, for example, secure a local authority contract.

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 6 o Ddeddf 2014 yn gwneud darpariaeth mewn perthynas â phlant sy’n derbyn gofal a phlant sy’n cael eu lletya ac mae nifer o bwerau gwneud rheoliadau yn cael eu darparu i Weinidogion Cymru i wneud darpariaeth ynghylch arfer y swyddogaethau hynny.
translation.en: Part 6 of the 2014 Act makes provision in relation to looked after and accommodated children and there are a number of regulation making powers provided to the Welsh Ministers to make provision about the exercise of those functions.

translation.cy: Felly, mae’r swyddogaethau hynny o dan Ran 6 i’w rheoleiddio o dan adrannau newydd 94A a 94B sy’n cael eu mewnosod yn Neddf 2014 gan adran 58.
translation.en: Those functions under Part 6 are therefore to be regulated under new sections 94A and 94B inserted into the 2014 Act by section 58.

translation.cy: Pennod 7:
translation.en: Chapter 7:

translation.cy: a b) hybu safonau uchel yn eu hyfforddiant.
translation.en: and b) promoting high standards in their training.

translation.cy: yn rhinwedd adran 70 bydd GCC hefyd yn gallu cydweithio â gwasanaethau gofal a chymorth i roi unrhyw argymhellion y mae’n eu nodi ar waith.
translation.en: by virtue of section 70 SCW will also be able to work with care and support services to implement any recommendations it identifies.

translation.cy: mae’n ei gwneud yn ofynnol i GCC ymgynghori cyn dyroddi dogfennau penodol, gan gynnwys rheolau a wneir o dan bwerau mewn mannau eraill yn y Ddeddf hon.
translation.en: it requires SCW to consult before issuing certain documents, including rules made under powers contained elsewhere in this Act.

translation.cy: Mae adran 75 yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i GCC ymgynghori cyn gwneud neu amrywio unrhyw reolau neu ddyroddi unrhyw godau neu ganllawiau o dan y Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 75 requires SCW to consult before making or varying any rules or issuing any codes or guidance under the Act.

translation.cy: Gallai canllawiau gynnwys bod Gweinidogion Cymru yn nodi’r ffordd y dylai GCC fynd ati i wneud adolygiad blynyddol o gyflogau staff.
translation.en: Guidance could include the Welsh Ministers setting out how SCW should approach its annual review of staff pay.

translation.cy: Mae adran 78 yn rhoi pwerau diofyn i Weinidogion Cymru mewn cysylltiad â GCC.
translation.en: Section 78 confers default powers on the Welsh Ministers in respect of SCW.

translation.cy: Roedd gan Weinidogion Cymru yr un pwerau mewn perthynas â’r Cyngor o dan Ddeddf 2000.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers had the same powers in relation to the Council under the 2000 Act.

translation.cy: Mae adran 79 yn nodi’r personau hynny sy’n “gweithwyr gofal cymdeithasol” at ddibenion y Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 79 sets out those persons who are “social care workers” for the purposes of the Act.

translation.cy: Ni fydd y diffiniad yn ymwneud â phersonau nad ydynt yn ymwneud â darparu gofal a chymorth ond sydd wedi eu cyflogi mewn mannau lle y darperir gofal a chymorth;
translation.en: Persons not involved with the provision of care and support but employed at places where care and support is provided will not be captured by the definition;

translation.cy: Mae’r rheoliadau yn galluogi Gweinidogion Cymru i ddynodi categorïau o fewn disgrifiad penodol o bersonau a restrir yn is-adran (3) sydd i’w trin fel gweithwyr gofal cymdeithasol.
translation.en: The regulations enable the Welsh Ministers to designate categories within a particular description of persons listed in subsection (3) to be treated as social care workers.

translation.cy: Mae adran 80
translation.en: Section 80 requires SCW

translation.cy: Os yw Gweinidogion Cymru, er enghraifft, yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i reolwyr gwasanaethau rheoleiddiedig gofrestru â GCC, byddai rhaid i reoliadau gael eu gwneud o dan adran 80 i’w gwneud yn ofynnol i GCC gadw cofrestr o’r rheolwyr hynny.
translation.en: If for example the Welsh Ministers require managers of regulated services to register with SCW, regulations would have to be made under section 80 to require SCW to keep a register of those managers.

translation.cy: rhan ar gyfer gweithwyr cymdeithasol perthnasol;
translation.en: a part for relevant social workers;

translation.cy: Gallai rheoliadau o dan adran 111(2) hefyd osod gofyniad ar gategorïau eraill o weithwyr gofal cymdeithasol i gofrestru drwy estyn diogelwch y teitl a roddir i weithwyr cymdeithasol yn rhinwedd yr adran honno.
translation.en: Regulations under section 111(2) could also impose a requirement to register on other categories of social care workers by extending the protection of title afforded to social workers by virtue of that section.

translation.cy: Mae’r ddyletswydd i gadw’r gofrestr wedi ei gosod ar GCC, y mae rhaid iddo benodi cofrestrydd (gweler adran 81).
translation.en: The duty to keep the register is imposed on SCW which must appoint a registrar (see section 81).

translation.cy: mae manylion am sut y maent hwy yn cael eu cofrestru isod.
translation.en: details of how they are registered appear below.

translation.cy: Felly byddai graddedigion o gwrs gradd gwaith cymdeithasol yn Lloegr yn bodloni amod 1 os yw’r cymhwyster hwnnw yn cyrraedd safon hyfedredd GCC.
translation.en: A graduate from a social work degree course in England would therefore satisfy condition 1 if that qualification meets SCW’s standard of proficiency.

translation.cy: Mae paragraff (b)(i) o adran 84 yn darparu yr ystyrir bod gweithwyr gofal cymdeithasol wedi eu cymhwyso’n briodol os ydynt wedi gwneud cwrs sydd wedi ei gymeradwyo gan GCC o dan adran 114.
translation.en: Paragraph (b)(i) of section 84 provides that social care workers are considered appropriately qualified if they have undergone a course which has been approved by SCW under section 114.

translation.cy: Mae hyn i alluogi i gymwysterau’r rheini sydd wedi eu cymhwyso i ymarfer proffesiwn mewn gwlad AEE neu’r Swistir gael eu cydnabod mewn gwlad AEE arall neu’r Swistir, er mwyn iddynt ymarfer yno.
translation.en: It is to enable those who are qualified to practise a profession in an EEA country or Switzerland to have their qualifications recognised in another EEA country or Switzerland, in order to practise there.

translation.cy: Mae gweithwyr cymdeithasol sydd ar ymweliad yn parhau i fod wedi eu sefydlu fel gweithwyr cymdeithasol yn eu gwlad eu hun;
translation.en: Visiting social workers are still established as social workers in their home country;

translation.cy: Adrannau 92 – 94 - Dileu cofnodion o’r gofrestr
translation.en: Sections 92 – 94 - Removal of entries from the register

translation.cy: Rhaid i GCC nodi’r weithdrefn ar gyfer gwneud ceisiadau o’r fath mewn rheolau (gweler adran 100).
translation.en: SCW must set out in rules the procedure for making such applications (see section 100).

translation.cy: Adrannau 106 – 111 - Hysbysu’r cofrestrydd am newidiadau i wybodaeth etc.,
translation.en: Sections 106 – 111 - Notifying the registrar of changes to information etc.,

translation.cy: ADDYSG ETC.
translation.en: EDUCATION ETC.

translation.cy: Bydd GCC hefyd yn gallu llunio codau ymarfer ar gyfer gweithwyr proffesiynol iechyd meddwl (GPIM) a gymeradwywyd.
translation.en: SCW will also be able to produce codes of practice for approved mental health professionals (AMHP).

translation.cy: i’r perwyl hwnnw, bydd yn ofynnol i GCC gadw’r codau o dan adolygiad a’u hamrywio pan fo hynny’n briodol.
translation.en: to that end, SCW will be required to keep the codes under review and vary them where appropriate.

translation.cy: Mae ei gwneud yn ofynnol i weithwyr gofal cymdeithasol gael cymwysterau penodol er mwyn cofrestru yn ffordd o sicrhau bod gweithwyr wedi eu cymhwyso ond nid yw hynny ynddo’i hun yn gwarantu ansawdd y cyrsiau sy’n arwain at y cymwysterau.
translation.en: Requiring that social care workers must have certain qualifications in order to be registered is a way of ensuring workers are qualified but it does not in itself guarantee the quality of the courses that give rise to the qualifications.

translation.cy: Yn is-adran (1)(a), mae’n debygol y bydd tystiolaeth o “perfformiad diffygiol fel gweithiwr gofal cymdeithasol” yn cynnwys methiannau i gydymffurfio â’r safonau ymddygiad ac ymarfer y disgwylir i weithwyr gofal cymdeithasol eu cyrraedd, a nodir yn y codau ymarfer a ddyroddir gan GCC o dan adran 112, er na fydd personau sy’n gwerthuso perfformiad gweithiwr gofal cymdeithasol wedi eu cyfyngu i ystyried cydymffurfedd â’r codau yn unig.
translation.en: In subsection (1)(a), evidence of “deficient performance as a social care worker” is likely to include failures to comply with the standards of conduct and practice expected of social care workers set out in the codes of practice issued by SCW under section 112, although persons evaluating a social care worker’s performance will not be limited to just considering compliance with codes.

translation.cy: Bwriedir i’r sail hon ymwneud â methiannau difrifol neu fynych i ddilyn y safonau ymddygiad y disgwylir i weithwyr gofal cymdeithasol sy’n ymarfer eu cyrraedd.
translation.en: This ground is intended to capture serious or persistent failures to follow the standards of conduct expected of practising social care workers.

translation.cy: Felly mae modd i ymddygiad gweithiwr gofal cymdeithasol y tu allan i’w waith proffesiynol arwain at gamau pan fo posibilrwydd y bydd hyder y cyhoedd mewn gweithwyr gofal cymdeithasol yn cael ei danseilio os na chymerir camau.
translation.en: Therefore behaviour that takes place outside a social care worker’s professional practice may lead to action where public confidence in social care workers might be undermined if action was not taken.

translation.cy: Yn is-adran (1)(c), mae “rhestr wahardd” yn cyfeirio at restr o unigolion y bernir eu bod yn anaddas i weithio gyda phlant neu oedolion hyglwyf.
translation.en: In subsection (1)(c), “barred list” refers to a list of individuals who have been deemed unsuitable to work with children or vulnerable adults.

translation.cy: Ystyrir ffactorau perthnasol eraill gan gynnwys, er enghraifft, mewn achos sy’n ymwneud â pherfformiad diffygiol, a oes modd datrys y problemau o dan sylw yn hawdd neu a oes camau wedi eu cymryd i fynd i’r afael â’r broblem.
translation.en: Other relevant factors will be taken into account, including for example in a case involving deficient performance, whether the issues in question are easily remediable or whether action has been taken to address the problem.

translation.cy: Mae’r Bennod hon yn nodi’r fframwaith ar gyfer ymchwilio i honiadau o amhariad ar addasrwydd i ymarfer sy’n cael eu gwneud i GCC mewn cysylltiad â pherson cofrestredig;
translation.en: This chapter sets out the framework for the investigation of allegations of impaired fitness to practise made to SCW in respect of a registered person;

translation.cy: mae’r Bennod hefyd yn gymwys pan fo gan GCC seiliau eraill dros gredu y gall fod amhariad ar addasrwydd person (er enghraifft, os daw GCC i wybod drwy adroddiad yn y cyfryngau fod gweithiwr cymdeithasol wedi cael ei arestio neu ei ddiswyddo).
translation.en: the chapter also applies where SCW has other grounds for believing that a person’s fitness may be impaired (for example, if SCW became aware through a report in the media that a social worker had been arrested or sacked).

translation.cy: Mae paneli gorchmynion interim yn ystyried a oes angen unrhyw fesurau ar unwaith i amddiffyn y cyhoedd neu’r person cofrestredig tra bo’r materion yn cael eu hystyried neu tra ymchwilir iddynt.
translation.en: Interim order panels consider if any immediate measures are needed to protect the public or the registered person while matters are being considered and investigated.

translation.cy: Gallai’r mesurau hyn gynnwys cyfyngu ar ystod y gweithgareddau y caniateir i’r person cofrestredig eu gwneud, neu atal dros dro gofrestriad y person cofrestredig;
translation.en: These measures could include restricting the range of activities the registered person is permitted to carry out, or suspending the registered person’s registration;

translation.cy: mae’r darpariaethau manwl sy’n ymdrin â mesurau interim i’w gweld ym Mhennod 4 o’r Rhan hon ac maent yn cael eu hesbonio isod.
translation.en: the detailed provisions dealing with interim measures appear in Chapter 4 of this Part and are explained below.

translation.cy: Mae adran 133 yn nodi’r ail ffordd o gychwyn adolygiad.
translation.en: Section 133 sets out the second method of initiating a review.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, os daw GCC yn ymwybodol bod person cofrestredig yn methu â chydymffurfio â gorchymyn cofrestru amodol a’i fod yn ymarfer mewn maes y mae wedi ei wahardd rhag ymarfer ynddo, byddai’n ofynnol i GCC atgyfeirio’r mater i’w adolygu.
translation.en: If, for example, SCW became aware that a registered person was failing to comply with a conditional registration order and was practising in an area he or she was prohibited from practising, SCW would be required to refer the matter for review.

translation.cy: Yn yr un ffordd, ni allai estyn gorchymyn cofrestru amodol am gyfnod pellach sy’n hwy na 3 blynedd.
translation.en: In the same way it could not extend a conditional registration order for a further period exceeding 3 years.

translation.cy: yn fras, rôl y paneli hyn fydd gosod ac adolygu gorchmynion interim.
translation.en: broadly, the role of these panels will be to impose and review interim orders.

translation.cy: Bydd pob gwrandawiad adolygu o dan y Bennod hon yn cael ei gynnal gan baneli addasrwydd i ymarfer.
translation.en: All review hearings under this Chapter will be carried out by fitness to practise panels.

translation.cy: Gweler y nodyn esboniadol ar gyfer adrannau 131-133 am fanylion pellach.

translation.cy: DEDDF YR AMGYLCHEDD (CYMRU) 2016
translation.en: ENVIRONMENT (WALES) ACT 2016

translation.cy: RHAGARWEINIAD
translation.en: INTRODUCTION

translation.cy: Mae’n darparu ar gyfer proses ailadroddol newydd lle bydd Gweinidogion Cymru, Cyfoeth Naturiol Cymru (CNC) a chyrff cyhoeddus eraill yn cyfrannu at gyflawni rheoli cynaliadwy ar adnoddau naturiol.
translation.en: It makes provisions for a new iterative process for the Welsh Ministers, Natural Resources Wales (NRW) and other public bodies to contribute to achieving the sustainable management of natural resources.

translation.cy: Mae’r Rhan hon hefyd yn disodli swyddogaethau CNC mewn perthynas ag ymrwymo i gytundebau rheoli yn Neddf Parciau Cenedlaethol a Mynediad i Gefn Gwlad 1949, Deddf Bywyd Gwyllt a Chefn Gwlad 1981 a Deddf Cefn Gwlad 1968.
translation.en: This Part also replaces NRW functions in relation to entering management agreements in the National Parks and Access to Countryside Act 1949, the Wildlife and Countryside Act 1981 and the Countryside Act 1968.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (1)(a) yn darparu bod rheoli cynaliadwy ar adnoddau naturiol yn ymwneud â defnyddio (neu beidio â defnyddio) adnoddau naturiol (fel y’u diffinnir yn adran 2) i hyrwyddo amcan is-adran (2).
translation.en: Subsection (1)(a) provides that sustainable management of natural resources is about using (or not using) natural resources (as defined in section 2) to promote the objective at subsection (2).

translation.cy: Mae’r egwyddorion yn ategu ei gilydd ac yn cysylltu â’i gilydd, ac nid ydynt wedi’u rhestru yn ôl trefn blaenoriaeth.
translation.en: The principles are complementary and interlinked and are not listed in order of priority.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, byddai’n rhaid i gynigion i gyflwyno gwlyptir newydd er mwyn helpu i leihau llygredd gwasgaredig o dir fferm ymgorffori’r amser a gymer i’r gwlyptir ddatblygu’r amodau bioffisegol angenrheidiol i reoli’r llygredd, ynghyd ag amrywioldeb llif y dŵr dros amser, wrth ddylunio a monitro’r gwlyptiroedd.
translation.en: For example, proposals to introduce a new wetland to help reduce diffuse pollution from farmland would have to factor in the time for the wetland to develop the necessary biophysical conditions to control the pollution, together with the variability of water flows over time into the design and monitoring of the wetlands.

translation.cy: Mae paragraff (h) yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol cymryd camau a all atal niwed arwyddocaol i ecosystemau.
translation.en: Paragraph (h) requires the taking of actions which can avert significant damage to ecosystems.

translation.cy: Mae’n ofynnol ystyried agweddau penodol ar gydnerthedd ecosystem yn ôl paragraff (i).
translation.en: Paragraph (i) requires that particular aspects of ecosystem resilience are considered.

translation.cy: Bydd y gofyniad hwn bellach yn dod o dan egwyddorion rheoli cynaliadwy ar adnoddau naturiol fel y darperir ar eu cyfer yn adran 4 o’r Ddeddf hon, felly mae erthygl 5B bellach yn ddiangen.
translation.en: This requirement will now fall under the principles of sustainable management of natural resources as provided in section 4 of this Act and therefore article 5B is no longer necessary.

translation.cy: Mae erthygl 5E yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i CNC roi sylw i iechyd a llesiant cymdeithasol unigolion a chymunedau yn ogystal â’u llesiant economaidd.
translation.en: Article 5E requires that NRW must have regard to the health and social wellbeing of individuals and communities as well as economic well-being.

translation.cy: Mae’r gofynion hyn yn dod yn rhan o’r dyletswyddau a osodir ar CNC gan Ddeddf Llesiant Cenedlaethau’r Dyfodol (Cymru) 2015, felly mae erthygl 5E bellach yn ddiangen.
translation.en: These requirements are subsumed within the duties placed on NRW by the Well-being of Future Generations (Wales) Act 2015, so article 5E is no longer required.

translation.cy: Adran 6 – Dyletswydd bioamrywiaeth a chydnerthedd ecosystemau
translation.en: Section 6 – Biodiversity and resilience of ecosystems duty

translation.cy: Mae adran 6(1) o’r Ddeddf yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i awdurdodau cyhoeddus, wrth gyflawni eu swyddogaethau mewn perthynas â Chymru, wneud hynny mewn ffordd sy’n ceisio gwella bioamrywiaeth, yn hytrach na’i lleihau, ac wrth wneud hynny rhaid iddynt geisio gwneud ecosystemau yn fwy cydnerth.
translation.en: Section 6(1) of the Act requires that public authorities when carrying out their functions in relation to Wales do so in a way that aims to improve and not reduce biodiversity and that in doing they must seek to further the resilience of ecosystems.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r cynllun gael ei adolygu yn sgil adroddiad a gyhoeddir o dan is-adran (7).
translation.en: This plan must be reviewed in light of a report published under subsection (7).

translation.cy: Adrannau
translation.en: Sections

translation.cy: Adran (6)(4)(b)
translation.en: Section (6)(4)(b)
