translation.en: • work in real-life and mathematical contexts, using local examples where possible.

translation.cy: Mathemateg a Rhifedd 48
translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy 46

translation.cy: Defnyddiwyd y hyfedreddau cyd-ddibynnol canlynol9 wrth greu’r deilliannau cyﬂawniad ac maent yn greiddiol i gynnydd yn ystod pob cam o ddysgu mathemategol.
translation.en: The following interdependent proﬁciencies9 have been used to formulate the achievement outcomes and are central to progression at each stage of mathematics learning.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr broﬁ cysyniadau cynyddol gymhleth, dylent hefyd feithrin dealltwriaeth o’r berthynas rhwng y cysyniadau hyn ac o fewn y cysyniadau hyn.
translation.en: As learners experience increasingly complex concepts, they should also develop an understanding of the relationships between and within these concepts.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr broﬁ, deall a chymhwyso cysyniadau a pherthnasau sy’n gynyddol fwy cymhleth, dylai eu rhuglder wrth goﬁo ffeithiau, perthnasau a thechnegau wella.
translation.en: As learners experience, understand and apply increasingly complex concepts and relationships, ﬂuency in remembering facts, relationships and techniques should grow.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi grwpio setiau o wrthrychau neu luniau yn gategorïau, drwy broﬁadau ymarferol, a gallaf eu dosbarthu yn ôl un neu fwy o feini prawf.
translation.en: I have grouped sets of objects or pictures into categories, through practical experiences, and I can classify by one criterion or more.

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro fy nghanfyddiadau, cyﬁawnhau fy rhesymeg a gallaf werthuso llwyddiant fy null gweithredu.
translation.en: I can explain what I have found out, justify my reasoning and I can evaluate how well my method worked.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi dangos dealltwriaeth o’r mathau o ddata sydd eu hangen arnaf, gan gynnwys data arwahanol a di-dor.
translation.en: I have demonstrated an understanding of the kinds of data I need, including discrete and continuous data.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio gwahanol raddfeydd ar echeliniau i echdynnu a dehongli gwybodaeth o amrywiaeth o ddiagramau, tablau (gan gynnwys cronfeydd data) a grafﬁau, gan gynnwys siartiau cylch â ffracsiynau a chyfraneddau syml.
translation.en: I can use different scales on axes to extract and interpret information from a range of diagrams, tables (including databases) and graphs, including pie charts with simple fractions and proportions.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddewis rhagdybiaeth synhwyrol er mwyn ymchwilio ac rwyf wedi dangos dealltwriaetho’r dulliau y gallaf eu defnyddio i gasglu data perthnasol a phriodol.
translation.en: I can choose a sensible hypothesis to investigate and I have demonstrated an understanding of the methods I can use to collect appropriate data.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi trafod manteision ac anfanteision cymharol pob dull cyﬂwyno a gallaf gyﬁawnhau fy newis o ddull.
translation.en: I have discussed the relative advantages and disadvantages of each presentation method, and I can justify my choice of method.

translation.cy: Gallaf ofyn cwestiynau perthnasol er mwyn cadarnhau hygrededd y canfyddiadau.
translation.en: I can pose relevant questions to check the credibility of the ﬁndings.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi arbroﬁ â gwahanol ddulliau o gyﬂwyno data, gan gynnwys dulliau amlder cronnus, blwch a blewyn, a histogramau, er mwyn dehongli mesurau canolduedd a mesurau o wasgariad.
translation.en: I have experimented with different approaches to presenting data, including cumulative frequency, box and whisker, and histograms, to interpret measures of central tendency and measures of spread.

translation.cy: Gallaf wneud penderfyniadau gwybodus yn seiliedig ar dystiolaeth ystadegol, gan adnabod rhagfarn ac anomaleddau.
translation.en: I can make informed decisions based on statistical evidence, identifying bias and anomalies.

translation.cy: • Mynegir tebygolrwydd drwy rifau mewn sawl ffordd, e.e. drwy ddefnyddio canrannau, ffracsiynau a degolion, ac mae angen y cysylltiadau rhwng y cynrychioliadau er mwyn mynegi tebygolrwydd yn effeithiol.
translation.en: • Probability is expressed through number in various ways, e.g. through the use of percentages, fractions and decimals, and the connections between the representations is necessary for effective expression of probability.

translation.cy: • Llunio a dehongli amrywiaeth o grafﬁau.
translation.en: • Drawing and interpreting a range of graphs.

translation.cy: • Cyfartaleddau ac amrediad.
translation.en: • Averages and range.

translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.en: • through experiential learning in stimulating and relevant local contexts, use a sequential data-handling cycle to pose questions, then collect and sort a variety of purposeful data to answer questions

translation.en: By supporting learners to become successful in this area of learning and experience, they are therefore also supported to succeed across the whole curriculum.

translation.en: Where applicable, its provision will include opportunities to learn Welsh and English as additional languages (WAL/EAL) and to learn other home or community languages too.

translation.en: Further information on how the Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience can support this is provided in the ‘Developing a broad and balanced curriculum’ section of this document.

translation.cy: Bydd yn rhoi sylw arbennig i ddiwylliant gan gydnabod y cyswllt rhwng diwylliant ac iaith a deall sut mae’r cyswllt hwn yn bwysig i’n hymdeimlad o hunaniaeth, o’n lle ac o’n llais mewn cymdeithas.
translation.en: It has a focus on culture as it recognises the link between culture and language and understands how this link is fundamental to our sense of identity and of our place and voice in society.

translation.cy: Un agwedd ar ddysgu iaith yn effeithiol yw’r parodrwydd i fentro wrth roi cynnig ar greu seiniau a phatrymau newydd.
translation.en: A key aspect of effective language learning is the willingness to take risks in trying out new sounds and patterns;

translation.cy: Yn hyn o beth, mae Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu yn cyfrannu at ddatblygu dinasyddion egwyddorol, gwybodus Cymru a’r byd wrth i ddysgwyr ennill yr wybodaeth a’r sgiliau sydd eu hangen arnynt i gymryd rhan mewn cymdeithas a hynny’n hyderus a chydag empathi.
translation.en: In this sense, the Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience contributes to developing ethical, informed citizens of Wales and the world as learners gain the knowledge and skills they need to participate conﬁdently and empathetically in society.

translation.cy: Gan hyn felly, bydd y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn yn meithrin balchder dysgwyr yn eu hunaniaeth fel dinasyddion Cymru a’r byd.
translation.en: This area of learning and experience will therefore foster in the learners a pride in their sense of identity as citizens of Wales and the world.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr sy’n siarad ac yn ysgrifennu’n effeithiol yn barod i chwarae rhan lawn mewn bywyd a gwaith.
translation.en: Learners who speak and write effectively are prepared to play a full part in life and work.

translation.cy: Ym Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu, rhoddircyﬂeoedd i ddysgwyr siarad ac ysgrifennu er mwyn iddynt fod yn effeithiol wrth iddynt ryngweithio, archwilio syniadau, mynegi safbwyntiau, gwybodaeth a dealltwriaeth a meithrin cydberthnasau.
translation.en: In the Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience, learners will be given opportunities to speak and write in order to be effective as they interact, explore ideas, express viewpoints, knowledge and understanding and build relationships.

translation.cy: Byddant nid yn unig yn gallu gwerthfawrogi crefft y llenor ond byddant hefyd yn gallu meithrin eu sgiliau creadigol eu hunain.
translation.en: They will not only be enabled to appreciate a creator’s craft but also to develop their own creative skills.

translation.cy: mae hunaniaeth a diwylliant yn cynnig cyd-destun ar gyfer dysgu ieithoedd.
translation.en: identity and culture provide a context for learning languages.

translation.cy: Cynnydd o fewn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn
translation.en: Progression within this area of learning and experience

translation.cy: Cafodd y deilliannau cyﬂawniad eu datblygu ar sail continwwm neu fframwaith cynnydd mewn ieithoedd, gan ddechrau gyda dim iaith neu heb fawr ddim iaith a gweithio tuag at ruglder.
translation.en: The achievement outcomes have been developed based on a continuum or framework of progression in languages, starting with little or no language and working towards ﬂuency.

translation.cy: Dylai sgiliau darllen gael eu datblygu i gefnogi dysgu, e.e. echdynnu gwybodaeth a data perthnasol o dablau, siartiau, grafﬁau a thestun i gefnogi eu prosesau gwneud penderfyniadau.
translation.en: Reading skills should be developed to support learning, e.g. to extract relevant information and data from tables, charts, graphs and text in order to support their decision-making.

translation.cy: Gellir cael mynediad at lenyddiaeth drwy dechnoleg yn ogystal â rhagor o wybodaeth am themâu y deuir ar eu traws drwy lenyddiaeth, neu ymatebion gwahanol i lenyddiaeth.
translation.en: Literature can be accessed through technology as well as further information about themes encountered through literature, or differing responses to it.

translation.cy: Ar gyfer y datganiadau hyn o’r hyn sy’n bwysig, mae’r dimensiwn Cymreig a’r persbectif rhyngwladol yn ffurﬁo rhan allweddol.
translation.en: For these what matters statements the Welsh dimension and international perspective forms a key part.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn datblygu eu heffeithiolrwydd personol a’u hunanymwybyddiaeth wrth ddefnyddio ieithoedd a fydd yn eu tro yn cefnogi dysgu ar draws y cwricwlwm cyfan.
translation.en: Learners will develop their personal effectiveness and self-awareness when using languages which will in turn support learning across the whole curriculum.

translation.cy: Mae cyfathrebu a llythrennedd yn hanfodol i fod yn barod at yrfa, ynghyd â chymwyseddau cymdeithasol fel meddwl yn feirniadol, dadlau darbwyllol ac ymgyﬂwyno hyderus.
translation.en: Communication and literacy are essential to career readiness, as are social competencies such as critical thinking, persuasive argument and conﬁdent presentation.

translation.cy: Bydd y sgiliau trosglwyddadwy sydd wrth wraidd Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu yn cyfrannu at baratoi gweithlu ar gyfer proffesiynau a swyddi nad ydynt yn bodoli eto, er mwyn diwallu anghenion gyrfaoedd newydd ac sy’n datblygu.
translation.en: Importantly, the transferable skills which sit at the heart of the Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience contribute to the preparation of a workforce for professions and jobs that are not yet in existence, to meet the needs of new and emerging careers.

translation.cy: Mae Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu yn helpu dysgwyr i ddeall amrywiaeth a herio stereoteipiau er mwyn codi uchelgais dysgwyr a’u cred yn eu dyfodol posibl.
translation.en: The Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience helps learners to understand diversity and challenge stereotypes in order to raise learners’ aspirations and belief in their potential future.

translation.cy: • gwerthuso risgiau wrth ddatblygu syniad busnes ac ystyried gwahanol ffyrdd o sefydlu a chynnal menter.
translation.en: • evaluating risks when developing a business idea and exploring different methods of setting up and sustaining an enterprise.

translation.cy: Proﬁadau sy’n gysylltiedig â gwaith
translation.en: Work-related experiences

translation.cy: Gall cyﬂeoedd megis ymweliadau, siaradwyr gwadd a gweithgareddau ymarferol, helpu i wella’r dysgu a’i roi mewn cyd-destun.
translation.en: Opportunities such as visits, guest speakers and practical activities can help to enhance and contextualise learning.

translation.cy: • ystyried themâu mewn llenyddiaeth a’r cyfryngau sy’n ymwneud â stereoteipio a rhagfarn ar sail rhyw
translation.en: • explore themes in literature and media around stereotyping and gender bias

translation.en: Engaging with writers and hearing them read is a powerful motivator.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr angen rhywbeth i siarad ac ysgrifennu amdano, ac mae ymgorffori chwarae a’r amgylchedd awyr agored lle y bo modd yn ffordd o ddatblygu’r dychymyg a chynnig ysgogiadau iddynt fynegi eu hunain.
translation.en: Learners need something to speak and write about, and incorporating play and the outdoor environment where possible provides a means of developing imagination and stimuli for expressing themselves.

translation.cy: Mae dysgu drwy broﬁad yn creu cymhelliant ac awydd i ddysgu a defnyddio ieithoedd.
translation.en: Experiential learning generates motivation and an appetite for learning and using languages.

translation.en: Listening and reading as well as speaking and writing exist in relation to each other and not separately.

translation.en: Learners’ experiences of literature will inﬂuence their ability to use language creatively to express themselves.

translation.en: I can see connections between and across languages, and can show an appreciation and understanding of the diversity of languages.

translation.en: I can analyse and evaluate cultural connections, attitudes, assumptions, behaviours and linguistic similarities and differences.

translation.cy: Iechyd a Lles 06
translation.en: Health and Well-being 06

translation.cy: Mae datblygu iechyd a lles y corff yn arwain at fuddiannau gydol oes.
translation.en: Developing physical health and well-being has lifelong beneﬁts.

translation.cy: Drwy ddeall hyn, bydd dysgwyr yn gallu datblygu ymddygiad sy’n eu helpu i barchu ac i ofalu amdanynt eu hunain ac eraill.
translation.en: From this understanding, learners will be able to develop positive, informed behaviours that support them both to care for and to respect themselves and others.

translation.cy: Caiff dysgwyr eu cynorthwyo i ddatblygu’r sgiliau sydd eu hangen i ystyried dewisiadau yn feirniadol.Cânt hefyd eu cynorthwyo i ddeall beth yw risg a chanlyniadau posibl eu penderfyniadau, a sut y gall eu penderfyniadau effeithio arnynt hwy eu hunain ac ar eraill.
translation.en: Learners will be supported to develop the skills necessary to critically consider choices, and to understand the risks and possible consequences of their decisions for themselves and others.

translation.cy: Mae’r ffordd rydym yn ymgysylltu â dylanwadau cymdeithasol gwahanol yn siapio pwy ydym ni a’n hiechyd a’n lles.
translation.en: How we engage with different social inﬂuences shapes who we are and our health and well-being.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn darganfod sut y cânt eu dylanwadu gan y rhain mewn sawl cyd-destunau amrywiol, gan gynnwys gwahanol grwpiau cyfoedion, diwylliannau gwahanol, y cyfryngau a’r byd ar-lein.
translation.en: Learners will ﬁnd out how they are inﬂuenced by a range of social contexts, including by different peer groups, different cultures, the media and the online world.

translation.cy: Mae’r dylanwadau hyn yn cyﬂwyno a gorfodi normau a gwerthoedd sy’n ymwneud ag amrywiaeth o faterion sy’n effeithio ar iechyd a lles.
translation.en: These inﬂuences present and enforce norms and values about a range of issues affecting health and well-being.

translation.cy: Drwy feithrin dealltwriaeth o hyn, bydd dysgwyr yn meithrin dealltwriaeth o’r ffordd y mae eu penderfyniadau, eu cydberthnasau a’u proﬁadau yn cael eu siapio gan ddylanwadau cymdeithasol a grwpiau cymdeithasol, a bydd y ddealltwriaeth hon wedyn yn eu galluogi i wneud dewisiadau cadarnhaol a gwybodus.
translation.en: From understanding this, learners will gain an understanding of how their own decisions, relationships and experiences are shaped by social inﬂuences; this understanding will enable them to make positive, informed choices.

translation.cy: Ar y naill law, bydd angen iddynt allu adnabod, dilyn a hyrwyddo normau cadarnhaol, ac ar y llall bydd angen iddynt allu adnabod, gwrthod a herio normau niweidiol er mwyn osgoi ymddwyn mewn ffordd sy’n niweidio eu hiechyd a’u lles eu hunain ac iechyd a lles eraill.
translation.en: On the one hand, they will need to be able to identify, follow and promote positive norms, and on the other hand, recognise, reject and challenge harmful ones, so that they can avoid behaviours that are detrimental to their own health and well-being and that of others.

translation.cy: Drwy gydnabod a dilyn normau cadarnhaol, gall dysgwyr fod yn aelodau llawn a gweithredol o amrywiaeth o grwpiau cymdeithasol.
translation.en: Recognising and following positive norms enables learners to be full and active members of a range of social groups.

translation.cy: • Effaith ymddygiad ar-lein cadarnhaol a negyddol ar iechyd meddwl a lles emosiynol.

translation.cy: Bydd y Dyniaethau yn cynnig cyﬂeoedd i bob dysgwr ddysgu am ei dreftadaeth ac ymdeimlad o le drwy astudio ei gyneﬁn a Chymru.
translation.en: Humanities will provide opportunities for all learners to learn about their heritage and sense of place through a study of their cyneﬁn and of Wales.

translation.cy: O ganlyniad, bydd y Dyniaethau yn helpu dysgwyr i weld sut mae eu stori bersonol yn rhan o ddarlun ehangach o’r gorffennol a’r presennol.
translation.en: Consequently, Humanities will help learners see how their personal story is part of a wider picture of the past and present.

translation.cy: Cwricwlwm gweddnewidiol
translation.en: A transformational curriculum

translation.cy: Mae Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Dyniaethau yn greiddiol o ran sicrhau bod dysgwyr yn dod yn ddinasyddion egwyddorol, gwybodus yng Nghymru a’r byd drwy fynd i’r afael â materion cyfoes a hanesyddol, archwilio proﬁadau dynol ar garreg eu drws a ledled y byd, ac ystyried gwahanol persbectifau.
translation.en: The Humanities Area of Learning and Experience is central to learners becoming ethical, informed citizens of Wales and the world through engaging with contemporary and historical issues, exploring human experiences on their own doorstep and across the globe, and contemplating different perspectives.

translation.cy: Gofynnir iddynt ystyried effaith eu gweithredoedd a gweithredoedd pobl eraill, a sut y caiff y gweithredoedd hyn eu llywio gan ddehongliadau o hawliau dynol, gwerthoedd, moeseg, safbwyntiau crefyddol ac anghrefyddol, ac athroniaethau.
translation.en: They will be asked to consider the impact of their actions and the actions of others, and how these are shaped by interpretations of human rights, values, ethics, religious and non-religious views, and philosophies.

translation.cy: Bydd gan ddysgwyr fan diogel i drafod a myfyrio a fydd yn rhoi amser iddynt ystyried eu persbectifau personol am faterion sy’n ymwneud â bydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol, heriau egwyddorol a materion cynhwysiant cymdeithasol.
translation.en: Learners will have the safe space for discussion and reﬂection which allows time to explore their personal perspectives on religious and non-religious world views, ethical challenges and social inclusion issues.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr hefyd yn deall mai ymgais i ddeall y cyﬂwr dynol yw’r ymholi hwn, yn ogystal â phroses.
translation.en: Learners will also understand that, as well as being a process, enquiry is a quest to understand the human condition.

translation.cy: Mae cymdeithasau dynol yn gymhleth ac yn amrywiol, ac maent yn cael eu llywio gan weithredoedd a chredoau pobl.
translation.en: Human societies are complex and diverse, and shaped by human actions and beliefs.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn galluogi dysgwyr i ymroi i weithredu cymdeithasol fel dinasyddion gofalgar a chyfranogol o’u cymunedau lleol a byd-eang, gan ddangos ymrwymiad i gyﬁawnder, amrywiaeth a diogelu’r amgylchedd.
translation.en: This will enable learners to take committed social action as caring, participative citizens of their local and global communities, showing a dedication to justice, diversity and the protection of the environment.

translation.cy: • y gallu i weithio gyda nifer gynyddol a mwy sofﬁstigedig o ffynonellau o wybodaeth
translation.en: • an ability to work with an increasing number and sophistication of sources of information

translation.cy: Fel conglfaen hollbwysig ar gyfer datblygu sgiliau bywyd a dilyn y cwricwlwm, dylai dysgwyr gael cyﬂeoedd i gyﬂeu eu syniadau a’u safbwyntiau ar lafar.
translation.en: As a vital building block for developing life skills and accessing the curriculum, learners should be provided with opportunities to communicate their ideas and viewpoints orally.

translation.cy: Gall cysyniadau megis ymwybyddiaeth gronolegol a graddfa gael eu datblygu a’u trafod, wrth edrych ar y ffordd y mae cydberthnasau dynol wedi effeithio ar fyd natur.
translation.en: Concepts such as chronological awareness and scale can be developed and discussed, as you look at how human relationships have impacted upon the natural world.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr ddangos dealltwriaeth o bwrpas a chynulleidfa wrth ddefnyddio amrywiaeth o feddalwedd a chyfryngau i gyﬂeu eu gwybodaeth, eu dealltwriaeth a’u hymatebion personol.
translation.en: Learners should show an understanding of purpose and audience as they use a range of software and media to communicate their own knowledge, understanding and personal responses.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr wneud defnydd cynyddol o dechnoleg ddigidol i ymholi ac ymchwilio, mae sicrhau dibynadwyedd y ffynonellau hyn yn hollbwysig wrth iddynt geisio ategu casgliadau.
translation.en: As learners increasingly use digital technology to enquire and investigate, ensuring the reliability of these sources is critical as they look to support conclusions.

translation.cy: Dylai ystyriaeth o fusnesau, diwylliannau, hanes, daearyddiaeth, gwleidyddiaeth, crefyddau, cymdeithasau Cymru a bydolygon fod yn rhan ganolog o hawl dysgwyr a chynnwys dealltwriaeth o’r cysylltiadau rhwng y rhain a chyd-destunau ehangach cenedlaethol, Ewropeaidd a rhyngwladol.
translation.en: An exploration of Welsh businesses, cultures, history, geography, politics, religions, societies, and world views should form a central part of a learners’ entitlement and include an understanding of the links between these and wider national, European and international contexts.

translation.cy: Cynllunio a threfnu, ac Effeithiolrwydd personol
translation.en: Planning and organising, and Personal effectiveness

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn helpu dysgwyr i ddeall amrywiaeth a herio stereoteipiau er mwyn codi uchelgais dysgwyr a’u cred yn eu dyfodol posibl.
translation.en: Humanities help learners to understand diversity and to challenge stereotypes in order to raiselearners’ aspirations and belief in their potential future.

translation.cy: • dangos a chymhwyso’r sgiliau a ddysgwyd mewn perthynas â’r byd gwaith
translation.en: • demonstrating and applying the skills learned in relation to the world of work

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn helpu dysgwyr i feithrin dealltwriaeth o hawliau cyﬂogaeth, entrepreneuriaeth foesegol, moeseg busnes, rhoi/cael benthyg arian, a hyrwyddo prosesau ac arferion diwydiannol gwyrdd cynaliadwy.
translation.en: Humanities helps learners foster an understanding of employment rights, ethical entrepreneurship, business ethics, money lending/borrowing, and promoting sustainable green industrial processes and practices.

translation.cy: Gall cydweithio ag unigolion a chyﬂogwyr a chyﬂeoedd i gysylltu â nhw, er enghraifft mewn llywodraeth leol, lletygarwch, ymarferwyr y gyfraith, banciau a chymdeithasau adeiladu, addysgu, iechyd a diogelwch, roi cyﬂeoedd i ddysgwyr ddysgu am waith, cyﬂogaeth a’r sgiliau a werthfawrogir yn y gweithle.
translation.en: Collaboration and access to individuals and employers, for example in local government, hospitality, law practitioners, banks and building societies, teaching, health and safety, can provide learners with opportunities to learn about work, employment and the skills valued in the workplace.

translation.cy: Dylai’rcyﬂeoedd ymgysylltu gynnwys mynychu ffeiriau gyrfaoedd a sgiliau, sgyrsiau gan ddarparwyr addysg bellach ac uwch ac ymweliadau gan y darparwyr hynny, yn ogystal â chyﬂwyniadau gan fyfyrwyr mewn addysg bellach neu uwch.
translation.en: Opportunities for engagement should include attending careers and skills fairs, talks from and visits to further and higher education providers, as well as presentations from students in further or higher education.

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn mynd i’r afael â gwahaniaethu ar sail cyfeiriadedd rhywiol neu hunaniaeth o ran rhywedd ac yn cynnig cyﬂeoedd i ddysgwyr ystyried eu diwylliannau eu hunain a diwylliannau eraill.
translation.en: Humanities addresses discrimination based on sexual orientation or gender identity and offers learners opportunities to explore their own and others’ cultures.

translation.cy: Trais a chadw’n ddiogel
translation.en: Violence and staying safe

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn rhoi cyﬂe i ddysgwyr ddeall yr heriau sy’n wynebu pobl yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: Humanities provides learners with the opportunity to understand the challenges facing people in Wales and the wider world.

translation.cy: Mae gan bob cymdeithas, diwylliant a chenhadaeth ei gredoau/chredoau ei hun ynglŷn ag ymddygiadau rhywiol ac mae’n bwysig gwybod y ffeithiau.
translation.en: Every society, culture and generation has its own beliefs about sexual behaviours and it is important to know the facts.

translation.cy: Mae cynhadledd maes llafur cytûn yn datblygu cynnwys y cwricwlwm ar gyfer addysg grefyddol ym mhob ardal awdurdod lleol.
translation.en: An agreed syllabus conference develops the curriculum content for religious education in each local authority area.

translation.cy: Nid ydym yn bwriadu newid y gofyniad i ysgolion gyﬂwyno’r maes llafur cytûn.
translation.en: We do not intend to make any change to the requirement for schools to deliver the agreed syllabus.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, mae dysgu drwy broﬁad yn rhoi cyﬂe i blant ymwneud â gweithgareddau chwarae rôl neu gymryd rhan mewn gweithgareddau megis dathliadau neu ddigwyddiadau ail-greu.
translation.en: For example, experiential learning gives learners opportunities to engage in role play or to participate in activities such as celebrations or re-enactments.

translation.cy: Mae pedwar diben y cwricwlwm yn allweddol fel sbardun i’r broses o ddatblygu cwricwlwm y Dyniaethau.
translation.en: The four purposes of the curriculum are the key drivers for developing the Humanities curriculum.

translation.cy: Mae’r annibyniaeth hon yn golygu y gellir addasu cynnwys er mwyn diwallu gwahanol anghenion dysgwyr.
translation.en: This autonomy allows for content to be adapted to suit the differing needs of learners.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn rhoi hyblygrwydd a mwy o gyﬂeoedd i sicrhau bod modd i ddysgwyr lywio eu dysgu.
translation.en: This allows for ﬂexibility and greater opportunities to ensure that learners’ input can help shape their learning.

translation.cy: • caniatáu i ddysgwyr feithrin dealltwriaeth drylwyr o’u hardal leol, o Gymru ac o’r byd ehangach • gynhenid ddiddorol, perthnasol ac ysgogol i ddysgwyr
translation.en: • allows learners to gain a thorough understanding of their locality, of Wales and the wider world • is intrinsically interesting, relevant and stimulating for learners

translation.cy: • cynnig cyﬂeoedd ar gyfer meysydd pwnc eang, ac astudiaethau manylach
translation.en: • provides opportunities for both broad topic areas, and more detailed studies

translation.cy: Rhwng 14 ac 16 oed, bydd y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn yn caniatáu i ddysgwyr ddilyn eu diddordebau’n fanylach wrth iddynt gamu ymlaen, felly byddant yn gallu arbenigo mewn un ddisgyblaeth neu fwy, ond gan gadw’r hawl i broﬁad eang o’r dyniaethau ar yr un pryd.
translation.en: At ages 14 to 16, this area of learning and experience will allow learners to follow their interests in more depth as they progress, so that they can specialise in one or more discipline, while also maintaining a broad humanities entitlement.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn hefyd yn paratoi dysgwyr i arbenigo ymhellach ym maes addysg bellach ac addysg uwch, ac yn y byd gwaith.
translation.en: This will also pave the way for further specialisation during further and higher education, and in the world of work.

translation.cy: Bydd taith y dysgwyr drwy’r Dyniaethau yn daith o ymholi a darganfod, wrth iddynt gael eu hannog i fod yn chwilfrydig ac i gwestiynu, i feddwl yn feirniadol a myfyrio ar dystiolaeth.
translation.en: Learners’ journey through Humanities will be characterised by enquiry and discovery, as they are encouraged to be curious and to question, to think critically and to reﬂect upon evidence.

translation.cy: Yn wir, mae’r broses ymholi yn cynnig cyﬂeoedd i hunanfyfyrio sy’n ychwanegu ystyr at eu bywydau eu hunain ac yn cyfrannu at eu hymdeimlad o’u lle yn y byd.
translation.en: Indeed, enquiry enables self-reﬂection which adds meaning to their own lives and contributes to their sense of place in the world.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 23
translation.en: Humanities 23

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi datblygu ac wedi arwain fy ymholiadau fy hun sy’n canolbwyntio ar fy nghredoau,
translation.en: I have developed and led my own enquiries focusing on my locality, Wales, and the wider world, now and in the past.

translation.cy: Gallaf werthuso’n annibynnol lwyddiant fy ymholiadau, awgrymu gwelliannau a mireinio fy methodoleg ar gyfer ymholiadau yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: I can independently evaluate the success of my enquiries, suggest improvements and reﬁne my methodology for future enquires.

translation.cy: Mae cymdeithasau dynol yn gymhleth ac yn amrywiol, ac maent yn cael eu llywio gan weithredoedd a chredoau pobl.
translation.en: Human societies are complex and diverse, and are shaped by human actions and beliefs.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn awgrymu ymhle gellid ystyried gwahanol elfennau o ddysgu gyda’i gilydd er mwyn cefnogi dysgu sy’n fwy holistaidd.
translation.en: It also suggests where different elements of learning could be considered together in order to support more holistic learning.

translation.cy: • mynd i’r afael â phrosesau cwestiynu athronyddol
translation.en: • engagement with philosophical questioning

translation.cy: • gynnal ymholiadau sy’n ymwneud â themâu disgyblaethol a rhyng-ddisgyblaethol
translation.en: • undertake enquiries relating to both interdisciplinary and disciplinary themes

translation.cy: • dehongli canfyddiadau er mwyn dod i gasgliad neu ffurﬁo barn
translation.en: • interpret ﬁndings in order to draw a conclusion or make a judgement

translation.cy: • trefnu a chyﬂwyno canfyddiadau yn briodol, gan ddefnyddio technegau digidol lle y bo’n briodol
translation.en: • arrange and present ﬁndings appropriately, using digital techniques when appropriate

translation.cy: • myfyrio ar ymholiadau, gofyn cwestiynau am y broses ddysgu, ac edrych ymlaen hefyd i weld beth fydd cam nesaf yr ymholiad
translation.en: • reﬂect on enquiries, ask questions about the learning process, and also look forward to where an enquiry is leading next

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: • ymholiadau sy’n canolbwyntio ar ardal leol dysgwyr, Cymru a’r byd ehangach yn y gorffennol a’r presennol
translation.en: • enquiries focusing on learners’ locality, Wales and the wider world in the past and present

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr wybod:
translation.en: Learners need to know:

translation.cy: • dehongli, cynnal dadansoddiad beirniadol a gwerthuso amrywiaeth eang o dystiolaeth ysgrifenedig, weledol, fﬁsegol a llafar, gan gynnwys tystiolaeth ffeithiol, athronyddol a dehongliadol
translation.en: • interpret, critically analyse and evaluate a wide range of written, visual, physical and oral evidence, including factual, philosophical and interpretative evidence

translation.cy: • gynnal ymholiadau sy’n canolbwyntio ar gwestiynau a materion rhyngddisgyblaethol yn ogystal â rhai pwnc-benodol
translation.en: • undertake enquiries that are focused on interdisciplinary as well as subject-focused questions and issues

translation.cy: • dehongli canfyddiadau er mwyn dod i gasgliad y mae modd ei gyﬁawnhau, cyﬂwyno’r casgliad hwnnw a’i ategu
translation.en: • interpret ﬁndings in order to draw, present and justify substantiated conclusions

translation.cy: YR HYN SY’N BWYSIG  YN Y DYNIAETHAU
translation.en: WHAT MATTERS IN HUMANITIES

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi cael cyﬂeoedd i drafod fy marn a’m syniadau â phobl eraill.
translation.en: I have had opportunities to discuss my opinions and ideas with other people.

translation.cy: Gallaf roi tystiolaeth ar gyfer dadl neu safbwynt a chyﬂwyno gwrthddadleuon.
translation.en: I can give evidence for an argument or viewpoint and present counterarguments.

translation.cy: Gallaf werthuso a dod i gasgliad am ddehongliadau a safbwyntiau o amrywiaeth o ffynonellau a thystiolaeth.
translation.en: I can infer and evaluate interpretations and viewpoints from a range of sources and evidence.

translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Hanes
translation.en: History

translation.cy: Addysg grefyddol
translation.en: Religious education

translation.cy: Cysylltiadau o fewn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn
translation.en: Links within this area of learning and experience

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn awgrymu lle gellid cyfoethogi dysgu drwy wneud cysylltiadau rhwng y datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig ar draws yr holl feysydd dysgu a phroﬁad.
translation.en: This section suggests where learning can be enriched through drawing links between other what matters statements across all the areas of learning and experience.

translation.cy: Mathemateg a Rhifedd
translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ:
translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i fynd i’r afael ag amrywiaeth o faterion yn eu cymuned leol er mwyn datblygu eu persbectif personol ar eu hardal leol
translation.en: • opportunities to engage with a range of issues in their local community to develop their own perspective on their locality

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr allu a gwybod sut i:
translation.en: Learners need to know how to and be able to:

translation.cy: • archwilio gwahanol ddehongliadau o bobl, cymdeithasau, cyfnodau amser a digwyddiadau;
translation.en: • explore different interpretations of people, societies, periods of time and events;

translation.cy: rôl busnes;
translation.en: the role of businesses;

translation.cy: • archwilio haenau o ystyr o fewn cynrychioliadau symbolaidd.
translation.en: • explore layers of meaning within symbolic representations.

translation.cy: • sut mae penderfyniadau economaidd busnesau a diwydiannau wedi effeithio ar broﬁadau a phersbectifau
translation.en: • how the economic decisions of business and industries has impacted on experiences and perspectives

translation.cy: Byddant yn dysgu hefyd ystyried sut y gall proﬁad o’r byd naturiol gyfrannu at eu datblygiad ysbrydol a’u lles, ac ennyn ynddynt ymdeimlad o le ac ymdeimlad o berthyn, fel sy’n cael ei ymgorffori yn y gair cyneﬁn.
translation.en: They will learn also how experiencing the wonder of the natural world can contribute to their spiritual development and well-being, and cultivate a sense of place and sense of belonging, as embodied in the Welsh word cyneﬁn.

translation.cy: Egwyddorion cynnydd yw’r sail ar gyfer datblygu’r deilliannau cyﬂawniad a dylent lywio dilyniant y dysgu o fewn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad.
translation.en: Principles of progression are the basis on which the achievement outcomes have been developed and should guide the progression of learning within the area of learning and experience.

translation.cy: • sofﬁstigeiddrwydd gwell o ran dealltwriaeth gysyniadol, a fydd yn caniatáu i ddysgwyr weld y tu hwnt i restr o ffeithiau a mynd i’r afael â’r syniadau hynny sy’n sail i ddisgyblaethau’r Dyniaethau, a’r modd y mae’r rhain yn cysylltu â’i gilydd mewn gwahanol gyd-destunau
translation.en: • increased sophistication of conceptual understanding, whereby learners see beyond a list of facts and engage with those ideas that underpin the disciplines that make up Humanities, and how these interrelate in different contexts

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Gallaf ddisgriﬁo’r modd y mae gweithredoedd dynol wedi arwain at barhad a newid yn y byd naturiol yn ystod gwahanol gyfnodau hanes.
translation.en: I can describe how human actions have led to both continuity and change in the natural world in different periods of history.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 50
translation.en: Humanities 49

translation.cy: Gallaf archwilio ystod eang o fydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol am y byd naturiol,a’r cyfrifoldeb sydd gan y ddynoliaeth i’w warchod.
translation.en: I can examine a broad range of religious and non-religious world views about the natural world and the responsibility humanity has towards it.

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro rhai bydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol am natur bywyd a marwolaeth, a chredoau am fywyd ar ôl marwolaeth a’r cysyniad o Realiti Eithaf.
translation.en: I can explain some religious and non-religious world views about the nature of life and death and beliefs about life after death and the concept of Ultimate Reality.

translation.cy: Gallaf werthuso cost amgylcheddol gweithgarwch busnes ac awgrymu strategaethau o’r modd y gall gwahanol fusnesau ymateb i faterion amgylcheddol.
translation.en: I can evaluate the environmental cost of business activity and suggest strategies as to how different businesses can respond to environmental issues.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddeall ac egluro’r modd y gall amgylcheddau fod o dan fygythiad.
translation.en: I can understand and explain how environments can become threatened.

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro a gwerthuso ystod o fydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol sylweddol am y cysyniadau o Realiti Eithaf, natur bywyd a marwolaeth, a chredoau am fywyd ar ôl marwolaeth.
translation.en: I can explain and evaluate a range of signiﬁcant religious and non-religious world views about the concepts of Ultimate Reality, the nature of life and death, and beliefs about life after death.

translation.cy: Mae datblygu meddwl ymholgar yn galluogi dysgwyr i archwilio ac ymchwilio i’r byd,i’w orffennol, ei bresennol a’i ddyfodol, drostynt eu hunain.
translation.en: Developing an enquiring mind enables learners to explore and investigate the world, past, present and future, for themselves.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 53
translation.en: Humanities 52

translation.cy: Celfyddydau Mynegiannol
translation.en: Expressive Arts

translation.cy: Proﬁadau, gwybodaeth a sgiliau
translation.en: Experiences, knowledge and skills

translation.cy: • cyﬂeu eu teimladau a’u syniadau am nodweddion lleoedd cyfarwydd
translation.en: • communicate their feelings and ideas about the features of familiar places

translation.cy: • dangos ymwybyddiaeth o rai bydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol am y byd naturiol, gan gynnwys am darddiadau’r byd naturiol
translation.en: • show awareness of some religious and non-religious world views about the natural world, including about the origins of the natural world

translation.cy: • disgriﬁo rhai o’r effeithiau y mae pobl fel defnyddwyr a chynhyrchwyr yn eu cael ar leoedd,amgylcheddau a thirweddau
translation.en: • describe some of the effects that humans as consumers and producers have on places, environments and landscapes

translation.cy: • achosion ac effeithiau y prosesau fﬁsegol sy’n llywio lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau
translation.en: • the causes and effects of physical processes that shape places, environments and landscapes

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr allu a gwybod sut i:
translation.en: Learners need to know how to and be able to:

translation.cy: • roi disgriﬁadau manwl o leoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau, gan gynnwys nodweddion a thirffurﬁau nodedig, a nodi’r mathau o gymunedau dynol a natur y cymunedau hynny
translation.en: • give detailed descriptions of place, environments and landscapes, including distinctive features and landforms, and type and nature of human communities

translation.cy: O ganlyniad, daw dysgwyr i ddeall y gall y dewisiadau y mae pob un ohonom yn eu gwneud, yn unigol ac ar y cyd, gael effeithiau sylweddol.
translation.en: Consequently, learners will come to realise that the choices we all make, individually and collectively, can have major impacts.

translation.cy: Cânt eu hannog hefyd i archwilio a meithrin dealltwriaeth oddefgar ac empathetig o’r amrywiol gredoau, gwerthoedd, traddodiadau a moesegau sy’n sail i gymdeithas ddynol ac sy’n dylanwadu arni.
translation.en:
They will also be encouraged to explore – and develop a
tolerant and empathetic understanding of – the varied beliefs, values, traditions and ethics that underpin and shape human society.

translation.cy: Egwyddorion cynnydd
translation.en: Principles of progression

translation.cy: Gallaf ddilyniannu digwyddiadau a deall y gellir rhannu’r gorffennol yn gyfnodau amser.
translation.en: I can sequence events and understand that the past can be divided into periods of time.

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod rhai achosion a chanlyniadau digwyddiadau a newidiadau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol.
translation.en: I can identify some causes and consequences of events and changes in the past and present.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio termau cyffredin i ddisgriﬁo cyfnodau amser a threigl amser.
translation.en: I can use common terms to describe periods and passage of time.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro a gwerthuso cyfraniadau pobl at gymdeithas yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: I can explain and evaluate people’s contributions to Welsh society and the wider world.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddadansoddi’n feirniadol ystod o nodweddion tebyg a gwahaniaethau cymhleth rhwng amrywiol gymdeithasau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol, gan gynnwys lleoliad daearyddol, diwylliannol, crefyddol, gwleidyddol, bydolygon ac economaidd.
translation.en: I can critically analyse a range of complex similarities and differences between diverse societies in the past and present, including through reference to geographical location, culture, religion, politics, world views and the economy.

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro achosion a natur anghydraddoldebau rhwng cymdeithasau ac o fewn cymdeithasau.
translation.en: I can explain the causes and nature of inequalities between and within societies.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn awgrymu lle gellid cyfoethogi dysgu drwy wneud cysylltiadau rhwng y datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig ar draws Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Dyniaethau.
translation.en: This section suggests where learning can be enriched through drawing links between other what matters statements across the Humanities Area of Learning and Experience.

translation.cy: • Ymholiadau sy’n canolbwyntio ar nodweddion tebyg a gwahaniaethau cymdeithasol.
translation.en: • Enquiries focusing on social sameness and difference.

translation.cy: Mae digwyddiadau a phroﬁadau yn gymhleth a chânt eu canfod, eu dehongli a’u cynrychioli mewn gwahanol ffyrdd.
translation.en: Events and human experiences are complex, and are perceived, interpreted and represented in different ways.

translation.cy: Mae dinasyddion gwybodus, hunanymwybodol yn mynd i’r afael â’r heriau a’r cyﬂeoeddsy’n wynebu dynoliaeth, ac yn gallu cymryd camau ystyrlon, egwyddorol a chynaliadwy.
translation.en: Informed, self-aware citizens engage with the challenges and opportunities that face humanity, and are able to take considered, ethical and sustainable action.

translation.cy: • ddefnyddio llinellau amser syml i ddilyniannu digwyddiadau sy’n gyfarwydd iddynt dros raddfa amser fer, a defnyddio geiriau allweddol priodol i amcangyfrif, mesur a disgriﬁo treigl amser
translation.en: • use simple timelines to sequence events that they are familiar with over a short timescale, and use appropriate key words to estimate, measure and describe the passage of time

translation.cy: • yr hyn sy’n debyg ac yn wahanol rhwng y ffordd yr oedd ac y mae pobl yn byw mewn gwahanol leoedd ac ar wahanol adegau, gan gynnwys dealltwriaeth benodol o’r modd y gallai bywydau plant a phobl ifanc yn y gorffennol fod wedi bod yn wahanol i fywydau plant a phobl ifanc heddiw.
translation.en: • the similarities and differences between the way people live and have lived in different times and different places, including a speciﬁc understanding of how children and young people in the past may have had different lives from children and young people today.

translation.cy: • cymharu a chyferbynnu agweddau ar eu bywydau nhw â chyfnod yn y gorffennol neu bobl mewn gwahanol leoliad.
translation.en: • compare and contrast aspects of their lives with a time in the past or people in a different place.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr wybod:
translation.en: Learners should know:

translation.cy: • nad oes gan bawb yr un credoau ac y gall hyn achosi gwrthdaro ac anghytuno.
translation.en: • that not everyone shares the same beliefs and that this can cause conﬂict and disagreement.

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i archwilio ac ymgysylltu â’u cymunedau a thu hwnt, drwy straeon, dathliadau,gwrthrychau, digwyddiadau a thraddodiadau, a chyﬂeu eu teimladau amdanynt
translation.en: • opportunities to explore and engage with their communities and beyond, through stories, celebrations, objects, events and traditions, and to communicate their feelings about them

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i ddefnyddio technoleg ddigidol i gymryd rhan mewn ymweliadau rhithwir ac i gyfathrebu ag amrywiaeth o bobl mewn cymuned fyd-eang
translation.en: • opportunities to use digital technology to participate in virtual visits and to communicate with a range of people in a global community

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr wybod:
translation.en: Learners need to know:

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ:
translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.cy: • ddefnyddio map neu fframwaith cronolegol cynyddol fanwl er mwyn creu cysylltiadau a chymariaethau ystyrlon rhwng nodweddion gwahanol gyfnodau o amser, a fydd yn galluogi dysgwyr i adnabod deinamig parhad a newid dros gyfnodau o amrywiol hyd, ac i gysylltu patrymau a thueddiadau â phrosesau hanesyddol mwy o faint
translation.en: • use an increasingly detailed chronological map or framework to make meaningful connections and comparisons between characteristics of different periods of time, which will allow learners to recognise the dynamics of continuity and change over periods of varying lengths, and relate patterns and trends to larger historical processes

translation.cy: Egwyddorion cynnydd
translation.en: Principles of progression

translation.cy: Gallaf ddisgriﬁo effaith bosibl fy ngweithredoedd arnaf i fy hun ac ar genedlaethau’r dyfodol.
translation.en: I can describe the potential impact of my actions on myself and future generations.

translation.cy: Gallaf werthuso achosion sylfaenol materion a mudiadau hawliau dynol cyfoes yng Nghymrua’r byd ehangach, a’r amrywiol ffactorau sy’n tanseilio neu’n ategu hawliau pobl.
translation.en: I can evaluate the underlying causes of current human rights issues and movements in Wales and the wider world, and the various factors that undermine or support people’s rights.

translation.cy: Bydd Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Celfyddydau Mynegiannol yn cynnig proﬁadau ystyrlon i’r dysgwyr a fydd yn eu galluogi i ddod i ddeall a gwerthfawrogi’r cymunedau amrywiol sydd yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: The Expressive Arts Area of Learning and Experience will afford learners meaningful experiences through which they can gain an understanding and an appreciation of the diverse communities of Wales as well as the wider world.

translation.cy: Yn bwysig iawn, bydd y maes dysgu a phroﬁad yn sicrhau bod y Celfyddydau Mynegiannol yn agored ac yn hygyrch i bawb, a thrwy’r ymagwedd gynhwysol hon, bydd yn ehangu gorwelion pob dysgwr.
translation.en: Importantly, the area of learning and experience will make the Expressive Arts accessible to all and through this inclusive approach expand the horizons of every learner.

translation.cy: galluoedd sy’n fuddiol i ddysgu yn fwy cyffredinol.
translation.en: capacities that have beneﬁts across learning more widely.

translation.cy: At hyn, mae’r gwerthuso sy’n rhan o’r broses greadigol yn galluogi’r dysgwyr i archwilio materion cymhleth.
translation.en: In addition, the evaluation involved in the creative process enables learners to explore complex issues.

translation.cy: Mae’n eu galluogi i herio canfyddiadau a rhagdybiaethau ac i ddod o hyd i atebion sy’n arwain at well dealltwriaeth o’u hunaniaeth ddiwylliannol eu hunain ynghyd â hunianaethau diwylliannol pobl, lleoedd a chyfnodau eraill.
translation.en: It enables them to challenge perceptions and identify solutions which lead to a better understanding of their own cultural identity and those of other people, places and times.

translation.cy: Mae’r Celfyddydau Mynegiannol yn cynnig cyfrwng pwerus i ddysgwyr archwilio nid yn unig eu hetifeddiaeth ddiwylliannol eu hunain ond hefyd etifeddiaeth ddiwylliannol gwahanol bobl, gwahanol leoedd a gwahanol gyfnodau.
translation.en: The Expressive Arts offer a powerful medium for learners to explore not only their own cultural heritage but also that of different people, places and times.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig yn dilyn trywydd unionsyth.
translation.en: What matters statements are not linear.

translation.cy: Mae’r pedair egwyddor cynnydd yn y Celfyddydau Mynegiannol yn ddefnyddiol wrth ddisgriﬁo cynnydd dysgwyr yn fras, ond gan lwyddo i gyﬂeu rhywfaint o natur ‘droellog’ gwaith dysgu yn y Celfyddydau Mynegiannol.
translation.en: The four principles of progression in Expressive Arts are helpful in describing learner progression in broad terms, while also capturing something of the ‘spiral’ nature of learning in Expressive Arts.

translation.cy: Mae’r Celfyddydau Mynegiannol yn cynnig amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau cyfoethog lle y gellir atgyfnerthu, datblygu, cymhwyso ac ehangu sgiliau llythrennedd dysgwyr.
translation.en: Expressive Arts provides a range of rich contexts where learners’ literacy skills can be reinforced, developed, applied and extended.

translation.cy: Bydd archwilio a dod i gysylltiad ag amrywiaeth o destunau hefyd yn cynnig cyﬂeoedd i ddatblygu strategaethau darllen ac, yn deillio o hynny, i ddyfnhau gwybodaeth artistig, gan gymharu gwaith neu berfformiadau ar ffurf ysgrifenedig, darllen ac ysgrifennu sgriptiau, a darllen am waith pobl eraill.
translation.en: Exploration and exposure to a variety of texts will enable the development of reading strategies and, in turn, deepen artistic knowledge by comparing works or performances in a written format, reading and writing scripts, and reading about the works of others.

translation.cy: Caiff llafaredd ar bob ffurf hefyd ei ddatblygu drwy actio, trafod, ymateb a myfyrio ar waith, chwarae rôl, caneuon, perfformio a chyﬂwyno, prosesau cynllunio a chwestiynu.
translation.en: Oracy in all its forms will also be developed through acting, discussing, responding and reﬂecting on works, role play, song, performance and presentation, planning processes and questioning.

translation.cy: Bydd y celfyddydau gweledol hefyd yn darparu’r cyd-destun ar gyfer cysyniadau megis siâp, gwerthfawrogi patrymau, ymwybyddiaeth ofodol a mesuriadau.
translation.en: Visual arts will also provide the context for concepts such as shape, pattern appreciation, spatial awareness and measurements.

translation.cy: • Gwylio a gwrando ar berfformiadau byw neu gyﬂwyniadau yn ardal leol y dysgwyr eu hunain a/neu ar lwyfannau digidol ac ymateb iddynt.
translation.en: • View, listen to and respond to live performances or presentations in learners’ own local area and/or on digital platforms.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn meithrin sgiliau datrys problemau drwy arbroﬁ ag amrywiaeth o dechnegau celfyddydol ac artistig.
translation.en: Learners will develop problem-solving skills by experimenting with a variety of arts and artistic techniques.

translation.cy: Byddant yn mynd ati i fyfyrio ar eu dysgu a’u proﬁadau personol, yn defnyddio gwybodaeth bersonol, yn gofyn cwestiynau ac yn herio rhagdybiaethau.
translation.en: They will actively reﬂect on their own learning and experiences, draw on personal knowledge, ask questions and challenge assumptions.

translation.en: The Expressive Arts promote an understanding of rights, including the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC) and universal human rights.

translation.en: Through exploration, creation and response to various creative works, challenging issues will be tackled and learners will be empowered to make informed decisions and communicate effectively.

translation.cy: Cyfoethogi a phroﬁadau
translation.en: Enrichment and experiences

translation.cy: Mae cyswllt annatod rhwng cwricwlwm y Celfyddydau Mynegiannol a chyfoethogi a phroﬁadau.
translation.en: The Expressive Arts curriculum and enrichment and experiences are intrinsically linked.

translation.cy: Mae proﬁ’r Celfyddydau Mynegiannol yn cynnwys dwy broses sylfaenol:
translation.en: Experiencing the Expressive Arts embraces two fundamental processes:

translation.cy: Byddant hefyd yn archwilio sut y gellirdefnyddio’r Celfyddydau Mynegiannol i gwestiynu a herio safbwyntiau cyffredin ac i ysgogi newid personol a chymdeithasol.
translation.en: They will also explore how the Expressive Arts can be used to question and challenge accepted viewpoints and be a force for personal and societal change.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal â hyn, ym Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Celfyddydau Mynegiannol bydd dysgwyr yn dod i ddeall sut y mae’r Celfyddydau Mynegiannol yn llywio, yn mynegi ac yn rhannu syniadau a theimladau.
translation.en: In addition, in the Expressive Arts Area of Learning and Experience learners will develop an understanding of how the Expressive Arts shape, express and share ideas and feelings.

translation.cy: Egwyddorion cynnydd yw’r sail ar gyfer datblygu’r deilliannau cyﬂawniad a dylent lywio dilyniant y dysgu o fewn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad.
translation.en: Principles of progression are the basis on which the achievement outcomes have been developed and should guide the progression of learning within the area of learning and experience.

translation.cy: Gallai dysgwyr symud yn ôl ac ymlaen yn rhwydd wrth broﬁ gweithgareddau Celfyddydau Mynegiannol ac mae gwahanol ddysgwyr yn dueddol o ddatblygu mewn ffyrdd gwahanol iawn.
translation.en: Learners may easily move backwards and forwards as they experience Expressive Arts activities and different learners are likely to progress in markedly different ways.

translation.cy: Mae pedwar diben y cwricwlwm, fel yr amlinellir yn Dyfodol Llwyddiannus, wedi bod yn sail i’r holl waith o gynllunio a datblygu Cwricwlwm i Gymru 2022.

translation.cy: Rydym wedi cyﬂwyno egwyddorion lefel uchel er mwyn darparu cyfeiriad eang ar lefel genedlaethol, gan sicrhau hyblygrwydd a fydd yn galluogi lleoliadau a ariennir nas cynhelir ac ysgolion i gynllunio trefniadau asesu priodol i gefnogi eu cwricwla ar lefel leol.
translation.en: We put forward high-level principles to provide broad direction at a national level, while ensuring ﬂexibility for funded non-maintained settings and schools to plan assessment appropriately to support their curricula at a local level.

translation.cy: Bydd ymarferwyr yn asesu cynnydd dysgwyr ar hyd yr un continwwm, a thrwy hynny’n lleihau effaith y broses bontio rhwng lleoliadau ac ysgolion, yn ogystal ag oddi mewn iddynt.
translation.en: Practitioners will be assessing learner progress along the same continuum, thus minimising the impact of transition between and within settings and schools.

translation.cy: • unigolion iach, hyderus, sy’n barod i fyw bywyd gan wireddu eu dyheadau fel aelodau gwerthfawr o gymdeithas.
translation.en: • healthy, conﬁdent individuals, ready to lead fulﬁlling lives as valued members of society.

translation.cy: • Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu.
translation.en: • Languages, Literacy and Communication.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn galluogi ymarferwyr i ddarparu adborth ar y meysydd lle mae’r dysgwyr wedi gwneud cynnydd ar hyd y continwwm, ynghyd â’r camau nesaf posibl ar eu taith dysgu.
translation.en: This will enable practitioners to provide feedback on where learners have made progress along the continuum, and what the next steps might be in their learning journey.

translation.cy: • Gall, a dylai, ymarferwyr ddefnyddio gwybodaeth asesu i fyfyrio a gwerthuso, er mwyn addasu eu harferion i sicrhau eu bod yn diwallu anghenion dysgwyr yn effeithiol, gan gadw’r hyn sy’n gweithio’n dda, a gwella neu newid cyfeiriad yr hyn nad yw’n gweithio cystal.
translation.en: • Practitioners can and should use assessment information to reﬂect and evaluate, in order to adapt their practices to ensure they meet learners’ needs effectively, keeping what works best, and improving or changing the direction of what is not working well.

translation.cy: Daeth yr ymgynghoriad ynghylch y Cod i ben ar 22 Mawrth 2019.

translation.en: This will provide direction for practitioners and learners on where they are making progress, where support is required to make further progress, and what they should do next.

translation.en: • Meetings with relevant Welsh Government officials – workstream leads will develop relationships with key Welsh Government officials and work with them to try and influence Welsh Government policy based on their discussions with external stakeholders.

translation.en: Prosperity is not just about material wealth – it is about every one of us having a good quality of life, and living in strong, safe communities.

translation.cy: Bydd y rhan fwyaf o’r camau gweithredu yn y strategaeth yn cael eu cyflawni erbyn diwedd tymor presennol y Cynulliad, ac mae eraill yn golygu y bydd gofyn gweithio ar lefel lawer mwy cydweithredol ac integredig, gan feddwl am atebion ar gyfer y dyfodol − gyda’n gilydd.
translation.en: Many of the actions in the strategy will be delivered by the end of this Assembly term, others are about working in a much more collaborative and integrated way, designing solutions for the future – together.

translation.cy: Er hynny, mae gormod o bobl o hyd heb gyflogaeth ystyrlon.
translation.en: Still, too many people lack meaningful employment.

translation.en: Sometimes this is beyond their control, but this is where the whole of the public service needs to focus its efforts on helping people across Wales to prosper.

translation.en: We cannot accept that many children, and disproportionately those from disadvantaged backgrounds, leave school without the skills they need to get a job.

translation.cy: Mae gan y llywodraeth rôl allweddol i’w chwarae wrth ysgogi twf economaidd yn yr ardaloedd hynny sydd â’r anghenion mwyaf.
translation.en: Government has a key role in stimulating economic growth in areas of greatest need.

translation.en: Achieving our ambitions for Wales will require a different relationship not just between the Welsh Government and local authorities, but also between local authorities themselves.

translation.en: It underpins the ambitions we have for every person and every community right across the country.

translation.cy: Felly, ein tri amcan yw rhoi’r gefnogaeth gywir i bobl a busnesau, mynd i’r afael ag anghydraddoldebau rhanbarthol a hyrwyddo gwaith teg, a sbarduno twf cynaliadwy.
translation.en: Therefore our three objectives are delivering the right support for people and businesses, addressing regional inequalities and promoting fair work, and driving sustainable growth.

translation.en: We can all benefit from a growing and prosperous Welsh economy, and businesses, individuals and public services all have vital – and reciprocal – roles to play in delivering this.

translation.en: Economic resilience will be particularly important over the coming years, as depending on the terms of our withdrawal, leaving the European Union is likely to have a significant impact on the Welsh economy and businesses.

translation.cy: Er mwyn llywio’r broses o wneud cyfraith Cymru yn fwy hygyrch, mae adran 1(1) yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i Swyddog y Gyfraith ar gyfer Cymru, y Cwnsler Cyffredinol, gadw hygyrchedd cyfraith Cymru o dan adolygiad.
translation.en: In order to inform the process of making Welsh law more accessible section 1(1) requires the Law Officer for Wales, the Counsel General, to keep the accessibility of Welsh law under review.

translation.cy: Yn ôl y diffiniad yn adran 1(2), mae pedair elfen i “hygyrchedd” cyfraith Cymru.
translation.en: The “accessibility” of Welsh law is defined in section 1(2) as having four elements.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r gyfraith yn hygyrch os nad yw’r sawl y gall y gyfraith effeithio arnynt gael hyd iddi a’i gweld.
translation.en: The law is not accessible unless those who may be affected by it can obtain it and view it.

translation.en: b. other subordinate legislation made by the Welsh Ministers or the old National Assembly for Wales so far as it applies in relation to Wales (in other words, any other legislation made by the devolved government in Wales), and

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i Weinidogion Cymru a’r Cwnsler Cyffredinol ddatblygu rhaglen weithredu sydd wedi ei chynllunio i wella hygyrchedd cyfraith Cymru ar gyfer pob un o dymhorau’r Cynulliad sy’n dechrau ar ôl i’r adran ddod i rym.
translation.en: This section requires the Welsh Ministers and the Counsel General to develop a programme of action designed to improve the accessibility of Welsh law for each Assembly term that begins after the section comes into force.

translation.cy: Mae’r diffiniad yn ei gwneud yn glir y bwriedir i godeiddio’r gyfraith ddod â threfn i’r llyfr statud.
translation.en: The definition makes clear that codifying the law is intended to bring order to the statute book.

translation.cy: Mae adran 2(5) yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i raglen gael ei gosod gerbron y Cynulliad Cenedlaethol o fewn chwe mis i benodi’r Prif Weinidog ar ôl etholiad cyffredinol.
translation.en: Section 2(5) requires a programme to be laid before the National Assembly within six months of the appointment of the First Minister following a general election.

translation.cy: r nad yw’n ofynnol i lywodraeth newydd etifeddu rhaglen y llywodraeth flaenorol ar ddechrau un o dymhorau’r Cynulliad, yn ymarferol mae bron yn sicr y bydd prosiectau sy’n rhan o un rhaglen yn parhau hyd nes y bydd y rhaglen nesaf wedi ei llunio a’i gosod, ac nid oes dim byd yn atal prosiectau sy’n rhan o raglen gynharach rhag ymddangos mewn rhaglen ddilynol pan fo’r amserlen ar gyfer cwblhau prosiect o’r fath yn gwneud hynny’n ofynnol.
translation.en: Although a new government is not required to inherit the programme of the previous government at the beginning of an Assembly term, in practice, projects from one programme will almost certainly continue until the next programme is prepared and laid, and there is nothing to prevent projects from an earlier programme appearing in a subsequent programme where the timeframe for completing such a project requires that.

translation.cy: Mae adran 3(1) yn nodi’r ddeddfwriaeth y mae Rhan 2 o’r Ddeddf yn gymwys iddi.

translation.cy: Mae’r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Deddfwriaeth (Cymru) 2019 (dccc 4) a gafodd y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar 10 Medi 2019

translation.cy: Yn yr un modd, bydd Rhan 2 yn gymwys i is-ddeddfwriaeth benodol a wneir o dan “deddfwriaeth uniongyrchol UE a ddargedwir” ond ni fydd yn gymwys i’r “deddfwriaeth uniongyrchol UE a ddargedwir” ei hun.
translation.en: Similarly, Part 2 will apply to certain subordinate legislation that is made under “retained direct EU legislation” but not to the “retained direct EU legislation” itself.

translation.cy: Mae Deddf 2018 hefyd yn rhoi pwerau i ddiwygio’r ddeddfwriaeth honno fel ei bod yn cynnwys pwerau i wneud is- ddeddfwriaeth.
translation.en: The 2018 Act also confers powers to amend that legislation so that it contains powers to make subordinate legislation.

translation.cy: Mae’n bosibl y caiff Deddf gan Senedd y DU roi swyddogaethau i Weinidogion Cymru mewn perthynas ag ardal sy’n ymestyn y tu hwnt i ffiniau Cymru, megis y rhan o barth Cymru sydd y tu hwnt i’r môr tiriogaethol.
translation.en: It is possible that an Act of Parliament may confer functions on the Welsh Ministers in relation to an area that extends beyond the boundaries of Wales, such as the part of the Welsh zone that lies beyond the territorial sea.

translation.cy: Mae adran 4 yn gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch gweithrediad y rheolau yn Rhan 2 mewn perthynas â Deddf benodol gan y Cynulliad neu is-offeryn Cymreig penodol. 4 European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018.
translation.en: Section 4 makes provision about the operation of the rules in Part 2 in relation to a particular Assembly Act or Welsh subordinate instrument.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gallai Deddf Cynulliad neu is-offeryn Cymreig ddefnyddio term sydd wedi ei ddiffinio yn Atodlen 1 i’r Ddeddf hon, ond rhoi diffiniad gwahanol i’r term.
translation.en: For example, an Assembly Act or Welsh subordinate instrument might use a term that is defined in Schedule 1 to this Act, but give the term a different definition.

translation.cy: Ystyr hyn yw mai cynnwys y ddau destun sy’n mynegi’r gyfraith yn llawn ac nid un testun yn unig.
translation.en: This means that the full expression of the law is that contained in both texts, not merely one.

translation.cy: Ar hyn o bryd, mae adran 156(1) o Ddeddf Llywodraeth Cymru 2006 yn darparu ar gyfer statws cyfartal testunau Cymraeg a Saesneg deddfwriaeth ddwyieithog.
translation.en: Section 156(1) of the Government of Wales Act 2006 currently provides for the equal status of the Welsh and English language texts of bilingual legislation.

translation.cy: Yn debyg i adran 156(1) o Ddeddf 2006, mae adran 5 oʼr Ddeddf hon yn gymwys at bob diben ac nid at ddiben dehongli yn unig.
translation.en: Like section 156(1) of the 2006 Act, section 5 of this Act applies for all purposes and not only for the purpose of interpretation.

translation.cy: Nid yw adran 5 yn ailddatgan adran 156(1) o Ddeddf 2006 ond ar gyfer deddfwriaeth y mae Rhan 2 oʼr Ddeddf hon yn gymwys iddi.
translation.en: Section 5 restates section 156(1) of the 2006 Act only for legislation to which Part 2 of this Act applies.

translation.en: It is for individual Acts and instruments to determine whether those methods of service, or any others, are permitted in particular contexts.

translation.cy: Os yw’n angenrheidiol pennu pa un o gyfeiriadau derbynnydd y gellir ei ddefnyddio, er enghraifft mewn perthynas â chwmni â sawl swyddfa, mater i’r Ddeddf berthnasol neu’r offeryn perthnasol fydd gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch y mater hwnnw.
translation.en: If it is necessary to specify which of a recipient’s addresses can be used, for example in relation to a company with multiple offices, it will be for the relevant Act or instrument to make provision about that issue.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (2) yn dilyn patrwm tebyg i is-adran (1), ond mewn perthynas â chyflwyno dogfennau gan ddefnyddio dulliau cyfathrebu electronig.
translation.en: Subsection (2) takes a similar approach to subsection (1), but in relation to service of documents using methods of electronic communication.

translation.cy: Adran 14 – Y diwrnod pan fernir bod dogfen wedi ei chyflwyno
translation.en: Section 14 – Day on which service is deemed to be effected

translation.cy: Pe bai achos pan oedd angen nodi union amser y dydd pan gyflwynid dogfen, byddai angen i’r Ddeddf Cynulliad berthnasol neu’r is- offeryn Cymreig perthnasol wneud darpariaeth ynghylch y mater hwnnw.
translation.en: If there were a case where it was necessary to identify the precise time of day at which a document was served, the relevant Assembly Act or Welsh subordinate instrument would need to make provision about that question.

translation.cy: Mae adran 15 yn pennu y tu hwnt i amheuaeth fod pwerau a roddir i berson a dyletswyddau a osodir ar berson yn barhaus, ac y caniateir eu harfer o bryd i’w gilydd ac yn ôl yr angen.
translation.en: Section 15 puts beyond doubt that powers conferred and duties imposed on a person are continuous, and may be exercised from time to time and as necessary.

translation.cy: Yn rhinwedd is-adran (1)(a), mae’r adran yn gymwys i ddarpariaethau Deddfau’r Cynulliad os deuant i rym ar adeg a bennir yn y Ddeddf ac sy’n fwy nag un diwrnod ar ôl diwrnod y Cydsyniad Brenhinol (ond nid yw’n gymwys i ddarpariaethau a ddaw i rym yn gynt neu a ddygir i rym drwy orchymyn neu reoliadau).
translation.en: By virtue of subsection (1)(a), the section applies to provisions of Assembly Acts if they come into force at a time which is specified in the Act and is more than one day after the day of Royal Assent (but not to provisions which come into force sooner or are brought into force by order or regulations).

translation.cy: Mae adran 18 yn gymwys i bwerau a dyletswyddau i wneud is-ddeddfwriaeth o dan Ddeddfau’r Cynulliad a gaiff y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar ôl i Ran 2 o’r Ddeddf ddod i rym.
translation.en: Section 18 applies to powers and duties to make subordinate legislation under Assembly Acts that receive Royal Assent after Part 2 of the Act comes into force.

translation.cy: Bwriedir i hyn wella cysondeb yn yr holl ddeddfwriaeth y mae Rhan 2 o’r Ddeddf yn gymwys iddi.
translation.en: This is intended to improve consistency across the legislation to which Part 2 of the Act applies.

translation.en: This would have been, for all intents and purposes, the definitive version of the Act, and could be obtained from The Stationery Office.

translation.cy: Mae adran 25 yn ymdrin â’r sefyllfa pan fo Deddf Cynulliad neu is-offeryn Cymreig yn cyfeirio at ddeddfwriaeth arall, a phan fo’r ddeddfwriaeth arall honno yn cael ei diwygio, pa un ai cyn neu ar ôl i’r Ddeddf gael ei deddfu neu i’r offeryn gael ei ddeddfu.
translation.en: Section 25 addresses the situation where an Assembly Act or Welsh subordinate instrument refers to other legislation, and that other legislation is amended, whether before or after the Act or instrument is enacted.

translation.cy: Diffinnir “deddfiad” yn Atodlen 1 i’r Ddeddf i gynnwys gwahanol fathau o ddeddfwriaeth sylfaenol ac is- ddeddfwriaeth, a hefyd i gynnwys deddfwriaeth uniongyrchol UE a ddargedwir.
translation.en: An “enactment” is defined in Schedule 1 to the Act to include various types of primary and secondary legislation, and also to include retained direct EU legislation.

translation.cy: Yn debyg i adran 21 o’r Ddeddf, mae’r adran hon yn estyn y diffiniad o “deddfiad” a roddir yn Atodlen 1, sy’n golygu y bydd hefyd yn gymwys i gyfeiriadau yn Neddfau’r Cynulliad ac mewn is-offerynnau Cymreig at ystod o fathau eraill o ddeddfwriaeth ar draws y Deyrnas Unedig.
translation.en: Like section 21 of the Act, this section extends the definition of “enactment” given in Schedule 1, meaning that it will also apply to references in Assembly Acts and Welsh subordinate instruments to a range of other kinds of legislation existing across the United Kingdom.

translation.cy: Adran 26 – Cyfeiriadau at offerynnau’r UE
translation.en: Section 26 – References to EU instruments

translation.cy: Mae offerynnau’r UE a ddaw’n ddeddfwriaeth uniongyrchol UE a ddargedwir ar y diwrnod ymadael o dan Ddeddf yr Undeb Ewropeaidd (Ymadael) 2018 yn cael eu trin yn lle hynny, o’r adeg honno ymlaen, fel “deddfiadau” (ac mae cyfeiriadau atynt i’w dehongli felly yn unol ag adran 25 yn hytrach nag adran 26).
translation.en: EU instruments that become retained direct EU legislation on exit day under the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018 are instead treated from that point onwards as “enactments” (and references to them are therefore to be interpreted in accordance with section 25 rather than section 26).

translation.cy: Ond o’r diwrnod ymadael ymlaen, yn lle hynny, byddant yn ddarostyngedig i reoliad 2 o Reoliadau Deddf yr Undeb Ewropeaidd (Ymadael) 2018 (Addasiadau a Diddymiadau a Dirymiadau Canlyniadol) (Ymadael â’r UE) 20199.
translation.en: But from exit day, they will instead be governed by regulation 2 of the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018 (Consequential Modifications and Repeals and Revocations) (EU Exit) Regulations 2019.

translation.cy: Mewn Deddf neu offeryn a ddeddfir ar neu ar ôl y diwrnod ymadael, bydd cyfeiriad at ddarn penodol o ddeddfwriaeth UE yn ddarostyngedig i adran 26 os yw’n cyfeirio at y ddeddfwriaeth fel y mae’n ffurfio rhan o gyfraith yr UE, ac i adran 25 os yw’n cyfeirio at y ddeddfwriaeth fel y mae’n ffurfio rhan o gyfraith ddomestig (a fydd y sefyllfa ddiofyn yn rhinwedd adran 24).
translation.en: In an Act or instrument enacted on or after exit day, a reference to a specific piece of EU legislation will be subject to section 26 if it refers to the legislation as it forms part of EU law, and to section 25 if it refers to the legislation as it forms part of domestic law (which will be the default position by virtue of section 24).

translation.cy: Pan fo Deddf Cynulliad neu is-offeryn Cymreig a ddeddfir cyn y diwrnod ymadael yn cynnwys cyfeiriad “newidiadwy” at offeryn UE, bydd effaith y cyfeiriad hwnnw ar neu ar ôl y diwrnod ymadael yn ddarostyngedig i Ran 1 o Atodlen 8 i Ddeddf yr Undeb Ewropeaidd (Ymadael) 2018.
translation.en: Where an Assembly Act or Welsh subordinate instrument enacted before exit day contains an “ambulatory” reference to an EU instrument, the effect of that reference on or after exit day will be governed by Part 1 of Schedule 8 to the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018.

translation.cy: Mae’r economi ymwelwyr yn cyffwrdd pob cymuned o Fôn i Fynwy, ac mae cyﬂe i roi lle mwy blaenllaw i Gymru ym marchnadoedd y DU a thramor, gan fanteisio ar ein gallu i ddarparu proﬁadau gwefreiddiol gyda’r gorau yn y byd ym myd diwylliant a chwaraeon.
translation.en: The visitor economy touches every community in Wales and there are opportunities to position Wales more prominently to UK and overseas markets, taking advantage of our ability to provide thrilling cultural and sporting experiences at a world-class level.

translation.cy: Rwy’n argymell y strategaeth newydd hon i chi, ac yn cymeradwyo’n llawn yr alwad am undod o ran diben er mwyn creu canolbwynt a bwrlwm ychwanegol i’r diwydiant twristiaeth yng Nghymru.
translation.en: I recommend this new strategy to you and fully endorse its call for a new unity of purpose that will bring added dynamism and focus to tourism in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae’r strategaeth hon, felly, yn estyn gwahoddiad i’r diwydiant a chyrff sector cyhoeddus eraill lleol, rhanbarthol a chenedlaethol, i ymgysylltu â’r amcanion hyn a chydweithio i’w cyﬂawni.
translation.en: This strategy, therefore, invites the industry and other local, regional and national public sector bodies, to align themselves with its goals and to work together to achieve them.

translation.cy: Y nod yw sbarduno enillion twristiaeth uwch er mwyn sicrhau’r gwerth mwyaf i economi Cymru, a helpu i gyﬂawni’r blaenoriaethau canlynol ar gyfer twristiaeth addifﬁniwyd yn Rhaglen Lywodraethu Llywodraeth Cymru:
translation.en: It seeks to drive higher tourism earnings to deliver maximum value for the Welsh economy and to support the delivery of the following priorities for tourism deﬁned in the Welsh Government’s Programme for Government:

translation.cy: Mae twristiaeth yn gyfrannwr mawr at economi Cymru ac mae’r rhagolygon ar gyfer twf cynaliadwy pellach yn dda.
translation.en: Tourism makes a major contribution to the Welsh economy and the prospects for further sustainable growth are good.

translation.cy: Mae’r gystadleuaeth, fodd bynnag, yn ffyrnigo, a dim ond y cyrchfannau hynny all fodloni disgwyliadau ymwelwyr a rhagori arnynt fydd yn dodi’r brig ac yn llwyddo orau mewn marchnad lawn.
translation.en: The competition, however, is also increasing and it will be those tourist destinations that can best satisfy and exceed the needs of their customers that will stand out and perform best in a crowded marketplace.

translation.cy: Nawr, mae’n rhaid i ni wneud pethau’n wahanol i lwyddo ymhellach, arloesi ym mhob agwedd ar dwristiaeth, o ddatblygu cynnyrch a darparu gwasanaethau i gyfathrebu a phartneriaethau.
translation.en: Continuous improvement is a prerequisite for further success, embracing innovation in all aspects of tourism from product development and service delivery to communications and partnerships.

translation.cy: Serch hynny, does dim rheswm pam na ddylid eu hystyried fel rhannau pwysig o strategaeth gynhwysfawr ar gyfer twristiaeth yng Nghymru.
translation.en: This has not inhibited their inclusion as important parts of a comprehensive strategy for tourism in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae twristiaeth yn ddiwydiant byd-eang sy’n newid yn gyﬂym, gyda mwy a mwy o wledydd yn cynnig eu hunain fel cyrchfannau llwyddiannus a deniadol i ymwelwyr.
translation.en: Tourism is a rapidly changing global industry, with ever more countries presenting themselves as viable and attractive tourism destinations.

translation.cy: Mae Visit Britaint yn rhagweld cynnydd o 38% yng ngwariant ymwelwyr tramor o’i gymharu â 2010 – cynnydd o £5.1bn, gan gynnal 130,000 o swyddi ychwanegol ledled y DU.
translation.en: Visit Britain has forecast an increase in international visitor spend of 38% compared with 2010 – an increase of £5.1bn, supporting an additional 130,000 jobs throughout the UK.

translation.en: Western Europe is anticipated to show lower than average growth rates 2.3% per annum but will maintain the highest share of world arrivals.
