translation.cy: Rhaid i'r awdurdodau cyhoeddus canlynol (y mae'r Cod yn cyfeirio atynt fel "personau perthnasol") roi sylw i'r canllawiau perthnasol yn y Cod wrth arfer swyddogaethau o dan Ran 2 o’r Ddeddf:  Adran 4(3) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: The following public authorities (referred to in the Code as “relevant persons”) must3 have regard to relevant guidance in the Code when exercising functions under Part 2 of the Act:

translation.cy: awdurdod lleol yng Nghymru neu yn Lloegr;
translation.en: a local authority in Wales or England;

translation.cy: person a chanddo gyfrifoldeb am lety ieuenctid perthnasol yng Nghymru neu yn Lloegr;
translation.en: a person in charge of relevant youth accommodation in Wales or England;

translation.cy: Bwrdd Iechyd Lleol;
translation.en: a Local Health Board;

translation.cy: Bwrdd Comisiynu’r Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol;
translation.en: the National Health Service Commissioning Board;

translation.cy: Mae'r Cod yn cynnwys canllawiau sy'n berthnasol i ddarparwyr addysg feithrin nas cynhelir, a gyllidir gan awdurdod lleol, y mae'n ofynnol i ddarparwyr o'r fath, yn unol â gofynion cyllid yr awdurdod lleol, roi sylw iddynt.
translation.en: The Code includes guidance relevant to local authority funded, nonmaintained providers of nursery education to which such providers, in accordance with the local authority’s funding arrangements, are required to have regard.

translation.cy: Addysg feithrin a ariennir gan awdurdod lleol i gyflawni ei ddyletswydd o dan adran 118 o Ddeddf Safonau a Fframwaith Ysgolion 1998.
translation.en: Nursery education funded by a local authority to fulfil its duty under section 118 of the School Standards and Framework Act 1998.

translation.cy: Dim ond ar awdurdodau lleol yng Nghymru a chyrff llywodraethu ysgolion a gynhelir a sefydliadau addysg bellach yng Nghymru y gosodir y gofynion hyn – gweler isod, lle yr eglurir bod cyfeiriadau at ysgolion a gynhelir, sefydliadau addysg bellach ac awdurdodau lleol yn gyfeiriadau at rai yng Nghymru oni nodir yn wahanol.
translation.en: These requirements are only imposed on local authorities in Wales and governing bodies of maintained schools and FEIs in Wales – see below, where it is explained that references to maintained schools, FEIs and local authorities are to those in Wales unless otherwise indicated.

translation.cy: Mae’r Cod yn gosod gofynion ar awdurdodau lleol mewn cysylltiad â’u dyletswyddau o dan y Ddeddf i wneud trefniadau ar gyfer-
translation.en: The Code imposes requirements on local authorities in respect of their duties under the Act to make arrangements for the-

translation.cy: phenderfyniadau ynghylch a oes gan blentyn neu berson ifanc ADY,
translation.en: decisions about whether a child or young person has ALN,

translation.cy: llunio, adolygu a diwygio cynlluniau datblygu unigol ("CDUau"), yn ogystal â’u ffurf a’u cynnwys, a  pheidio â chynnal CDUau.
translation.en: the preparation, content, form, review and revision of individual development plans (“IDPs”), and  ceasing to maintain IDPs.

translation.cy: Yn y Cod hwn, lle nodir gofyniad - boed yn y Ddeddf, rheoliadau a wneir o dan y Ddeddf, wedi'i osod gan y Cod neu mewn deddfwriaeth arall - i berson (gan gynnwys corff) wneud rhywbeth, nodir bod yn rhaid i'r person wneud y peth hwnnw, a bydd troednodyn yn nodi ffynhonnell y gofyniad, er enghraifft yr adran berthnasol o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: In this Code, where there is a requirement – whether in the Act, regulations made under the Act, imposed by the Code or in other legislation – for a person (including a body) to do something, it will be indicated by stating that the person must do the thing, together with an accompanying footnote which sets out the source of the requirement, such as the relevant section of the Act.

translation.cy: O dan y system ADY, dim ond awdurdod lleol yng Nghymru all fod yn gyfrifol am blentyn neu berson ifanc.
translation.en: Under the ALN system, only a local authority in Wales can be responsible for a child or young person.

translation.cy: Er mwyn i blant a phobl ifanc o'r fath gael hawliau effeithiol o dan y system ADY tra byddant yn ddisgybl neu'n fyfyriwr o'r fath, weithiau gall awdurdod lleol fod yn gyfrifol am arfer swyddogaethau penodol mewn perthynas â nhw.
translation.en: So that such children and young people have effective rights under the ALN system whilst they are such a pupil or student, on occasion, a local authority can be responsible for exercising particular functions in relation to them.

translation.cy: O dan adran 26 o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 26 of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae cyfeiriadau at ysgolion a gynhelir, sefydliadau addysg bellach ac awdurdodau lleol yn y Cod drwyddo draw yn gyfeiriadau at sefydliadau neu awdurdodau o'r fath yng Nghymru (ac felly nid ydynt yn cyfeirio at unrhyw rai yn Lloegr), oni nodir yn wahanol.
translation.en: References to maintained schools, FEIs and local authorities throughout the Code are to such institutions or authorities in Wales (and so do not refer to any in England), unless otherwise indicated.

translation.cy: Mae hyn hefyd yn adlewyrchu'r ffordd y mae'r system yn gweithio'n ymarferol, gan mai staff sy'n gweithredu ar ran y corff llywodraethu i gyflawni swyddogaethau'r cyrff llywodraethu gan amlaf.
translation.en: This also reflects the practical operation of the system where, for the most part, the functions of governing bodies are undertaken by staff members acting for the governing body.

translation.cy: Mae geiriau a ddefnyddir yn y Cod yn yr unigol yn cynnwys y lluosog ac i'r gwrthwyneb, oni bai bod y cyd-destun yn mynnu fel arall.
translation.en: Words used in the Code in the singular include the plural and vice versa, unless the context otherwise requires.

translation.cy: Gofynion amserlen
translation.en: Timescale requirements

translation.cy: Rhaid i'r [corff cyfrifol] [gymryd y camau(au)] yn brydlon ac yn sicr cyn diwedd [neu "o fewn"] y cyfnod [cyfnod penodol - x wythnos / x diwrnod ysgol / x diwrnod yn ystod y tymor] i [digwyddiad sbarduno ar gyfer dechrau'r amserlen].
translation.en: 30 Source of the requirement is given.  The [responsible body] must30 [take the action(s)] promptly and in any event before the end of [or “within”] the period of [specific period - x weeks / x school days / x term time days] from [trigger event for the start of the timescale].

translation.cy: Hyd yn oed os bydd rhywfaint o dystiolaeth yn weddill sydd heb ei derbyn ac a allai roi darlun llawnach o raddau'r ADY neu'r DDdY – gan gynnwys, er enghraifft, lle y gellid bod wedi gofyn am ddiagnosis o gyflwr penodol ond ei fod heb ei dderbyn - os gellir llunio’r CDU, yna mae angen ei lunio.
translation.en: Even if there might remain some outstanding evidence yet to be received which might provide a fuller picture of the extent of the ALN or the ALP – including, for example, where a diagnosis of a particular condition might have been sought but not received - if the IDP can be prepared, then it needs to  be prepared.

translation.cy: yn gymwys os nad yw'r Ddeddf yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i'r ysgol a gynhelir neu'r awdurdod lleol (fel y bo’n berthnasol) hysbysu'r plentyn, rhoi copi o CDU (gan gynnwys un diwygiedig) iddo, neu gymryd camau eraill sy'n ymwneud ag ef wrth arfer y swyddogaeth y mae'r gofyniad yn ymwneud â hi.Rhaid dehongli'r gofynion yn y Cod fel hyn.
translation.en: does not apply if the maintained school or local authority (as the case may be) is not required by the Act to notify, give a copy of an IDP (including a revised one) to, or take other action relating to, the child when exercising the function to which the requirement relates.The requirements in the Code mustbe interpreted in this way.

translation.cy: Esbonnir hyn ymhellach ym Mhennod 31.
translation.en: This is explained further in Chapter 31.

translation.cy: hysbysu rhiant plentyn (gan gynnwys rhiant person sy'n cael ei gadw'n gaeth sy'n blentyn) am rywbeth;
translation.en: notify a child’s parent (including a parent of a detained person who is a child) of something;

translation.cy: mae'r cyfeiriad at y person ifanc i'w ddarllen fel cyfeiriad at gynrychiolydd y person ifanc;
translation.en: the reference to the young person is to be read as a reference to the young person’s representative;

translation.cy: Croesgyfeirio i rannau eraill o’r Cod
translation.en: Cross-references to other parts of the Code

translation.cy: Os na roddir croesgyfeiriad, felly, ni ddylid tybio nad oes dim arall yn y Cod sy’n berthnasol i’r sefyllfa a ddisgrifir yn y testun dan sylw.
translation.en: Therefore, where a crossreference is not given, it should not be assumed that there is nothing else in the Code of relevance to the situation described in the text in question.

translation.cy: Caiff prif rôl y personau a'r cyrff hynny o fewn y system ADY ei disgrifio isod.
translation.en: The main role in the ALN system of those persons and bodies is described below.

translation.cy: gweler Rheoliadau Addysg (Unedau Cyfeirio Disgyblion) (Pwyllgorau Rheoli etc.) (Cymru) (Diwygio) 2021.
translation.en: see the Education (Pupil Referral Units) (Management Committees etc.) (Wales) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Mae rôl gan ddarparwyr addysg feithrin nas cynhelir a gyllidir gan awdurdodau lleol, o ran cefnogi awdurdodau lleol i adnabod ADY ac o ran helpu awdurdodau lleol i gyflawni eu rhwymedigaethau statudol.
translation.en: Local authority funded non-maintained providers of nursery education have a role in supporting local authorities to identify ALN and in helping local authorities to fulfil their statutory obligations.

translation.cy: Yn gyffredinol, maent yn gyfrifol yn uniongyrchol am adnabod a diwallu anghenion y rhan fwyaf o'u myfyrwyr sydd ag ADY.
translation.en: Generally, they are directly responsible for identifying and meeting the needs of the majority of their students who have ALN.

translation.cy: Mae Pennod 21 yn ymdrin â'r materion hyn, er bod llawer o Benodau eraill yn berthnasol i gyrff y GIG hefyd.
translation.en: Chapter 21 deals with these matters, though many other Chapters are also relevant to NHS bodies.

translation.cy: Mae llawer o blant a phobl ifanc ag ADY yn mynychu ysgolion annibynnol neu sefydliadau ôl-16 arbennig annibynnol.
translation.en: Many children and young people with ALN attend independent schools or ISPIs.

translation.cy: y diffiniad o anghenion dysgu ychwanegol
translation.en: definition of additional learning needs

translation.cy: Y diffiniad o DDdY
translation.en: The definition of ALP

translation.cy: Mae adran 2(2) (a nodir yn ffigur 1 uchod) yn ymdrin ag ystyr hyn i blentyn o oedran ysgol gorfodol neu berson ifanc.
translation.en: Section 2(2) (set out in figure 1 above) deals with the meaning of this for a child of compulsory school age or a young person.

translation.cy: (a) A oes gan y plentyn anhawster dysgu neu anabledd?
translation.en: (a) 	Does the child have a learning difficulty or disability?

translation.cy: Gweler isod i gael gwybod mwy am hyn.
translation.en: 7 See below for more information about this.

translation.cy: Anhawster i ddysgu;
translation.en: Difficulty in learning;

translation.cy: Anhawster sylweddol fwy i ddysgu;
translation.en: Significantly greater difficulty in learning;

translation.cy: Efallai y bydd y plant a'r bobl ifanc hyn angen mwy o gyfleoedd a her er mwyn cyrraedd eu llawn botensial, ond dylid darparu hyn fel rhan o addysgu gwahaniaethol.
translation.en: These children and young people may require enhanced opportunities and challenge in order to reach their full potential, but this ought to be provided as part of differentiated teaching.

translation.cy: Ni fydd gan bob plentyn a pherson ifanc sydd ag anabledd (fel y'i diffinnir gan Ddeddf Cydraddoldeb 2010) ADY.
translation.en: Not all children and young people who have a disability (as defined by the Equality Act 2010), will have ALN.

translation.cy: Wedi dweud hynny, pan fydd Cymraeg neu Saesneg yn iaith ychwanegol i blentyn neu berson ifanc, a bod ei gynnydd yn araf (er gwaethaf addysgu gwahaniaethol i'w helpu), dylid ystyried a oes problem ehangach.
translation.en: That said, when a child or young person has Welsh or English as an additional language and makes slow progress (despite differentiated teaching to support them), consideration ought to be given to whether there is a wider issue.

translation.cy: Mewn rhai achosion, gall cyflyrau meddygol gael effaith sylweddol arbrofiadau plentyn neu berson ifanc ac ar y ffordd y mae'n gweithredu yn yr ysgol neu addysg bellach, fel eu bod yn arwain at anhawster dysgu neu anabledd o fewn ystyr y term hwnnw (a nodir yn Ffigur 1 uchod).
translation.en: In some cases, medical conditions may have a significant impact on achild or young person’s experiences and on the way they function in school or further education, such that they result in a learning difficulty or disability within the meaning of that term (set out in Figure 1 above).

translation.cy: Ceir ystod eang o anableddau neu anawsterau dysgu ond gellir eu dosbarthu'n fras i'r pedwar maes canlynol:
translation.en: There is a wide range of learning difficulties or disabilities, but they can be broadly classified into the following four areas:

translation.cy: Gwybyddiaeth a dysgu;
translation.en: Cognition and learning;

translation.cy: Efallai y bydd angen DDdY ar ffurf chwarae arbrofol ar blant ag ADY, neu DDdY arall i'w galluogi i fanteisio ar gyfleoedd/gweithgareddau chwarae priodol.
translation.en: Children with ALN might require ALP in the form of exploratory play, or other ALP to enable them to access appropriate play opportunities/activities.

translation.cy: Mae darpariaeth hefyd o fewn y system ADY i ganiatáu i hawliau apelio a hawliau eraill gael eu harfer pan nad oes gan y plentyn, rhiant y plentyn, neu’r person ifanc alluedd i arfer ei hawliau.
translation.en: There is also provision within the ALN system to allow appeal and other rights to be exercised where a child, a child’s parent or young person lacks capacity to exercise their rights.

translation.cy: Gwneir hyn trwy i’r Tribiwnlys benodi cyfaill achos ar gyfer plentyn, a thrwy gynrychiolwyr ar gyfer pobl ifanc a rhieni plant nad oes ganddynt alluedd (gweler Pennod 30 ar gyfeillion achos a Phennod 31 ar gynrychiolwyr i gael rhagor o fanylion).
translation.en: This is through the appointment by the Tribunal of a case friend for a child and through representatives for young people and children’s parents who lack capacity (see Chapter 30 on case friends and Chapter 31 on representatives for the details).

translation.cy: pwysigrwydd sicrhau bod y plentyn a’i riant neu’r person ifanc yn cymryd rhan mor llawn â phosibl mewn penderfyniadau sy’n ymwneud ag arfer y swyddogaeth o dan sylw;
translation.en: the importance of the child and the child’s parent or the young person participating as fully as possible in decisions relating to the exercise of the function concerned, and

translation.cy: Mae Pennod 6 yn trafod y dyletswyddau sy’n gysylltiedig â gwybodaeth a chyngor yn fanwl.
translation.en: Chapter 6 discusses in detail duties associated with information and advice.

translation.cy: Adran 9 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 9 of the Act.

translation.cy: Hefyd, trwy adnabod ADY yn gynnar a rhoi’r ymyriadau priodol ar waith, gellir atal yr angen am ymyriadau mwy costus a llai effeithiol maes o law.
translation.en: Identifying ALN at an early stage and delivering appropriate interventions can also prevent the need for future more costly and less effective interventions.

translation.cy: Nod y canllawiau yn y Cod yw helpu awdurdodau lleol, ysgolion a gynhelir, sefydliadau addysg bellach a chyrff y GIG ac asiantaethau eraill i hwyluso trefniadau cydweithredu effeithiol rhwng gwasanaethau.
translation.en: The guidance throughout the Code aims to support local authorities, maintained schools, FEIs and NHS bodies and other agencies to facilitate effective collaboration between services.

translation.cy: defnyddio adnoddau yn fwy effeithiol;
translation.en: use resources more effectively;

translation.cy: Mae gwybodaeth staff am sgiliau a galluoedd pob plentyn a pherson ifanc yn allweddol i hyn.
translation.en: The key to this lies in the teaching staff’s knowledge of each child and young person’s skills and abilities.

translation.cy: Mewn rhai achosion, efallai y bydd angen darparu DDdY yn Gymraeg er mwyn iddi fod yn effeithiol, neu mor effeithiol â phosibl.
translation.en: In some cases, ALP may need to be provided in Welsh for it to be effective, or as effective as possible.

translation.cy: Ceir dyletswyddau amrywiol yn y Ddeddf ar y lefel unigol a’r lefel gynllunio, â’r nod o sicrhau bod DDdY yn cael ei darparu yn Gymraeg lle bynnag y bo modd.
translation.en: There are various duties in the Act at both the individual level and the planning level, with a view to ensuring provision of ALP in Welsh wherever possible.

translation.cy: Ar wahân i gydymffurfio â dyletswyddau a osodir gan y Ddeddf ynghylch darparu DDdY yn Gymraeg, bydd angen i bersonau perthnasol hefyd gydymffurfio ag unrhyw rwymedigaethau perthnasol yn ymwneud â’r Gymraeg wrth arfer swyddogaethau o dan y system ADY.
translation.en: Besides complying with duties imposed by the Act about the provision of ALP in Welsh, relevant persons will also need to comply with any applicable Welsh language obligations when exercising functions under the ALN system.

translation.cy: Pennod 4:
translation.en: Chapter 4:

translation.cy: Er mwyn bodloni’r ddyletswydd, dylaiawdurdodau lleol, ysgolion a gynhelir a sefydliadau addysg bellach, pan fyddant yn gwneud penderfyniadau am ADY plentyn neu berson ifanc, DDdY neu faterion eraill sy’n gysylltiedig â CDU (gan gynnwys a oes angen un):
translation.en: In order to satisfy the duty, local authorities, maintained schools and FEIs should, when making decisions about a child or young person’s ALN, ALP or other matters related to an IDP (including whether one is necessary):

translation.cy: Efallai y byddai’n ddefnyddiol i awdurdodau lleol, ysgolion, sefydliadau addysg bellach a chyrff y GIGystyried ySafonau Cyfranogiad Cenedlaethol Plant a Phobl Ifanc sy’n rhoi canllaw ar gyfer gwrando ar leisiau plant a phobl ifanc ac ymateb iddynt.
translation.en: Local authorities, schools, FEIs and NHS bodiesmight find it useful to consider theChildren and Young People’s National Participation Standards which provide a guide to listening and responding to the voices of children and young people.

translation.cy: Gweler Pennod 23 am wybodaeth am gofnodi dewisiadau cyfathrebu mewn CDU (lle mae angen un).
translation.en: See Chapter 23 for information on recording communication preferences in an IDP (where one is required).

translation.cy: O dan yr amgylchiadau hyn dylidystyried beth y gellid ei wneud i gynorthwyo plentyn neu berson ifanc unigol i gymryd rhan.
translation.en: In these circumstances, consideration shouldbe given as to what may be done to support an individual child or young person to participate.

translation.cy: Adran 6 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 6 of the Act.

translation.cy: Gallai hyn gynnwys darparu cyfieithydd ar gyfer plant a phobl ifanc nad ydynt yn siarad Cymraeg na Saesneg fel iaith gyntaf, darparu dogfennau mewn fformat priodol, er enghraifft, print mawr neu Braille, a sicrhau y bydd unrhyw gyfarpar arbenigol sydd ei angen ar y plentyn neu’r person ifanc i gymryd rhan yn effeithiol ar gael ar y diwrnod.
translation.en: This could include providing an interpreter for children and young people whose first language is not Welsh or English, providing documents in an appropriate format for example enlarged print or braille and that any specialist equipment the child or young person requires to participate effectively will be available on the day.

translation.cy: Gweler Pennod 15 am wybodaeth am y dyletswyddau ar ysgolion ac awdurdod lleol mewn perthynas â phobl ifanc sy'n mynychu ysgolion a gynhelir, a Phennod 16 am y dyletswyddau ar sefydliadau addysg bellach ac awdurdod lleol mewn perthynas â phobl ifanc mewn sefydliad addysg bellach.
translation.en: See Chapter 15 for information on the duties on schools and local authority in relation to young people attending maintained schools, and Chapter 16 for the duties on FEIs and local authority in relation to young people at an FEI.

translation.cy: Dylidrhoi cymorth priodol i'r person ifanc, gan gynnwys gwybodaeth sy'n ei alluogi i wneud penderfyniadau ar sail gwybodaeth am gydsyniad.
translation.en: The young person shouldbe provided with appropriate support, including information that enables them to make informed decisions on consent.

translation.cy: Mae modd dadwneud penderfyniad i atal cydsyniad;
translation.en: A decision to withhold consent is not irreversible; the young person is entitled to change their mind at any time.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys pwy fydd yn ei gynnal (mewn achosion lle gallai'r CDU drosglwyddo, e.e. o ysgol i sefydliad addysg bellach lle mae'r plentyn yn disgwyl ymrestru) ac esbonio hawliau pobl ifanc i gydsynio neu wrthwynebu penderfyniadau ADY a CDUau.
translation.en: This includes who will maintain it (in cases where the IDP might transfer, e.g. from a school to an FEI at which the child is expecting to enrol) and explaining the rights of young people to consent or object to ALN decisions and IDPs.

translation.cy: Mae gwahanol ffyrdd i rieni gefnogi dysg y plentyn.
translation.en: There are various ways in which parents can support the child’s learning.

translation.cy: Ymdrinnir â’r rhain yn y penodau perthnasol sy’n ymdrin â’r penderfyniad neu’r broses dan sylw.
translation.en: These are dealt with in the relevant chapters dealing with the decision or process to which they attach.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r person sy’n arfer y swyddogaeth roi sylw i farn, dymuniadau a theimladau’r plentyn a’r rhiant, gan gynnwys pan fo eu barn yn wahanol.
translation.en: The person exercising the function must have regard to both the child and the parent’s views, wishes and feelings, including where their views differ.

translation.en: The Children’s Commissioner has developed the following five principles based upon the Convention rights.

translation.en: assessing the likely impact of proposals for ALN policies, services and resources, or changes to existing policies, services or resources;

translation.cy: Os hysbysir ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach am y trefniadau hyn, rhaid i'r ysgol ysgolion neu sefydliad gymryd camau rhesymol i wneud y trefniadau yn hysbys i'w disgyblion, eu rhieni a'u cyfeillion achos (mewn ysgol) neu ei fyfyrwyr (mewn sefydliad addysg bellach).
translation.en: If a maintained school or FEI is informed of these arrangements, it must take reasonable steps to make the arrangements known to its pupils, their parents and their case friends (in the case of a school) or its students (in the case of an FEI).

translation.cy: y gwahanol asiantaethau dan sylw a'u rolau
translation.en: the different agencies involved and their respective roles;

translation.cy: Rhaid i awdurdod lleol gymryd camau rhesymol i wneud ei drefniadau ar gyfer cyngor a gwybodaeth am ADY a'r system ADY yn hysbys i:
translation.en: A local authority must take reasonable steps to make its arrangements for advice and information about ALN and the ALN system known to:

translation.cy: plant sy'n derbyn gofal ganddo sydd y tu allan i'w ardal, ysgolion a gynhelir a sefydliadau addysg bellach o fewn ei ardal, ac unrhyw bobl eraill y mae'n ystyried ei bod yn briodol rhoi gwybod iddynt.
translation.en: children it looks after who are outside its area, (e) 	maintained schools and FEIs in its area, and (f) 	any other persons it considers appropriate.

translation.cy: Dylai awdurdodau lleol ystyried y dulliau mwyaf priodol ar gyfer rhoi gwybod i'r personau a restrir uchod am eu trefniadau.
translation.en: Local authorities shouldconsider the most appropriate mechanisms for making their arrangements known to the persons listed above.

translation.cy: Gallai hyn gynnwys ardaloedd cymunedol mewn meithrinfeydd nas cynhelir, ysgolion a gynhelir ac ysgolion eraill, sefydliadau addysg bellach ac mewn lleoliadau iechyd, er enghraifft meddygfeydd teulu.
translation.en: This might include communal areas in non-maintained nurseries, maintained and other schools, FEIs, and in health settings, such as GP surgeries.

translation.cy: Dylai awdurdodau lleol roi cyngor a gwybodaeth mewn gwahanol fformatau er mwyn sicrhau eu bod yn hygyrch i bawb a allai fod â diddordeb ynddynt.
translation.en: Local authorities shouldprovide advice and information in various formats to ensure accessibility to all those who could have an interest in it.

translation.cy: Dylai awdurdodau lleol, felly, sicrhau bod y trefniadau yn darparu ar gyfer gwybodaeth a chyngor mewn fformatau sydd ar gael i blant a phobl ifanc yn benodol, a rhaididdynt gymryd camau rhesymol i roi gwybod am y trefniadau hynny i blant yn eu hardal yn ogystal â rhoi gwybod i'w rhieni.
translation.en: Local authorities should,therefore,ensure the arrangements cover information and advice in formats specifically accessible to children and to young people, and musttake reasonable steps to make those arrangements known to children in its area in addition to making them known to their parents.

translation.en: effective systems for monitoring the progress and achievement of children and young people with ALN and their inclusion in the everyday life of the school;

translation.cy: Swyddog Arweiniol ADY Blynyddoedd Cynnar yr awdurdod lleol
translation.en: Providers of non-maintained nursery education  The local authority’s Early Years ALN Lead Officer

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, mae'r consortia addysg rhanbarthol, mewn partneriaeth â rhanddeiliaid eraill a restrir ym mharagraff 7.13, yn cyflawni swyddogaeth allweddol wrth goladu tystiolaeth sy'n ymwneud â maint a gallu'r gweithlu sydd ar gael ac a yw trefniadau lleol yn ddigonol.
translation.en: For example, the regional education consortia, in partnership with other stakeholders listed in paragraph 7.13, undertake a key role in collating evidence relating to the size and capability of the workforce available and whether local arrangements are sufficient.

translation.cy: Mae'n codi o bryd i'w gilydd yn ôl yr angen.
translation.en: It arises from time to time as occasion occurs.

translation.cy: Wrth fynd i'r afael â diffygion o ran y DDdY sydd ar gael mewn ysgolion a threfniadau ADY eraill mewn ysgolion, dylai'r awdurdod lleol ystyried pa gamau i'w cymryd i unioni'r diffygion hynny, gan roi sylw i'r egwyddorion y cyfeirir atynt mharagraffau 5.10, 12.44 a 15.45.
translation.en: When addressing insufficiencies in the availability of ALP in schools and other ALN arrangements in schools, the local authority shouldconsider, taking into account the principles referenced at paragraphs 5.10, 12.44 and 15.45, what actions to take to remedy those insufficiencies.

translation.cy: Dylaiawdurdodau lleol ystyried ar lefel strategol a yw newidiadau i drefniadau ariannu ar gyfer cefnogi plant a phobl ifanc ag ADY yn briodol yn sgil eu hadolygiad a chan ystyried yr egwyddorion y cyfeiriwyd atynt uchod.
translation.en: Local authorities shouldconsider at strategic level whether changes to funding arrangements for supporting children and young people with ALN are appropriate in light of their review and taking into account the principles referenced above.

translation.en: improving access to specialist advice and support – for example educational psychology advice, therapies, sensory support, specialist support for children and young people with autism, or for those with social, emotional and mental health needs;

translation.en:  the evidence that has been considered;

translation.cy: Pennod 8:
translation.en: Chapter 8:

translation.cy: Dylai CADYau fynd ati i ddilyn hyfforddiant i gefnogi eu datblygiad proffesiynol parhaus.
translation.en: ALNCos should actively undertake training to support their continuing professional development.

translation.cy: Mae ei rôl yn un strategol o fewn y lleoliad addysg a dylai, felly, naill ai fod yn aelod o’r uwch dîm arwain neu fod â llinell gyfathrebu glir i’r uwch dîm arwain.
translation.en: The role is a strategic one within the education setting and should, therefore, either form part of the senior leadership team or have a clear line of communication to the senior leadership team.

translation.cy: Gall yr awdurdod lleol gefnogi rôl y CADY, gan gynnwys darparu arweiniad pan fo hynny’n briodol.
translation.en: The local authority may support the role of the ALNCo, including providing guidance where appropriate.

translation.cy: Gall CADY ddewis ymgymryd â’r tasgau hyn ei hun neu drefnu i dasgau gael eu cyflawni gan eraill.
translation.en: ALNCos may choose to undertake these tasks themselves or arrange for tasks to be undertaken by others.

translation.cy: Rhaid i CADYau adnabod ADY disgybl neu fyfyriwr a chydlynu’r broses o greu DDdY sy’n diwallu’r anghenion hynny.
translation.en: ALNCos must identify a pupil or student’s ALN and co-ordinate the making of ALP that meets those needs.

translation.cy: Bydd y CADY yn gyfrifol am gydweithio â’r gwasanaethau arbenigol hyn a phan gytunir i ddarparu gwasanaethau o’r fath, am ofalu y cânt eu sicrhau.
translation.en: It will be the responsibility of the ALNCo to liaise with these specialist services and when there is agreement to provide such services, ensure that these are secured.

translation.cy: Mae rhagor o wybodaeth am fonitro effaith ar gael ym Mhennod 25.
translation.en: Further information on impact monitoring can be found in Chapter 25.

translation.cy: Gall gweithwyr cymorth dysgu ddarparu sgiliau arbenigol i gefnogi dysgwyr ag ADY, a byddant yn cynnig cymorth ymarferol a gweinyddol i’r CADY.
translation.en: Learning support workers can provide specialist skills to support learners with ALN, and will offer both practical and administrative support to the ALNCo.

translation.cy: Mae’n bosibl na fydd yn briodol defnyddio gweithwyr cymorth dysgu ym mhob achos, fodd bynnag.
translation.en: However, the use of learning support workers may not be appropriate in all cases.

translation.cy: Byddai hyn yn cynnwys cynrychiolydd i berson ifanc neu riant plentyn, neu gyfaill achos— gweler Pennod 1 am fanylion ynghylch arfer hawliau gan blant a chyfeillion achos, a chan gynrychiolwyr i rieni a phobl ifanc nad oes ganddynt alluedd.
translation.en: This would include a representative of a young person or child’s parent, or a case friend— see Chapter 1 for details regarding exercise of rights by children and case friends, and by representatives of parents and young people who lack capacity.

translation.cy: datblygu i fod yn ffynhonnell arbenigedd ym maes ADY drwy ddatblygu sgiliau a gwybodaeth arbenigol;
translation.en: becoming a source of expertise on ALN by developing specialist skills and knowledge;

translation.cy: rhoi tystiolaeth i’r Tribiwnlys mewn apêl mewn perthynas â materion ADY;
translation.en: givingevidence to the Tribunal in an appeal in relation to ALN matters;

translation.cy: ymdrin ag argymhellion a wneir i’r Bwrdd Iechyd Lleol gan y Tribiwnlys ynghylch arfer swyddogaethau’r Bwrdd Iechyd Lleol.
translation.en: dealing with recommendations9 made to the Local Health Board by the Tribunal about the exercise of the Local Health Board’s functions.

translation.cy: Os nad yw hyn yn bosibl, dylai’r strwythurau a’r systemau a sefydlir gan y SACDA sicrhau bod gweithwyr iechyd proffesiynol yn darparu eu cyngor a’u tystiolaeth yn ysgrifenedig cyn y cyfarfod (gweler Pennod 22 am ragor o wybodaeth am gyfarfodydd ynghylch ADY a CDUau).
translation.en: Where this is not possible, the structures and systems established by the DECLO should ensure that health professionals provide in writing their advice and evidence in advance of the meeting (see Chapter 22 for more information on meetings about ALN and IDPs).

translation.cy: Mae rôl SACDA yn rôl strategol a dylai Bwrdd Iechyd Lleol gynnwys y cyfrifoldebau canlynol o fewn y rôl:
translation.en: The role of the DECLO is a strategic one and a Local Health Board should include the following responsibilities within the role:

translation.cy: Mae canllawiau ar y cyfrifoldebau hyn i’w gweld isod.
translation.en: Guidance on these responsibilities is set out below.

translation.cy: Dylai’r Bwrdd Iechyd Lleol sicrhau bod y SACDA yn cydweithio â SACDAau eraill ledled Cymru â’r nod o:
translation.en: The Local Health Board should ensure the DECLO cooperates with other DECLOs across Wales with a view to:

translation.cy: rannu arfer gorau;
translation.en: sharing best practice;

translation.cy: Dylai’r Bwrdd Iechyd Lleol sicrhau bod y SACDA yn gweithredu i hyrwyddo ymwybyddiaeth o ADY ar lefel weithredol ar draws y Bwrdd Iechyd Lleol, yn ogystal ag ymwybyddiaeth, yn ehangach, o’r dyletswyddau sy’n berthnasol i ymarferwyr mewn perthynas ag ADY, yn benodol;
translation.en: The Local Health Board should ensure the DECLO is operating to promote awareness of ALN at executive level across the Local Health Board and more widely, an awareness of the duties relevant to practitioners in relation to ALN, in particular:

translation.cy: O dan adran 64 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 64 of the Act.

translation.cy: gynnal asesiadau priodol, amserol;
translation.en: undertaking appropriate, timely assessments;

translation.en: monitoring the outcomes of such treatments or services;

translation.cy: ystyried y ffordd orau i weithwyr iechyd proffesiynol fynd ati i gyfrannu at lunio ac adolygu CDUau (pan geir cais am gyfraniad, cymorth a chyngor gweithwyr iechyd proffesiynol);
translation.en: considering how best health professionals can be actively involved in the preparation and review of IDPs (where the input, help and advice of health professionals is sought);

translation.cy: Dylai’r Bwrdd Iechyd Lleol ddisgwyl i’r SACDA oruchwylio’r gwaith o ddatblygu prosesau i gasglu a dadansoddi data cadarn i fesur ei gydymffurfiaeth â dyletswyddau o dan y Ddeddf, mesur effeithiolrwydd trefniadau ar gyfer gweithio mewn partneriaeth, a sicrhau ansawdd ei weithgareddau mewn perthynas â phlant a phobl ifanc ag ADY.
translation.en: The Local Health Board shouldexpect the DECLO to have oversight of the development of processes to collect and analyse robust data to measure its compliance with duties under the Act, measure the effectiveness of arrangements for partnership working, and provide quality assurance of its activities in relation to children and young people with ALN.

translation.cy: Pennod 10:
translation.en: Chapter 10:

translation.cy: Gelwir y swyddog dynodedig yn 'Swyddog Arweiniol Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol y Blynyddoedd Cynnar'.
translation.en: The designated officer is to be known as the ‘Early Years Additional Learning Needs Lead Officer’ (‘the Early Years ALNLO’).

translation.cy: Diben y rôl sy'n wynebu tuag i mewn yw bod yn gyfrifol am drefniadau'r awdurdod lleol ar gyfer arfer ei swyddogaethau mewn perthynas â charfan y Swyddog Arweiniol ADY.
translation.en: The purpose of the inward facing role is to be responsible for the local authority’s arrangements for exercising its functions in relation to the ALNLO cohort.

translation.cy: cyfeillion achos ac eraill fel y bo'n briodol (gweler Pennod 6 am ddyletswyddau cyngor a gwybodaeth awdurdodau lleol);
translation.en: parents, case friends and others as appropriate, (see Chapter 6 for local authorities’ advice and information duties);

translation.cy: Drwy godi ymwybyddiaeth o ADY, y system ADY a sut mae'n berthnasol i garfan y Swyddog Arweiniol ADY, a chydweithio ag eraill sy'n gweithio gyda'r garfan hon, mae plant ag ADY yn fwy tebygol o gael eu hatgyfeirio at yr awdurdod lleol yn gynharach.
translation.en: By raising awareness of ALN, the ALN system and how it applies to the ALNLO cohort, and working collaboratively with others who work with this cohort, children with ALN are more likely to be referred to the local authority earlier.

translation.cy: nodi achosion pan ddylid enwi ysgol at ddibenion derbyn.
translation.en: identify cases where a school should be named for admission purposes.

translation.cy: a) Meithrin perthynas waith gydweithredol
translation.en: a) 	Establishing collaborative working relationships

translation.cy: Dylid disgwyl i Swyddog Arweiniol ADY y Blynyddoedd Cynnar hyrwyddo cydweithrediad rhwng y personau hyn a'r awdurdod lleol, gan gynnwys i gefnogi plant i drosglwyddo’n llwyddiannus rhwng lleoliadau sy'n darparu addysg feithrin nas cynhelir neu ofal plant a’r ysgol.
translation.en: The Early Years ALNLO shouldbe expected to promote collaboration between these persons and the local authority, including to support successful transitions for children between settings that provide nonmaintained nursery education or childcare and into school

translation.cy: Dylai swyddog arweiniol ADY y Blynyddoedd Cynnar sicrhau bod systemau neu drefniadau eraill yn eu lle i gefnogi darparwyr addysg feithrin nas cynhelir a gofal plant ac eraill sy'n gweithio gyda charfan Swyddog Arweiniol ADY yr awdurdod (gan gynnwys, er enghraifft, y rhai a restrir ym mharagraff 10.15) i ddatblygu eu sgiliau a'u gwybodaeth am ADY.
translation.en: The Early Years ALNLO shouldensure systems or other arrangements are in place to support providers of non-maintained nursery education and childcare and others who work with the authority’s ALNLO cohort (including, for example, those listed in paragraph 10.15) to develop their skills and knowledge of ALN.

translation.cy: Adran 64(4) o'r Ddeddf.

translation.en: Duties on local authorities in relation to children under compulsory school age who are not at a maintained school in Wales

translation.cy: Pennod 11:
translation.en: Chapter 11:

translation.cy: 11.5 	Pan gaiff ei ddwyn i sylw awdurdod lleol, neu pan ddaw i’r amlwg iddo mewn ffordd arall, y gallai fod gan blentyn y mae'n gyfrifol amdano ADY, rhaid3 i'r awdurdod lleol benderfynu a oes gan y plentyn ADY oni bai bod un o'r amgylchiadau canlynol yn berthnasol:
translation.en: 11.5. 	Where it is brought to its attention, or otherwise appears to a local authority, that a child for whom it is responsible may have ALN, the local authority mustdecide whether the child has ALN unless one of the following circumstances applies:

translation.cy: Wrth benderfynu a oes gan y plentyn ADY, rhaidi’r awdurdod lleol ystyried a ddylai ofyn am gyngor gan seicolegydd addysgol.Rhaid10 i’r awdurdod geisio cyngor o’r fath os yw o'r farn bod ceisio’r cyngor yn angenrheidiol i bennu-
translation.en: When deciding whether the child has ALN, the local authority must consider whether to seek advice from an educational psychologist.The authority must seek such advice if it considers that the advice is necessary to determine-

translation.cy: (a) graddau neu natur yr ADY y gallai fod gan y plentyn, neu(b) y DDdY y mae ADY y plentyn yn galw amdani.
translation.en: (a) 	the extent or nature of the ALN that the child may have, or(b) 	the ALP called for by the child’s ALN.

translation.cy: 11.12 Rhaid11 i’r cyngor a geisir ymwneud â-
translation.en: 11.12. The advice sought must relate to-

translation.cy: y ddarpariaeth a all fod yn briodol ar gyfer y plentyn yng ngoleuni'r nodweddion hynny, p'un ai drwy gyfrwng DDdY neu fathau eraill o ddarpariaeth ac unrhyw faterion sy'n effeithio ar gyflwyno'r ddarpariaeth honno.
translation.en: the provision which may be appropriate for the child in light of those features, whether by way of ALP or other types of provision, and any matters affecting the delivery of that provision.

translation.cy: Er mwyn cyflawni'r ddyletswydd a'r amcan hwn, fel rheol dylai'rcydlynydd drefnu cyfarfod neu gyfarfodydd, fel y bo'n briodol, gyda rhiant y plentyn ac, os yw'n briodol, gyda'r plentyn, i drafod a phenderfynu ar anghenion y plentyn ac, os oes angen, i lunio CDU ar ei gyfer.
translation.en: To fulfil this duty and objective, the designated co-ordinator should normally arrange a meeting or meetings, as appropriate, with the child’s parent and, if appropriate, the child, to discuss and decide the child’s needs and if required, prepare an IDP for them.

translation.cy: 11.17 Rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol wneud y penderfyniad a rhoi’r hysbysiad yn brydlon, ac yn bendant cyn diwedd y cyfnod o 12 wythnos ar ôl iddo gael ei ddwyn i sylw'r awdurdod lleol, neu ddod i’r amlwg iddo mewn ffordd arall, y gallai fod gan y plentyn ADY.
translation.en: 11.17. The local authority must make the decision and give the notification promptly and in any event before the end of the period of 12 weeks from it being brought to the attention of, or otherwise appearing to, the local authority that the child may have ALN.

translation.cy: O dan adran 69 o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 69 of the Act.

translation.cy: Dylai'r hysbysiad amlinellu hefyd unrhyw gamau y bydd yr awdurdod lleol yn eu cymryd yng ngoleuni ei ystyriaeth i sicrhau bod anghenion y plentyn (nad ydynt yn ADY) yn cael eu diwallu.
translation.en: The notification shouldalso outline any action the local authority will undertake in light of its consideration to ensure the child’s needs (which are not ALN) are met.

translation.cy: Gallai fod yn fuddiol rhoi cyfle i riant y plentyn drafod y mater ymhellach.
translation.en: It might be helpful to offer an opportunity to the child’s parent to discuss further.

translation.cy: Adran 14(1) a (2) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 14(1) and (2) of the Act.

translation.cy: 11.24 Rhaid i'r awdurdod lleol wneud y penderfyniad ar ADY, llunio’r cynllun a rhoi'r copi ohono yn brydlon, ac yn sicr cyn diwedd y cyfnod o 12 wythnos ar ôl i'r ffaith y gallai fod gan y plentyn ADY gael ei ddwyn i sylw'r awdurdod lleol, neu ar ôl i hynny ddod i’r amlwg iddo fel arall.
translation.en: 11.24. The local authority must make the decision on ALN, prepare the plan and give the copy of it promptly, and in any event before the end of the period of 12 weeks from it being brought to the attention of, or otherwise appearing to, the local authority that the child may have ALN.

translation.cy: Gall hefyd drosglwyddo i gorff arall, er enghraifft, lle mae'r awdurdod lleol wedi cyfarwyddo'r ysgol i gynnal y CDU, fel y soniwyd uchod.
translation.en: It may also transfer to another body, for example, where the local authority has directed the school to maintain the IDP, as mentioned above.

translation.cy: Pennod 12:
translation.en: Chapter 12:

translation.cy: Dyletswyddau ar ysgolion a gynhelir ac awdurdodau lleol mewn perthynas â phlant mewn ysgolion a gynhelir yng Nghymru
translation.en: Duties on maintained schools and local authorities in relation to children at maintained schools in Wales

translation.cy: Gweler Pennod 1 i gael rhagor o fanylion am sefyllfa lle bydd plentyn o fewn ardal awdurdod lleol yng Nghymru neu Loegr.
translation.en: See Chapter 1 for more details about when a child is in the area of a local authority in Wales or England.

translation.cy: cofnodi crynodeb o sut y cafodd y posibilrwydd bod gan blentyn ADY ei ddwyn i sylw'r ysgol neu pam mae’n ymddangos fel arall iddi y gall fod gan blentyn ADY;
translation.en: record a summary of how the possibility that the child has ALN has been brought to its attention or why it otherwise appears to it that the child may have ALN;

translation.cy: 7 O dan adran 9 o’r Ddeddf. 12.5(d) roi: manylion cyswllt yr ysgol;
translation.en: 7 Under section 9 of the Act.   contact details for the school;

translation.cy: gwybodaeth am sut i ddod o hyd i drefniadau'r awdurdod lleol cyfrifol ar gyfer rhoi gwybodaeth a chyngor i bobl am ADY a'r system ADY12;
translation.en: information about how to access the responsible local authority’s arrangements for providing people with information and advice about ALN and the ALN system;

translation.cy: Dylai'r ysgol ystyried unrhyw bryderon a gweithredu arnynt yn briodol, er enghraifft diweddaru'r CDU drafft neu esbonio penderfyniadau neu faterion eraill ymhellach.
translation.en: The school shouldconsider any concerns and act upon them appropriately, which may be to update the draft IDP, or explain decisions or other matters further.

translation.cy: Ar ôl ei lunio, rhaid i'r ysgol roi copi o'r CDU i'r plentyn a'i riant.
translation.en: Once prepared, the school must give a copy of the IDP to the child and their parent.

translation.cy: Gofyniad a osodir gan y Cod.
translation.en: Requirement imposed by the Code.

translation.cy: Efallai na fydd gan y plentyn CDU oherwydd -
translation.en: The child might not have an IDP because -

translation.cy: Os bydd gan y plentyn gynllun Addysg, Iechyd a Gofal a gynhelir gan awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr, bydd y cynllun yn amlinellu ei anghenion, ar sail asesiadau, ac yn nodi'r union ddarpariaeth addysgol arbennig i'w diwallu.
translation.en: Where the child has an EHC plan maintained by a local authority in England, the EHC plan will set out their assessed needs and specify special educational provision to meet them.

translation.cy: O dan yr amgylchiadau hyn, dylai'rysgol gymryd pob cam rhesymol i helpu'r awdurdod lleol hwnnw i sicrhau'r ddarpariaeth addysgol arbennig a nodir yn y cynllun Addysg, Iechyd a Gofal.
translation.en: In these circumstances, the school should take all reasonable steps to help that local authority secure the special educational provision specified in the EHC plan.

translation.cy: gwneud unrhyw addasiadau priodol i amgylchedd yr ysgol er mwyn ei gwneud yn haws i'r plentyn gael ei addysg;
translation.en: make any appropriate adjustments to the school environment to improve the child’s access to education;

translation.cy: Efallai y caiff y DDdY, neu fathau arbennig o'r ddarpariaeth, eu hadnabod yn gynnar yn y broses a pheth amser cyn y bydd y CDU wedi'i gwblhau.
translation.en: The ALP, or particular types of ALP, might be identified early in the process and some time before the IDP is complete.

translation.cy: Adran 12(1) a (2) o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 12(1) and (2) of the Act.

translation.cy: Fel arall, gall ysgol a gynhelir gyfeirio achos plentyn at awdurdod lleol ar sail benodol sy'n ymwneud â natur ADY ymddangosiadol y plentyn (gweler y paragraffau canlynol).
translation.en: Otherwise, a maintained school can refer a child’s case to a local authority on particular grounds related to the nature of the child’s apparent ALN (see the following paragraphs).

translation.cy: Os yw'r plentyn yn ardal awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr, caiffyr ysgol ofyn i'r awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr sicrhau asesiad o anghenion Addysg, Iechyd a Gofal:
translation.en: If the child is in the area of a local authority in England, the school mayrequest the local authority in England to secure an EHC needs assessment:

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gallai unrhyw un o'r amgylchiadau canlynol effeithio ar y farn honno:
translation.en: For example, any of the following circumstances might affect that view:

translation.cy: Wrth wneud hyn, bydd yn ysgogi'r ddyletswydd sydd gan yr ysgol i benderfynu ac, os bydd yr awdurdod lleol yn fodlon bod yr ysgol yn penderfynu ar y mater, ni fydd dyletswydd yr awdurdod yn berthnasol (gweler yr eithriad ym mharagraff 12.47(c)).
translation.en: In so doing, the school’s duty to decide would be triggered and if the local authority is satisfied that the school is deciding the matter, its duty would not apply (see the exception in paragraph 12.47(c)).

translation.cy: Unwaith eto, efallai y bydd yr awdurdod lleol yn ystyried atgyfeirio'r mater at yr ysgol berthnasol yn y lle cyntaf.
translation.en: Again, the local authority might consider referring the issue to the relevant school in the first instance.

translation.cy: Gofyniad a osodir gan y Cod.
translation.en: Requirement imposed by the Code.

translation.cy: Gofyniad a osodir gan y Cod.
translation.en: Requirement imposed by the Code.

translation.cy: O dan adran 68 o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 68 of the Act.

translation.cy: Os yw awdurdod lleol wedi penderfynu bod ADY gan blentyn mewn ysgol ac y mae'n gyfrifol amdano, rhaididdonaill ai llunio CDU neu gyfarwyddo'r ysgol i lunio a chynnal CDU.
translation.en: If a local authority has decided that a child at a school and for whom it is responsible has ALN it musteither prepare an IDP or direct the school to prepare and maintain an IDP.

translation.cy: Os yw'r awdurdod lleol yn llunio CDU, rhaididdo naill ai ei gynnal neu, os yw'r awdurdod yn ystyried bod hynny'n briodol, cyfarwyddo'r ysgol i'w gynnal.
translation.en: If the local authority prepares an IDP, it must either maintain it or, if the authority considers it appropriate, direct the school to maintain it.

translation.cy: Adran 14(1) a (2) o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 14(1) and (2) of the Act.

translation.cy: Ond nid oes rhaid i'r awdurdod lleol wneud hyn os yw wedi gofyn i'r un yn Lloegr sicrhau asesiad o anghenion Addysg, Iechyd a Gofal neu os yw’r awdurdod yn Lloegr yn cynnal cynllun Addysg, Iechyd a Gofal ar gyfer y plentyn.
translation.en: But the local authority does not have to do this if it has requested the one in England to secure an EHC needs assessment or if the authority in England maintains an EHC plan for the child.

translation.cy: Os yw awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr, yn dilyn cais gan awdurdod lleol i sicrhau asesiad o anghenion Addysg, Iechyd a Gofal ar gyfer plentyn, yn hysbysu’r awdurdod lleol nad yw'n ofynnol iddo sicrhau cynllun Addysg, Iechyd a Gofal ar gyfer y plentyn, rhaidi'r awdurdod lleol gyfarwyddo'r ysgol mewn un o'r ddwy ffordd a grybwyllir yn y paragraff blaenorol (ar ôl llunio CDU yn gyntaf mewn perthynas â'r ail ffordd).
translation.en: If following a local authority’s request that a local authority in England secures an EHC needs assessment for a child, the local authority is notified by the local authority in England that it is not required to secure an EHC plan for the child, the local authority must direct the school in one of the two ways mentioned in the preceding paragraph (having first prepared an IDP in respect of the second way).

translation.cy: Ar ôl ei lunio, rhaid64 i'r awdurdod lleol roi copi o'r CDU i'r plentyn a'i riant.
translation.en: Once prepared, the local authority must give a copy of the IDP to the child and their parent.

translation.cy: Gweler Pennod 1 i gael gwybod rhagor am sut i ddehongli amserlenni yn y Cod hwn.
translation.en: See Chapter 1 for more information on how timescales in the Code are to be interpreted.

translation.cy: Wrth roi copi o'r CDU, rhaid67 i'r awdurdod lleol hefyd roi i'r plentyn a rhiant y plentyn:
translation.en: When giving a copy of the IDP, the local authority mustalso give the child and the child’s parent:

translation.cy: O dan adran 68 o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 68 of the Act.

translation.cy: Pan fo awdurdod lleol wedi llunio CDU ar gyfer plentyn mewn ysgol, rhaid72 iddo naill ai gynnal y CDU hwnnw neu gyfarwyddo'r ysgol i gynnal yr CDU.
translation.en: Where a local authority has prepared an IDP for a child at a school, it must either maintain that IDP or direct the school to maintain the IDP.

translation.cy: Adran 23 o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 23 of the Act.

translation.cy: Gall hefyd drosglwyddo i gorff arall, er enghraifft, pan fo’r awdurdod lleol wedi cyfarwyddo'r ysgol i gynnal y CDU.
translation.en: It may also transfer to another body, for example, where the local authority has directed the school to maintain the IDP.

translation.cy: Dyletswydd ysgol a gynhelir i gymryd pob cam rhesymol i helpu awdurdod lleol i sicrhau'r DDdY mewn CDU a gynhelir ar gyfer plentyn gan yr awdurdod lleol
translation.en: A maintained school’s duty to take all reasonable steps to help a local authority secure the ALP in an IDP maintained for a child by the local authority

translation.cy: Os bydd awdurdod lleol yn cynnal CDU ar gyfer plentyn mewn ysgol, rhaid78 i'r ysgol gymryd pob cam rhesymol i helpu'r awdurdod lleol i sicrhau'r DDdY a bennir yn y cynllun.
translation.en: Where a local authority maintains an IDP for a child at a school, the school must take all reasonable steps to help the local authority secure the ALP specified in it.

translation.cy: y gallai'r ysgol benderfynu'n ddigonol ar raddau a natur yr ADY;
translation.en: the school could adequately determine the extent and nature of the ALN, and

translation.cy: 7 wythnos yn achos awdurdod lleol sy'n ailystyried penderfyniad ysgol o dan adran 26 o'r Ddeddf; 12 wythnos ym mhob achos arall.
translation.en: (a) 	7 weeks in the case of a local authority reconsidering a school’s decision under section 26 of the Act; (b) 	12 weeks in all other cases.

translation.cy: Nid oes angen i'r ysgol gydymffurfio â'r gofyniad i lunio a rhoi copi o'r CDU cyn diwedd y cyfnod perthnasol hwnnw os nad yw'n ymarferol gwneud hynny oherwydd amgylchiadau sydd y tu hwnt i'w rheolaeth.
translation.en: The school need not comply with the requirement to prepare and give a copy of the IDP before the end of that relevant period if it is impractical to do so due to circumstances beyond its control.

translation.cy: Dyletswyddau awdurdodau lleol mewn perthynas â phlant o oedran ysgol gorfodol nad ydynt mewn ysgol a gynhelir
translation.en: Duties on local authorities in relation to children of compulsory school age not at a maintained school

translation.cy: Gofyniad a osodir gan y Cod.
translation.en: Requirement imposed by the Code.

translation.cy: nodweddion addysgol neu seicolegol neu nodweddion eraill yr achos sy’n ymddangos yn berthnasol i anghenion addysgol y plentyn (gan gynnwys anghenion tebygol y plentyn yn y dyfodol),
translation.en: the educational, psychological or other features of the case which appear to be relevant to the child’s educational needs (including the child’s likely future needs),

translation.cy: sut y gallai’r nodweddion hynny effeithio ar anghenion addysgol y plentyn, ac
translation.en: how those features could affect the child’s educational needs, and

translation.cy: Gall fod yn ddefnyddiol cynnig cyfle i’r plentyn a’i riant ddod i gyfarfod i drafod y mater ymhellach.
translation.en: It might be helpful to offer an opportunity to the child and child’s parent to discuss further.

translation.cy: 13.22 Rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol benderfynu ynghylch ADY, llunio’r cynllun a rhoi copi ohono’n brydlon ac yn sicr cyn diwedd y cyfnod o 12 wythnos ar ôl i’r posibilrwydd fod gan blentyn ADY gael ei ddwyn i’w sylw neu iddi ddod i’r amlwg fel arall iddo y gall fod gan blentyn ADY.
translation.en: 13.22. The local authority must make the decision on ALN, prepare the plan and give a copy of it promptly and in any event before the end of the period of 12 weeks from it being brought to the attention of, or otherwise appearing to, the local authority that the child may have ALN.

translation.cy: 13.23 Nid oes angen i’r awdurdod lleol gydymffurfio â’r gofyniad i wneud y penderfyniad, llunio’r cynllun a rhoi copi ohono cyn diwedd y cyfnod hwnnw o 12 wythnos os nad yw’n ymarferol gwneud hynny oherwydd amgylchiadau y tu hwnt i’w reolaeth.
translation.en: 13.23. The local authority need not comply with the requirement to make the decision, prepare the plan and give a copy of it before the end of that 12 week period if it is impractical to do so due to circumstances beyond its control.

translation.cy: O dan adran 70.
translation.en: Under section 70.

translation.cy: 13.25 Os bydd awdurdod lleol wedi llunio CDU ar gyfer y plentyn nad yw mewn ysgol a gynhelir, rhaid iddo gynnal y CDU hwnnw.
translation.en: 13.25. Where a local authority has prepared an IDP for a child not at a maintained school, it must maintain that IDP.

translation.cy: Adran 14(10) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 14(10) of the Act.

translation.cy: Yn benodol, rhaidi ysgolion a gynhelir wneud pob un o’r canlynol:
translation.en: Specifically, maintained schools must do all of the following:

translation.cy: cymryd pob cam rhesymol i sicrhau’r DDdY y mae ADY plentyn sy’n derbyn gofal yn galw amdani, lle nad oes gan y plentyn hwnnw CDU (er enghraifft, am ei fod yn cael ei lunio) a’i fod yn ddisgybl cofrestredig yn yr ysgol;
translation.en: take all reasonable steps to secure that the ALP called for by a looked after child’s ALN is made, where that child does not have an IDP (for example, because it is being prepared) and is a registered pupil at the school;

translation.cy: Caiff y dyletswyddau hyn, yn cynnwys y cyfyngiadau arnynt, eu hegluro’n fanylach ym Mhennod 12.
translation.en: These duties, including limits to them, are explained in more detail in Chapter 12.

translation.cy: mae’r awdurdod lleol wedi penderfynu ar y mater o’r blaen ac yn fodlon nad yw anghenion y plentyn wedi newid yn sylweddol ers i’r penderfyniad gael ei wneud ac nad oes unrhyw wybodaeth newydd sy’n effeithio’n sylweddol ar y penderfyniad hwnnw;
translation.en: the local authority has previously decided the issue and is satisfied that the child’s needs have not changed materially since that decision and that there is no new information that materially affects that decision;

translation.cy: Fel y disgrifir ym Mhennod 4, mae dyletswydd gyffredinol i gynnwys plant a’u rhieni mewn penderfyniadau sy’n ymwneud ag unrhyw ADY a allai fod ganddynt a llunio CDUau.
translation.en: As described in Chapter 4 there is a general duty to involve children and their parents in decisions that relate to any ALN they might have and the preparation of IDPs.

translation.cy: manylion cyswllt ar gyfer yr awdurdod lleol;
translation.en: contact details for the local authority;

translation.cy: gwybodaeth am yr hawl i apelio i’r Tribiwnlys ynglŷn ag elfennau penodol o’r CDU.
translation.en: information about the right to appeal to the Tribunal about particular aspects of the IDP.

translation.cy: Adran 19(2) a 31(4)(b) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Sections 19(2) and 31(4)(b) of the Act.

translation.cy: Hefyd, gan ei fod yn rhan o gynllun gofal a chymorth y plentyn sy’n nodi materion eraill, yn cynnwys y rhai sy’n ymwneud ag iechyd, datblygiad emosiynol ac ymddygiadol, hunaniaeth a pherthnasoedd teuluol a chymdeithasol; mae’n hwyluso dull cyfannol nid yn unig o gynllunio darpariaeth addysgol ar gyfer y plentyn sy’n derbyn gofal, ond hefyd ar gyfer cynllunio gofal y plentyn yn ei gyfanrwydd.
translation.en: Additionally, as it forms part of the child’s care and support plan which sets out other matters, including those relating to health, emotional and behavioural development, identity and family and social relationships, it facilitates a holistic approach not just to the planning of educational provision for the looked after child, but also for planning the care of the child as a whole.

translation.cy: 14.42 Yn ymarferol, mae hyn yn golygu lle mae awdurdod lleol yn gyfrifol am gynnal CDU, bydd y CDU ar y ffurflen safonol ar gyfer plentyn sy’n derbyn gofal, yn hytrach na’r ffurflen safonol yn Atodiad A (ar gyfer plant nad ydynt yn derbyn gofal a phobl ifanc) a bydd yn cael ei ymgorffori yng nghynllun addysg personol y plentyn.
translation.en: 14.42. In practice, this means that where a local authority is responsible for maintaining the IDP, the IDP will be on the standard form for a looked after child, rather than the standard form in Annex A (for children who are not looked after and young people) and will be incorporated into the child’s PEP.

translation.cy: Pennod 15:
translation.en: Chapter 15:

translation.cy: Nid yw’n ymdrin â sefyllfa pan fo person ifanc yn ddarostyngedig neu’n dod yn ddarostyngedig i orchymyn cadw (mae Pennod 19 yn ymdrin â hyn).
translation.en: It does not deal with the position of a young person who is or becomes subject to a detention order (Chapter 19 deals with this).

translation.cy: 15.2 	Yn unol â hynny, mae cyfeiriadau yn y bennod hon at berson ifanc mewn ysgol (sut bynnag y’u mynegir) yn cyfeirio at berson ifanc sydd wedi’i gofrestru’n ddisgybl mewn ysgol a gynhelir ond nid ydynt yn cynnwys person ifanc sy'n destun gorchymyn cadw neu'n dod yn destun gorchymyn cadw.
translation.en: 15.2. 	Accordingly, references in this chapter to a young person at a school (however expressed) refer to a young person who is registered as a pupil at a maintained school, but do not include a young person who is or becomes subject to a detention order.

translation.cy: Dyletswydd ysgol a gynhelir i benderfynu a oes gan berson ifanc ADY
translation.en: A maintained school’s duty to decide whether a young person has ALN

translation.cy: mae’r person ifanc wedi’i gofrestru’n ddeuol ac mae awdurdod lleol yng Nghymru yn gyfrifol am y person ifanc (gweler paragraff 15.38 am ddyletswydd yr ysgol yn yr achos hwn);
translation.en: the young person is dual-registered and a local authority in Wales is responsible for the young person (see paragraph 15.38 for the school’s duty in this instance);

translation.cy: cofnodi crynodeb o sut y cafodd y posibilrwydd bod gan y person ifanc ADY ei ddwyn i’w sylw neu pam mae’n ymddangos i’r ysgol fel arall y gallai fod gan y person ifanc ADY;
translation.en: record a summary of how the possibility that the young person has ALN has been brought to its attention or why it otherwise appears to it that the young person may have ALN;

translation.cy: (Mae canllawiau ar gynnal y cyfarfodydd hyn ym Mhennod 22).
translation.en: (Guidance on these meetings is provided in Chapter 22).

translation.cy: 15.16 Yn ogystal â nodi’r penderfyniad a’r rhesymau drosto, rhaid12 i’r hysbysiad a roddir i’r person ifanc gynnwys:
translation.en: 15.16. As well as setting out the decision and the reasons for it, the notification to the young person must12 give:

translation.cy: Os yw'n rhesymol iddi ddarparu'r DDdY ei hun, dylaiwneud hynny; ac os yw'n rhesymol iddi drefnu'r ddarpariaeth o unrhyw elfen o'r DDdY gan rywun arall, dylai wneud hynny hefyd.
translation.en: Where it can reasonably provide the ALP itself, it shoulddo so; and where it can reasonably arrange the provision of any element of the ALP by someone else, it shouldalso do so.

translation.cy: 15.36 Mae dyletswyddau34 ar ysgol hefyd i adolygu CDU y mae'n ei gynnal (gweler Pennod 25).
translation.en: 15.36. A school is also subject to dutiesto review an IDP it maintains (see Chapter 25).

translation.cy: 15.37 Ni chaiff awdurdod lleol godi tâl ar y person ifanc am y DDdY a ddisgrifir yn y CDU, nac am unrhyw beth arall y mae’n ei sicrhau ar gyfer y person ifanc o dan Ran 2 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: 15.37. The school must not charge the young person for the ALP described in the IDP, nor for anything else it secures for the young person under Part 2 of the Act.

translation.cy: 39 Adran 12(1) a (2)(a) o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 12(1) and (2)(a) of the Act.

translation.cy: 15.41 Dylai’r ysgol fod yn ymwybodol o’r angen i wneud unrhyw atgyfeiriad o’r fath mor gynnar â phosibl er mwyn lleihau’r oedi cyn llunio’r CDU.
translation.en: The school shouldbe mindful of the need to make any such referral as early as possible so as to minimise delay in the IDP being prepared.

translation.cy: er mwyn diwallu anghenion y person ifanc, mae’r ysgol angen cyngor a chymorth rheolaidd gan asiantaethau allanol sydd y tu hwnt i’r hyn y gellir ei drefnu’n rhesymol gan yr ysgol;
translation.en: to meet the young person’s needs, the school requires regular advice and support from external agencies which is over and above that which can be reasonably arranged and accessed by the school;

translation.cy: mae’r person ifanc angen cyfarpar na ellir ei ddefnyddio ond gan un disgybl neu na ellir ei ailddefnyddio neu sydd y tu hwnt i adnoddau rhesymol yr ysgol;
translation.en: the young person requires equipment which can only be used by one pupil or cannot be reused or is beyond the reasonable resources of the school;

translation.cy: Os atgyfeirir achos at awdurdod lleol (un ai am fod gan y person ifanc gofrestriad deuol neu am un o'r rhesymau sy'n ymwneud â'r ADY ymddangosiadol), mae dyletswydd yr awdurdod lleol i benderfynu (yr ymdrinnir â hi isod) yn debygol o fod yn gymwys.
translation.en: Where a case is referred to a local authority (whether because the young person is dual registered or on one of the grounds relating to the apparent ALN), the local authority’s duty to decide (dealt with below) is likely to apply.

translation.cy: y dyddiad pan fo'n dod i’w sylw, neu pan fo’n dod i’r amlwg iddo fel arall y gall fod gan y person ifanc ADY, a
translation.en: the date on which it is brought to its attention, or otherwise appears to it, that the young person may have ALN, and

translation.cy: y ddarpariaeth a all fod yn briodol ar gyfer y person ifanc yng ngoleuni’r nodweddion hynny, p’un ai drwy gyfrwng DDdY neu fathau eraill o ddarpariaeth ac unrhyw faterion sy’n effeithio ar gyflwyno’r ddarpariaeth honno.
translation.en: the provision which may be appropriate for the young person in light of those features, whether by way of ALP or other types of provision, and any matters affecting the delivery of that provision.

translation.cy: Nid oes angen i’r awdurdod lleol gydymffurfio â’r gofyniad i wneud y penderfyniad a rhoi’r hysbysiad cyn diwedd y cyfnod perthnasol hwnnw os nad yw’n ymarferol gwneud hynny oherwydd amgylchiadau y tu hwnt i’w reolaeth.

translation.en: However, a local authority is not required to consider potential programmes of study, or indeed to identify a young person’s desired outcomes, if it is satisfied that doing so would not affect its decision on whether it is necessary for it to prepare and maintain an IDP for the young person in order to meet their reasonable needs for education or training.30
