translation.en: Regulation 8(6) of the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Pan fydd awdurdod lleol yn ystyried a yw rhaglen astudio mewn sefydliad arbenigol yn addas ar gyfer person ifanc, neu’n parhau’n addas (os yw’r person ifanc eisoes yn ymgymryd â hi), rhaid45 iddo ystyried a oes gobaith realistig y byddai’r person ifanc yn cyflawni ei ddeilliannau dymunol drwy ymgymryd â’r rhaglen astudio, neu barhau i ymgymryd â hi (yn yr achos olaf hwn, parhau â hi ag unrhyw addasiadau arfaethedig iddi).
translation.en: When a local authority considers whether a programme of study at a specialist institution is, or remains (where the young person is already undertaking it), suitable for a young person, it must consider whether there is a realistic prospect that the young person would meet their desired outcomes by undertaking, or continuing to undertake the programme of study (in the latter case, continuing it with any proposed modifications to it).

translation.cy: addasrwydd y rhaglen astudio i gyflawni deilliannau dymunol y person ifanc;
translation.en: the suitability of the programme of study to meet the young person’s desired outcomes;

translation.cy: Nid yw hyn yn atal yr awdurdod lleol rhag ystyried unrhyw wybodaeth berthnasol arall.
translation.en: This does not preclude the local authority from taking into account any other relevant information.

translation.cy: Ar y llaw arall, ar adegau prin, gallai ddod yn amlwg yn ystod rhaglen nad oes gobaith realistig mwyach y bydd y person ifanc yn gallu cyflawni ei ddeilliannau dymunol.
translation.en: On the other hand, on rare occasions, it might become apparent during the course of a programme that there is no longer a realistic prospect of the young person being able to meet their desired outcomes.

translation.cy: (1) Bwriedir i’r rhaglen astudio addas arfaethedig barhau am fwy na 2 flynedd ar y dechrau
translation.en: (1) The proposed suitable programme of study is intended at the outset to last for more than 2 years

translation.cy: At ddibenion penderfynu a oes gan y person ifanc anghenion rhesymol am addysg neu hyfforddiant mewn perthynas â rhaglen astudio ychwanegol, rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol ystyried y ffactorau canlynol, pan fo’n berthnasol:
translation.en: For the purposes of determining whether the young person has reasonable needs for education or training in relation to an additional programme of study,the local authority must take into account the following factors, where relevant:

translation.cy: bod yr addysg bellach neu’r hyfforddiant blaenorol yn disgyn mor bell o dan y safon ddisgwyliedig fel na ellir dweud yn rhesymol bod y darparwr wedi darparu’r addysg neu’r hyfforddiant angenrheidiol i gyflawni deilliannau dymunol y person ifanc,
translation.en: the previous further education or training falling so far below the expected standard that the provider of it cannot reasonably be said to have delivered the education or training necessary to meet the young person’s desired outcomes,

translation.cy: unrhyw amgylchiadau eithriadol eraill;
translation.en: any other exceptional circumstances;

translation.cy: Pan fo awdurdod lleol yn penderfynu bod gan berson ifanc anghenion rhesymol am raglen astudio ychwanegol addas, gall y rhaglen astudio honno wedyn barhau am hyd at ddwy flynedd.
translation.en: Where a local authority determines that a young person has reasonable needs to a suitable additional programme of study, then the duration of that programme of study can then be for up to two years.

translation.cy: Os felly, at ddibenion penderfynu a oes gan y person ifanc anghenion rhesymol am addysg neu hyfforddiant mewn perthynas â’r rhaglen astudio addas arfaethedig, rhaid62 i’r awdurdod lleol ystyried y ffactorau, pan fo’n berthnasol, sy’n gysylltiedig â’r amgylchiadau blaenorol y mae’r sefyllfa’n debyg iawn iddynt.
translation.en: Where this is the case, for the purposes of determining whether the young person has reasonable needs for education or training in relation to the proposed suitable programme of study, the local authority must62 take into account the factors, where relevant, attaching to the preceding circumstance to which the situation is substantially similar.

translation.cy: Os yw awdurdod lleol yn penderfynu bod angen iddo lunio a chynnal cynllun datblygu unigol er mwyn diwallu anghenion rhesymol y person ifanc am addysg neu hyfforddiant, mae’n rhaid iddo lunio CDU ar gyfer y person hwnnw oni bai nad yw’r person ifanc yn cydsynio i’r cynllun gael ei lunio.
translation.en: If a local authority decides that it is necessary for it to prepare and maintain an IDP to meet the young person’s reasonable needs for education or training, it must prepare an IDP for that person unless the person does not consent to the plan being prepared.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r cyngor a geisir ymwneud ag:
translation.en: The advice sought must relate to:

translation.cy: Adran 22 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 22 of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae’n rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol wneud y penderfyniad ynghylch a yw CDU yn angenrheidiol, llunio’r CDU a rhoi copi ohono’n brydlon ac yn sicr o fewn 12 wythnos i gael cydsyniad y person ifanc i wneud y penderfyniad ynghylch a oes gan y person ADY.
translation.en: The local authority mustmake the decision on whether an IDP is necessary, prepare the IDP and give the copy of it promptly and in any event within the period of 12 weeks from the young person consenting to the decision being made as to whether the person has ALN.

translation.cy: Nid oes angen i’r awdurdod lleol gydymffurfio â’r gofyniad i wneud y pethau hynny o fewn y cyfnod o 12 wythnos os nad yw’n ymarferol i’r awdurdod lleol wneud hynny oherwydd amgylchiadau y tu hwnt i’w reolaeth.
translation.en: The local authority need not comply with the requirement to do those things within that 12 week period if it is impractical to do so due to circumstances beyond its control.

translation.cy: 74 Gofyniad a osodir gan y Cod.
translation.en: Requirement imposed by the Code.

translation.cy: 87 Adran 14(1) i (3) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: 87 Section 14(1) to (3) of the Act.

translation.cy: Adran 49(1) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 49(1) of the Act.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mae'r darpariaethau'n ymwneud ag ailystyriaethau gan awdurdodau lleol a ddisgrifir ym Mhenodau 26 a 12 a 15 yn berthnasol gydag addasiadau mewn achosion lle mae disgybl sy'n mynychu ysgol a gynhelir yn dod o dan ardal awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr.
translation.en: However, the provisions on local authority reconsiderations described in Chapters 26 and 12 and 15, do apply with modifications in cases where a pupil at a maintained school is in the area of a local authority in England.

translation.cy: Os bydd plentyn neu berson ifanc sydd â CDU yn mynychu sefydliad o'r fath yn Lloegr, rhaid5 i'r awdurdod lleol sicrhau'r DDdY a nodir yn y CDU.
translation.en: Where a child or young person with an IDP attends such an institution in England, the local authority must secure the ALP set out in the IDP.

translation.cy: I wneud hynny, dylai'rawdurdod lleol weithio gyda'r ysgol honno neu'r sefydliad addysg bellach hwnnw i sicrhau bod y DDdY a ddisgrifir yn CDU y plentyn neu'r person ifanc yn cael ei chyflwyno.
translation.en: To do that, the local authority shouldwork with that school or FEI to ensure that the ALP described in the child or young person’s IDP is delivered.

translation.cy: 21 Adran 53 o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: 21 Section 53 of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae'r dyletswyddau o dan y Ddeddf yr un mor berthnasol i blentyn neu berson ifanc sydd ag anghenion gofal iechyd, gan gynnwys os oes rhywbeth yn amharu ar ei addysg, er enghraifft, am iddo gael ei dderbyn i'r ysbyty am gyfnod hir.
translation.en: Duties under the Act apply equally in respect of a child or young person who has healthcare needs, including if they experience an interruption to their education as a result, for example because of admission to hospital for a sustained period.

translation.cy: Adran 7 o Ddeddf Addysg 1996.
translation.en: Section 7 of the Education Act 1996.

translation.cy: Dylai awdurdod lleol sy’n penderfynu a oes gan blentyn sy’n mynychu ysgol annibynnol ADY neu sy’n llunio neu’n adolygu CDU ar gyfer plentyn o’r fath, weithio gyda’r ysgol annibynnol i adnabod unrhyw ADY a nodi DDdY.
translation.en: A local authority deciding whether a child attending an independent school has ALN or preparing or reviewing an IDP for such a child, shouldwork with the independent school to identify any ALN and ALP.

translation.cy: Wrth gynnal CDU ar gyfer plentyn o’r fath, er mwyn sicrhau’r DDdY a bennir ynddo, dylai’rawdurdod weithio gyda’r ysgol i’w fodloni ei hun ei fod yn cael ei gyflwyno.
translation.en: When maintaining an IDP for such a child, in order to secure the ALP specified in it, the authority shouldwork with the school to satisfy itself that it is being delivered.

translation.cy: Mae'r Gwasanaeth Cynghori Addysg Plant (CEAS) yn rhan o'r Gyfarwyddiaeth ac yn darparu cyngor, cymorth ac arweiniad ynghylch llesiant addysgol y plant a phobl ifanc sy'n perthyn i deuluoedd ym mhob un o'r tair o'r lluoedd a sifiliaid cymwys y weinyddiaeth Amddiffyn sydd wedi'u lleoli dramor.
translation.en: The Children’s Education Advisory Service (CEAS) are part of DCYP and provide advice, support and guidance regarding the educational well-being of the children and young people belonging to families in all 3 Services and eligible MoD civilians who are based overseas.

translation.cy: Wrth benderfynu ar ADY neu wrth lunio neu adolygu CDU ar gyfer plant a phobl ifanc y lluoedd, rhaid33 i ysgol a gynhelir, sefydliad addysg bellach neu awdurdod lleol-
translation.en: A maintained school, FEI or local authority when deciding upon ALN, preparing or reviewing an IDP for a Service child or young person must33

translation.cy: O dan adran 11 (ysgol neu sefydliad addysg bellach) neu adrannau 13, 18 neu 40 (awdurdod lleol) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 11 (school or FEI) or sections 13, 18 or 40 (local authority) of the Act.

translation.cy: Adran 44(1) a (2) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 44(1) and (2) of the Act.

translation.cy: Yr awdurdod cartref ar gyfer plentyn neu berson ifanc yw:
translation.en: The home authority for a child or young person is:

translation.cy: cofnodi’r dyddiad y cafodd ei ddwyn i’w sylw neu yr ymddangosodd iddo fel arall y gall fod gan y person sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth ADY;
translation.en: record the date on which it is brought to its attention, or otherwise appears to it, that the detained person may have ALN;

translation.cy: (c) 	cofnodi crynodeb o sut y cafodd y posibilrwydd bod ADY gan y person sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth ei ddwyn i’w sylw neu sut yr ymddangosodd iddo fel arall y gall fod gan y person sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth ADY.
translation.en: record a summary of how the possibility that the detained person has ALN has been brought to its attention or why it otherwise appears to it that the detained person may have ALN.

translation.cy: Adran 65 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: 18 Section 65 of the Act.

translation.cy: Er mwyn cyflawni’r ddyletswydd hon a’r amcan hwn, fel rheol dylai’r cydlynydd dynodedig fel arfer drefnu cyfarfod neu gyfarfodydd, fel y bo’n briodol, gyda’r plentyn, ei riant neu’r person ifanc, i drafod a phenderfynu ar anghenion y plentyn neu’r person ifanc ac, os oes angen, i lunio CDU ar ei gyfer.
translation.en: To fulfil this duty and objective, the designated co-ordinator shouldnormally arrange a meeting or meetings, as appropriate, with the child, their parent or young person, to discuss and decide the child or young person’s needs and if required, prepare an IDP for them.

translation.cy: Os bydd awdurdod cartref yn penderfynu bod ADY gan berson sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth, rhaid iddo benderfynu yn unol â’r rheoliadau a fydd yn angenrheidiol cynnal CDU ar gyfer y person ar ôl iddo gael ei ryddhau, i ddiwallu ei anghenion rhesymol am addysg neu hyfforddiant.
translation.en: Where a home authority decides that a detained person has ALN, it must decide in accordance with regulations whether it will be necessary for an IDP to be maintained for the person when released from detention to meet their reasonable needs for education or training.

translation.cy: os yw’n debygol y bydd y person wedi troi’n 25 oed cyn iddo gael ei ryddhau, neu
translation.en: it is likely that the person will have attained the age of 25 before being released from detention, or

translation.cy: yn achos person ifanc sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth, ei bod hi’n annhebygol y bydd gan y person anghenion rhesymol am addysg neu hyfforddiant pan fydd yn cael ei ryddhau.
translation.en: in the case of a detained young person, it is unlikely that the person will have reasonable needs for education or training when released.

translation.cy: mae’r person ifanc wedi’i gofrestru fel disgybl neu wedi cofrestru fel myfyriwr mewn ysgol a gynhelir, Academi neu sefydliad addysg bellach (p’un a yw’r ysgol neu’r sefydliad addysg bellach yng Nghymru neu yn Lloegr);
translation.en: the young person is registered as a pupil or enrolled as a student at a maintained school, an Academy or an FEI (whether the school or FEI is in Wales or England);

translation.cy: Bydd safbwyntiau, dymuniadau a theimladau’r person ifanc o ran yr hyn y mae’n dymuno’i wneud pan gaiff ei ryddhau yn hanfodol i’r mater.
translation.en: The young person’s views, wishes and feelings as to what they wish to do when released will be critical to the issue.

translation.cy: Adran 40(4) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 40(4) of the Act.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r awdurdod cartref wneud y penderfyniad dan sylw a rhoi’r hysbysiad yn brydlon ac yn sicr cyn diwedd y cyfnod o 12 wythnos-
translation.en: The home authority must make the decision concerned and give the notification promptly and in any event before the end of the period of 12 weeks from-

translation.cy: Yn achos llunio CDU ar gyfer person sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth, mae gofyniad ychydig yn wahanol oherwydd y sefyllfa.
translation.en: In the case of preparing an IDP for a detained person, there is a slightly different requirement due to the detention situation.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, os nad yw’r person sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth yn debygol o gael ei ryddhau am beth amser, mae atgyfeiriad yn llai tebygol o fod o gymorth, yn enwedig os oes ansicrwydd ynghylch beth fydd sefyllfa’r person sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth adeg ei ryddhau (er enghraifft, ble y gallai fod yn byw neu beth allai ei anghenion fod bryd hynny).
translation.en: However, where the likely release of the detained person is some time away, a referral is less likely to be helpful, particularly if there is uncertainty as to what the detained person’s situation will be on release (for example, where they might be living or what their needs might then be).

translation.cy: Gofyniad (sy’n ddarostyngedig i’r eithriad penodedig) a osodir gan y Cod.
translation.en: Requirement (which is subject to the specified exception) imposed by the Code.

translation.cy: Nid oes angen i’r awdurdod cartref gydymffurfio â’r gofyniad i wneud y penderfyniad, llunio’r CDU a rhoi copi ohono cyn diwedd y cyfnod o 12 wythnos os nad yw’n ymarferol i’r awdurdod cartref wneud hynny oherwydd amgylchiadau sydd y tu hwnt i’w reolaeth.
translation.en: The home authority need not comply with the requirement to make the decision, prepare the IDP and give a copy of it before the end of that 12 week period if it is impractical to do so due to circumstances beyond its control.

translation.cy: gwybodaeth am yr hawl i apelio i’r Tribiwnlys ynglŷn ag elfennau penodol o’r CDU.
translation.en: information about the right to appeal to the Tribunal about particular aspects of the IDP.

translation.cy: O dan amgylchiadau o’r fath, dylai’r awdurdod cartref weithio gyda’r person â chyfrifoldeb dros y llety ieuenctid perthnasol a’r darparwr  addysg i nodi a ellid darparu’r DDdY ac, os na fyddai’n ymarferol gwneud hynny, y ddarpariaeth sy’n cyfateb mor agos â phosibl i’r DDdY a amlinellir yn y CDU.
translation.en: In such circumstances, the home authority should work with the person in charge of the relevant youth accommodation and the education provider to identify whether it could be provided and if it is impractical to do so, the provision corresponding as closely as possible to that set out in the IDP.

translation.cy: Dylai’r awdurdod cartref geisio gwneud hyn cyn gynted ag y daw’n ymwybodol bod y person yn dechrau ar gyfnod o gael ei gadw’n gaeth a bod ganddo CDU, neu wrth iddo lunio CDU ar gyfer y person sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth, gan ddefnyddio gweithdrefnau cynllunio presennol y llety ieuenctid a’r tîm troseddwyr ifanc pan fo hynny’n bosibl.
translation.en: The home authority shouldseek to do this as soon as it becomes aware of the detained person entering detention and that they have an IDP, or as it is preparing an IDP for the detained person, using the relevant youth accommodation’s and youth offending team’s existing planning procedures wherever possible.

translation.cy: Pan fo awdurdod lleol yn cynnal CDU ar gyfer person a oedd yn cael ei gadw’n gaeth ac sydd wedi cael ei ryddhau, rhaidi’r awdurdod adolygu’r CDU.
translation.en: Where, following the release of a detained person, a local authority is maintaining an IDP for that person, the authority mustreview the IDP.

translation.cy: Os trosglwyddir y cyfrifoldeb am gynnal y CDU i ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach heb i’r awdurdod lleol ei adolygu ar ôl rhyddhau’r person, rhaidi’r ysgol neu’r sefydliad addysg bellach adolygu’r CDU a chwblhau’r adolygiad yn brydlon (gan gynnwys, fel y bo’n berthnasol, rhoi copi o’r CDU diwygiedig neu hysbysiad o gasgliad arall yr adolygiad – gweler Pennod 25) ac yn sicr o fewn y cyfnod o 35 diwrnod ysgol (yn achos ysgol) neu 35 diwrnod yn ystod y tymor (yn achos sefydliad addysg bellach) ar ôl
translation.en: If responsibility for maintaining the IDP is transferred to a maintained school or FEI without the local authority having reviewed it following release, the school or FEI mustreview the IDP and complete the review (including, as the case may be, giving  a copy of the revised IDP or notification of another conclusion of the review – see Chapter 25) promptly and in any event within the period of 35 school days (in the case of a school) or term time days (in the case of an FEI) from

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 2 o Ddeddf 1983 yn sôn am dderbyniad gorfodol sifil i’r ysbyty.
translation.en: Part 2 of the 1983 Act deals with civil compulsory admission to hospital.

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 3 o Ddeddf 1983 yn sôn am dderbyniad gorfodol i’r ysbyty yn ystod achos troseddol neu o dan ddedfryd.
translation.en: Part 3 of the 1983 Act deals with compulsory admission to hospital in the course of criminal proceedings or under sentence.

translation.cy: Cyn cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty, efallai:
translation.en: Before being detained in hospital, a child or young person might:

translation.cy: Byddai hyn yn wir pe na bai’r person yn ddarostyngedig i orchymyn cadw, er enghraifft, os oedd y person yn ddisgybl mewn ysgol, a bod yr ysgol yn cynnal CDU.
translation.en: This would be where the person was not subject to a detention order, for example, the person was a pupil at a school, and the school was maintaining an IDP.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, yn achos person ifanc, dim ond o 1 Medi 2022 (gan gynnwys y dyddiad hwnnw) y mae hyn yn gymwys.  Hynny yw, os caiff ei ddwyn i sylw’r awdurdod lleol perthnasol (os oes un) ar gyfer y person ifanc neu os yw’n ymddangos iddo fel arall, ar y dyddiad hwnnw neu o hynny ymlaen, bod gan y person ifanc ADY ac nad oedd CDU yn cael ei gynnal na’i gadw ar gyfer y person ifanc cyn iddo gael ei gadw yn yr ysbyty (pryd bynnag yr oedd hynny).
translation.en: However, in the case of a young person, this only applies from 1 September 2022 (including that date), that is where, on or after that date, it is brought to the attention of or otherwise appears to the relevant local authority for the young person (if there is one) that the young person has ALN and an IDP was neither being maintained nor kept for the young person before their detention in hospital (whenever that was).

translation.cy: Adran 13 o’r Ddeddf fel y’i cymhwysir gan Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021.
translation.en: Section 13 of the Act as applied by the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Sefyllfa plentyn neu berson ifanc
translation.en: Situation of child or young person

translation.cy: yn achos person ifanc, os nad yw’r person ifanc yn cydsynio i’r penderfyniad gael ei wneud, neu
translation.en: In the case of a young person, the young person does not consent to the decision being made, or

translation.cy: Yn achos person ifanc, rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol perthnasol wneud y canlynol yn brydlon hefyd:
translation.en: In the case of a young person, the relevant local authority must also do the following promptly:

translation.cy: Os yw awdurdod lleol perthnasol yn penderfynu bod ADY gan blentyn sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty, rhaid iddo baratoi CDU ar gyfer y plentyn.
translation.en: Where a relevant local authority decides that a child detained in hospital has ALN, it must prepare an IDP for the child.

translation.cy: Yn achos unrhyw berson ifanc arall sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty, os yw’r awdurdod lleol perthnasol yn penderfynu bod gan y person ifanc ADY, mae’n rhaid iddo benderfynu yn unol â rheoliadau97 a yw’n angenrheidiol iddo lunio a chynnal CDU er mwyn diwallu anghenion rhesymol y person ifanc am addysg neu hyfforddiant.
translation.en: In the case of any other young person detained in hospital, if the relevant local authority decides that the young person has ALN, it must decide in accordance with regulations97 whether it is necessary for it to prepare and maintain an IDP to meet the young person’s reasonable needs for education or training.

translation.cy: Wrth ystyried a yw CDU yn angenrheidiol, bydd angen i’r awdurdod lleol ystyried yr holl amgylchiadau, gan gynnwys y ffaith fod y person yn cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty ac am faint mae hynny’n debygol o barhau.
translation.en: In considering whether an IDP is necessary, the local authority will need to take account of all the circumstances, including the person’s detention in hospital and its likely length.

translation.cy: Rhaid100 i’r awdurdod lleol perthnasol wneud y penderfyniad hwnnw a chyflwyno’r hysbysiad yn brydlon ac yn sicr cyn diwedd y cyfnod o 12 wythnos i gael cydsyniad y person ifanc i wneud y penderfyniad ynghylch a oes gan y person ifanc ADY ai peidio.
translation.en: The relevant local authority mustmake that decision and give the notification promptly and in any event before the end of the period of 12 weeks from the young person consenting to the decision being made as to whether or not the young person has ALN.

translation.cy: O dan adran 68 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 68 of the Act.

translation.cy: Dylai’r awdurdod ystyried unrhyw bryderon a gweithredu arnynt yn briodol, a gallai hyn gynnwys diweddaru’r CDU drafft, neu esbonio penderfyniadau neu faterion eraill ymhellach.
translation.en: The authority shouldconsider any concerns and act upon them appropriately, which may be to update the draft IDP, or explain decisions or other matters further.

translation.cy: 112 Gofyniad a osodir gan y Cod (sy’n gymwys yn rhinwedd Rheoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021).
translation.en: 112 Requirement imposed by the Code (applicable by virtue of the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021).

translation.cy: Wrth roi copi o’r CDU i’r plentyn neu’r person ifanc ac, yn achos plentyn, ei riant, rhaid112 i’r awdurdod lleol perthnasol hefyd roi:
translation.en: When giving a copy of the IDP to the child or young person and, in the case of a child, their parent, the relevant local authority must112 also give :

translation.cy: Adran 14 o’r Ddeddf fel y’i cymhwysir gan Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021.
translation.en: Section 14 of the Act as applied by the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Os oedd gan blentyn neu berson ifanc CDU a oedd yn cael ei gynnal gan ysgol neu sefydliad addysg bellach cyn cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty, nid oes gan yr ysgol neu’r sefydliad addysg bellach unrhyw ddyletswydd i’w gynnal tra bod y person yn ddarostyngedig i orchymyn cadw.
translation.en: If a child or young person had an IDP maintained by a school or FEI before being detained in hospital, the school or FEI has no duty to maintain it whilst the person is subject to a detention order118.

translation.cy: Os oedd gan blentyn neu berson ifanc CDU a gynhelid gan awdurdod lleol cyn cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty, rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol perthnasol gynnal y CDU tra bo’r person yn cael ei gadw yn yr ysbyty.
translation.en: If a child or young person had an IDP maintained by a local authority before being detained in hospital, the relevant local authority must121 maintain the IDP whilst the person is detained in hospital.

translation.cy: Os oedd plentyn neu berson ifanc sydd â CDU wedi cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn llety ieuenctid perthnasol yng Nghymru neu yn Lloegr cyn cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty, nid yw dyletswydd yr awdurdod cartref i gadw’r CDU yn gymwys tra bo’r person yn cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty.
translation.en: If a child or young person who has an IDP was detained in relevant youth accommodation in Wales or England before being detained in hospital, the home authority’s duty to keep the IDP does not apply whilst the person is detained in the hospital.

translation.cy: Yn yr achos hwn, rhaidi’r awdurdod hysbysu’r plentyn neu’r person ifanc ac, yn achos plentyn, y rhiant, ei fod wedi dod yn gyfrifol am gynnal y cynllun.
translation.en: In this case, the authority mustinform the child or young person and in the case of a child, the parent, that it has become responsible for maintaining the plan.

translation.cy: Pan fo CDU yn cael ei gynnal neu ei gadw gan gorff heblaw’r awdurdod lleol perthnasol cyn i’r person gael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty, rhaid i’r corff a oedd yn cadw neu’n cynnal y CDU roi copi ohono i’r awdurdod lleol perthnasol os yw’n ymwybodol o’r amgylchiadau sy’n arwain at drosglwyddo cyfrifoldeb i’r awdurdod lleol perthnasol.
translation.en: Where an IDP was maintained or kept by a body other than the relevant local authority prior to the detention in hospital, the body that was keeping or maintaining it, must128 give a copy of the IDP to the relevant local authority if it is aware of the circumstances which give rise to the transfer of responsibility to the relevant local authority.

translation.cy: Nid yw hyn yn gymwys i unrhyw DDdY sy’n driniaeth neu wasanaeth a nodir gan un o gyrff y GIG.  Yn yr achos hwn, rhaid131 i gorff perthnasol y GIG sicrhau’r DDdY.
translation.en: This does not apply to any ALP which is a relevant treatment or service identified by an NHS body, in which case the NHS body must secure the ALP.

translation.cy: Casglu tystiolaeth
translation.en: Gathering evidence

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, bydd rhai plant sydd o dan oedran ysgol gorfodol yn cael addysg wedi’i seilio ar y cyfnod sylfaen y tu allan i leoliad ysgol a gynhelir.
translation.en: For example, some children under compulsory school age will be receiving a foundation phase based education outside of a maintained school setting.

translation.cy: Dylaipob ymgeisydd a myfyriwr sydd wedi cofrestru mewn sefydliadau addysg bellach gael cyfle wrth ymgeisio, wrth gofrestru ac yn ystod y cwrs, i godi unrhyw bryderon ynghylch eu hanghenion dysgu.
translation.en: All applicants and enrolled students at FEIs shouldbe given the opportunity at application stage, at enrolment and during the course to raise any concerns about their learning needs.

translation.cy: Er mwyn canfod beth sy'n achosi'r perfformiad academaidd gwael neu gynnydd annigonol, gallai fod yn werth ystyried a yw'r plentyn neu'r person ifanc yn ymddwyn yn wahanol neu'n arddangos gallu dysgu gwahanol mewn gwahanol leoliadau ac amgylcheddau.
translation.en: To establish the cause of poor academic performance or inadequate progress, it might be useful to consider if the child or young person is showing different behaviour or demonstrating different learning ability in different settings and environments.

translation.cy: Nid yw addysgu gwahaniaethol o'r fath, ynddo'i hun, yn gyfystyr â DDdY ac nid yw'r ffaith bod angen dull gwahaniaethol ar blentyn neu berson ifanc yn golygu bod ganddo ADY.
translation.en: Such differentiated teaching does not, itself, constitute ALP and just because a child or young person requires a differentiated approach does not mean that they have ALN.

translation.cy: Os bydd cynnydd yn parhau i fod yn llai na'r disgwyl ac os nad yw dulliau addysgu gwahaniaethol neu ymyriadau safonol wedi'u targedu yn llwyddo i fynd i'r afael â'r bwlch cyrhaeddiad rhwng y plentyn neu'r person ifanc a'i gyfoedion, byddai hyn fel arfer yn dangos i'r ysgol, sefydliad addysg bellach neu awdurdod lleol y gallai fod gan y plentyn neu'r person ifanc ADY.
translation.en: Where progress continues to be less than expected and the application of differentiated teaching or standard targeted interventions have failed to address the attainment gap between the child or young person and their peers, this would usually indicate to the school, FEI or local authority that the child or young person may have ALN.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal â hyn, mewn rhai achosion, gallai fod angen cyngor meddygol gan gorff iechyd am effaith anabledd neu gyflwr meddygol er mwyn helpu i adnabod union natur yr anhawster dysgu neu'r anabledd (neu a oes anhawster neu anabledd o gwbl) a pha ddarpariaeth y mae galw amdani, a allai fod yn DDdY (ceir canllawiau manwl am rôl a dyletswyddau cyrff iechyd ym Mhennod 21).
translation.en: Additionally, in some cases, it might be necessary to get medical advice from a health body about the effect of a disability or medical condition to help identify exactly what the learning difficulty or disability is (or whether there is one at all) and what provision is called for by it, which might be ALP (detailed guidance in relation to the role of, and duties on, health bodies is provided in Chapter 21.)

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu y dylai’r DDdY sy'n cael ei gwneud fod ar y lefel isaf sy'n angenrheidiol i ddiwallu'r anghenion a nodwyd ar gyfer y plentyn neu'r person ifanc.
translation.en: This means that the ALP made shouldbe at the lowest level necessary to meet the child or young person’s identified needs.

translation.cy: Gwaith amlasiantaeth
translation.en: Multi-Agency Working

translation.cy: Bwriedir i’r swyddogaethau sydd gan bersonau perthnasol gefnogi awdurdodau lleol a chyrff llywodraethu wrth iddynt arfer eu swyddogaethau mewn cysylltiad ag ADY.
translation.en: The functions on relevant persons are intended to provide support to local authorities and governing bodies in the exercise of their functions relating to ALN.

translation.cy: Mae paragraffau 21.5 – 21.13 yn delio â’r ddyletswydd sydd ar bersonau perthnasol i gydymffurfio â chais am wybodaeth neu gymorth arall.
translation.en: Paragraphs 21.5 – 21.13 deal with the duty on relevant persons to comply with a request for information or other help.

translation.cy: Mae paragraffau 21.21 - 21.39 yn berthnasol i gyrff y GIG ac yn delio ag achosion a atgyfeirir atynt i ganfod a oes DDdY y gallant ei chynnig.
translation.en: Paragraphs 21.21 – 21.39 are relevant to NHS bodies and deal with referrals to them to identify whether there is ALP that they can provide.

translation.cy: Cyfeirir at y cyrff hyn fel "personau perthnasol" drwy’r Cod a rhaid i bob un ohonynt roi sylw i ganllawiau perthnasol yn y Cod wrth arfer swyddogaethau o dan Ran 2 o’r Ddeddf:
translation.en: These bodies are referred to as “relevant persons” throughout the Code and they must all have regard to relevant guidance in the Code when exercising functions under Part 2 of the Act:

translation.cy: corff llywodraethu ysgol a gynhelir yng Nghymru neu yn Lloegr;
translation.en: the governing body of a maintained school in Wales or England;

translation.cy: adran 12(2) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: section 12(2) of the Act.

translation.cy: Os mai arfer swyddogaeth sy’n ymwneud â phlentyn neu berson ifanc penodol yw diben cais yr awdurdod lleol, ac os yw’r person perthnasol o dan ddyletswydd i gydymffurfio â’r cais, rhaid i’r person perthnasol gydymffurfio’n brydlon, ac yn sicr o fewn chwe wythnos i gael y cais.
translation.en: Where the local authority’s request is for the purpose of exercising a function which relates to a particular child or young person, and the relevant person is under the duty to comply with the request, the relevant person must comply promptly and in any event by the end of the period of six weeks from receiving the request.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, wrth lunio neu adolygu CDU, efallai y bydd awdurdod lleol yn gwneud cais am wybodaeth gan berson perthnasol y tu allan i Gymru, er enghraifft, cais am wybodaeth am blentyn neu berson ifanc i dîm troseddwyr ifanc yn Lloegr.
translation.en: For example, when preparing or reviewing an IDP, a local authority may request information from a relevant person outside Wales, such as a request for information about a child or young person to a youth offending team in England.

translation.cy: a fydd rhoi gwybod i’r awdurdod lleol yn helpu’r awdurdod i gynllunio ar gyfer darpariaeth y bydd ei hangen ar y plentyn pan fydd yn mynychu lleoliad blynyddoedd cynnar neu ysgol gynradd;
translation.en: informing the local authority will help the authority plan for provision that the child will require when he or she attends an early years setting or primary school;

translation.cy: Yn y rhan fwyaf o sefyllfaoedd, dwyn y mater i sylw’r awdurdod lleol fyddai’r peth gorau ar gyfer y plentyn yn ôl pob tebyg, ond gallai fod rhesymau eraill sy’n drech na hyn mewn rhai achosion, neu mae’n bosibl nad dyna fyddai’r peth gorau ar yr adeg honno.
translation.en: In most situations, it would be likely that bringing the matter to the attention of the local authority would be in the child’s best interests, but there might occasionally be over-riding reasons why this would not be case, or it might not be the case at the current time.

translation.cy: Gall cyrff y GIG helpu i ddiwallu anghenion plant a phobl ifanc mewn pob math o ffyrdd.
translation.en: NHS bodies can help meet the needs of children and young people in a range of ways.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gallant:
translation.en: For instance, they can:

translation.cy: darparu cyngor i staff ar addasu amgylchedd addysg y plentyn neu’r person ifanc;
translation.en: provide advice to staff on the modification of the environment within which the child or young person receives their education;

translation.cy: Adran 20(1) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 20(1) of the Act.

translation.cy: Yn y rhan fwyaf o achosion, mae Bwrdd Iechyd Lleol yn gyfrifol am y rhai sydd fel arfer yn preswylio yn yr ardal y’i sefydlwyd ar ei chyfer.
translation.en: In most instances, a Local Health Board is responsible for the persons usually resident in the area for which it is established.

translation.cy: Mae’r achos yn ymwneud â
translation.en: The referral relates to

translation.cy: Plentyn
translation.en: A child

translation.cy: ei fod wedi rhoi gwybod i’r plentyn neu’r person ifanc ac, yn achos plentyn, ei riant, ei fod yn bwriadu atgyfeirio’r achos,
translation.en: has informed the child or young person and, in the case of a child, their parent, that it intends to make the referral,

translation.cy: Ar ôl i achos gael ei atgyfeirio, os na fydd corff y GIG yn nodi triniaeth neu wasanaeth perthnasol sy’n debygol o fod o fudd er mwyn mynd i’r afael ag ADY y plentyn neu’r person ifanc, rhaid iddo:
translation.en: Following a referral, if an NHS body does not identify a relevant treatment or service that is likely to be of benefit in addressing the child or young person’s ALN, it must:

translation.cy: Rhaid i gorff y GIG gydymffurfio â’r ddyletswydd i roi gwybod am ganlyniad ei ystyriaeth (a ddisgrifir ym mharagraffau 21.30 - 21.31) yn brydlon, ac yn sicr cyn diwedd y cyfnod o chwe wythnos ar ôl i’r atgyfeiriad ddod i law.
translation.en: The NHS body must comply with the duty to inform of the outcome of its consideration (described in paragraphs 21.30 – 21.31) promptly and in any event before the end of the period of six weeks from receiving the referral.

translation.cy: Gweler Pennod 1 i gael gwybod rhagor am sut i ddehongli amserlenni yn y Cod hwn.
translation.en: See Chapter 1 for more information on how timescales in this Code are to be interpreted.

translation.cy: Mae rhagor o wybodaeth am CDUau a’u cynnwys wedi’i nodi ym Mhennod 23.
translation.en: Further information about IDPs and their content is set out in Chapter 23.

translation.cy: I gael rhagor o wybodaeth am adolygu CDUau gweler Pennod 25.
translation.en: For more information on reviewing IDPs see Chapter 25.

translation.cy: Adrannau 23(7) a 24(6) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Sections 23(7) and 24(6) of the Act.

translation.cy: Adran 21(7) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 21(7) of the Act.

translation.cy: Caiff39 yr ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol, fel y bo’n berthnasol, atgyfeirio’r achos at y Bwrdd Iechyd Lleol sydd wedi dod yn gyfrifol am y plentyn neu’r person ifanc.
translation.en: The school, FEI or local authority, as the case may be, may39 make a referral to the Local Health Board that has become responsible for the child or young person.

translation.cy: Rhaid i bawb sy’n ymwneud â sicrhau DDdY ar gyfer plentyn ag ADY sy’n cael ei addysgu mewn ysgol brif ffrwd a gynhelir sicrhau bod y plentyn yn cymryd rhan yng ngweithgareddau’r ysgol ochr yn ochr â phlant nad oes ganddynt ADY.
translation.en: All those concerned with making ALP for a child with ALN who is being educated in a mainstream maintained school, must secure that the child engages in the activities of the school together with children who do not have ALN.

translation.cy: Cyfarfodydd am ADY a CDUau
translation.en: Meetings about ALN and IDPs

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mae’n bosibl y bydd rhwystrau rhag cynnal cyfarfod wyneb yn wyneb mewn rhai achosion ac fe allai fod yn briodol ei gynnal yn rhithiol, yn llwyr neu’n rhannol.
translation.en: However, on some occasions, there may be obstacles to holding a meeting in that way and holding it wholly, or in part, virtually may be appropriate.

translation.cy: canllaw ar gyfer blynyddoedd cynnar, ysgolion a cholegau yng Nghymru,  https://llyw.cymru/sites/default/files/publications/2018-12/pecyn-cymorth-adolygiadau-sy-ncanolbwyntio-ar-unigolion.pdf.
translation.en: a guide for early years, schools and colleges in Wales,  https://gov.wales/sites/default/files/publications/2018-12/person-centred-reviews-toolkit.pdf

translation.cy: Gallai hwn fod yn gyfarfod gyda'r plentyn, ei riant neu berson ifanc i fynnu eu barn cyn cyfarfod mwy gyda'r holl weithwyr proffesiynol angenrheidiol.
translation.en: This could be a meeting with the child, their parent or young person to elicit their views in advance of a larger meeting with all the necessary professionals.

translation.cy: Yn yr un modd, wrth adolygu CDU, y sawl sy'n gyfrifol am gynnal yr adolygiad ddylaifod yn gyfrifol am drefnu'r cyfarfod a'i arwain.
translation.en: Similarly, when reviewing an IDP, it shouldbe the person responsible for conducting the review who is responsible for arranging the meeting and who shouldlead it.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, os nad yw anghenion y plentyn yn ddifrifol nac yn gymhleth, efallai mai dim ond y plentyn, ei riant a'r cydlynydd dynodedig fydd yno.
translation.en: For example, for a child whose needs are neither severe nor complex, it might only include the child, their parent, and the designated coordinator.

translation.cy: Adran 65(2) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 65(2) of the Act.

translation.cy: Pan na fydd pobl berthnasol yn mynd i fod yn bresennol dylent ddarparu'n ysgrifenedig, yn ddigon pell cyn y cyfarfod, unrhyw gyngor a thystiolaeth sy'n ofynnol i hysbysu'r cyfarfod fel y gall pob parti ei ystyried yn briodol ymlaen llaw.
translation.en: Where relevant persons are not going to attend they shouldprovide in writing, sufficiently in advance of the meeting, any advice and evidence required to inform the meeting so that it can be properly considered in advance by all parties.

translation.cy: Gan amlaf, unrhyw ysgol, sefydliad addysg bellach neu leoliad blynyddoedd cynnar y mae'r plentyn neu'r person ifanc yn ei fynychu yw'r lleoliad mwyaf addas i gael cyfarfod.
translation.en: In most cases, the most suitable location for a meeting will be at any school, FEI or early years setting which the child or young person attends.

translation.cy: Gallai hefyd fod yn angenrheidiol neu’n briodol ar rai adegau i gyfarfod gael ei gynnal yn rhithiol; naill ai yn llwyr (hy bydd pawb yn cymryd rhan yn rhithiol), neu yn rhannol (e.e. mae’n bosibl mai dim ond yn rhithiol y bydd rhai pobl yn gallu cymryd rhan am wahanol resymau; neu efallai y bydd y plentyn neu’r person ifanc yn dymuno cymryd rhan yn rhithiol).
translation.en: It may also be necessary or appropriate, on occasion, for a meeting to be held virtually; either wholly (i.e. all attendees participate virtually), or in part (e.g. certain attendees may only be able to attend virtually for various reasons; or the child or young person may wish to attend virtually).

translation.cy: Adran 25 o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 25 of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae Rhan B (o baragraff 23.97 ymlaen) yn rhoi rhagor o fanylion am faterion penodol sy’n ymwneud â llunio a chynnal CDU, yn benodol y ddyletswydd i ffafrio ysgolion prif ffrwd a gynhelir, lleoliadau mewn ysgolion annibynnol, sefydliadau ôl-16 arbennig annibynnol a lleoliadau ac ystyriaethau eraill.
translation.en: Part B (from paragraph 23.97 onwards) provides further detail on certain matters relating to the preparing and maintaining of an IDP, specifically the duty to favour mainstream maintained schools, placements at independent schools, independent special post-16 institutions (ISPIs) and other placements and considerations.

translation.cy: Yn y bennod hon drwyddi draw, mae rhywfaint o amrywiad yn yr iaith a ddefnyddir i ddisgrifio camau amrywiol mewn perthynas â’r CDU (er enghraifft, weithiau defnyddir “cynnal y CDU” ac mewn mannau eraill gellir defnyddio “adolygu’r CDU”).
translation.en: Throughout this chapter, there is some variation in the language used to describe various actions in relation to the IDP (for example, sometimes “maintaining the IDP” may be used and other times “revising the IDP” may be used).

translation.cy: Mae’r Bennod yn rhoi arweiniad ac yn nodi gofynion o ran sut y dylid llenwi’r ffurflen safonol.
translation.en: The Chapter provides guidance and sets out requirements as to how the standard form should be completed.

translation.cy: Caiff y corff sy’n llunio neu’n cynnal CDU gynnwys rhagor o wybodaeth fel atodiadau, pe bai’n ystyried ei bod yn briodol gwneud hynny.
translation.en: The body preparing or maintaining an IDP may include further information as appendices, should it consider it appropriate to do so.

translation.cy: Mae’r paragraffau’n manylu sut y dylid llenwi pob adran gyfatebol o’r ffurflen safonol, gan gynnwys canllawiau a gofynion penodol.
translation.en: The paragraphs detail how each corresponding section of the standard form should be completed, including guidance and certain requirements.

translation.cy: Mae’r paragraffau isod yn nodi’r elfennau hynny o’r CDU y gellir apelio yn eu cylch i’r Tribiwnlys.
translation.en: The paragraphs below indicate those elements of the IDP in relation to which appeals to the Tribunal can be made.

translation.cy: Mae elfennau cyfatebol y ffurflen safonol yn Atodiad A wedi’u nodi â phrint coch, trwm, ac wedi’u tanlinellu.
translation.en: The corresponding elements of the standard form at Annex A are also indicated as underlined, bold and red.

translation.cy: https://cy.ico.org.uk
translation.en: www.ico.org.uk

translation.cy: Cyfeiriad a rhif ffôn y plentyn neu’r person ifanc.
translation.en: These are those of the child or young person.

translation.cy: Ar gyfer person ifanc, dim ond os yw’r person ifanc yn cydsynio i’r corff sy’n cynnal y CDU rannu gwybodaeth am y CDU a’r ADY ag ef y dylid nodi manylion rhiant yn y fan hon ac yn 1A.8 ac 1A.9.
translation.en: For a young person, their parent’s details should only be inserted here and in 1A.8 and 1A.9 if the young person consents to the body maintaining the IDP sharing information about their IDP and their ALN with them.

translation.cy: Os yw’r CDU ar gyfer person ifanc, gweler y nodiadau ar is-adran 1A.7.
translation.en: See the notes on subsection 1A.7 where the IDP is for a young person.

translation.cy: Dylid cofnodi’r corff sy’n cynnal y CDU, boed yr ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol.
translation.en: This is to record the body that maintains the IDP, whether that be the school, FEI or local authority.

translation.cy: Dyma’r dyddiad arfaethedig ar gyfer cynnal yr adolygiad nesaf o’r CDU, er na fydd yr adolygiad nesaf o reidrwydd yn dechrau bryd hynny.
translation.en: This is the proposed date from which the next review of the IDP would take place, although the next review may not necessarily start then.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, er mwyn i broffil weithredu’n effeithiol, mae’n bwysig bod popeth sydd wedi’i gynnwys ynddo yn canolbwyntio ar y pethau cadarnhaol, ac yn gwneud hynny mewn modd clir, cryno a chywir.
translation.en: However, for a profile to operate effectively, it is important that everything included within it is focussed on the positives, whilst being clear, concise, and accurate.

translation.cy: Dylai’r rhai sy’n gyfrifol am ddrafftio’r CDU sicrhau nad ydynt yn camgymryd y disgrifiad o ADY am y DDdY sydd ei hangen i ddiwallu’r anghenion hynny.
translation.en: Those responsible for drafting the IDP ought to ensure that they do not confuse the description of ALN with the ALP necessary to meet those needs.

translation.cy: Gallai hyn gynnwys proses dracio barhaus neu unrhyw asesiad a gynhelir yn rheolaidd yn y lleoliad addysgol.
translation.en: This could include a continuing process of tracking or any assessments that might take place in the educational setting on a regular basis.

translation.cy: Gall unrhyw bryderon a godir o ganlyniad i’r gwaith monitro hwn arwain at adolygiad o’r CDU yn ei gyfanrwydd (gweler Pennod 25).
translation.en: Any concerns raised as a result of this monitoring might lead to a review of the IDP as a whole (see Chapter 25).

translation.cy: Disgrifiad o’r DDdY sydd i’w darparu er mwyn cyflawni’r deilliant a fwriedir.
translation.en: This is a description of the ALP to be provided with a view to meeting the intended outcome.

translation.cy: Mae dyddiad dechrau a dyddiad gorffen y DDdY (lle mae un) yn rhan o’r disgrifiad o’r DDdY, er eu bod wedi’u nodi ar wahân yn yr is-adrannau hyn yn adran 2B.
translation.en: The start and the end date (where there is one) for the ALP, although set out separately in these subsections of section 2B, is part of the description of ALP.

translation.cy: 15 Mae adran 21(3) o’r Ddeddf yn gymwys mewn perthynas â chynnal CDU;
translation.en: Section 21(3) of the Act applies in relation to maintaining an IDP; a requirement is imposed by the Code in relation to preparing an IDP.

translation.cy: Dyma’r isadrannau yn adran 2C:
translation.en: The sub-sections of section 2C are:

translation.cy: Adran 6 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 6 of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae’r pŵer yn adran 48 yn darparu y caiff awdurdod lleol sy’n llunio neu’n cynnal CDU ar gyfer plentyn enwi ysgol a gynhelir yng Nghymru at ddiben sicrhau bod y plentyn yn cael ei dderbyn i’r ysgol honno.
translation.en: The power at section 48 provides that a local authority which is preparing or maintaining an IDP for a child, may name a maintained school in Wales for the purpose of securing admission of the child to that school.

translation.cy: Adran 48(6) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 48(6) of the Act.

translation.cy: Adran 14(7) o’r Ddeddf; adran 19(5) ar gyfer plant sy’n derbyn gofal.
translation.en: Section 14(7) of the Act; section 19(5) for looked after children.

translation.cy: Adran 14(8)(a) o’r Ddeddf; adran 19(6)(a) ar gyfer plant sy’n derbyn gofal.
translation.en: Section 14(8)(a) of the Act; section 19(6)(a) for looked after children.

translation.cy: Gallai’r gwasanaethau hyn gynnwys:
translation.en: These might include:

translation.cy: Yn achos CDUau sydd wedi’u llunio ers cryn amser, bydd hefyd yn cynnwys gwybodaeth sy’n deillio o waith monitro diweddar ar y DDdY ac o waith olrhain data a thargedau pan fo hyn wedi arwain at ddiwygio’r CDU.
translation.en: For those IDPs which have been in existence for some time, it would also include information arising from the recent monitoring of the ALP and the tracking of data and targets where this has led to a revision to the IDP.

translation.cy: Adran 3B:
translation.en: Section 3B:

translation.cy: Amserlen o ddigwyddiadau allweddol
translation.en: Timeline of key events

translation.cy: enw’r ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol a luniodd y CDU (os yw’n wahanol i’r corff sy’n ei gynnal ar hyn o bryd);
translation.en: the name of the school, FEI or local authority which prepared the IDP (if different to the body currently maintaining it);

translation.cy: unrhyw wybodaeth a allai fod yn berthnasol wrth i’r plentyn neu berson ifanc bontio i’r cyfnod nesaf ac a fyddai’n ddefnyddiol i’r rheini sy’n gysylltiedig â darparu addysg neu hyfforddiant i’r plentyn neu’r person ifanc,
translation.en: any information which might be relevant to the child or young person’s transition and which would be helpful to those involved in delivering the child or young person’s education or training to know, and

translation.cy: cymorth arall nad yw’n DDdY ar gyfer proses bontio i ddod,
translation.en: other support for a forthcoming transition which is not ALP,

translation.cy: Trwy gynnwys gwybodaeth yn yr adran hon, gellir helpu corff sy’n dod yn gyfrifol am gynnal y CDU, ar ôl i’r plentyn neu’r person ifanc symud i leoliad newydd, i arfer ei swyddogaethau o dan y Ddeddf, er enghraifft, i adolygu’r CDU.
translation.en: Including information in this section may assist a body that becomes responsible for maintaining the IDP following a move to a new setting to perform its functions under the Act, for example, to review the IDP.

translation.cy: Gall cofnod o’r fath fod yn berthnasol mewn achosion eithriadol, er enghraifft, os bydd gan y plentyn neu’r person ifanc anghenion teithio penodol neu os bydd angen cydgysylltu’n ofalus y trefniadau ar gyfer teithio ac ar gyfer cyflwyno’r DDdY.
translation.en: Recording this may be relevant in exceptional cases, for example, where the child or young person has particular travel needs or where the travel arrangements and the delivery of ALP require careful coordination.

translation.cy: Yn y cyd-destun hwn, mae i “sefydliad addysgol annibynnol” yr ystyr a roddir i “independent educational institution” gan Bennod 1 o Ran 4 o’r Ddeddf honno.
translation.en: In this context, “independent educational institution” has the meaning given by Chapter 1 of Part 4 of that Act.

translation.cy: Mewn achosion prin iawn, gall fod yn briodol i blentyn neu berson ifanc sydd angen DDdY gael lle mewn sefydliad y tu allan i Gymru a Lloegr.
translation.en: Very rarely, it may be appropriate for a child or young person requiring specialist ALP to be placed at an institution outside England and Wales.

translation.cy: Ni chaiff awdurdod lleol ddisgrifio lleoliad y tu allan i Gymru a Lloegr ynadran 2D.2 neu 2D.3 (neu’r ddau) o CDU a sicrhau’r ddarpariaeth honno oni bai bod y sefydliad wedi ei drefnu i wneud y DDdY a ddisgrifir yn CDU y plentyn neu’r person ifanc.
translation.en: A local authority must notdescribe a placement outside of England and Wales in section 2D.2 or 2D.3 (or both) of an IDP and secure that provision unless the institution is organised to make the ALP described in the child or young person’s IDP.

translation.cy: Adran 59 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 59 of the Act.

translation.cy: Dylid defnyddio’r bennod hon wrth lunio neu gynnal Cynllun Datblygu Unigol (CDU) ar gyfer plentyn sy’n derbyn gofal sydd ag ADY.
translation.en: This chapter should be used when preparing or maintaining an Individual Development Plan (IDP) for a looked after child with ALN.

translation.cy: Yn yr un modd, ar yr amod nad yw penawdau a strwythur sylfaenol y ffurflen safonol yn cael eu newid (byddai newid o’r fath yn torri’r gofyniad), caiffedrychiad y ffurflen safonol ei addasu yn ôl dewisiadau lleol (er enghraifft, drwy gynnwys logo’r awdurdod lleol) neu ddewisiadau’r plentyn (drwy ddefnyddio ffont mwy o faint neu ffont gwahanol, defnyddio delweddau yn ogystal â thestun, osgoi defnyddio lliwiau penodol ac ati), a gellir addasu’r modd y caiff yr wybodaeth ei mewnosod i’r adrannau a’r is-adrannau hynny hefyd.
translation.en: Similarly, provided that the headings and fundamental structure of the standard form is not altered (such alteration would contravene the requirement), the appearance of the standard form may be adapted to suit local preferences (such as by including the logo of the local authority) or those of the child (such as by using a larger or different font, using images as well as text, avoiding the use of certain colours etc.), as can the presentation of the information inserted into those sections and sub-sections.

translation.cy: cael ei datblygu ar sail hyblyg sy’n canolbwyntio ar yr unigolyn ac sy’n adlewyrchu anghenion y plentyn;
translation.en: developed on a flexible, person-centred basis that reflects the needs of the child;

translation.cy: Adolygu a diwygio CDUau
translation.en: Review and revision of IDPs

translation.cy: I sicrhau bod y CDU yn parhau i adlewyrchu’n gywir anghenion y plentyn neu’r person ifanc a manylion y ddarpariaeth sy’n ofynnol i ddiwallu’r anghenion hynny, mae’r Ddeddf yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol adolygu CDUau o leiaf unwaith y flwyddyn ac mae’n caniatáu eu diwygio yng ngoleuni pob adolygiad.
translation.en: To ensure that the IDP continues to accurately reflect the child or young person’s needs and details the provision required to meet those needs, the Act requires IDPs to be reviewed at least annually and allows for them to be revised in the light of each review.

translation.cy: Trafodir y mater hwn ym Mhennod19.
translation.en: This matter is dealt with in Chapter 19.

translation.cy: adolygiadau a ysgogir gan ysgol, sefydliad addysg bellach ac awdurdod lleol;
translation.en: school, FEI and local authority initiated reviews;

translation.cy: ceisiadau am adolygiadau gan blant, eu rhieni a phobl ifanc;
translation.en: requests for reviews from children, their parents and young people;

translation.cy: Adrannau 23(9) a 24(8) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Sections 23(9) and 24(8) of the Act.

translation.cy: Pan fydd copi o CDU diwygiedig neu hysbysiad nad yw’r CDU i’w adolygu yn cael ei roi’n hwyr, hynny yw, ar ôl diwedd y cyfnod adolygu y mae’n ymwneud ag ef, yna dylid anwybyddu’r ffaith fod copi o’r CDU neu’r hysbysiad wedi’i roi.
translation.en: Where a copy of a revised IDP or a notice that the IDP is not to be revised is given late, that is, after the end of the review period to which it relates, then the giving of the copy of the IDP or the notice is to be ignored.

translation.cy: 14 O dan adran 27 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: 14 Under section 27 of the Act.

translation.cy: yn achos CDU a gynhelir gan ysgol, pan fo’r Tribiwnlys yn gorchymyn i awdurdod lleol adolygu’r CDU.
translation.en: in the case of an IDP maintained by a school, where the Tribunal orders a local authority to review the IDP.

translation.cy: Os bydd y plentyn, rhiant y plentyn neu’r person ifanc yn gwneud cais i’r ysgol a gynhelir, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol sy’n cynnal y CDU adolygu CDU, rhaid iddo gynnal adolygiad oni bai ei fod o’r farn bod adolygiad yn ddiangen.
translation.en: If a request to review an IDP is made by the child, the child’s parent or young person, to the maintained school, FEI or local authority that maintains the IDP, it must conduct a review unless it considers a review to be unnecessary.

translation.cy: At ddiben paragraffau 25.22 a 25.28 y cyfnod perthnasol yw-
translation.en: For the purpose of paragraphs 25.22 and 25.28 the relevant period is-

translation.cy: i’r dyddiad y bydd yr ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol (pa un bynnag sy’n berthnasol) yn cael y cais am adolygiad.
translation.en: from the school, FEI or local authority (as the case may be) receiving the request for a review.

translation.cy: (f) 	ystyried unrhyw faterion eraill sy’n ymwneud ag addysg neu hyfforddiant y plentyn neu’r person ifanc sy’n effeithio ar y CDU (er enghraifft y cyfnod pontio sydd ar ddod, neu yn achos person ifanc nad yw mewn ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach, a oes angen cynnal y CDU i ddiwallu anghenion rhesymol y person ifanc i gael addysg neu hyfforddiant (gweler Pennod 17)).
translation.en: consider any other matters related to the child or young person’s education or training which affect the IDP (for instance a forthcoming transition, or in the case of a young person not at a maintained school or FEI, whether it is necessary to maintain the IDP to meet the young person’s reasonable needs for education or training (see Chapter 17)).

translation.cy: At hynny, pan adolygir CDU, os bydd corff y GIG yn gwneud cais i’r disgrifiad o’r DDdY y mae’n ofynnol iddo ei sicrhau gael ei dynnu oddi yno neu ei newid, rhaidi’r ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol gydymffurfio â’r cais hwnnw.
translation.en: Also, if, on review of an IDP, the NHS body requests that the description of the ALP that it is required to secure is removed or changed, the school, FEI or local authority mustcomply with that request.

translation.cy: Serch hynny, dylai’rysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol barhau i fonitro’n barhaus pa mor effeithiol yw’r CDU.
translation.en: The school, FEI or local authority shouldnevertheless continue to monitor on an on-going basis the efficacy of the IDP.

translation.cy: Mae Pennod 17 yn ymdrin â phryd y bydd angen i awdurdod lleol barhau i gynnal CDU ar gyfer person ifanc.
translation.en: Chapter 17 addresses when it will be necessary for a local authority to continue to maintain an IDP for a young person.

translation.cy: Adran 31(6)(b) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 31(6)(b) of the Act.

translation.cy: Os yw adolygiadau neu brosesau tebyg yn cael eu cynnal ar yr un pryd, rhaid iddynt ddilyn gofynion y ddeddfwriaeth berthnasol.
translation.en: Where reviews or similar actions are conducted at the same time, they must follow the requirements of the relevant legislation.

translation.cy: Os cynhelir adolygiadau ar wahân, mae’n bosibl y bydd canlyniad adolygiad o dan un Ddeddf yn arwain at oblygiadau i ddyletswyddau awdurdod lleol (neu berson arall) o dan y Ddeddf arall.
translation.en: Where reviews are conducted separately, the outcome of a review under one Act may have consequences for a local authority’s (or another person’s) obligations under the other Act.

translation.cy: Os daw’r adolygiad i’r casgliad nad oes gan blentyn neu berson ifanc ADY bellach neu nad oes angen cynnal CDU ar gyfer person ifanc bellach, bydd y darpariaethau penodol ar beidio â chynnal CDU yn berthnasol.
translation.en: If the conclusion of the review is that a child or young person no longer has ALN or that it is no longer necessary to maintain an IDP for a young person, the specific provisions on ceasing to maintain an IDP will apply.

translation.cy: Yn dilyn adolygiad, pan fydd ysgol a gynhelir, sefydliad addysg bellach neu awdurdod lleol yn hysbysu plentyn, rhiant y plentyn neu berson ifanc ynghylch ei benderfyniad i beidio â diwygio CDU neu’n rhoi copi o CDU diwygiedig i blentyn, rhiant y plentyn neu berson ifanc, rhaid i’r ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol roi’r canlynol hefyd:
translation.en: Following a review, when a maintained school, FEI or local authority notifies a child, the child’s parent or a young person of its decision not to revise an IDP or gives a copy of a revised IDP to a child, the child’s parent or a young person, the school, FEI or local authority must also give:

translation.cy: Gofyniad a osodir gan y Cod.
translation.en: Requirement imposed by the Code.

translation.cy: Ceir cyflwyno apêl i’r Tribiwnlys ynghylch y penderfyniad – gweler Pennod 33.
translation.en: The decision is appealable to the Tribunal - see Chapter 33.

translation.cy: Pennod 26:
translation.en: Chapter 26:

translation.cy: Ailystyriaeth gan awdurdodau lleol a chymryd drosodd y cyfrifoldeb am CDUau
translation.en: Local authority reconsiderations and taking over responsibility for IDPs

translation.cy: Ailystyriaeth gan yr awdurdod lleol o benderfyniad ysgol a gynhelir am ADY
translation.en: A local authority’s reconsideration of a maintained school’s decision about ALN

translation.cy: Os yw ysgol a gynhelir yng Nghymru wedi gwneud penderfyniad ynghylch a oes gan un o’i ddisgyblion cofrestredig ADY, neu os yw wedi gwrthod gwneud penderfyniad o’r fath, caiff y disgybl (plentyn neu berson ifanc) neu, yn achos plentyn, rhiant y plentyn, wneud cais i’r awdurdod lleol sy’n gyfrifol am y plentyn neu’r person ifanc ailystyried y mater.  Yn achos plentyn neu berson ifanc sydd o fewn ardal awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr, gellir gwneud cais i’r awdurdod lleol sy’n cynnal yr ysgol ailystyried y mater.
translation.en: Where a maintained school in Wales has made a decision about whether one of its registered pupils has ALN, or has refused to make such a decision, the pupil (a child or young person) or, in the case of a child, the child’s parent, may3 request that the local authority responsible for the child or young person, or in the case of a child or young person who is in the area of a local authority in England, the local authority that maintains the school, reconsiders the matter.

translation.cy: Gweler Pennod 1 am fwy o wybodaeth am sut y dylid dehongli gofynion amserlen.
translation.en: See Chapter 1 for more information on how timescale requirements are to be interpreted.

translation.cy: Os yw ysgol yn cynnal CDU ar gyfer disgybl, caiff y disgybl (plentyn neu berson ifanc) neu, yn achos plentyn, rhiant y plentyn wneud cais i’r awdurdod lleol cyfrifol, neu’r awdurdod lleol sy’n cynnal yr ysgol yn achos disgybl sydd mewn ardal awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr, ailystyried y CDU gyda golwg ar ei ddiwygio.
translation.en: Where a school maintains an IDP for a pupil, the pupil (a child or young person) or, in the case of a child, the child’s parent may request that the responsible local authority, or in the case of a pupil who is in the area of a local authority in England, the local authority that maintains the school, reconsiders the IDP with a view to it being revised.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol fynd ati wedyn i ailystyried y CDU a phenderfynu p’un a ddylid ei ddiwygio ai peidio, oni bai bod unrhyw un o’r amgylchiadau canlynol yn berthnasol:
translation.en: The local authority must then reconsider the IDP and decide whether or not to revise it, unless any of the following circumstances apply:

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol ystyried a ddylai’r DDdY gael ei darparu i’r disgybl yn Gymraeg ac os yw’n penderfynu y dylid darparu math benodol o DDdY yn Gymraeg, rhaidi’r corff nodi yn y cynllun y dylai gael ei darparu yn Gymraeg (oni bai bod y cynllun yn darparu ar gyfer hyn eisoes).
translation.en: The local authority must consider whether ALP should be provided to the pupil in Welsh and if it decides that a particular kind of ALP should be provided in Welsh, the body must specify in the plan that it should be provided in Welsh (unless this is already provided for in the plan).

translation.cy: Fel y disgrifiwyd ym Mhennod 4, mae dyletswydd gyffredinol i gynnwys plant, eu rhieni a phobl ifanc mewn penderfyniadau sy’n ymwneud â CDU.
translation.en: As described in Chapter 4, there is a general duty to involve children, their parents and young people in decisions that relate to an IDP.

translation.cy: 28 Adran 28(1) o’r Ddeddf 29 O dan adran 28(1) o’r Ddeddf, dim ond i’r awdurdod lleol cyfrifol y gellir gwneud cais ac ni chaiff hyn ei addasu gan adran 87.
translation.en: Section 28(1) of the Act.  Section 28(1) of the Act: requests may only be made to the responsible local authority and this is not modified by section 87.

translation.cy: Gallai plentyn, rhiant plentyn, neu berson ifanc wneud cais i’r awdurdod lleol gymryd drosodd y cyfrifoldeb am CDU os nad ydynt yn credu bod yr ysgol neu’r sefydliad addysg bellach yn gallu diwallu eu hanghenion yn llawn, neu os ydynt yn credu bod angen rhagor o DDdY arnynt, neu ddarpariaeth amgen, na all yr ysgol neu’r sefydliad addysg bellach ei darparu (ac felly mae’r cais yn debygol o gynnwys cais i’r awdurdod lleol ailystyried y CDU).
translation.en: A child, child’s parent or young person might request the local authority to take over responsibility for an IDP where they do not believe the school or FEI is capable of fully meeting their needs, or they believe they require further or alternative ALP which the school or FEI cannot provide (in which case the request is likely to be accompanied by a request for the local authority to reconsider the IDP).

translation.cy: Adran 28(6) o’r Ddeddf 36 Adran 28(7) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 28(6) of the Act. 36 Section 28(7) of the Act.

translation.cy: Pan fo awdurdod lleol yn penderfynu ar y mater yn dilyn cais, neu’n penderfynu cymryd drosodd y cyfrifoldeb wrth ailystyried a diwygio cynllun a gynhelir gan ysgol, rhaid36i’r awdurdod hysbysu’r plentyn neu’r person ifanc, neu yn achos plentyn, rhiant y plentyn ac (yn unol â’r achos) yr ysgol neu’r sefydliad addysg bellach am y penderfyniad a’r rhesymau drosto.
translation.en: Where the local authority decides the matter following a request, or decides to take over responsibility when reconsidering and revising a plan maintained by a school, the authority must36notify the child or young person, in the case of a child, the child’s parent and (as the case may be) the school or FEI of the decision and the reasons for it.

translation.cy: O dan adran 69 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 69 of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae’r canllawiau am ofynion amserlen a osodir gan y Cod ym Mhennod 1 yn berthnasol i’r canllawiau statudol hyn hefyd.
translation.en: The guidance about timescale requirements imposed by the Code in Chapter 1 is also relevant to this statutory guidance.

translation.cy: Mae cynlluniau pontio fel arfer yn fwyaf effeithiol pan fabwysiedir dull sy'n canolbwyntio ar yr unigolyn, gan ganiatáu i'r plentyn, rhiant y plentyn, neu'r person ifanc leisio unrhyw bryderon sy'n ymwneud â'i broses bontio nesaf.
translation.en: Transition planning is usually most effective when a person centred practice approach is adopted, allowing the child, the child’s parent, or young person to voice any concerns relating to their next transition.

translation.cy: Felly, gall cyfuno cynlluniau pontio gydag adolygiadau CDU fod yn ffordd effeithlon ac effeithiol o ddefnyddio adnoddau i gefnogi'r plentyn neu'r person ifanc wrth iddo nesáu at gyfnod pontio.
translation.en: Combining transition planning with IDP reviews can therefore be an efficient and effective way of using resources to support the child or young person as they approach a period of transition.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gallai dysgwr bontio o ysgol a gynhelir i sefydliad addysg bellach, neu symud o ardal un awdurdod lleol i un arall.
translation.en: For example, a learner could transition from a maintained school to an FEI, or move from one local authority’s area to another.

translation.cy: Mewn achosion o'r fath, gall y cyfrifoldeb dros gynnal ei CDU drosglwyddo ar yr un pryd ag y mae'r plentyn neu'r person ifanc yn symud.
translation.en: In such cases, responsibility for maintaining their IDP may transfer at the same time as the child or young person transitions.

translation.cy: (Gweler Pennod 28 i gael gwybod rhagor am drosglwyddo cyfrifoldeb am CDU).
translation.en: (See Chapter 28 for more information on transfer of responsibility for an IDP).

translation.cy: Er y gall trafodaethau ar brosesau pontio hysbys fel rhan o adolygiad o CDU arwain at ddiwygio'r DDdY a bennir yn y CDU neu at ddisgrifio lle mewn ysgol benodol neu sefydliad arall, dylai cymorth ychwanegol (nad yw'n DDdY) i helpu proses bontio esmwyth gael ei gofnodi ar wahân yn adran 3C o’r CDU (gweler Pennod 23 am gynnwys CDU a Phennod 24 am gynnwys CDU ar gyfer plentyn sy'n derbyn gofal).
translation.en: Whilst discussions on known transitions as part of an IDP review may lead to revising the ALP specified in the IDP or describing a place at a particular school or other institution, additional support (which is not ALP) to help a smooth transition should be recorded separately in section 3C of the IDP (see Chapter 23 for the content of an IDP and Chapter 24 for the content of an IDP for a LAC).

translation.cy: Cynllunio ar gyfer pontio
translation.en: Planning for transition

translation.cy: Mewn rhai achosion, gallai'r adolygiad terfynol o'r CDU cyn proses bontio ddisgwyliedig fod yn ddigon i roi rhai trefniadau cefnogi ychwanegol ar waith ar gyfer y plentyn neu'r person ifanc.
translation.en: In some cases, the final IDP review before an expected transition may be sufficient to put in place some additional supporting arrangements for the child or young person.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mewn achosion eraill, mae adolygiad CDU sy'n digwydd yn fuan ar ôl pontio i leoliad newydd yn rhoi cyfle i'r plentyn, rhiant y plentyn, neu'r person ifanc drafod ei brofiad a thrafod a oes angen gwneud unrhyw ddiwygiadau i'w CDU yn sgil hynny.
translation.en: However, in other cases, an IDP review which takes place shortly after a transition to a new setting gives the opportunity for the child, a child’s parent, or the young person to discuss their experience and whether any revisions need to be made to their IDP in light of it.

translation.cy: Gall hyn fod yn arbennig o ddefnyddiol pan fydd person ifanc ag ADY wedi dechrau mewn sefydliad addysg bellach yn ddiweddar.
translation.en: This may be particularly useful when a young person with ALN has recently started at an FEI.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r gwaith o gynllunio proses bontio wedi'i gyfyngu i adolygiadau CDU, a gall cynllunio ehangach ddigwydd y tu allan i adolygiad ffurfiol.
translation.en: Transition planning is not confined to IDP reviews and broader transition planning can take place outside a formal review.

translation.cy: Oherwydd hynny, ni fydd modd cynllunio ar gyfer proses bontio benodol ym mhob achos.
translation.en: As such, planning for a specific transition may not always be possible.

translation.cy: Mae cynllunio ar gyfer pontio yn rhoi cyfle i blant a phobl ifanc godi unrhyw bryderon sydd ganddynt am y lleoliad newydd.
translation.en: Planning for transition provides an opportunity for children and young people to raise any concerns they may have about the new setting.

translation.cy: cario cyfarpar o gwmpas drwy'r dydd a pheidio â'i golli;
translation.en: carrying equipment around all day and not losing it;

translation.cy: dysgu enwau athrawon a deall eu disgwyliadau a'u harddulliau addysgu;
translation.en: learning teachers’ names and understanding their expectations and styles of teaching;

translation.cy: cyfleoedd i'r plentyn a'i riant ymweld â'r ysgol sawl gwaith cyn i'r plentyn ddechrau yn yr ysgol - i gwrdd â'r staff ac ymgyfarwyddo â chynllun yr ysgol;
translation.en: opportunities for the child and their parent to make several visits to the school prior to the child starting school – to meet staff and to become familiar with the layout of the school;

translation.cy: amseroedd egwyl;
translation.en: break times;

translation.cy: Ar gyfer dysgwyr ym mlwyddyn 9, 10 neu 11, efallai y bydd yr ysgol neu'r awdurdod lleol sy'n cynnal adolygiad o'u CDU sydd i ystyried pontio o addysg orfodol yn dymuno cynnwys cynghorydd gyrfaoedd yn yr adolygiad, er mwyn trafod opsiynau gyrfa.
translation.en: For learners in year 9, 10 or 11, the school or local authority undertaking a review of their IDP which is to consider transition from compulsory education may wish to involve a careers adviser in the review to discuss career options.

translation.cy: Dylai sefydliad addysg bellach roi cyfle i bobl ifanc sôn, pan fyddant yn cofrestru yn y sefydliad addysg bellach, am unrhyw ADY sydd ganddynt a dweud a oes ganddynt CDU neu a ydynt wedi bod ag CDU.
translation.en: An FEI should provide young people at the time they are enrolling as students at the FEI, with an opportunity to raise any ALN they may have and state whether they have or have had an IDP.

translation.en: It requires individuals to scrutinise the stereotypes they and others hold, and to understand how their actions may impact on people of different races and ethnicities.

translation.en: In the summer of 2020, Jane Hutt MS, the Deputy Minister responsible for Equalities, asked officials to develop an “ambitious and radical” Race Equality Action Plan (the Plan).

translation.en: The goal should be to “create equitable outcomes”, which “celebrate differences and similarities among ethnic minority communities” where we are “united not divided by our differences”.

translation.cy: Ystyriwyd mai diben y gwaith hwn oedd creu “ymdeimlad o fyrder a newid diwylliannol sy’n golygu bod gwasanaethau cyhoeddus yn atebol i’r cyhoedd” ac “sy’n rhoi’r camau gweithredu a addawyd ar waith” er mwyn lleihau anghydraddoldebau mewn amrywiol feysydd o fewn ein dyletswyddau a’n pwerau.
translation.en: The purpose of this work was thought was to be to create “urgency and culture change that make public services publicly accountable” and “delivers on promised, actions” to reduce inequalities in various areas of our duties and powers.

translation.en: It is the responsibility of those in power to “serve justice”, “enforce” and hold “to account” those responsible for services and decision making.

translation.cy: Ni ddylai “grwpiau poblogaidd” a “grwpiau amhoblogaidd” fodoli. Yn lle hynny, dylai Cymru fod yn lle sy’n gwerthfawrogi pobl am eu talentau a’u profiadau bywyd unigryw sydd, er eu bod yn wahanol, yn gyfwerth â’i gilydd.
translation.en: There should be no “in groups” and no “out groups”, but instead a Wales where people are valued for their unique talents and lived experiences which, while different, are of equal worth.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu bod yn rhaid iddyn nhw weithio i wella lles economaidd, cymdeithasol, amgylcheddol a diwylliannol Cymru.
translation.en: This means that they must work to improve the economic, social, environmental and cultural well-being of Wales.

translation.cy: Mae ein dull o ddiwygio'r cwricwlwm yn cyfrannu at gyflawni'r amcan hwnnw a, thrwy hynny, wneud y mwyaf o'n cyfraniad i'r nodau lles.
translation.en: Our approach to curriculum reform contributes to achieving that objective and, through that, maximising our contribution to the well-being goals.

translation.cy: Anogwn ysgolion, lleoliadau meithrin a ariennir nas cynhelir, unedau cyfeirio disgybliona darparwyr EOTASi ystyried sut y gallan nhw sefydlu'r ffyrdd o weithio a chyfrannu tuag at y nodau lles yn y ffordd y maen nhw’n mynd ati i gynllunio, mabwysiadu a gweithredu eu cwricwlwm a chynnwys dysgwyr, rhieni/gofalwyr, eu cymunedau ehangach, busnesau a phartneriaid, yn y broses honno.
translation.en: We encourage schools, funded non-maintained nursery settings, PRUs and providers of EOTAS to consider how they can embed the ways of working and contribute towards the well-being goals in the way they go about designing, adopting and implementing their curriculum and engaging learners, parents/carers and their wider communities, businesses and partners in that process.

translation.cy: Mae'r Ddeddf Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol a’r Tribiwnlys Addysg (Cymru) 2018 yn creu fframwaith deddfwriaethol i wella'r broses o gynllunio a chyflawni darpariaeth ddysgu ychwanegol, drwy ddull sy'n canolbwyntio ar yr unigolyn i ganfod anghenion yn gynnar, rhoi cymorth a monitro effeithiol ar waith, ac addasu ymyriadau i sicrhau eu bod yn cyflawni'r deilliannau a ddymunir.
translation.en: The Additional Learning Needs and Education Tribunal (Wales) Act 2018 creates a legislative framework to improve the planning and delivery of additional learning provision, through a person-centred approach to identifying needs early, putting in place effective support and monitoring, and adapting interventions to ensure they deliver desired outcomes.

translation.cy: Wrth ei wraidd y mae ein dyhead ar gyfer pob plentyn a pherson ifanc yng Nghymru, fel y'i diffinnir gan bedwar dibeny cwricwlwm.
translation.en: At its heart is our aspiration for every child and young person in Wales, as defined by the four purposesof curriculum.

translation.cy: galluogi eich dysgwyr i gyflawni'r pedwar diben ac yn eu paratoi ar gyfer dysgu parhaus, gwaith a bywyd?

translation.en: Like the rest of this guidance, it is primarily for schools but will also be of use to other educational settings.

translation.en: Learners will have a range of needs and backgrounds, thus the Framework offers schools and practitioners the agency to choose the specific experiences, knowledge and skills,as well as the specific topics, activities and contexts that will best support learning within the Framework.

translation.en: Their vision – and the four purposes more broadly – should then guide the process of curriculum and assessment design.

translation.en: The four purposesare also underpinned by integral skills which should be developed within a wide range of learning and teaching.

translation.en: Opportunities to use Welsh within and beyond the classroom (including on digital platforms) support learners to use Welsh confidently and appreciate its usefulness to communication in a bilingual Wales.

translation.en: Assessment should focus on identifying each individual learner’s strengths, achievements, areas for improvement and, if relevant, any barriers to learning.

translation.en: It can also be used as a basis for communicating and engaging with parents/carers.

translation.en: This should help learners to apply the descriptions of learning in increasingly challenging contexts and allow for diversion, reinforcement and reflection as their understanding and application of the key learning develops and becomes more sophisticated over time, provoking deep thinking, discussion and inquiry.
