translation.en: As learners progress, they should have greater opportunity to specialise and the disciplinary contexts for descriptions of learning should become increasingly apparent in curriculum design.

translation.cy: Wrth ystyried disgrifiadau dysgu neu gyd-destun, testun neu brofiad penodol, mae'r egwyddorion cynnydd yn helpu ymarferwyr i ddeall sut y dylai dysgwyr wneud cynnydd mewn modd mwy soffistigedig neu ddwfn.
translation.en: When considering descriptions of learning or a specific context, topic or experience, the principles of progression help practitioners to understand how learners should progress with greater sophistication or depth.

translation.en: Learning and experience in this Area encourages the development of knowledge, skills and values that can help learners grasp the opportunities and meet the challenges that arise in their lives.

translation.en: As learning progresses, learners become increasingly aware of the expressive arts’ disciplines and their key features, including (though not necessarily limited to) art, dance, drama, film and digital media, and music.

translation.en: Learners gain knowledge and understanding through exploring and communicating how identities, views and rights are portrayed.

translation.cy: Gyda’i gilydd, maen nhw’n cyfrannu at wireddu pedwar diben y cwricwlwm.
translation.en: Together they contribute to realising the four purposes of the curriculum.

translation.cy: Wrth ddysgu sut i fynegi eu teimladau, bydd dysgwyr mewn sefyllfa well i greu diwylliant lle mae siarad am iechyd meddwl a lles emosiynol yn weithred arferol.
translation.en: By learning how to communicate their feelings, learners will be better placed to create a culture where talking about mental health and emotional well-being is normalised.

translation.cy: Gall y Maes hwn helpu dysgwyr i ddeall sut mae penderfyniadau a gweithredoedd yn cael effaith ar y dysgwyr eu hunain, ar eraill, ac ar y gymdeithas ehangach, a hynny yn y presennol a’r dyfodol.
translation.en: This Area can help learners to understand how decisions and actions impact on themselves, on others and on wider society, both now and in the future.

translation.cy: Gall dysgu a phrofiad yn y Maes hwn alluogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu’r sgiliau meddwl beirniadol angenrheidiol er mwyn gallu pwyso a mesur goblygiadau posibl eu penderfyniadau, gan gynnwys y risg, iddyn nhw ac i eraill.
translation.en: Learning and experience in this Area can enable learners to develop the critical-thinking skills necessary to consider their decision-making in terms of possible implications, including risks, for themselves and others.

translation.cy: Mae’r ffordd rydym yn ymwneud â dylanwadau cymdeithasol yn siapio pwy ydyn ni, ac yn effeithio ar ein hiechyd a’n lles.
translation.en: How we engage with social influences shapes who we are and affects our health and well-being.

translation.cy: Maen nhw’n effeithio ar ein hunaniaeth, ein gwerthoedd, ein hymddygiad ac ar ein hiechyd a lles, yn aml heb i ni sylweddoli hynny.
translation.en: They affect our identity, values, behaviours and health and well-being, and often do so without our being aware of it.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn cael eu hannog i ddeall y byddan nhw’n cael profiad o amrywiaeth o gydberthnasau drwy gydol eu bywydau.
translation.en: Learners will be encouraged to understand that, throughout their lives, they will experience a range of relationships.

translation.cy: Byddan nhw hefyd yn cael eu hannog i ddatblygu eu gallu i ffurfio, meithrin a chynnal cydberthnasau.
translation.en: They will also be encouraged to develop their abilities to form, nurture and maintain relationships.

translation.cy: Dyfnhau’r ddealltwriaeth o’r syniadau a’r disgyblaethau yn y Meysydd
translation.en: Deepening understanding of the ideas and disciplines within Areas

translation.cy: Caiff cynnydd ei ddangos mewn rhai agweddau ar y Maes fel taith o feithrin sgil neu gysyniad gyda chymorth gan eraill (cyfoedion neu oedolion) i ddod yn fwy cymwys ac annibynnol yn raddol, gan gynnwys ehangu’r gallu i adnabod a cheisio help a chymorth yn ôl yr angen.
translation.en: Progression is exemplified within some aspects of the Area as a journey from developing a skill or a concept with support from others (peers or adults) to gradually becoming more competent and independent, including an increasingly capacity to identify and seek help and support when needed.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Mae’n gen i’r hyder a’r ysgogiad i symud mewn gwahanol ffyrdd, ac rwy’n dechrau datblygu rheolaeth ar symudiadau echddygol brasac echddygol manwl mewn gwahanol sefyllfaoedd, gan symud yn ddiogel mewn ymateb i gyfarwyddiadau.
translation.en: I have the confidence and motivation to move in different ways and I am beginning to develop control of gross motorandfine motormovements in different environments, moving safely in response to instructions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dadansoddi’r cysylltiad rhwng newidiadau corfforol ac emosiynol.
translation.en: I can analyse the connection between physical and emotional changes.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod rhai mathau o ymddygiad, cyflyrau a sefyllfaoedd sy’n effeithio ar fy iechyd a lles corfforol, ac rwy’n gwybod sut i ymateb a chael cymorth mewn ffordd ddiogel.
translation.en: I can recognise some of the behaviours, conditions and situations that affect my physical health and well-being, and I know how to respond and get help in a safe way.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymyrryd yn ddiogel, gan ddefnyddio technegau wedi’u dysgu, pan mae iechyd corfforol eraill mewn perygl.
translation.en: I can safely intervene, using learnt techniques, when others’ physical health is at risk.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall sut a pham mae fy meddyliau, fy nheimladau a’m gweithredoedd yn newid mewn ymateb i wahanol broﬁadau.
translation.en: I can understand how and why my thoughts, feelings and actions change in response to different experiences.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cyfrannu tuag at ddiwylliant lle mae siarad am iechyd meddwl a lles emosiynol yn weithred arferol sy’n cael ei hannog.
translation.en: I can contribute towards a culture where talking about mental health and emotional well-being is encouraged and normalised.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu rhagweld sut y gallai digwyddiadau’r dyfodol wneud i mi ac i eraill deimlo.
translation.en: I can anticipate how future events may make me and others feel.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymateb i broﬁadau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol, myfyrio arnyn nhw a dysgu ganddyn nhw, a hyn er mwyn rhagweld a pharatoi fy hun ac eraill ar gyfer proﬁadau yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: I can respond to current experiences, as well as reflect, and learn from the past, in order to anticipate and prepare myself and others for future experiences.

translation.cy: Mae gen i ymwybyddiaeth o deimladau pobl eraill.
translation.en: I have an awareness of the feelings of others.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu rhoi sylw i deimladau pobl eraill ac rwy’n dysgu meddwl am y rhesymau pam eu bod o bosibl yn teimlo felly.
translation.en: I can pay attention to the feelings of others and I am learning to think about why they may feel that way.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dangos empathi tuag at eraill a deall gwerth dangos hyn trwy weithredoedd tosturiol a charedig.
translation.en: I can empathise with others and understand the value of demonstrating this through actions which are compassionate and kind.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 1
translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwneud penderfyniadau ystyriol yn seiliedig ar yr wybodaeth sydd ar gael, gan gynnwys profiadau’r gorffennol.
translation.en: I can make considered decisions, taking into account available information, including past experiences.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu rhagweld, asesu a rheoli risg.
translation.en: I can anticipate, assess and manage risks.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod a dilyn rheolau a normau yn y grwpiau a’r sefyllfaoedd rwy’n cymryd rhan ynddyn nhw.
translation.en: I can recognise and follow rules and norms in the groups and situations in which I take part.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dangos ymwybyddiaeth gynyddol o natur gymhleth cydberthnasau.
translation.en: I can show a developing awareness of the complex nature of relationships.

translation.cy: Mae gen i’r gallu i wneud ffrindiau a cheisio datrys anghytundeb, gan ofyn am gymorth pan fydd angen.
translation.en: I can make friends and try to resolve disagreements, seeking support when needed.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu parchu safbwyntiau pobl eraill a defnyddio hyn er mwyn helpu i ddatrys achosion o wrthdaro.
translation.en: I can respect other people’s points of view and use this to help resolve conflict.

translation.cy: Mae gan ddysgu am lenyddiaeth a dysgu trwy lenyddiaeth botensial sylweddol i gynnig y modd i ddysgwyr gyfathrebu eu teimladau, datblygu cydberthnasau a chwilio am gymorth a chefnogaeth.
translation.en: Learning about and through literature has significant potential to provide learners with the means to communicate their feelings, develop relationships with others, and seek help and support.

translation.cy: Mae rhifedd hefyd yn chwarae rôl wrth brynu a pharatoi bwyd i gefnogi maeth.
translation.en: Numeracy also plays a role in purchasing and preparing food to support nutrition.

translation.cy: Trwy’r rhain gellir archwilio gwahanol bynciau a materion gan roi hyblygrwydd i athrawon nodi’r rhai sy’n berthnasol i anghenion eu dysgwyr, eu lleoliad neu eu hysgol a’u cymuned.
translation.en: They are meant to act as lenses through which different topics and issues can be explored giving professionals the flexibility to identify those which are relevant to the needs of their learners, their setting or school and their community.

translation.cy: Bydd gan bob lleoliad ac ysgol ystod o wybodaeth ar gael i fod o gymorth iddyn nhw gynnal dadansoddiad o’r hyn sydd ei angen.
translation.en: Every setting and school will have a range of information available to help them carry out an analysis of need.

translation.cy: Bydd anghenion a blaenoriaethau yn newid, a bydd angen i ddysgu ac addysgu yn y Maes ymateb i’r newidiadau hyn.
translation.en: Needs and priorities will change and learning and teaching in the Area should respond to these changes.

translation.cy: Efallai y byddai’n fanteisiol defnyddio cyrff allanol i gynnig cefnogaeth wrth gynllunio a gweithredu rhai pynciau a materion.
translation.en: It may be felt that there are times when it would be beneficial to use external organisations to provide support in planning and delivery on certain topics and issues.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal ag ystyried iechyd a lles dysgwyr, gallai’r broses hyn ystyried y canlynol.
translation.en: As well as considering learners’ health and well-being, this process could consider the following.

translation.cy: Pa bynciau, themâu a gweithgareddau sydd o gymorth i ymateb i anghenion dysgwyr?
translation.en: What topics, themes and activities will help respond to learners’ needs?

translation.cy: Gellir ymateb i anghenion dysgwyr gydag ystod eang o ddysgu ac addysgu.
translation.en: Learners’ needs can be addressed by a wide range of learning and teaching.

translation.cy: Gallai hyn gynnwys sgiliau achub bywyd a chymorth cyntaf.
translation.en: This may include lifesaving skills and first aid.

translation.cy: Sut y gall lleoliadau/ysgolion greu a hybu diwylliant lle mae siarad am iechyd meddwl a lles emosiynol yn cael ei annog?
translation.en: How can settings and schools create and promote a culture where talking about mental health and emotional well-being is encouraged?

translation.cy: Pa brofiadau, gwybodaeth a sgiliau fydd yn cefnogi dysgwyr i ymateb i’w profiadau?
translation.en: What experiences, knowledge and skills will support learners to respond to their experiences?

translation.cy: Dylai lleoliadau ac ysgolion sicrhau bod gan ddysgwyr werthfawrogiad dwfn o bwysigrwydd cydberthnasau cadarnhaol a manteision gofyn am gymorth.
translation.en: Settings and schools should ensure that learners have a deep appreciation of the importance of positive relationships and the benefits of seeking help.

translation.cy: Gall y rhain fod yn ddylanwadau byd-eang sy’n effeithio ar nifer mawr o ddysgwyr, ond gall hefyd gynnwys elfennau sy’n effeithio ar grwpiau llai o ddysgwyr.
translation.en: These may be more global influences that affect large numbers of learners, but could also include things that affect smaller groups of learners.

translation.cy: Er mwyn ffurfio, cynnal a datblygu cydberthnasau iach gydol oes, bydd angen i ddysgwyr roi amser i’r cydberthynasau a chaffael ystod o sgiliau a rhinweddau.
translation.en: In order to form, maintain and develop healthy relationships for life, learners will need to invest time in those relationships and acquire an array of skills and dispositions.

translation.cy: Dylai’r rhain gynnwys, ond heb fod yn gyfyngedig i, cyfathrebiad a trafodaeth agored, derbyniad, dathliad, empathi, ymddiriedaeth, rheoli technoleg symudol, rhoi a derbyn adborth, tosturi, datrys problemau, negyddu, parchu safbwyntiau pobl eraill, gwerthoedd a hawliau, myfyrio, ymateb yn adeiladol a phriodol i wrthdaro, dealltwriaeth y gall cydberthynas newid a datblygu dros gyfnod o amser.
translation.en: These should include, but may not be limited to, open communication and discussion, acceptance, celebration, empathy, trust, managing mobile technology, give and take feedback, compassion, problem-solving, cooperation, negotiation, respecting others’ views, values and rights, mediation, responding constructively and appropriately to conflict, understanding that relationships change and develop over time.

translation.cy: Mae’n bwysig fod dysgwyr yn deall beth yw ystyr cydberthynas nad yw’n iach neu gydberthynas dreisiol.
translation.en: It is important that learners understand what may constitute an unhealthy or abusive relationship.

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr wybod bod ganddyn nhw hawliau, gan gynnwys hawliau dynol a’r hawliau yng Nghonfensiwn y Cenhedloedd Unedig ar Hawliau’r Plentyn (CCUHP), a bod yr hawliau hyn yn gallu eu diogelu rhag niwed.
translation.en: Learners need to know that they have rights, including human rights and those in the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC), and that these should protect them from harm.

translation.cy: Gall yr ystyriaethau dechreuol nodi’r cysylltiadau canlynol i’r datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig:
translation.en: Initial thinking may identify the following links to the statements of what matters:

translation.cy: defnyddio gweithgaredd corfforol fel cyfrwng i adeiladu cydweithredu, archwilio manteision cefnogi pobl eraill mewn perthynas ag iechyd meddwl a lles emosiynol, gwneud penderfyniadau ar y cyd a dysgu oddi wrth gamgymeriadau, archwilio sut y gall gwahanol grwpiau cymdeithasol o fewn lleoliad neu ysgol nodi elfennau sy’n debyg, rhannu targedau a chydweithredu i adeiladu gwahanol fathau o berthnasau gyda’r gymuned ehangach.
translation.en: using physical activity as a vehicle for building collaboration, exploring the benefits of supporting one another on mental health and emotional well-being, making collective decisions and learning from mistakes, exploring how different social groups within a setting or school can identify commonalities, share goals and collaborate to build relationships with the wider community.

translation.cy: Dylai lleoliadau ac ysgolion ystyried natur y profiadau dysgu a’r addysgeg gefnogol er mwyn sicrhau bod themâu a phynciau yn cyfrannu at gynnydd dysgwyr.
translation.en: Settings and schools should consider the nature of the learning experiences and the supporting pedagogy to ensure that themes and topics contribute to learners’ progression.

translation.cy: Gall ymddygiadau a chydberthnasau fod ag agweddau iach yn ogystal â niweidiol.
translation.en: Behaviours and relationships can have both healthy and harmful aspects.

translation.cy: Enghreifftio ehangder
translation.en: Illustrating breadth

translation.cy: Gall cyfranogiad yn y celfyddydau mynegiannol alluogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu ymdeimlad o’r hunan, adeiladu hyder, ac archwilio gwahanol ffurfiau o gyfathrebu a chydberthnasau a all gefnogi iechyd meddwl a lles emosiynol
translation.en: Involvement in the expressive arts can enable learners to develop a sense of self, build confidence, and explore different forms of communication and relationships, which can support mental health and emotional well-being.

translation.cy: Mae’r ddau Faes yma yn cysylltu i ddyfnhau gwybodaeth a dealltwriaeth dysgwyr o hunaniaeth, cymunedau, cymdeithasau, normau a gwerthoedd cymdeithasol, a dylanwadau cymdeithasol.
translation.en: These two Areas link together to deepen learners’ knowledge and understanding of identity, communities, societies, social norms and values, and social influences.

translation.cy: Bydd datblygiad corfforol a gwybyddol yn effeithio ar gaffael lleferydd ac iaith a datblygu symudiadau echddygol manwl fel llawysgrifen.
translation.en: Physical and cognitive development will impact on the acquisition of speech and language and the development of fine motor movements, such as handwriting.

translation.cy: Mathemateg a Rhifedd
translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy

translation.cy: Gan dynnu ar ddysgu yn y Maes hwn, dylid annog dysgwyr i ddatblygu gwybodaeth, dealltwriaeth a sgiliau i addasu ymddygiadau yn ôl gwahanol sefyllfaoedd a chyd-destunau.
translation.en: Drawing on learning in this Area, learners should be encouraged to develop knowledge, understanding and skills to adapt behaviours according to different situations and contexts.

translation.cy: Addysg hawliau dynol ac amrywiaeth yn y Maes hwn
translation.en: Human rights education and diversity in this Area

translation.cy: Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad Y Dyniaethau
translation.en: Humanities Area of Learning and Experience

translation.cy: Cyflwyniad
translation.en: Introduction

translation.cy: Mae’r hyn sy’n bwysig yn y Maes hwn wedi’i fynegi mewn pum datganiad sy’n cefnogi a chadarnhau ei gilydd, ac ni ddylid eu hystyried fel datganiadau ar wahân.
translation.en: What matters in this Area has been expressed in five statements which support and complement one another, and should not be viewed in isolation.

translation.cy: Gyda’i gilydd, bydd y profiadau hyn o gymorth i ddysgwyr werthfawrogi cymaint rhan ydyn nhw o gymuned ryngwladol ehangach, gan feithrin ymdeimlad o berthyn a allai eu hysgogi i gyfrannu’n gadarnhaol at eu cymunedau.
translation.en: Taken together, these experiences will help learners appreciate the extent to which they are part of a wider international community, fostering a sense of belonging that can encourage them to contribute positively to their communities.

translation.cy: Mae’r agwedd hon o’r Maes hwn yn ysgogi archwilio cysyniadau, gan gynnwys archwilio ystyr, dod i farn, cwestiynau athronyddol a phwysig bywyd, ffyrdd o gyfleu, safbwyntiau, dehongliadau, arwyddocâd a dilysrwydd.
translation.en: This aspect of the Area will encourage the exploration of concepts, including seeking meaning, making judgements, ultimateand philosophical questions, representations, perspectives, interpretations, significance and validity.

translation.cy: Mae’r agwedd hon o’r Maes hwn yn annog dysgwyr i archwilio cysyniadau gan gynnwys cronoleg, newid a pharhad, amrywiaeth, achos ac effaith, cydgysylltiad, cymuned, hunaniaeth a pherthyn, awdurdod a llywodraethiant.
translation.en: This aspect of the Area encourages learners to explore concepts, including chronology, change and continuity, diversity, cause and effect, interconnectedness, community, identity and belonging, authority and governance.

translation.cy: Mae’r agwedd hon o’r Maes hwn yn annog dysgwyr i archwilio cysyniadau gan gynnwys dinasyddiaeth, awdurdod a llywodraethiant, rhyng-gysylltu, cyfiawnder a chydraddoldeb, menter, hawliau, a gweithredu a chyfrifoldeb cymdeithasol.
translation.en: This aspect of the Area encourages learners to explore concepts, including citizenship, authority and governance, interconnectedness, justice and equality, enterprise, rights, and social actionand responsibility.

translation.cy: Caiff cynnydd yn y Maes hwn ei nodweddu hefyd gan ddefnydd mwy soffistigedig o’r sgiliau perthnasol a’r gallu cynyddol i drosglwyddo sgiliau a gwybodaeth bresennol i gyd-destunau cynyddol anghyfarwydd.
translation.en: Progression in this Area is also characterised through more sophisticated use of relevant skills and the growing ability to transfer existing skills and knowledge into new, and increasingly unfamiliar contexts.

translation.cy: Effeithiolrwydd cynyddol fel dysgwr
translation.en: Increasing effectiveness as a learner

translation.cy: Disgrifiadau dysgu
translation.en: Descriptions of learning

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio fy mhrofiadau, gwybodaeth a chredoau i greu syniadau yn annibynnol a threfnu ymholiadau, gan ddefnyddio ystod o ddulliau ymchwil yn ôl y gofyn.
translation.en: I can use my experiences, knowledge and beliefs to generate ideas independently and frame enquiries, using a range of research approaches when required.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall y gwahaniaeth rhwng ffeithiau, barn a chredoau, ac ystyried sut mae hyn yn effeithio ar bwysigrwydd a defnyddioldeb tystiolaeth.
translation.en: I can understand the difference between facts, opinions and beliefs, and consider how this may affect the importance and usefulness of evidence.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cyflwyno, mewn amrywiol ffyrdd, yr hyn rwyf wedi’i ddarganfod, a dod i gasgliadau syml.
translation.en: I can present what I have discovered in a variety of ways and draw simple conclusions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cyflwyno fy nghanfyddiadau mewn amrywiol ffyrdd, gan ddod i gasgliadau a barn yn seiliedig ar y dystiolaeth a ddefnyddiwyd.
translation.en: I can present my findings in a variety of ways, drawing conclusions and making judgements based on the evidence used.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu disgriﬁo ac esbonio’n syml beth yw effaith gweithredoedd dynol ar y byd naturiol yn y gorffennol a’r presennol.
translation.en: I can describe and give simple explanations about the impact of human actions on the natural world in the past and present.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall ac esbonio yr ystod o ffactorau sy’n effeithio’r rhyngberthnasau rhwng pobl a phrosesau ffisegol.
translation.en: I can understand the range of factors that affect the interrelationshipsbetween humans and physical processes.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio a dadansoddi’r ystod eang o rhyngberthnasau a rhyng-ddibyniaethaurhwng y gweithredoedd dynol a’r prosesau ffisegol sy’n siapio lleoedd, gofodau, amgylcheddau a thirffurfiau dros gyfnod o amser.
translation.en: I can explain and analyse the wide range of interrelationshipsand interdependenciesbetween the human actions and physical processes that shape places, spaces, environments and landforms over time

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio rhai achosion ac effeithiau digwyddiadau a newidiadau yn fy nghymuned dros gyfnod o amser.
translation.en: I have explored some causes and effects of events and changes in my community over time.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio a dadansoddi achosion ystod o ddigwyddiadau a newidiadau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol, ac yn gallu gwerthfawrogi sut y gall achosion fod yn aml yn rhyng-gysylltiedig, a gwahaniaethu o ran pwysigrwydd.
translation.en: I can explain and analyse the causes of a range of events and changes in the past and present, and can appreciate how causes can often be interconnected and differ in importance.

translation.cy: Rwy’n deall sut mae ffactorau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol wedi siapio fy nghymunedau.
translation.en: I have an understanding of how factorsin the past and present have shaped my communities.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cymharu a gwerthuso systemau llywodraethu lleol, cenedlaethol a rhyngwladol, gan gynnwys systemau Llywodraeth a democratiaeth yng Nghymru, gan ystyried eu heffaith ar gymdeithasau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol, a hawliau a chyfrifoldebau dinasyddion yng Nghymru.
translation.en: I can compare and evaluate local, national and global governance systems, including the systems of government and democracy in Wales, considering their impact on societies in the past and present, and the rights and responsibilities of citizens in Wales.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall bod angen i ni barchu hawliau rhai eraill.
translation.en: I can understand that we need to respect the rights of others.

translation.cy: Rwyf hefyd yn deall bod eu hawliau yn cael eu gwrthod i rai pobl.
translation.en: I also have an understanding that some people are denied their rights.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio a gwerthuso’r gwahaniaeth rhwng dymuniadau, anghenion a hawliau.
translation.en: I can explain and evaluate the difference between wants, needs and rights.

translation.cy: Mae’r canlynol yn rhai egwyddorion allweddol y dylai lleoliadau ac ysgolion eu hystyried wrth gynllunio dysgu ac addysgu ym Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad y Dyniaethau (Maes).
translation.en: The following are some key principles which settings/schools should consider when designing learning and teaching in the Humanities Area of Learning and Experience (Area).

translation.cy: Datblygu’r gallu i feddwl yn ddadansoddol a deall y gorffennol a’r presennol yn ogystal â dychmygu dyfodol posib.
translation.en: Developing the ability to think analytically and understand the past and present as well as to imagine possible futures.

translation.cy: Effeithiolrwydd personol
translation.en: Personal effectiveness

translation.cy: Ystyriaethau penodol ar gyfer y Maes hwn
translation.en: Specific considerations for this Area

translation.cy: Safbwyntiau lleol, cenedlaethol a’r byd ehangach
translation.en: Local, national and the wider world perspectives

translation.cy: Trylwyredd
translation.en: Rigour

translation.cy: Ymateb yn sensitif ac yn graff i fydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol ynghylch cymdeithas, cymunedau a diwylliannau, a deall sut y gellir dehongli’r rhain mewn gwahanol amserau, diwylliannau a lleoedd.
translation.en: Respond sensitively and insightfully to religious and non-religious worldviews about society, communities and cultures, and understand how these can be interpreted in different times, cultures and places.

translation.cy: Mae’r cynnwys, y cysyniadau a’r sgiliau a amlinellir yn y Maes hwn yn rhyng-gysylltiedig.
translation.en: The content, concepts and skills outlined in this Area are interconnected.

translation.cy: Astudiaethau cymdeithasol
translation.en: Social studies

translation.cy: Dylai cynllun cwricwlwm ysgol:
translation.en: School curriculum design should:

translation.cy: ddatblygu dealltwriaeth o’r disgyblaeth a’i gwerth
translation.en: develop an understanding of the discipline and its value

translation.cy: gweithio gyda phobl broffesiynol o fewn y byd treftadaeth a datblygu cydnabyddiaeth o werth safleoedd treftadaeth/orielau/amgueddfeydd
translation.en: heritage professionals and developing a recognition of value of heritage sites /galleries/museums

translation.cy: arweinwyr gwleidyddol, busnes, cymunedol a/neu diwylliannol
translation.en: political, business, community and/or cultural leaders

translation.cy: prosiectau gweithredu cymdeithasol
translation.en: social action projects

translation.cy: Darperir y canlynol fel enghreifftiau o sut y gallech archwilio dysgu testunol gwahanol yn y Maes hwn.
translation.en: The following are provided as examples of how you could explore different topical learning in this Area.

translation.cy: Celfyddydau Mynegiannol
translation.en: Expressive Arts

translation.cy: Eisteddfod), yn galluogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu eu dealltwriaeth o ddiwylliannau pobl eraill yn ogystal â’u diwylliant eu hunain.
translation.en: Eisteddfod), allows learners to develop their understanding of other cultures as well as their own.

translation.cy: Mae ymholiadau yn y dyniaethau yn defnyddio ystod o ddata ansoddol a meintiol.
translation.en: Enquiries in the humanities will use a range of qualitative and quantitative data.

translation.cy: Mae gan y ddau Faes yma ddulliau ac egwyddorion ymchwilio tebyg ac eto’n benodol i’r Maes.
translation.en: Both of these Areas have similar and yet distinct methods and principles of inquiry.

translation.cy: Gall gwyddoniaeth a thechnoleg gynnig datrysiadau ac ymatebion i’r heriau mae dynoliaeth yn eu hwynebu yn y byd modern.
translation.en: Science and technology can offer solutions and responses to the challenges that humanity faces in the modern world.

translation.cy: Mae’r economi digidol yn ddylanwad grymus wrth lywio cymdeithasau, economïau a bywydau pobl yn y byd modern.
translation.en: The digital economy is a powerful influence in shaping modern societies, economies and people's lives.

translation.cy: Mae cyd-destunau lleol, cenedlaethol a rhyngwladol yn greiddiol i’r Maes hwn ac yn ffurfio rhan o’r egwyddorion allweddol sy’n ymwneud â dewis cynnwys.
translation.en: Local, national and international contexts are integral to this Area and form part of the key principles relating to the choice of content.

translation.cy: Mae sgiliau amlieithog effeithiol yn dyfnhau’r gallu hwn gan eu bod yn galluogi dysgwyr i ymateb mewn llawer mwy o gyd-destunau.
translation.en: Effective multilingual skills deepen this ability as they enable learners to respond in many more contexts.

translation.cy: Datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig
translation.en: Statements of what matters

translation.cy: Mae llenyddiaeth yn ehangu gorwelion.
translation.en: Literature expands horizons.

translation.cy: Maen nhw hefyd yn gwneud cynnydd o ran ehangder a dyfnder gwybodaeth gysyniadol drwy profi syniadau mewn ieithoedd a llenyddiaeth, i ddechrau mewn cyd-destun mwy personol a lleol gan symud ymlaen i gysylltu â  chyfathrebu mwy cymhleth mewn byd amlieithog.
translation.en: They also progress in their breadth and depth of conceptual knowledge by encountering ideas in languages and literature, initially in more personal and local contexts and moving as they progress to connect with more complex communications in a multilingual world.

translation.cy: Mae sgiliau mewn iaith gyntaf ac ail iaith dysgwyr yn eu helpu i ddysgu mewn ieithoedd dilynol.
translation.en: Skills in learners’ first and second languages enable learning in subsequent languages.

translation.cy: Effeithiolrwydd cynyddol
translation.en: Increasing effectiveness as a learner

translation.cy: gwneud penderfyniadau trwy werthuso a beirniadu’r syniadau a'r safbwyntiau a'r dulliau cyfathrebu yn yr hyn y maen nhw’n ei glywed, ei ddarllen a'i weld
translation.en: making evaluative and critical judgements about the ideas and viewpoints and the means of communication in what they hear, read, and view

translation.cy: Disgrifiadau dysgu
translation.en: Descriptions of Learning

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 1
translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod bod cysylltiad rhwng ieithoedd, diwylliant a’r ymdeimlad sydd gen i o’m hunaniaeth Gymreig.
translation.en: I can recognise that there is a relationship between languages, culture and my own sense of Welsh identity.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau deall bod gwahanol ieithoedd yn fy amgylchedd.
translation.en: I am beginning to understand that there are different languages in my environment.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu addasu a bod yn sensitif i amrywiaeth o fewn ieithoedd a deall bod amrywiaeth yn digwydd o fewn gwahanol grwpiau cymdeithasol, rhanbarthol ac ieithyddol.
translation.en: I can adapt and be sensitive to variety within languages and understand that variety occurs within different social, regional and linguistic groups.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu derbyn gwybodaeth mewn un iaith a’i haddasu at wahanol ddibenion mewn iaith arall.
translation.en: I can receive information in one language and adapt it for various purposes in another language.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod, yn annibynnol, gyﬂeoedd i roi fy sgiliau trawsieithu ar waith er mwyn cyfoethogi’r modd rwy’n dysgu a chyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can independently identify translanguagingopportunities to enhance my learning and communication in my languages.

translation.cy: Mae deall ieithoedd yn allweddol i ddeall y byd o’n hamgylch.
translation.en: Understanding languages is key to understanding the world around us.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall ac ymateb i ystod o gwestiynau a chyfarwyddiadau aml-gam mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau cyfarwydd ac anghyfarwydd.
translation.en: I can understand and respond to a range of questions and multi-step instructions in a variety of familiar and unfamiliar contexts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwrando gydag empathi ar safbwyntiau gwahanol bobl ar bynciau amrywiol gan ddefnyddio’r safbwyntiau i gyrraedd fy nghasgliadau fy hun.
translation.en: I can listen empathetically to different people’s viewpoints on various subjects, using them to arrive at my own conclusions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau dod yn ymwybodol o sut mae prif lythrennau ac atalnodau llawn yn pennu ffiniau brawddegau.
translation.en: I am beginning to have an awareness of how capital letters and full stops demarcate sentences.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu datblygu fy ngeirfa trwy wrando a darllen, a defnyddio’r geiriau newydd hyn mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau.
translation.en: I can develop my vocabulary through listening and reading and use these new words in a variety of contexts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwrando ar eraill gyda sylw cynyddol.
translation.en: I can listen to others with growing attention.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ddarllen ar goedd gyda mynegiant, gan roi sylw i atalnodi.
translation.en: I can read aloud with expression, paying attention to punctuation.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwrando a darllen i ddatblygu fy nealltwriaeth o’r ffordd y mae gramadeg ac atalnodi’n siapio brawddegau a thestunau cyflawn.
translation.en: I can listen and read to build on my understanding of how grammar and punctuation shape sentences and whole texts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu datblygu fy ngeirfa ac ynganiad trwy wrando a darllen, a defnyddio’r geiriau newydd hyn mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau.
translation.en: I can develop my vocabulary and pronunciation through listening and reading, and use new words and phrases in a variety of contexts.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 1
translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu addasu a thrin iaith a gwneud dewisiadau priodol ynghylch geirfa, iaith idiomatiga chystrawen er mwyn mynegi fy hun yn rhugl ac eglur.
translation.en: I can adapt and manipulate language and make appropriate choices about vocabulary, idiomatic language and syntaxin order to express myself with fluency and clarity.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwneud dewisiadau gwybodus ynghylch geirfa a gramadeg i cyfoethogi fy sgiliau cyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can make informed choices about vocabulary and grammar to enhance my communication skills.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ysgrifennu’n ddarllenadwy.
translation.en: I can write legibly.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau ysgrifennu gan ddefnyddio geiriau ac ymadroddion cyfarwydd.
translation.en: I am beginning to write using familiar words and phrases.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu siarad er mwyn cynllunio ysgrifennu at wahanol ddibenion ac ar gyfer gwahanol gynulleidfaoedd.
translation.en: I can talk to plan writing and write for different purposes and audiences.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu myfyrio ar fy nefnydd o strategaethau i wella ansawdd, cywirdeb ac effaith fynghyfathrebu gweledol,llafar ac ysgrifenedig.
translation.en: I can reflect on my use of strategies to improve the quality, accuracy and effects of my spoken, written and visual communication.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau gofyn ac ateb cwestiynau.
translation.en: I am beginning to ask and answer questions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am sain a phatrwm llythrennau i gefnogi fy sillafu.
translation.en: I can use my knowledge of letter sounds and patterns to support my spelling.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cyfrannu at ysgrifennu ar y cyd ar gyfer gwahanol gynulleidfaoedd a dibenion.
translation.en: I can contribute to shared writing for different audiences and purposes.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu rhannu syniadau a mynegi barn a theimladau gan ddefnyddio geirfa berthnasol.
translation.en: I can share ideas, and express opinions and feelings using relevant vocabulary.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cyfathrebu gan ddefnyddio ymadroddion a brawddegau cyfarwydd.
translation.en: I can communicate using familiar phrases and sentences.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio fy nychymyg i ymateb i lenyddiaeth a’i haddasu i greu fy ngwaith fy hun.
translation.en: I can use my imagination to respond to and adapt literature to create my own work.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau gofyn ac ateb cwestiynau i wella fy nealltwriaeth.
translation.en: I am beginning to ask and answer questions to clarify my understanding.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod nodweddion gwahanol fathau o lenyddiaeth a defnyddio iaith briodol i siarad amdanyn nhw.
translation.en: I can recognise the features of different types of literature and use appropriate language to talk about them.

translation.cy: Cymraeg mewn lleoliadau/ysgolion/ffrydiau cyfrwng Saesneg
translation.en: Welsh in English-medium settings/schools/streams

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau ymateb i lenyddiaeth rwy’n ei chlywed a’i gweld.
translation.en: I am beginning to respond to literature I hear and view.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwrando ar farddoniaeth, drama a rhyddiaith, gan eu coﬁo a’u haddasu mewn ffordd greadigol.
translation.en: I can listen to and remember poetry, drama and prose and can adapt them creatively.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymateb i’r hyn rwy’n ei glywed, ei ddarllen a’i weld gan fynegi barn syml yn fy newis iaith.
translation.en: I can respond to what I hear, read and view and express opinions in my language of choice.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau dangos empathi gyda chymeriadau mewn llenyddiaeth.
translation.en: I am beginning to show empathy with characters in literature.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymateb yn greadigol yn fy newis iaith, i lenyddiaeth yn yr iaith ryngwladol.
translation.en: I can respond creatively in my language of choice to literature in the international language.

translation.cy: Mae’r hyn yn rhoi arweiniad penodol i’w ddefnyddio wrth ymgorffori dysgu o fewn ieithoedd, llythrennedd a chyfathrebu yn eich cwricwlwm.
translation.en: This provides specific guidance when incorporating learning in languages, literacy and communication in your curriculum.

translation.cy: Dylai cyfleoedd hefyd gael eu cynnig iddyn nhw gydweithio’n lleol a byd-eang drwy lwyfannau digidol er mwyn cynyddu ymwybyddiaeth a dealltwriaeth o wahanol ieithoedd a diwylliannau.
translation.en: Opportunities should also be offered for them to collaborate locally and globally through digital platforms in order to increase awareness and understanding of different languages and cultures.

translation.cy: Drwy dderbyn y cyfle i ddefnyddio sgiliau llythrennedd er mwyn cyflwyno cynlluniau a gweithredu datrysiadau’n eglur, gall dysgwyr fyfyrio ar eu gwaith a chynllunio a gweithredu gwelliannau pellach.
translation.en: Given the opportunity to use literacy skills to present plans and implement solutions with clarity, learners can reflect on their work and plan and implement further improvements.

translation.cy: Dylai lleoliadau ac ysgolion annog dysgwyr i ddefnyddio eu sgiliau amlieithog a dylai dysgwyr ddeall gwerth gallu defnyddio gwahanol ieithoedd.
translation.en: Settings and schools should encourage learners to use theirplurilingual skills and learners should recognise the value of being able to use different languages.

translation.cy: Sut y byddwch chi’n darparu ehangder a dyfnder mewn ieithoedd rhyngwladol?
translation.en: How will you provide breadth and depth in international languages?

translation.cy: Sut y byddwch chi’n creu awyrgylch sy’n annog dysgwyr i dynnu ar eu gwybodaeth o nifer o ieithoedd, gan gynnwys gwybodaeth am amrywiaeth o fewn ieithoedd (acen, tafodiaith, cywair, jargon, a phriodiaith) i hybu dealltwriaeth a gwella cyfathrebu wrth ymwneud ag eraill?
translation.en: How will you create an environment which encourages learners to draw upon their knowledge of a number of languages, including knowledge of language varieties (accent, dialect, register, jargon, and idiolect) to facilitate understanding and improve communication when interacting with others?

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr brofi cyfoeth o lenyddiaeth sy’n darparu cyfleoedd i wireddu pedwar diben y cwricwlwm.
translation.en: Learners should experience a wealth of literature which provides opportunities to realise the four purposes of the curriculum.

translation.cy: Wrth gynllunio eich cwricwlwm, dylid ystyried gwahanol addysgeg sy’n benodol ar gyfer y Maes hwn.
translation.en: When designing your curriculum, consideration should be given to pedagogies specific to this Area.

translation.cy: Dylai’r gweithgareddau hyn hybu diddordeb dysgwyr mewn mwynhau darllen, darllen i ddibenion dychmygus a darllen ar gyfer dysgu.
translation.en: These activities should promote learners’ interest in reading for enjoyment, for imaginative purposes and for learning.

translation.cy: Pan mae’n addas ar gyfer y dysgwr, dylai dysgu ffoneg fod yn systematig a chyson, gan ddigwydd gyda gweithgareddau ieithyddol eraill, sy’n hybu datblygiad geirfa a dealltwriaeth.
translation.en: When appropriate for a learner, the teaching of phonicsshould be systematic and consistent, and take place with other language activities, which promote vocabulary-building and comprehension.

translation.cy: Nid yw gallu dadgodio geiriau yn unig yn ddigon. Dylai dysgwyr fod yn gallu gwneud synnwyr o’r hyn y maen nhw’n ei ddarllen.
translation.en: Being able to decodewords alone is not enough; readers need to be able to make sense of what they read.

translation.cy: Mae llenyddiaeth yn darparu tystiolaeth werthfawr ar gyfer ymchwiliadau mewn dyniaethau, ac yn gallu bod yn destun yr ymchwiliadau hyn.
translation.en: Literature provides valuable evidence for, and can be a focus of, enquiries in humanities.

translation.cy: mwynhau dysgu ieithoedd a datblygu delwedd gadarnhaol o'u hunain fel defnyddwyr yr ieithoedd hynny
translation.en: enjoy learning languages and develop a positive perception of themselves as users of those languages

translation.cy: gwerthfawrogi eu sgiliau yn y Gymraeg a datblygu’r sgiliau hyn ymhellach
translation.en: value their Welsh language skills and to develop these skills further

translation.cy: Dylai ymarferwyr ddefnyddio’r cyfleoedd yn y Maes hwn i feithrin a datblygu parch ac empathi dysgwyr tuag at ieithoedd a hunaniaeth pobl eraill, tra’n dathlu a pharchu tebygrwydd a gwahaniaethau.
translation.en: Practitioners should use the opportunities within this Area to foster and develop learners’ respect and empathy for others’ languages and identities, while celebrating and respecting similarities and differences.

translation.cy: Mae datblygiad mathemateg wedi mynd law yn llaw â datblygiad gwareiddiad ers y cychwyn cyntaf.
translation.en: The development of mathematics has always gone hand in hand with the development of civilisation itself.

translation.cy: Mae’n ddisgyblaeth wirioneddol ryngwladol, ac mae o’n cwmpas ni i gyd ac yn sail i gynifer o agweddau ar ein bywydau bob dydd, megis pensaernïaeth, celfyddyd, cerddoriaeth, arian a pheirianneg.
translation.en: A truly international discipline, it surrounds us and underpins so many aspects of our daily lives, such as architecture, art, music, money and engineering.

translation.cy: Yn ystod y blynyddoedd cynnar, mae chwarae yn rhan bwysig yn y broses o ddatblygu mathemateg a rhifedd, gan alluogi dysgwyr i ddatrys problemau, archwilio syniadau, creu cysylltiadau a chydweithio ag eraill.
translation.en: In the early years, play forms an important part in the development of mathematics and numeracy, enabling learners to solve problems, explore ideas, establish connections and collaborate with others.

translation.cy: Mae’r hyn sy’n bwysig yn y Maes hwn wedi’i fynegi mewn pedwar datganiad sy’n cefnogi a chadarnhau ei gilydd, ac ni ddylid eu hystyried fel datganiadau ar wahân.
translation.en: What matters in this Area has been expressed in four statements which support and complement one another and should not be viewed in isolation.

translation.cy: Rhifau yw’r system symbolau ar gyfer disgriﬁo a chymharu meintiau.
translation.en: Numbers are the symbol system for describing and comparing quantities.

translation.cy: Mae algebra yn defnyddio systemau symbolau i fynegi strwythur perthnasoedd mathemategol.
translation.en: Algebra uses symbol systems to express the structure of mathematical relationships.

translation.cy: Mae rhesymu ynghylch meintiau a phriodweddau siapiau a’r gofod o’u hamgylch yn cynnig modd i ddysgwyr wneud synnwyr o’r byd fﬁsegol a byd siapiau mathemategol.
translation.en: Reasoning about the sizes and properties of shapes and their surrounding spaces helps learners to make sense of the physical world and the world of mathematical shapes.

translation.cy: Gellir cymhwyso geometreg a mesur mewn sawl maes, gan gynnwys celf, adeiladu, gwyddoniaeth a thechnoleg, peirianneg, a seryddiaeth.
translation.en: Geometry and measurement have applications in many fields, including art, construction, science and technology, engineering, and astronomy.

translation.cy: Caiff dysgwyr eu cyflwyno i gysyniadau cynyddol gymhleth, a bydd deall y ffordd y mae cysyniadau yn cysylltu yn cyfrannu at ddealltwriaeth gynyddol o'r syniadau yn y Maes hwn.
translation.en: The concepts that learners are introduced to will become increasingly complex, and understanding the way in which concepts connect will contribute to a growing understanding of the ideas within this Area.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr ddeall bod y symbolau y maen nhw’n eu defnyddio yn gynrychioliadau haniaethol a dylen nhw ddatblygu mwy o hyblygrwydd wrth gymhwyso a thrin amrywiaeth gynyddol o symbolau, gan ddeall confensiynau'r symbolau y maen nhw’n eu defnyddio.
translation.en: Learners should understand that the symbols they are using are abstractrepresentations and should develop greater flexibility with the application and manipulation of an increasing range of symbols, understanding the conventions of the symbols they are using.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 1
translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall y gellir penderfynu ar werth rhif ar sail saﬂe’r digidau a ddefnyddir.
translation.en: I can understand that the value of a number can be determined by the position of the digits.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwirio cyfriﬁadau a datganiadau am rifau, drwy resymu gwrthdro a dulliau amcangyfrif.
translation.en: I can verify calculations and statements about number by inverse reasoning and approximation methods.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau adnabod, copïo, ymestyn a chyffredinoli patrymau a dilyniannau o’m cwmpas.
translation.en: I am beginning to recognise, copy, extend and generalise patterns and sequences around me.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio, creu, adnabod a chynrychioli dilyniannau rhifyddol a gofodol, gan ddefnyddio dilyniannau llinol ac aflinol.
translation.en: I can explore, generate, identify and represent both numerical and spatial patterns, using linear and non-linear sequences.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 1
translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio ac wedi defnyddio gwahanol ffyrdd o ddangos treigl amser, gan gynnwys calendrau, llinellau amser, amserlenni syml a rhestrau digwyddiadau.
translation.en: I have explored and used different ways of showing the passing of time, including calendars, timelines, simple timetables and schedules.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio siapiau dau ddimensiwn a thri dimensiwn, ynghyd â’u priodweddau, mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau.
translation.en: I have explored two-dimensional and three-dimensional shapes and their properties in a range of contexts.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio cymesuredd adlewyrchol mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau ac rwy’n gallu’i drafod fel un o briodweddau siapiau dau ddimensiwn.
translation.en: I have explored reflective symmetry in a range of contexts and I can discuss it as a property of shapes and images.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio fertigau, ymylon a wynebau siapiau tri dimensiwn ac rwy’n gallu defnyddio’r nodweddion hyn i ddisgriﬁo siâp tri dimensiwn.
translation.en: I can explore vertices, edges and faces of three-dimensional shapes and I can use these characteristics to describe a three-dimensional shape.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deillio a chymhwyso’r hafaliadau ar gyfer cyfaint prismau syml.
translation.en: I can derive and apply the formulae for the volume of simple prisms.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cymhwyso fy nealltwriaeth o arwynebedd i ddangos a defnyddio’r berthynas rhwng trionglau ongl sgwâr a sgwariau yng nghyd-destun theorem Pythagoras.
translation.en: I can apply my understanding of area to demonstrate and use the relationship between right-angled triangles and squares in the context of Pythagoras’ theorem.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio’r berthynas rhwng y math o ddata rwyf wedi eu casglu (gan gynnwys data ansoddol a meintiol) a sut y gellir trin a chynrychioli’r data hyn.
translation.en: I have explored the relationship between the type of data I have collected (including qualitative and quantitative) and how this can be manipulated and represented.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu didoli a dosbarthu gan ddefnyddio mwy nag un maen prawf, gan ddefnyddio diagramau Venn a diagramau Carroll.
translation.en: I can sort and classify using more than one criterion, including the use of Venn diagrams and Carroll diagrams.

translation.cy: Sgiliau trawsgwricwlaidd a sgiliau cyfannol
translation.en: Cross-curricular skills and integral skills

translation.cy: Rhifedd
translation.en: Numeracy

translation.cy: Mae gweithio mathemategol yn datblygu ac yn gofyn am greadigrwydd a chywreinrwydd sydd hefyd yn trosglwyddo i agweddau eraill o fywyd.
translation.en: Mathematical working requires and develops creativity and curiosity which also transfer to other aspects of life.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr ymwneud â thasgau ystyrlon a sylweddol megis:
translation.en: Learners should engage in meaningful and substantial tasks such as:

translation.cy: Gellir defnyddio mathemateg a rhifedd ar draws pob Maes arall i gyfoethogi ysgogi a chefnogi dysgu.
translation.en: Mathematics and numeracy can be used across all other Areas to enhance, stimulate and support learning.

translation.cy: Ymdrinnir â llythrennedd ariannol yn y datganiad o’r hyn sy’n bwysig sy’n ymdrin â’r system rif.
translation.en: Financial literacy is provided for in the statement of what matters dealing with the number system.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cael ei gadarnhau yn iechyd a lles lle y gallai dysgu archwilio llythrennedd ariannol trwy risg a dyled bersonol, a’u canlyniadau.
translation.en: This is complemented in health and well-being where learning could explore financial literacy through risk and personal debt, and its consequences.

translation.cy: Mae cefnogi entrepreneuriaeth, cymhareb a graddfa, cyllid, talgrynnu a threfnu hefyd yn berthnasol.
translation.en: Supporting entrepreneurship, ratio and scale; finance; rounding; ordering will also be relevant.

translation.cy: Themâu trawsbynciol
translation.en: Cross-cutting themes

translation.cy: Mae ymgorffori gyrfaoedd a phrofiadau yn ymwneud â byd gwaith o fewn mathemateg a rhifedd yn galluogi mwy o ymwneud, yn codi dyheadau ac yn llywio gwneud penderfyniadau’n effeithiol.
translation.en: Incorporating careers and work-related experiences within Mathematics and Numeracy enables greater engagement, raises aspirations, and informs effective decision-making.

translation.cy: Cyflwyniad
translation.en: Introduction

translation.cy: Nid oes modd gorbwysleisio pwysigrwydd gwyddoniaeth a thechnoleg yn ein byd modern.
translation.en: The importance of science and technology in our modern world cannot be overstated.

translation.cy: Mae angen iddyn nhw feithrin y gallu i ofyn, yn ystyrlon, y cwestiwn: ‘Ydy’r ffaith ein bod ni’n gallu yn golygu y dylen ni?’
translation.en: They need to develop the ability to meaningfully ask the question, ‘Just because we can, does that mean we should?’

translation.cy: Bydd bod yn rhan o broses ddylunio sy’n canolbwyntio ar y defnyddiwr yn annog dysgwyr i fod yn greadigol er mwyn datblygu syniadau, rheoli a lliniaru risg, a lleihau cymhlethdodau.
translation.en: Being part of a user‑centred design process will encourage them to use creativity to develop ideas, manage and mitigate risks, and minimise complexities.

translation.cy: Mae sut mae materyn ymddwyn yn pennu priodweddau defnyddiau ac yn ein galluogi i ddefnyddio adnoddau naturiol, yn ogystal â chreu sylweddau newydd.
translation.en: The behaviour of matter determines the properties of materials and allows us to use natural resources, as well as to create new substances.

translation.cy: Mae grymoedd ac egni yn gosod sail i ddeall ein bydysawd.
translation.en: Forces and energy provide a foundation for understanding our universe.

translation.cy: Gellir defnyddio grymoedd ac egni er mwyn disgrifio ymddygiad popeth, o flociau adeiladu lleiaf mater i symudiad y sêr a’r planedau.
translation.en: Forcesand energy can be used to describe the behaviour of everything from the smallest building blocks of matter to the motion of planets and stars.

translation.cy: Gellir modelu’r syniadau hyn a’u mynegi’n ffurfiol, gan ddarparu fframwaith mathemategol cyson ar gyfer disgrifio systemau ffisegol.
translation.en: These ideas can be modelled and expressed formally, providing a consistent mathematical framework to describe physical systems.

translation.cy: Dyma fan cychwyn pob system caledwedd a meddalwedd, ond mae angen i ddysgwyr hefyd fod yn ymwybodol o gyfyngiadau’r hyn y gall cyfrifiaduron eu cyflawni.
translation.en: They provide the foundation for all software and hardware systems, but learners should also be aware of the limitations of what computers can achieve.

translation.cy: Mae gwybodaethyn symud, drwy archwilio, o ddealltwriaeth bersonol o'r byd i safbwynt haniaethol sy'n galluogi'r dysgwr i gysyniadu a chyfiawnhau ei ddealltwriaeth.
translation.en: Knowledgemoves through exploration from a personal understanding of the world to an abstract view that enables learners to conceptualise and justify their understandings.

translation.cy: Gellir cymhwyso sgiliauymchwilio sy'n cael eu meithrin yng nghyd-destun un datganiad o'r hyn sy'n bwysig mewn rhai eraill.
translation.en: Investigative skillswhich are developed within the context of one statement of what matters can be applied in others.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwr wneud cynnydd, mae'n archwilio ac yn ymchwilio i broblemau ac yn ffurfio atebion creadigol canlyniadol mewn ffordd gynyddol soffistigedig.
translation.en: As a learner makes progress, there is increasing sophistication in the way in which they explore and investigate problems and the resulting formulation of creative solutions.

translation.cy: Mae bod yn chwilfrydig a chwilio am atebion yn hanfodol i ddeall a rhagfynegi ffenomenau.
translation.en: Being curious and searching for answers is essential to understanding and predicting phenomena.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu nodi, dilyn a dechrau creu dilyniannau a phatrymau mewn gweithgareddau pob-dydd.
translation.en: I can identify, follow and begin to create sequences and patterns in everyday activities.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymchwilio a dwyn ysbrydoliaeth o ffynonellau hanesyddol a diwylliannol ymhlith eraill er mwyn dylunio datrysiadau creadigol.
translation.en: I can investigate and draw inspiration from historical, cultural and other sources to design creative solutions.

translation.cy: Rwyf hefyd yn gallu gwerthuso effaith y rhain ar effeithiolrwydd fy nghynnyrch terfynol.
translation.en: I can select and safely use appropriate tools, materials and equipment to construct purposeful outcomes.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ddefnyddio technegau prototeipio i broﬁ syniadau a helpu gyda’r broses o wneud.
translation.en: I can use prototyping techniques to test ideas and support my making.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio’r bygythiadau i ddatblygiad ac iechyd organebau, a gallu disgrifio sut mae effeithiau’r rhain yn cael eu lleihau drwy amddiffynfeydd naturiol, ataliad haint a thriniaethau.
translation.en: I can explain the threats to the development and health of organisms and describe how the effects of these are reduced by natural defences, preventions and treatments.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwerthuso’r ffactorau ay’n effeithio ar ddatblygiad ac iechyd organebau.
translation.en: I can evaluate the factors which affect the development and health of organisms.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu nodi, dilyn a dechrau creu dilyniannau a phatrymau mewn gweithgareddau pob-dydd.
translation.en: I can identify, follow and begin to create sequences and patterns in everyday activities.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod patrymau ar sail fy arsylwadau a’m hymchwiliadau, ac rwy’n gallu mynegi fy nghanfyddiadau.
translation.en: I can recognise patterns from my observations and investigations and can communicate my findings.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio a chyfrifo sut mae nifer o rymoeddsy’n gweithedau ar wrthrych yn effeithio ar ei fudiant.
translation.en: I can explain and calculate how multiple forces acting on an object will affect its motion.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu meintioli’r egni mewn systemau a chymhwyso hyn i ddyluniadau system er mwyn gwella effeithlonrwydd.
translation.en: I can quantify the energy in systems and apply this to system design in order to improve efficiency.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio modelaui sicrhau dealltwriaeth ddyfnach o’r cysylltiadau rhwng grym, cerrynt a meysydd magnetig.
translation.en: I can use modelsto enable deeper understanding of the links between force, current and magnetic fields.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu nodi, dilyn a dechrau creu dilyniannau a phatrymau mewn gweithgareddau pob-dydd.
translation.en: I can identify, follow and begin to create sequences and patterns in everyday activities.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu nodi patrymau ailadroddol a defnyddio dolennau i wneud fy alorithmauyn fwy cryno.
translation.en: I can identify repeating patterns and use loops to make my algorithmsmore concise.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio’r technegau a ddefnyddir i gadw a throsglwyddo data, a deall sut maen nhw’n agored i niwed.
translation.en: I can explain the techniques used to store and transfer data and understand their vulnerabilities.

translation.cy: Mae’r canlynol yn rhai egwyddorion allweddol y dylai lleoliadau ac ysgolion eu hystyried wrth gynllunio dysgu ac addysgu ym Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg (Maes).
translation.en: The following are some key principles which settings/schools should consider when designing learning and teaching in the Science and Technology Area of Learning and Experience (Area).

translation.cy: Gall lleoliadau ac ysgolion fod o gymorth i ddysgwyr ddatblygu sgiliau rhifedd effeithiol, gan gynnwys rhai ar gyfer dylunio a mesur, modelua chyfathrebu syniadau, dadansoddi a rhagfynegi, ac yna ddod i ganlyniad.
translation.en: Settings and schools can help learners develop effective numeracy skills, including those to design and measure, modeland communicate ideas, analyse and predict then draw conclusions.

translation.cy: Sgiliau cyfannol
translation.en: Integral skills

translation.cy: Meddwl yn feirniadol a datrys problemau
translation.en: Critical thinking and problem-solving

translation.cy: Felly gall chwilio cyfleoedd i gydweithio gydag ystod o arbenigwyr a rhanddeiliaid gwyddoniaeth a thechnoleg wrth ymwneud â dylunio a chynllunio’r cwricwlwm (gan gynnwys diwydiant lleol a sefydliadau trydydd sector) fod o gymorth i ysgolion.
translation.en: Seeking opportunities to collaborate with a range of experts and science and technology stakeholders when engaging in curriculum design and planning (including local industry and third sector organisations) can therefore be helpful to schools.

translation.cy: Gellir hefyd archwilio defnyddio arbenigedd pynciol ar draws ysgolion er mwyn llywio cynllunio a datblygu cwricwlwm.
translation.en: Drawing on subject specialist expertise across schools to help inform curriculum design and development can also be explored.

translation.cy: Gall datblygu gwybodaeth sut i ymgymryd â gweithgaredd gwyddoniaeth a thechnoleg (trefniadol) berthyn yn agos i wybod am eu gwerth a’u safle mewn cymdeithas (epistemig) a chyda’i gilydd gallan nhw gael eu hystyried fel agweddau ar ddysgu ‘am’ wyddoniaeth a thechnoleg.
translation.en: Developing knowledge on how to undertake science and technology activity (procedural) can be closely related to knowing about their value and place in society (epistemic) and, together, can be considered as aspects of learning ‘about’ science and technology.

translation.cy: defnyddio modelau(o Gam cynnydd 3) gyda dysgwyr yn adeiladu, mireinio, defnyddio a gwerthuso ystod o fodelau (gan gynnwys modelau mathemategola chysyniadol), gall hyn gynnwys dysgu am sut maen nhw wedi cael eu datblygu a’u mireinio trwy ddarganfyddiadau gwyddonol a thechnolegol.
translation.en: using models(from Progression step 3) with learners building, refining, using and evaluating a range of models (including conceptual and mathematical models), which may include learning about how they have been advanced and refined through scientific and technological discovery.

translation.cy: cynrychioli rhyngddibyniaeth, deall cylchred maeth, modelau haniaethol o gerrynt trydanol, a phrosesau cyfrifiadurol
translation.en: representing interdependence, understanding nutrient cycles, abstract models of electrical currents, and computational processes

translation.cy: Mae defnyddio prototeipio bras a manwla chynhyrchu o safon uchel hefyd yn cefnogi prosesau dylunio iteraidd
translation.en: Using low-fidelity and high-fidelity prototypingand high-quality making also supports the iterative design process

translation.cy: Mae agweddau epistemig yn y Maes hwn yn cynnwys:
translation.en: Epistemic aspects of this Area include:

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys ymchwiliadau yn y presennol a’r gorffennol, datblygiadau technolegol ac, wrth i ddysgwyr wneud cynnydd, rôl data mewn tystiolaeth, a sut mae tystiolaeth empirig yn llywio syniadau mewn gwyddoniaeth
translation.en: This includes current and past investigations, technological developments and, as learners progress, the role of data in evidence and how empirical evidence shapes ideas in science

translation.cy: sut y gall ymddygiad effeithio ar iechyd corfforol y dysgwyr (gan gynnwys maeth, defnydd o sylweddau a gweithgaredd) yn ogystal ag atgenhedlu rhywiol, datblygiad dynol a rôl hormonau
translation.en: how behaviours can impact learners’ physical health (including nutrition, substance use and activity) as well as sexual reproduction, human development and the role of hormones

translation.cy: natur defnyddiau a’r gwahanol ffyrdd y gellir dosbarthu sylweddau.
translation.en: the nature of materials and the different ways that substances can be classified.

translation.cy: sut mae’r gofod yn cynnig cyfleoedd cyfoethog i gyffroi dysgwyr, gan gynnwys cyd-destun ar gyfer ystyried trosglwyddiad egni, yn ogystal â thonnau a’r sbectrwm electromagnetig i alluogi arsylwadau a chasglu tystiolaeth.
translation.en: space provides a rich source of engagement for learners, including a context for considering energy transfer, as well as waves and the electromagnetic spectrum to enable observations and evidence gathering.

translation.cy: Mae gwybod sut i ddylunio, creu, profi a defnyddio meddalwedd sy’n ymarferol, yn gadarn ac yn ystyriol o gynulleidfaoedd amrywiol yn darparu dysgwyr gyda’r wybodaeth, sgiliau a phrofiad sylfaenol o sut mae technolegau modern yn gweithio a’r modd y gellir eu cymhwyso
translation.en: Knowing how to design, create, test and use software that is functional, robust and considerate of diverse audiences provides learners with the fundamental knowledge, skills and experience of how modern technologies work and can be applied

translation.cy: Darperir y canlynol fel enghreifftiau o sut y gallech archwilio dysgu testunol gwahanol yn y Maes hwn.
translation.en: The following are provided as examples of how you could explore different topical learning in this Area.

translation.cy: Mae technoleg yn bwysig i iechyd a lles dysgwyr, gan gynnwys cefnogi paratoi deiet iach.
translation.en: Technology is important to the health and well-being of learners, including supporting the preparation of healthy diets.

translation.cy: Mae’r canlynol i gyd yn cyfrannu at wneud gwell penderfyniadau mewn perthynas â diogelwch ar-lein, bwlio ar-lein a hybu ymddygiad cadarnhaol ar-lein: dealltwriaeth sut mae’r cyfryngau digidol yn gweithio a sut i ddefnyddio’r byd ar-lein yn ddiogel a chyfrifol, archwilio perthynas ag eraill mewn cyd-destun ar-lein, a deall normau a dylanwadau cymdeithasol mewn perthynas â thechnoleg.
translation.en: Understanding how digital media works and how to use the online world safely and responsibly, exploring relationships in an online context and understanding social norms and influences in respect of technology all support stronger decision-making in relation to online safety, online bullying and promoting positive online behaviours.

translation.cy: Mae gan agweddau eraill ar wyddoniaeth a thechnoleg gysylltiadau cynhenid â’r Dyniaethau yn nhermau perthynas ag elfennau megis daearyddiaeth ffisegol a gwybodaeth am ddefnyddiau naturiol a’r dull o’u prosesu, a dylai’r cysylltiadau hyn gael eu harchwilio.
translation.en: Other aspects of science and technology are intrinsically linked to humanities in terms of connections with, for example, physical geography and knowledge of natural materials and their processing, and these should be explored.

translation.cy: Mae cyfathrebu digidol ac ieithoedd cyfrifiadurol yn cynnig cyfleoedd ar gyfer cyswllt i atgyfnerthu dysgu ar draws y ddau Faes yma.
translation.en: Digital communication and computer languages offer opportunities for links to reinforce learning across these two Areas.

translation.cy: Mathemateg a Rhifedd
translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy

translation.cy: O’r defnydd o ddata ac ystadegau mewn ymholiad a thystiolaeth, geometreg a mesur mewn dylunio a datblygu, hyd at drin data mewn technoleg, mae dysgu mewn gwyddoniaeth a thechnoleg yn aml yn seiliedig ar  gynnydd mewn dealltwriaeth fathemategol, fel y’u mynegir trwy’r pum medr mathemategol.
translation.en: From the use of data and statistics in inquiry and evidence, geometry and measurement in design and development, through to data handling in technology learning in science and technology is often underpinned by progression in mathematical understanding, as expressed through the fivemathematical proficiencies.

translation.cy: Themau trawsgwricwlaidd
translation.en: Cross-curricular themes

translation.cy: Mae’r angen gan gyflogwyr am wybodaetha sgiliau sy’n seiliedig ar wyddoniaeth a thechnoleg yn parhau’n gryf, ochr yn ochr â chyfleoedd am ddewisiadau gwerthfawr mewn gyrfa a bywyd.
translation.en: Employers’ need for science and technology-based knowledgeand skillsremains strong, alongside opportunities for rewarding career and life options.

translation.cy: Mae’n rhoi cyfeiriad clir i ysgolion wrth iddynt ddatblygu eu trefniadau asesu.
translation.en: It provides a clear direction for schools when developing their assessment arrangements.

translation.cy: Dylai hyn gynnwys y camau nesaf ac amcanion a nodau tymor hwy y dylai’r dysgwr weithio tuag atynt i helpu i barhau i symud ymlaen yn eu dysgu.
translation.en: This should include both immediate next steps and longer-term objectives and goals that the learner should work towards to help keep them moving forward in their learning.

translation.cy: Gellir hefyd ddefnyddio hyn fel sail ar gyfer cyfathrebu ac ymgysylltu â rhieni/gofalwyr.
translation.en: It can also be used as a basis for communicating and engaging with parents/carers.

translation.cy: Dylai asesu hefyd alluogi ymarferwyr ac arweinwyr o fewn ysgolion i ddeall a yw gwahanol grwpiau o ddysgwyr yn gwneud y cynnydd disgwyliedig.
translation.en: Assessment should also enable practitioners and leaders within the school to understand whether different groups of learners are making expected progress.

translation.cy: Felly, mae cefnogi cynnydd dysgwyr yn fater i’w ystyried gan ysgolion unigol.
translation.en: Therefore, supporting learner progression is a matter for consideration by individual schools.

translation.cy: fod yn glir ynghylch y dysgu a fwriedir a chynllunio profiadau dysgu sy’n ennyn diddordeb yn unol â hynny
translation.en: being clear about the intended learning and planning engaging learning experiences accordingly

translation.en: respond actively to feedback on their learning

translation.en: Parents/carers and external partners have an important role to play and schools should engage with them so that they can support learner progression in an appropriate way.

translation.cy: Ni ddylent ychwaith gael eu defnyddio i dynnu cymariaethau rhwng ysgolion; mewn gwirionedd, byddai gwneud hynny’n wrthreddfol  i system sy’n gwella ei hun.
translation.en: Nor should they be used to draw comparisons between schools; in fact, to do so would be counterintuitive to a self-improving system.

translation.cy: Diben y disgrifiadau dysgu yw darparu arweiniad ar gyflymder cynnydd er mwyn cefnogi ymarferwyr a llywio’r gwaith o gynllunio’r cwricwlwm a dysgu ac addysgu.
translation.en: The purpose of the descriptions of learning is to provide guidance on the pace of progression in order to support practitioners and inform curriculum design and learning and teaching.

translation.cy: Dylid seilio hyn ar ddealltwriaeth dda o ddatblygiad plant.
translation.en: This should be informed by a good understanding of child development.

translation.cy: Dylid dewis dulliau a thechnegau asesu, a’u haddasu lle bo’n briodol, yn unol ag anghenion y dysgwr.
translation.en: Assessment methods and techniques should be selected, and adapted where appropriate, according to the needs of the learner.

translation.cy: Mae asesiadau personol ar-lein statudol wedi’u cynllunio i helpu’r ymarferydd a’r dysgwr i ddeall sut mae sgiliau darllen a rhifedd dysgwr yn datblygu, a beth ddylai’r camau nesaf fod.
translation.en: Statutory online personalised assessments are designed to help the practitioner and learner understand how a learner’s reading and numeracy skills are developing and what the next steps should be.

translation.cy: Dylai ysgolion berthyn i o leiaf un grŵp arall yn ogystal â’u clwstwr, at ddibenion datblygu dealltwriaeth gyffredin o gynnydd.
translation.en: Schools should belong to at least one other group in addition to their cluster, for the purpose of developing a shared understanding of progression.

translation.cy: Disgwylir i ysgolion uwchradd sicrhau eu bod yn aelod o grŵp sydd ag o leiaf un ysgol uwchradd arall ynddo.
translation.en: Secondary schools are expected to ensure they are a member of a group which has at least one other secondary school in its membership.

translation.en: Examples of classroom planning.

translation.cy: Dylid ceisio mewnbwn gan ystod o ddysgwyr a’u cynnydd dysgu unigol.
translation.en: Input should be sought from a range of learners and their individual learning progression.

translation.cy: Mae pontio effeithiol yn golygu cefnogi pob dysgwr ar hyd y continwwm dysgu, wrth iddynt symud rhwng gwahanol grwpiau, dosbarthiadau gwahanol, blynyddoedd gwahanol a lleoliadau gwahanol.
translation.en: Effective transition is about supporting all learners along the learning continuum, as they move between different groups, different classes, different years and different settings.

translation.cy: dylai ysgolion cynradd ac uwchradd ymgysylltu ag arweinwyr unedau cyfeirio disgyblion.
translation.en: primary and secondary schools should engage with leaders of PRUs.

translation.en: Communicating and engaging with parents/carers

translation.en: Schools should develop and implement processes to support effective two-way communication and engagement with parents/carers.

translation.cy: Lle bo’n bosibl, dylid galluogi dysgwyr i gasglu enghreifftiau o’u dysgu, mynegi eu cynnydd a’u cyflawniadau eu hunain, a chyfleu eu dyheadau a’u safbwyntiau ar y camau nesaf yn eu dysgu.
translation.en: Where possible, learners should be enabled to gather examples of their learning, articulate their own progress and achievements, and convey their aspirations and views on the next steps in their learning.

translation.cy: Dylid amseru hyn er mwyn gallu cynnal trafodaethau pellach rhwng ymarferwyr, y dysgwr a’u rhieni/gofalwyr ac er mwyn i’r camau nesaf gael eu rhoi ar waith.
translation.en: This should be timed to allow for further discussions to take place between practitioners, the learner and their parents/carers and for next steps to be put in place.

translation.en: The information provided should be individually-tailored to the learner and be focused on supporting their development and progression.

translation.en: For example, the Welsh Government-funded Wales Asylum Seeking and Refugee Doctors (WARD) Group, delivered by the Wales Deanery and Displaced People in Action, has been supporting refugee doctors to have their existing medical qualifications recognised and find employment in the NHS for 15 years.

translation.en: The spectrum of pain experienced ranges significantly from low risk, where an individual can deal with their own pain as a manageable condition with continued support, to higher risk individuals who require complex case management programmes.

translation.en: For example, Welsh Government guidance advises that people within gypsy and traveller communities may have improved interaction with the health service when contacted face to face, via text message or on the phone, as opposed to receiving a letter.

translation.en: These are based on a review of evidence of clinical and cost effectiveness for a particular technology, and give recommendations about whether and in what circumstances the technology should be used in the NHS.

translation.en: NICE is tasked with conducting assessments and drawing up guidelines by the Department of Health and the Welsh Government.

translation.en: Closer links between pain management programmes within specialist services and primary care projects such as the EPP may enable improved self-management depending on the level of personal/individual support required.

translation.cy: Mae'r rhan fwyaf o bobl sy'n byw gyda phoen parhaus yn rheoli eu cyflwr iechyd ar eu pennau eu hunain gyda chymorth a chyngor gan weithwyr iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol dim ond pan fo angen hynny.
translation.en: Most people living with persistent pain manage their health condition themselves with support and advice from health and social care professionals only when needed.

translation.cy: Mae hunanreoli gyda chymorth yn rhan annatod o reoli poen parhaus ac mae'n gweithio orau pan fydd yr unigolyn yn gallu cymryd yr awenau wrth benderfynu ar sut yr hoffai fyw ei fywyd ac yn cael ei gefnogi i ddod o hyd i ffyrdd o leihau poen parhaus.
translation.en: Supported selfmanagement is an integral part of persistent pain management and it works best when the individual is able to take the lead in deciding how they want to live their life and are supported in finding ways of reducing persistent pain.

translation.cy: Lluniwyd cynllun ar y cyd rhwng yr unigolyn, ei feddyg teulu a’i fferyllydd i leihau’r llacwyr cyhyrau yn araf, yn unol â’r rhaglen ymarfer corff.
translation.en: The plan was made with the individual, GP and Pharmacist to slowly reduce muscle relaxants in line with exercise programme.
