translation.cy: Mae'n rhaid i unrhyw asesiad ganolbwyntio ar y canlyniadau y mae unigolyn yn dymuno eu cyflawni yn ei fywyd bob dydd ac i ba raddau y gallai darparu gofal a chymorth, gwasanaethau ataliol neu wybodaeth, cyngor a chymorth gyfrannu at gyflawni ei ganlyniadau.
translation.en: Any assessment must focus on the outcomes an individual wishes to achieve in their daily life and the extent to which the provision of care and support, preventative services or the provision of information, advice and assistance could contribute to the achievement of their outcomes.

translation.cy: Gall ffynonellau megis presgripsiynau llyfrau, ‘campfeydd gwyrdd’ neu gymorth llesiant chwarae rhan bwysig o ran diwallu anghenion iechyd a llesiant unigolyn.
translation.en: Sources such as Book Prescriptions, Green Gyms or welfare support can play an important part in meeting an individual’s health and wellbeing needs.

translation.cy: Mae cynlluniau o'r fath yn aml yn cael eu darparu gan y trydydd sector ac nid yw gweithwyr proffesiynol bob amser yn ymwybodol ohonynt na'r buddion posibl sy'n gysylltiedig â nhw.
translation.en: Such schemes are often provided by the third sector and professionals are not always aware of them or of their potential benefits.

translation.cy: Mae darparu'r sgiliau a'r dulliau sydd eu hangen ar bobl i wella eu hiechyd yn caniatáu i weithwyr proffesiynol gofal iechyd archwilio dulliau gwahanol mewn perthynas â thriniaeth ac adferiad, gan ategu'r cymorth clinigol sydd ar gael o fewn gofal sylfaenol ac eilaidd.
translation.en: Providing people with the skills and tools they need to improve their health allows healthcare professionals the ability to explore different approaches to treatment and recovery, complementing the clinical support that is available in both primary and secondary care.

translation.cy: Yn ei graidd, mae presgripsiynu cymdeithasol yn ymwneud ag atal.
translation.en: At its core, social prescribing is about prevention.

translation.cy: Er mwyn cael rhagor o wybodaeth, mae Conffederasiwn GIG Cymru wedi darparu gwybodaeth am bresgripsiynu cymdeithasol, ynghyd â diffiniad ohono ac esboniad o ran sut mae'n cysylltu â GIG Cymru.16
translation.en: For further the Welsh NHS Confederation has provided informationand a definition of social prescribing and its link to the NHS in Wales.16

translation.cy: Mae gofal integredig fel dull wedi cael ei gefnogi gan nifer o sefydliadau arbenigol.
translation.en: Integrated Care as an approach has been supported by numerous expert organisations.

translation.en: They will continue to apply, in England only.

translation.en: Under the Access to Information (Post-Commencement Adoptions) (Wales) Regulations 2005, the IRM can also consider adoption disclosure applications where an adoption agency is proposing that protected information from adoption records will be disclosed or withheld, contrary to the views expressed by the person the information is about.

translation.cy: yn benderfyniad i beidio â bwrw ymlaen â chais i ddatgelu gwybodaeth sydd wedi'i diogelu, am ba reswm bynnag
translation.en: a decision not to proceed with an application for disclosure of protected information, for whatever reason

translation.cy: Polisi Llywodraeth Cymru yw annog pobl o amrywiol gefndiroedd i ystyried mabwysiadu, a hefyd annog mwy o ddarpar fabwysiadwyr sy'n gallu siarad Cymraeg.
translation.en: Welsh Government policy is to encourage people from a variety of backgrounds to consider adoption, and also to encourage more Welsh-speaking prospective adopters.

translation.cy: Drwy ddarparu mecanwaith adolygu annibynnol pan fydd telerau cymeradwyo darpar fabwysiadwr yn newid neu'n dod i ben (neu os bydd cais yr unigolyn yn cael ei wrthod), mae’r mecanwaith adolygu annibynnol yn helpu i sicrhau bod pawb yn cael eu hystyried a’u hadolygu’n briodol cyn iddynt gael eu heithrio.
translation.en: By providing an independent review mechanism when a prospective adopter’s terms of approval are changed or terminated (or the individual’s application is turned down), the IRM helps ensure that nobody is excluded without due consideration and review.

translation.cy: Disgwylir i asiantaethau mabwysiadu gyfrannu tuag at gyfran o’r costau adolygu - sydd ar hyn o bryd yn £3,403 fesul adolygiad.
translation.en: Adoption agencies are expected to contribute to a proportion of the review costs – currently £3,403 per review.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r mecanwaith adolygu annibynnol yn rhwystro pobl rhag defnyddio gweithdrefnau cwyno'r asiantaeth fabwysiadu, ac mae adborth gan baneli'r mecanwaith adolygu annibynnol yn awgrymu mai'r hyn y mae'r ymgeiswyr yn ei werthfawrogi fwyaf yw teimlo bod rhywun yn gwrando arnyn nhw a'u pryderon.
translation.en: The IRM does not preclude people from using an adoption agency’s complaints procedures, and feedback from IRM panels suggests that their main value is that applicants feel listened to and that their concerns are heard.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru am glywed eich barn ar ddyfodol adolygiadau annibynnol o ddyfarniadau a’r mecanwaith adolygu annibynnol.
translation.en: The Welsh Government is seeking views on the future of independent reviews of determinations and the IRM.

translation.cy: Er y byddai hyn yn lleihau gwir gost pob adolygiad, byddai angen o hyd i sefydliad ystyried ceisiadau, cynnal y rhestr ganolog a gwneud gwaith gweinyddol arall.
translation.en: Although this would reduce the actual cost of each review, there would still be a need for an organisation to consider applications, maintain the central list and undertake other administration.

translation.cy: Mae'r grwpiau hyn wedi cael eu heithrio oherwydd bod fforymau trafod a grwpiau hunangymorth yn bodoli er mwyn rhoi llwyfan i bobl sydd wedi'u heffeithio gan fabwysiadu i rannu eu profiadau a chynghori a gwrando ar eu cyfoedion;
translation.en: These groups have been excepted as we consider that discussion forums and self-help groups exist to provide a platform for people affected by adoption to share their experiences and to advise and listen to their peers;

translation.cy: Felly, ein barn ni, yw nad yw'r hwyluswyr hynny'n darparu unrhyw wasanaethau cymorth mabwysiadu yn uniongyrchol.
translation.en: We feel that those facilitators are not therefore directly providing adoption support services.

translation.cy: Mae'r eithriadau arfaethedig hyn yn adlewyrchu'r rhai sydd mewn grym yn Lloegr o dan reoliad 4 o Reoliadau Asiantaethau Cymorth Mabwysiadu (Lloegr) ac Asiantaethau Mabwysiadu (Diwygiadau Amrywiol) 2005 (O.S. 2005/2720).
translation.en: These proposed exemptions mirror those in force in England under Regulation 4 of the Adoption Support Agencies (England) and Adoption Agencies (Miscellaneous Amendments) Regulations 2005 (SI 2005/2720).

translation.cy: Gallai hyn gael ei gyfrif yn rhywbeth sy’n gysylltiedig yn unig â’r gwasanaethau mabwysiadu a ddarperir yn Lloegr.
translation.en: This activity could be considered as merely incidental to adoption services provided in England.

translation.cy: Ar y ffurflen ymateb i’r ymgynghoriad, ar ddiwedd y ddogfen hon, rydym yn holi a yw'r eithriadau hyn yn briodol ac a oes angen ystyried unrhyw eithriadau pellach (a’r rhesymau dros hynny).
translation.en: A question is asked within the consultation response form, at the back of this document, as to whether these exemptions are appropriate and whether any further exemptions should be considered (and why).

translation.en: We can’t predict exactly how technology will evolve over the next decade, but we can equip our post-16 learners (most of whom will be members of our current or our future workforce) with the confidence and capability they will need to use digital tools in their work and their everyday lives.

translation.cy: Cyn y diwygiadau a wneir gan y Ddeddf, roedd yn ofynnol i landlordiaid cymdeithasol cofrestredig gael cydsyniad Gweinidogion Cymru i warediadau tir o dan adran 9 o Ddeddf 1996, adran 171D o Ddeddf Tai 1985, ac adrannau 81 a 133 o Ddeddf Tai 1988.
translation.en: Prior to amendments being made by the Act, RSLs were required to obtain the consent of the Welsh Ministers for disposals of land under section 9 of the 1996 Act, section 171D of the Housing Act 1985, and sections 81 and 133 of the Housing Act 1988.

translation.cy: 68) ac yn diddymu adran 81, ac yn diwygio adran 133 o Ddeddf Tai 1988 (p. 50)
translation.en: and repeals section 81, and amends section 133 of the Housing Act 1988 (c. 50)

translation.cy: Mae’n bosibl bod tenantiaid landlordiaid cymdeithasol cofrestredig a oedd yn denantiaid diogel awdurdod lleol, ac a ddaeth yn denantiaid sicr am i berchnogaeth eu cartrefi gael ei throsglwyddo i landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig, yn meddu ar yr hyn a elwir yn hawl i brynu a gadwyd.
translation.en: Tenants of RSLs who were previously secure tenants of a local authority and became assured tenants because ownership of their homes were transferred to an RSL may have what is known as the preserved right to buy.

translation.cy: Mae adran 14 yn diwygio adran 9 o Ddeddf 1996 mewn perthynas â gwaredu tir gan landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig er mwyn dileu’r gofyniad i gael cydsyniad Gweinidogion Cymru wrth waredu tir, ac yn lle hynny gosodir gofyniad i hysbysu Gweinidogion Cymru am unrhyw warediad o’r fath.
translation.en: Section 14 amends section 9 of the 1996 Act relating to disposal of land by an RSL to remove the requirement to obtain the consent of the Welsh Ministers on the disposal of land, and instead impose a requirement to notify the Welsh Ministers on any such disposal.

translation.en: If an RSL needs to remove a member from its board to comply with the 24% limit it has four months to do so from the date section 7C comes into force.

translation.cy: O dan adran 7F, os ceir darpariaeth yng nghyfansoddiad neu reolau landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig sy’n ei gwneud yn ofynnol cael dros 75% o’r pleidleisiau a fwriwyd i basio penderfyniad, bydd y ddarpariaeth honno’n cael effaith fel pe bai’n ei gwneud yn ofynnol cael 75% yn unig o’r pleidleisiau a fwriwyd i basio’r penderfyniad.
translation.en: Under section 7F, if there is provision in an RSL’s constitution or rules which requires more than 75% of the votes cast to pass a resolution, that provision will have effect as if it requires only 75% of the votes cast to pass the resolution.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn dileu hawliau pleidleisio awdurdodau lleol fel aelodau o landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig.
translation.en: This removes the voting rights of local authorities as members of an RSL.

translation.cy: Gweler hefyd adran 7I mewn cysylltiad â darpariaethau mewn cytundebau nad ydynt i gael unrhyw effaith.
translation.en: See also section 7I in respect of provisions in agreements which are to have no effect.

translation.cy: Caiff Gweinidogion Cymru ddarparu, drwy orchymyn, nad yw unrhyw un neu ragor o’r darpariaethau ym Mhennod 1A, neu nad yw yr un ohonynt, yn gymwys i landlordiaid cymdeithasol cofrestredig sy’n is-gyrff a reolir yn llwyr gan awdurdod lleol.
translation.en: The Welsh Minsters may, by order, provide that any or all of the provisions of Chapter 1A do not apply to RSLs which are wholly-controlled local authority subsidiaries.

translation.cy: Mae Deddf yr Undebau Llafur (Cymru) 2017 yn datgymhwyso adrannau 3, 13, 14 a 15 o Ddeddf 2016 fel y maent yn gymwys i wasanaethau cyhoeddus yng Nghymru.
translation.en: The Trade Union (Wales) Act 2017 disapplies sections 3, 13, 14 and 15 of the 2016 Act as they apply to public services in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae’r dull partneriaethau cymdeithasol yn golygu bod Llywodraeth Cymru ac awdurdodau datganoledig Cymreig, a gweision sifil a gweithwyr y cyrff hynny, yn gweithio ar y cyd i ddarparu gwasanaethau cyhoeddus.
translation.en: Social partnership involves the Welsh Government and devolved Welsh public authorities, and civil servants and employees of those bodies, working collaboratively to deliver public services.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn ystyried y bydd effaith Deddf yr Undebau Llafur 2016 yn un a fydd yn effeithio ar ei dull partneriaethau cymdeithasol, yn arwain at berthnasau mwy gwrthdrawiadol rhwng cyflogwyr a gweithwyr, ac yn tanseilio’r ffordd y bydd gwasanaethau cyhoeddus yn cael eu darparu yn y pen draw.
translation.en: The Welsh Government considers that the effect of the Trade Union Act 2016 will affect its social partnership approach lead to more confrontational relationships between employers and employees, and ultimately undermine public service delivery.

translation.cy: O dan y gyfraith gyffredin, ystyriwyd bod gweithiwr a oedd yn ymwneud â gweithredu diwydiannol yn euog o dorri ei gytundeb cyflogaeth.
translation.en: At common law a worker who engaged in industrial action was considered to be in breach of his or her employment contract.

translation.cy: Mae’r Ddeddf hon yn datgymhwyso’r darpariaethau hynny i’r graddau y maent yn ymwneud â gwasanaethau cyhoeddus a ddarperir gan awdurdodau cyhoeddus datganoledig Cymreig, neu’n ymwneud yn fwy cyffredinol â gweithrediadau awdurdodau o’r fath.
translation.en: This Act disapplies those provisions in so far as they relate to public services provided by devolved Welsh public authorities, or relate more generally to the operations of such authorities.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r ddarpariaeth hon yn effeithio ar y gyfraith bresennol o ran ymddygiad busnesau cyflogaeth a nodir yn Neddf Asiantaethau Cyflogi 1973 neu Reoliadau Ymddygiad Asiantaethau Cyflogi a Busnesau Cyflogaeth 2003 (O.S.
translation.en: This provision does not affect existing law on the conduct of employment businesses set out in the Employment Agencies Act 1973 or the Conduct of Employment Agencies and Employment Businesses Regulations 2003 (S.I.

translation.cy: Rhagair
translation.en: Foreword

translation.cy: Cysylltiad parhaus
translation.en: Continuous Engagement

translation.cy: Ni fydd unrhyw un o’r newidiadau hyn yn rhai cyflym na rhwydd.
translation.en: None of these changes will come quickly or easily.

translation.cy: Yn Ffyniant i Bawb, y strategaeth genedlaethol ar gyfer tymor 5 mlynedd y Cynulliad hwn, mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn gosod ymrwymiad “iechyd ym mhob polisi”, i wneud gwahaniaeth i ffactorau cymdeithasol ac economaidd ehangach sy’n dylanwadu ar iechyd fel tai, rhianta, addysg a chyflogadwyedd.
translation.en: The Welsh Government has set out in Prosperity for All, the national strategy for the 5-years of this National Assembly term, its commitment to “health in all policies”, to make a difference to wider social and economic influences such as housing, parenting, education and employability.

translation.cy: Nawr mae angen cyflymu’r newid, yn hytrach na mynd mewn cyfeiriad gwahanol.
translation.en: What we need now is to speed up change, not to go in a different direction.

translation.cy: Bydd gwasanaethau ysbytai yn cael eu llunio i leihau’r amser sy’n cael ei dreulio yn yr ysbyty, a chyflymu adferiad.
translation.en: Hospital services will be designed to reduce the time spent in hospital, and to speed up recovery.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn rhannu perchnogaeth dros ein system iechyd a gofal, ac fe fydd modd i ni gyfrannu at y ffordd mae’n datblygu, fel y gallwn ni i gyd fel unigolion a chymunedau helpu i’w gryfhau ar gyfer cenedlaethau’r dyfodol.
translation.en: We will all have a shared ownership of our health and care system, and we will be able to contribute to how it develops, so that as individuals and communities we can all help make it stronger for future generations.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn sicrhau bod gwasanaethau priodol ar gyfer anghenion unigol yn cael eu darparu ar lefel gofal sylfaenol a chymunedol.
translation.en: We will ensure that services appropriate to individual needs are provided at the primary and community care level.

translation.cy: Bydd y sgwrs yn newid i ddechrau drwy ofyn ‘beth sy’n bwysig i chi?’ ac yn arwain at drafodaeth ynghylch sut gall pobl eu hunain gyfrannu at well iechyd, gan adlewyrchu ein hathroniaeth Gofal Iechyd Darbodus.
translation.en: We will see a shift to conversations that start by asking ‘what matters to you?’ and lead into a discussion about how people can themselves contribute to better health, reflecting our philosophy of Prudent Healthcare.

translation.cy: Dros y degawd nesaf, byddwn yn gweld gwasanaethau yn symud o ysbytai i gymunedau, ac o gymunedau i gartrefi.
translation.en: Over the next decade, we will see a shift of services from hospitals to communities, and from communities to homes.

translation.cy: Ar gyfer nifer o bobl, bydd y cymorth angenrheidiol yn cael ei ddarparu gan wahanol bobl yn cydweithio’n agos â’i gilydd – gofalwyr proffesiynol a di-dâl, teulu a ffrindiau, gwirfoddolwyr cymunedol, cymdeithasau tai a chymdogion, yn ogystal â’u hunain.
translation.en: For many people the support they need will be delivered by different people working closely together – professional and unpaid carers, family and friends, community volunteers, housing organisations and neighbours, as well as themselves.

translation.cy: Yng Nghymru ceir gwahaniaethau mawr mewn disgwyliad oes, hyd yn oed i bobl sy’n byw mewn cymunedau o fewn rhai milltiroedd i’w gilydd.
translation.en: In Wales there are large differences in healthy life expectancy, even for people who live in communities within a few miles of each other.

translation.cy: Bydd ysbytai yn datblygu ffyrdd newydd o ragweld llif i mewn ac allan o ysbytai, fel bod modd cael adnoddau i gyfateb i’r anghenion, drwy gydol yr wythnos a thrwy gydol y flwyddyn.
translation.en: Hospitals will develop new tools to forecast flows in and out of hospitals, so that they can match resources to need, throughout the week and throughout the year.

translation.cy: Mae gwasanaethau mewn ysbytai yn ddwys o ran adnoddau, ac fe fyddai’n well gan y rhan fwyaf o bobl fod yn agosach at y cartref. Bydd hyn yn caniatáu modelau partneriaeth newydd rhwng gwahanol ddarparwyr ac unigolion, gan alluogi pobl i aros yn yr ysbyty am gyfnod mor fyr â phosib.
translation.en: Hospital-based services are resource intensive, and most people would prefer to be closer to home, which will allow new models of partnership between different providers, and individuals, enabling people to minimise their hospital stay.

translation.cy: Ni fydd modd i rai pobl gyrraedd at wasanaethau digidol, a bydd eraill yn dewis peidio.
translation.en: Some people will be unable to access digital services, others will choose not to.

translation.cy: Bydd y mathau o wasanaethau sy’n cael eu darparu yn ein hysbytai mawr yn parhau i newid, wrth i rai gwasanaethau gael eu symud i ganolfannau cymunedol ac wrth i eraill ddod yn fwy arbenigol.
translation.en: The types of services which are delivered in our major hospitals will continue to change, as some services are moved out into community centres, and others become more specialised.

translation.cy: Bydd systemau digidol newydd yn gwella ein gallu i adnabod dirywiad graddol mewn iechyd meddyliol a chorfforol, ac i weld arwyddion cynnar iawn o ddirywiad a salwch drwy ddata gwell, mwy cysylltiedig a dulliau newydd, gan gynnwys dysgu peiriannau a deallusrwydd artiffisial.
translation.en: New digital systems will improve our ability to spot gradual decline in mental and physical health, and to see very early signs of deterioration and illness through improved and better connected data and through new methods, including machine learning and artificial intelligence.

translation.cy: Bydd gan bobl fwy o rôl a rheolaeth dros eu hiechyd a’u llesiant eu hunain, gan wneud penderfyniadau am driniaethau a rheoli cyflyrau hirdymor.
translation.en: People will have a greater role and greater control in managing their own health and wellbeing, making decisions about treatment, and managing long term conditions.

translation.cy: Mae’r syniad o bedwar nod cysylltiedig – a ddisgrifir gyda’i gilydd fel Nod Pedwarplyg – yn ysgogi datblygiad nifer o systemau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol sy’n perfformio’n dda ar draws y byd.
translation.en: The idea of four interlocking aims – described together as the Quadruple Aim – is driving the development of many high performing international health and social care systems.

translation.cy: Yn unol ag argymhellion yr Adolygiad Seneddol, byddwn yn defnyddio’r Nod Pedwarplyg fel syniad canolog i ddatblygu dealltwriaeth gyffredin o’r ffordd rydym am weld ein system yn datblygu a sut y byddwn yn blaenoriaethu newid.
translation.en: As the Parliamentary Review recommended we will use the Quadruple Aim as a central idea to help develop a shared understanding of how we want our system to develop and how we will prioritise change.

translation.cy: Bydd ein hathroniaeth Gofal Iechyd Darbodus yn parhau i fod yn nodwedd amlwg o’r system yng Nghymru, gan arwain at well ansawdd a gwerth drwy leihau amrywiad, gwastraff a niwed, a thrwy ymyraethau clinigol llai dwys.
translation.en: Our philosophy of Prudent Healthcare will continue to be a distinctive feature of the Welsh system, enabling higher quality and value through reducing variation, waste and harm, and through less intensive clinical interventions.

translation.cy: Atal ac ymyrryd yn fuan – gweithredu i alluogi ac annog iechyd a llesiant da gydol oes;
translation.en: Prevention and early intervention – acting to enable and encourage good health and wellbeing throughout life;

translation.cy: meddygaeth fanwl;
translation.en: precision medicine;

translation.cy: Ar draws Cymru, rydym wedi gweld nifer o fodelau a dulliau gweithredu newydd yn dod i’r amlwg yn ddiweddar, gyda chefnogaeth y Gronfa Gofal Sylfaenol a’r Gronfa Gofal Integredig er enghraifft.
translation.en: Across Wales we have seen a number of new models and approaches emerging in recent years, supported for example by the Primary Care Fund and the Integrated Care Fund.

translation.cy: Disgwyliwn weld amrywiol fodelau newydd yn rhoi sylw i anghenion gwahanol grwpiau ac yn ymateb i ddewisiadau a chyfleoedd lleol.
translation.en: We expect to see a range of new models, addressing the needs of different groups, and responding to local preferences and opportunities.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r sgyrsiau hyn gynnwys y rhai sy’n rhan o’r gwaith o ddarparu gofal mewn ysbytai fel bod modd ystyried llwybrau’r cleifion yn llawn o’r cychwyn cyntaf, lle bynnag mae’r gwasanaethau’n cael eu darparu.
translation.en: These conversations must include those involved in delivering care in hospitals so that full patient pathways are considered from the outset, irrespective of the delivery setting.

translation.cy: I gyflawni’r cynllun hwn, byddwn yn sefydlu Rhaglen Drawsnewid, dan arweiniad y Cyfarwyddwr Cyffredinol, Iechyd a Gofal Cymdeithasol gyda rheolaeth leol drwy’r Byrddau Partneriaeth Rhanbarthol, gyda chefnogaeth Bwrdd Trawsnewid Cenedlaethol o gynrychiolwyr uwch arweinwyr iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol a phartneriaid a rhanddeiliaid pwysig eraill.
translation.en: To deliver this plan, we will establish a Transformation Programme, led by the Director General, Health & Social Services, with local governance through the RPBs supported by a representative National Transformation Board of senior health and social care leaders and other key partners and stakeholders.

translation.cy: Roedd methodoleg a Rhaglen Drawsnewid genedlaethol yn argymhelliad amlwg yn yr Adolygiad Seneddol, a nododd hefyd bod nifer o fyrddau rhaglenni, rhwydweithiau, systemau cyflawni, cronfeydd a mentrau eraill eisoes yn bodoli i gefnogi newid strategol.
translation.en: A national Transformation Programme and methodology was a prominent recommendation made in the Parliamentary Review, which also noted that there are numerous existing programme boards, networks, delivery mechanisms, funds and other initiatives which support strategic change.

translation.cy: gofal henoed bregus;
translation.en: frail elderly care;

translation.cy: Mae gan bob Bwrdd Iechyd yng Nghymru drefniadau partneriaeth gyda Phrifysgolion, fel Byrddau Iechyd Prifysgol neu Fwrdd Iechyd Addysgu.
translation.en: All Health Boards in Wales have partnership arrangements with Universities, as University Health Boards or as a Teaching Health Board.

translation.cy: Dylai pawb sy’n gweithio yn y gwasanaethau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol gael cyfle i ddefnyddio eu gwybodaeth a’u profiadau i sicrhau gwell ffyrdd o weithio, gan gynnwys cyfleoedd i staff gyfuno ymchwil â swyddogaethau clinigol.
translation.en: Everyone working in our health and social care services should have the opportunity to apply their knowledge and experience to better ways of working, including through opportunities for staff to combine research with clinical roles.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn uno pob gweithgaredd ymchwil, arloesi a gwella o fewn ardal ddaearyddol pob Bwrdd Partneriaeth Rhanbarthol, gan ganolbwyntio ar gefnogi arloesi a phartneriaethau lleol sy’n arwain at fodelau gofal newydd.
translation.en: We will bring together all research, innovation and improvement activity within each regional partnership board footprint, focussed on supporting local innovation and partnerships which drive towards new models of care.

translation.cy: Cymerwyd camau gan Lywodraeth Cymru yn 2011 i leihau’r baich ariannol ar unigolion sy’n gysylltiedig â threfniadau codi tâl presennol, drwy gyflwyno uchafswm y gellid ei godi am ofal amhreswyl ac ymrwymiad i gynyddu swm y cyfalaf y gall unigolion ei gadw heb orfod talu am ofal preswyl.
translation.en: The Welsh Government has taken action to reduce the financial burden on individuals associated with current charging arrangements with the introduction in 2011 of a maximum charge for non-residential care and the commitment to increase the amount of capital individuals can retain without having to pay for their residential care.

translation.cy: Hefyd mae angen i ni gael gwell dealltwriaeth o lefelau’r adnodd rydym yn ei fuddsoddi ar hyn o bryd i atal salwch a datblygiad afiechyd.
translation.en: We also need to increase our understanding of the levels of resource we are currently investing in preventing ill-health and the progression of disease.

translation.cy: Drwy’r cynllun hwn byddwn yn dechrau ar y gwaith hwnnw ar fyrder, gan gomisiynu dadansoddiad newydd o wariant presennol ar iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol, a gweld sut gall mabwysiadu modelau newydd o ofal effeithio ar gostau yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: Through this plan we will make an urgent start on that work, by commissioning a new analysis of current spending in health and social care, and how adoption of new models of care can impact on the future costs.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn rhan bwysig o’n dull o ddarparu cysylltiad agored, sy’n caniatáu i bobl gyfrannu eu gwybodaeth a’u dewisiadau drwy gydol cyfnod y cynllun hwn.
translation.en: This will be an important part of our approach to providing an open engagement, which allows people to contribute their knowledge and preferences throughout the life of this plan.

translation.cy: Yn drydydd, rydym am drafod ar sail mwy holistaidd, er mwyn sicrhau cysylltiad cliriach rhwng ein sgyrsiau ynghylch newidiadau i wasanaethau a’r ffordd y byddant yn cael eu darparu a’u cyllido.
translation.en: Thirdly, we want to engage on a more holistic basis, so that conversations about changes to services are more clearly linked to how they will be delivered and to how they will be funded and paid for.

translation.cy: ein gweledigaeth at y dyfodol o drefn system gyfan gyda mwy o bwyslais ar lesiant ac atal salwch;
translation.en: our Future Vision of a whole system approach with a greater emphasis on wellbeing and preventing illness;

translation.cy: a’r Modelau Cyllido ar gyfer y Dyfodol a fydd yn edrych i weld sut byddwn yn talu am wasanaethau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol yn y tymor hir, gan eu gwneud yn gynaliadwy ar gyfer cenedlaethau’r dyfodol.
translation.en: and Future Funding Models which explore how we will pay for health and social care services over the longer term, making them sustainable for future generations.

translation.cy: Mae’r modelau newydd gorau sy’n cael eu datblygu yng Nghymru yn rhannu nodwedd gyffredin:
translation.en: The best new models being developed in Wales share a common characteristic:

translation.cy: Mae Cymru’n wlad o gymunedau amrywiol sy’n ysbrydoli.
translation.en: Wales is a country of diverse and inspiring communities.

translation.cy: Blaenoriaeth bwysig fydd gweithio gyda sefydliadau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol a phartneriaid eraill i symleiddio a chysoni’r dirwedd cynllunio.
translation.en: A key priority will be to work with health and social care organisations and other partners to simplify and streamline the planning landscape.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn cynnwys ystyried sut y dylid darparu gwasanaethau arbenigol a gwasanaethau mewn ysbytai, a’r sgiliau a’r technolegau angenrheidiol i’w hategu, fel rhan o’r cynnig iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol ehangach.
translation.en: This will include consideration of how specialist services and hospital-based services should be provided, and the skills and technologies needed to support them, as part of the broader health and social care offer.

translation.cy: Bydd cynllun cenedlaethol yn cael ei ddatblygu ar gyfer y GIG, gan ddod â Chynlluniau Tymor Canolig Integredig holl Fyrddau ac Ymddiriedolaethau Iechyd y GIG ynghyd i gynhyrchu darlun cenedlaethol.
translation.en: A national plan for the NHS will be developed, bringing together all NHS Health Board and Trust IMTPs to produce a national picture.

translation.cy: Mae paragraff 2(3)(a) o Atodlen 1 i’r Ddeddf yn gwneud diwygiad arall i adran 1 o Ddeddf 2006 o ganlyniad i hyn i'w gwneud yn glir y bydd senedd (yn hytrach na Chynulliad) i Gymru.
translation.en: Paragraph 2 (3)(a) of Schedule 1 to the Act makes a further amendment to section 1 of the 2006 Act in consequence of this to make it clear that there is to be a parliament (rather than an Assembly) for Wales.

translation.cy: Adran 5 – Ailenwi Clerc y Cynulliad yn Glerc y Senedd
translation.en: Section 5 – Clerk of the Assembly renamed Clerk of the Senedd

translation.cy: Mae adran 7 yn disodli'r cyfeiriad at “Comisiynydd Safonau Cynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru” yn adran 1(1) o Fesur 2009 (mccc 4) (“Mesur 2009”) gyda “Comisiynydd Safonau y Senedd”.
translation.en: Section 7 replaces the reference to the “National Assembly for Wales Commissioner for Standards” in section 1 (1) of the 2009 Measure with “Senedd Commissioner for Standards”.

translation.cy: Mae adran 13(1) yn addasu’r gofyniad i swyddogion cofrestru wneud ymholiadau o dŷ i dŷ at ddibenion cynnal cofrestr etholwyr llywodraeth leol fel nad yw’n gymwys i unrhyw berson o dan 16 oed.
translation.en: Section 13(1) modifies the requirement for registration officers to make house to house inquiries for the purposes of maintaining the register of local government electors so that it does not apply to any person under the age of 16.

translation.cy: Mae’r ddarpariaeth yn caniatáu i’r swyddog cofrestru, at ddibenion etholiad i fod yn Aelod o’r Senedd, gynnwys y bobl a fydd yn 16 oed erbyn etholiad nesaf y Senedd ar y gofrestr etholwyr llywodraeth leol.
translation.en: The provision allows the registration officer, for the purposes of an election for membership of the Senedd, to include on the register of local government electors those people who will be aged 16 by the time of the next Senedd election.

translation.cy: Mewn achosion o’r fath, nid oes gofyniad i’r swyddog fod wedi rhoi gwybod i’r person y gellid gosod cosb sifil os na fydd y person yn gwneud cais i gofrestru.
translation.en: In such cases, there is no requirement on the officer to have informed the person that a civil penalty may be imposed if the person fails to apply for registration.

translation.cy: Mae adran 15 yn rhoi’r pŵer i Weinidogion Cymru wneud rheoliadau ynghylch gwahoddiadau i wneud cais i gofrestru yn etholwr llywodraeth leol yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Section 15 provides the Welsh Ministers with the power to make regulations about invitations to apply to be registered as a local government elector in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae adran 16(6) yn darparu nad yw rheoliad 29ZA yn gymwys mewn achosion pan wneir cais i gofrestru gan berson o dan 16 oed.
translation.en: Section 16(6) provides that regulation 29ZA does not apply in cases where an application for registration is made by a person under the age of 16.

translation.cy: Adran 17 – Adolygu’r hawl i gofrestru
translation.en: Section 17 - Review of entitlement to registration

translation.cy: Mae adran 18 yn ychwanegu at restr, yn rheoliad 31J, y personau a gaiff ardystio cais i gofrestru’n ddienw a wneir gan berson o dan 16 oed mewn perthynas â chofrestru etholwyr llywodraeth leol yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Section 18 adds to the list, in regulation 31J, of persons who may attest an application for anonymous registration made by a person under the age of 16 in relation to the registration of local government electors in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn egluro na fydd datganiadau o gysylltiad lleol eraill a wneir gan ddinesydd tramor cymhwysol neu bersonau o dan 17 oed nad oes ganddynt hawl i gael eu cofrestru yn y gofrestr etholiadau seneddol yn cael effaith yn etholiadau seneddol y DU.
translation.en: It also clarifies that any other declarations of local connection made by a qualifying foreign citizen or persons under the age of 17 who are not entitled to be registered in the register of parliamentary elections will not have effect at UK parliamentary elections.

translation.cy: Mae’r diwygiad yn darparu, o ran cofrestru etholwyr llywodraeth leol yng Nghymru, nad oes angen ardystio datganiad o wasanaeth a wneir gan berson o dan 18 oed fel y nodir yn adran 14(1A).
translation.en: The amendment provides that in relation to the registration of local government electors in Wales, a service declaration made by a person under the age of 18 as set out in section 14(1A) does not need to be attested.

translation.cy: Mae’r rheoliad yn gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch y wybodaeth sydd ei hangen mewn datganiad o wasanaeth lle y mae person yn hawlio cymhwyster gwasanaeth o dan adran 14(1A).
translation.en: The regulation makes provision about the information required in a service declaration where a person is claiming a service qualification under section 14(1A).

translation.cy: Mae adran 22(3)(b) yn mewnosod diffiniad o swyddog perthnasol yn rheoliad 26B ac yn eithrio rhiant, gwarcheidwad, priod neu bartner sifil yr ymgeisydd o’r diffiniad hwnnw.
translation.en: Section 22(3)(b) inserts a definition of “relevant official” into regulation 26B and excludes from that definition the applicant‟s parent, guardian, spouse or civil partner.

translation.cy: Mae'r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Senedd ac Etholiadau (Cymru) 2020 (dccc 1) a gafodd y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar 15 Ionawr 2020
translation.en: These notes refer to the Senedd and Elections (Wales) Act 2020 (anaw 1) which received Royal Assent on 15 January 2020

translation.cy: Rhaid darparu cynllun:
translation.en: A plan must be provided when:

translation.cy: RHAN 4
translation.en: PART 4

translation.cy: Mae'r darpariaethau yn Rhan 4 yn adlewyrchu rhai o'r argymhellion a wnaed gan Bwyllgor Materion Cyfansoddiadol a Deddfwriaethol y Cynulliad Cenedlaethol yn ei adroddiad ar anghymhwyso ym mis Gorffennaf 2014 – Ymchwiliad i anghymhwyso person rhag bod yn Aelod o Gynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru.
translation.en: The provisions in Part 4 reflect some of the recommendations made by the Constitutional and Legislative Affairs Committee of the National Assembly in its report on disqualification in July 2014 - Inquiry into the Disqualification from Membership of the National Assembly for Wales.

translation.cy: Mae paragraffau (c) a (d) yn anghymhwyso Archwilydd Cyffredinol Cymru ac Ombwdsmon Gwasanaethau Cyhoeddus Cymru rhag bod yn Aelodau o’r Cynulliad.
translation.en: Paragraphs (c) and (d) disqualified the Auditor General for Wales and the Public Services Ombudsman for Wales from membership of the Assembly.

translation.cy: Mae Atodlen 1A yn darparu ar gyfer anghymhwyso personau sy'n dal swydd Arglwydd Raglaw, Rhaglaw neu Uchel-Siryf ar gyfer unrhyw ardal yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Schedule 1A provides for the disqualification of persons holding the office of lord-lieutenant, lieutenant or high sheriff for any area in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae adran 30 yn diwygio adran 17 o Ddeddf 2006.
translation.en: Section 30 amends section 17 of the 2006 Act.

translation.cy: Mae adran 17B o Ddeddf 2006 yn darparu eithriad rhag anghymhwyso Aelod Cynulliad a ddychwelir fel Aelod Seneddol o fewn 372 o ddyddiau ar ôl etholiad cyffredinol nesaf Aelodau’r Cynulliad.
translation.en: Section 17B of the 2006 Act provides an exception from disqualification for an Assembly Member returned as a Member of Parliament within 372 days of the expected day of the next general election of Assembly Members.

translation.cy: Mae adran 17(C)(3) newydd o Ddeddf 2006 yn darparu nad yw person wedi'i anghymhwyso rhag bod yn Aelod o'r Senedd os oes ganddo naill ai ganiatâd i fod yn absennol o Dŷ'r Arglwyddi, neu os yw wedi gwneud cais am ganiatâd nad yw wedi’i dynnu'n ôl na’i wrthod.
translation.en: New section 17(C)(3) of the 2006 Act provides that a person is not disqualified from being a Member of the Senedd if they either have leave of absence from the House of Lords, or have made an application for leave which has not been withdrawn or refused.

translation.cy: Mae dyddiad disgwyliedig yr etholiad cyffredin nesaf i'w bennu drwy gyfeirio at yr amgylchiadau ar ddechrau'r diwrnod dychwelyd.
translation.en: The expected date of the next ordinary election is to be determined by reference to the circumstances as at the beginning of the return day.

translation.cy: Pan fo adran 5(2) neu (3) (etholiad cyffredinol eithriadol) o Ddeddf 2006 yn gymwys, yn ystod y cyfnod perthnasol, mae adran 17F(4) yn gwneud darpariaeth amrywiol o ran beth y bydd y “dyddiad disgwyliedig”.
translation.en: Where, at the relevant time, section 5(2) or (3) (extraordinary general election) of the 2006 Act applies, section 17F(4) makes various provision as to what the “expected date” will be.

translation.cy: Mae adran 5 yn darparu dull i gynnal etholiad cyffredinol eithriadol cyn yr etholiad cyffredinol arferol nesaf a drefnir mewn amgylchiadau penodol.
translation.en: Section 5 provides a mechanism for an extraordinary general election to take place before the next scheduled ordinary general election in certain circumstances.

translation.cy: RHAN 5
translation.en: PART 5

translation.cy: - caniatáu i ddinasyddion tramor cymhwysol fod yn Aelodau o'r Senedd, - anghymhwyso aelodau o gynghorau sir a chynghorau bwrdeistref sirol yng Nghymru rhag bod yn Aelodau o'r Senedd.
translation.en: - allow qualifying foreign citizens to be Members of the Senedd, and - disqualify members of county and county borough councils in Wales from being Members of the Senedd.

translation.cy: Rhaid llunio a chyhoeddi'r adroddiad o fewn chwe mis i ddiwedd y cyfnod adrodd.
translation.en: The report must be prepared and published within six months of the end of the reporting period.

translation.cy: RHAN 6
translation.en: PART 6

translation.cy: Mae'r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Senedd ac Etholiadau (Cymru) 2020 (dccc 1) a gafodd y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar 15 Ionawr 2020
translation.en: These notes refer to the Senedd and Elections (Wales) Act 2020 (anaw 1) which received Royal Assent on 15 January 2020

translation.cy: Rydym yn parhau i ymateb i bandemig byd-eang na welwyd ei debyg o’r blaen, un sydd wedi hawlio bywydau miliynau o bobl ledled y byd ac wedi effeithio ar bob agwedd ar fywyd pob dydd.
translation.en: We are continuing to respond to an once-in-a-lifetime global pandemic, which has claimed the lives of millions of people worldwide and affected every aspect of our daily lives.

translation.cy: Yr argyfwng hinsawdd a’r argyfwng natur yw’r bygythiadau mwyaf sy’n wynebu ein byd.
translation.en: The climate and nature emergency are the greatest threats facing our world.

translation.cy: Byddwn hefyd yn dechrau’r broses o ddiwygio cymorth ffermio i helpu ffermydd teuluol a busnesau amaethyddol i fod yn wyrddach ac yn fwy cynaliadwy.
translation.en: We will also start the process of reforming farm support to help family farms and agricultural businesses become greener and more sustainable.

translation.cy: Cwmni ynni sero net –  Gweithio tuag at greu Ynni Cymru, cwmni ynni o dan berchnogaeth gyhoeddus, dros y ddwy flynedd nesaf, i ehangu’r gwaith o gynhyrchu ynni adnewyddadwy sy’n eiddo i’r gymuned.
translation.en: Net zero energy company – Work towards the creation of Ynni Cymru, a publicly-owned energy company for Wales, over the next two years, to expand community-owned renewable energy generation.

translation.cy: Bydd adroddiad interim ac adroddiad terfynol y Comisiwn yn cael eu cyflwyno ar y cyd i’r ddwy blaid.
translation.en: The commission’s interim and final reports will be presented jointly to both parties.

translation.cy: Byddai’r corff hwn yn cefnogi’r defnydd o’r Gymraeg, yn enwedig yn y maes digidol ac yn annog lluosogrwydd yn y cyfryngau.
translation.en: This body would support the use of the Welsh language, particularly in digital and encourage media plurality.

translation.cy: Rydym ni o’r farn y dylai pwerau darlledu a chyfathrebu gael eu datganoli i Gymru.
translation.en: We believe broadcasting and communication powers should be devolved to Wales.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn cydddatblygu strategaeth arloesi genedlaethol newydd sy’n seiliedig ar genhadaeth i’w gweithredu ar draws y llywodraeth a chan y Comisiwn Addysg Drydyddol ac Ymchwil, sy’n chwarae rôl flaenllaw yn hybu arloesedd yng Nghymru.
translation.en: We will jointly develop a new mission-based national innovation strategy to be implemented across government and by the Commission for Tertiary Education and Research, which has a leading role in promoting innovation in Wales.

translation.cy: Strategaeth ddiwylliant – Datblygu strategaeth ddiwylliant newydd, sy’n adlewyrchu amrywiaeth Cymru, iaith Gymraeg ffyniannus, ein sectorau diwylliant, treftadaeth a’r celfyddydau a’n dyletswyddau o dan Ddeddf Llesiant Cenedlaethau’r Dyfodol.
translation.en: Culture strategy – Develop a new culture strategy, reflecting Wales’ diversity, a thriving Welsh language, our arts, culture and heritage sectors and our duties under the Wellbeing of Future Generations Act.

translation.cy: Mae’r Rhaglen Lywodraethu (Mehefin 2021) yn nodi’r deg amcan llesiant y bydd y llywodraeth yn eu defnyddio i wneud y cyfraniad mwyaf posibl at saith nod llesiant hirdymor Cymru a’r camau y byddwn yn eu cymryd i’w cyflawni.
translation.en: The Programme for Government (June 2021) sets out the 10 well-being objectives that the government will use to maximise its contribution to Wales’ 7 long-term well-being goals and the steps we will take to deliver them.

translation.cy: Mae’n bwysig nodi bod yr amcanion llesiant yn parhau â’r daith tuag at gyflawni’r saith nod llesiant.
translation.en: Importantly, the well-being objectives continue the journey towards achieving the 7 well-being goals.

translation.cy: Wrth osod ein hamcanion llesiant, rydym wedi ystyried Adroddiad Cenedlaethau’r Dyfodol, yr adroddiad cyntaf o’i fath, a gyhoeddwyd gan Gomisiynydd Cenedlaethau’r Dyfodol ym mis Mai 2020.
translation.en: In setting our well-being objectives we have taken account of the first Future Generations Report, which was published by the Future Generations Commissioner in May 2020.

translation.cy: Hirdymor
translation.en: Long term

translation.cy: Cydweithio
translation.en: Collaboration

translation.cy: Bydd yn ofynnol inni gydweithio’n agos â’n partneriaid cyflawni ac eraill er mwyn inni wneud y cyfraniad mwyaf posibl tuag at yr amcanion llesiant. Mae’r egwyddor hon wedi’i hymgorffori’n gadarn yn yr amcanion llesiant.
translation.en: Maximising our contribution towards the well-being goals will require us to work closely with delivery partners and others, and this principle is firmly embedded in the well-being objectives.

translation.cy: Mae ymgorffori’r amcanion llesiant yn ein Rhaglen Lywodraethu yn sicrhau y byddant wrth wraidd y Llywodraeth o’r dechrau a thrwy gydol tymor y Senedd hon.
translation.en: Embedding the well-being objectives in our Programme for Government ensures that they will sit at the heart of government from the outset and throughout this Senedd term.

translation.cy: Mae’r Ysgrifennydd Parhaol yn gyfrifol am y camau parhaus i wreiddio’r egwyddor datblygu cynaliadwy yng ngwasanaeth sifil Llywodraeth Cymru.
translation.en: The Permanent Secretary is responsible for the ongoing action to embed the sustainable development principle in the Welsh Government civil service.

translation.cy: Nod y Ddeddf yw gwneud datblygu cynaliadwy yn brif egwyddor drefniadol ar gyfer y llywodraeth a chyrff cyhoeddus. Byddwn yn sicrhau bod ein dull gweithredu a llywodraethu a’n mecanweithiau yn parhau i wella i ymateb i’r gofynion hyn.
translation.en: The Act is designed to make sustainable development the central organising principle of government and public bodies, and we will ensure that the operation, governance and mechanics of government continues to improve to respond to these requirements.

translation.cy: Mae’n gosod cydweithio o flaen cystadleuaeth, gan ddangos sut y byddwn yn gweithredu i sicrhau tegwch i bawb a dileu anghydraddoldeb ym mhob rhan o gymdeithas.
translation.en: It puts collaboration ahead of competition, showing how we will act to maximise fairness for all and eliminate inequality at every level of society.

translation.cy: Rydym am greu GIG addas i’r unfed ganrif ar hugain drwy fuddsoddi yn yr adferiad ôl-Covid, mynd i’r afael ag anghydraddoldebau iechyd, gwella’r ddarpariaeth iechyd meddwl a chanolbwyntio ar atal.
translation.en: We want to create a 21st century NHS by investing in the post-Covid recovery, tackling health inequalities, improving mental health provision and focussing on prevention.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn:
translation.en: We will:

translation.cy: Blaenoriaethu ailgynllunio gwasanaethau i wella dulliau ataliol, mynd i’r afael â stigma a hyrwyddo dull dim drws anghywir o ddarparu cymorth iechyd meddwl.
translation.en: Prioritise service redesign to improve prevention, tackle stigma and promote a nowrong door approach to mental health support.

translation.cy: Bydd y system hon yn diwallu anghenion ein dinasyddion mwyaf agored i niwed, ac yn cefnogi’r plant, y bobl ifanc a’r teuluoedd hynny sy’n wynebu’r heriau mwyaf.
translation.en: This system will meet the needs of our most vulnerable citizens, and will support those children, young people and families who face the greatest challenges.

translation.cy: Dileu elw preifat o ofal plant sy’n derbyn gofal yn ystod tymor nesaf y Senedd.
translation.en: Eliminate private profit from the care of looked after children during the next Senedd term.

translation.cy: Ariannu gwasanaethau preswyl rhanbarthol i blant ag anghenion cymhleth, gan sicrhau bod eu hanghenion yn cael eu diwallu mor agos at eu cartrefi â phosibl ac yng Nghymru lle bynnag y bo hynny’n ymarferol.
translation.en: Fund regional residential services for children with complex needs ensuring their needs are met as close to home as possible and in Wales wherever practicable.

translation.cy: Adeiladu economi ar sail egwyddorion gwaith teg, cynaliadwyedd a diwydiannau a gwasanaethau’r dyfodol
translation.en: Build an economy based on the principles of fair work, sustainability and the industries and services of the future

translation.cy: Byddwn yn gweithio mewn partneriaeth i adeiladu economi sy’n seiliedig ar swyddi cynaliadwy a fydd yn mynd â ni ymlaen i’r ganrif nesaf.
translation.en: We will work in partnership to build an economy based on sustainable jobs that will take us forward into the next century.

translation.cy: Cryfhau ein Contract Economaidd.
translation.en: Strengthen our Economic Contract.

translation.cy: Galluogi canol ein trefi i ddod yn fwy ystwyth yn economaidd drwy helpu busnesau i weithio’n gydweithredol, cynyddu eu cynnig digidol a chefnogi cadwyni cyflenwi lleol, gan gynnwys gwasanaethau cyflenwi lleol.
translation.en: Enable our town centres to become more agile economically by helping businesses to work co-operatively, increase their digital offer and support local supply chains, including local delivery services.

translation.cy: Creu sylfaen ddeddfwriaethol fodern ar gyfer trafnidiaeth yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Create a modern legislative basis for transport in Wales.

translation.cy: Deddfu i ddiddymu’r defnydd o blastigau untro sydd yn aml yn cael eu taflu fel sbwriel.
translation.en: Legislate to abolish the use of more commonly littered, single use plastics.

translation.cy: Datblygu Strategaeth Bwyd Cymunedol Cymru.
translation.en: Develop a Wales Community Food Strategy.

translation.cy: Ehangu trefniadau i greu neu wella mannau gwyrdd yn sylweddol.
translation.en: Expand arrangements to create or significantly enhance green spaces.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn sicrhau nad oes neb yng Nghymru yn cael ei adael ar ôl yn sgil pandemig y coronafeirws, gan atgyweirio’r difrod a wnaed dros y flwyddyn ddiwethaf.
translation.en: We will make sure nobody in Wales is left behind after the coronavirus pandemic, repairing the damage done over the last year.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn:
translation.en: We will:

translation.cy: Diwygio etholiadau llywodraeth leol i leihau’r diffyg democrataidd.
translation.en: Reform local government elections to reduce the democratic deficit.

translation.cy: Rhoi rhaglen cyfnewid dysgu rhyngwladol gwerth £65 miliwn ar waith.
translation.en: Put in place a £65 million international learning exchange programme.

translation.cy: Mae’n nodi’n glir ein nodau polisi radical ac uchelgeisiol, yn adlewyrchu ein dull partneriaeth ac yn hyrwyddo cyfiawnder economaidd, cymdeithasol ac amgylcheddol.
translation.en: It sets out clearly our radical and ambitious policy goals, reflects our partnership approach and promotes economic, social and environmental justice.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn defnyddio’r holl bwerau a ddatganolwyd inni yn Neddf Llywodraeth Cymru 2006 i ddarparu datrysiadau.
translation.en: We will use all the powers devolved to us in the Government of Wales Act 2006 to deliver solutions.

translation.cy: Drwy gydol tymor y Senedd hon, cyfrifoldeb y Cabinet cyfan fydd ein Rhaglen Lywodraethu, gan sicrhau bod problemau’n cael eu nodi’n gynnar a bod camau’n cael eu cymryd;
translation.en: Throughout this Senedd term our Programme for Government will be the responsibility of the whole Cabinet, ensuring that problems are identified early and action taken;

translation.cy: Parhau â’n rhaglen hirdymor o ddiwygio addysg, a sicrhau bod anghydraddoldebau addysgol yn lleihau a bod safonau’n codi.
translation.en: Continue our long-term programme of education reform, and ensure educational inequalities narrow and standards rise.

translation.cy: Gwneud ein dinasoedd, ein trefi a’n pentrefi yn lleoedd gwell fyth i fyw a gweithio ynddynt.
translation.en: Make our cities, towns and villages even better places in which to live and work.

translation.cy: Roedd maniffesto Llywodraeth Lafur Cymru yn cynnwys addewidion pellach i’r etholwyr a bydd y rhain hefyd yn cael eu gwireddu. Y Gweinidog ar gyfer y portffolio perthnasol fydd yn gyfrifol am y dasg o’u cyflawni, fel a ganlyn:
translation.en: The Welsh Labour Government’s manifesto contained further promises to the electorate and these will also be honoured, with the task of delivery falling directly to the lead portfolio minister, as follows:

translation.cy: Cadw presgripsiynau yn rhad ac am ddim yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Keep prescriptions free in Wales.

translation.cy: Parhau i ddarparu cyfarpar diogelu personol yn rhad ac am ddim i staff iechyd a gofal.
translation.en: Continue to provide free PPE for health and care staff.

translation.cy: Sefydlu Gweithrediaeth Genedlaethol y GIG.
translation.en: Establish a NHS National Executive.

translation.cy: Buddsoddi mewn cenhedlaeth newydd o ganolfannau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol integredig ledled Cymru.
translation.en: Invest in a new generation of integrated health and social care centres across Wales.

translation.cy: Cynnal y terfyn cyfalaf (ar gyfer gofal) ar £50,000.
translation.en: Maintain the capital limit (for care) at £50,000.

translation.cy: Datblygu mwy na 50 o hybiau cymunedol lleol i gydleoli gwasanaethau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol rheng flaen a gwasanaethau eraill.
translation.en: Develop more than 50 local community hubs to co-locate frontline health and social care and other services.

translation.cy: Gwella’r rhyngwyneb rhwng gofal iechyd parhaus a Thaliadau Uniongyrchol.
translation.en: Improve the interface between continuing health care and Direct Payments.

translation.cy: Cyflwyno bwndeli babanod i fwy o deuluoedd.
translation.en: Roll out baby bundles to more families.

translation.cy: Parhau i gefnogi a chynnal hawliau plant a phobl ifanc ar eu pennau eu hunain sy’n ceisio lloches.
translation.en: Continue to support and uphold the rights of unaccompanied asylum-seeking children and young people.

translation.cy: Cyflawni ein rhaglen Y Cymoedd Technoleg 10-mlynedd gwerth £100m.
translation.en: Deliver on our 10-year £100 million Tech-Valleys programme.

translation.cy: Mynnu bod Cymru yn cael ei chyfran deg o’r Gronfa Ffyniant Gyffredin a’r Gronfa Codi’r Gwastad, fel y’i gelwir, gan Whitehall.
translation.en: Insist that Wales gets its fair share of the Shared Prosperity Fund and the so-called Levelling Up Fund from Whitehall.

translation.cy: Pwyso ar Lywodraeth y DU am gyfran deg i Gymru o fuddsoddiad hanfodol mewn seilwaith rheilffyrdd ac Ymchwil a Datblygu.
translation.en: Press the UK government for a fair share of vital rail infrastructure and R&D investment for Wales.

translation.cy: Datblygu cynlluniau ar gyfer metro yng Ngogledd Cymru a Bae Abertawe.
translation.en: Progress plans for a metro in North Wales and Swansea Bay.

translation.cy: Gweithio i wneud y fflyd cerbydau bws a thacsi yn fflyd allyriadau sero erbyn 2028.
translation.en: Work to make the bus and taxi vehicle fleet zero-emission by 2028.

translation.cy: Moderneiddio grantiau trafnidiaeth.
translation.en: Modernise transport grants.

translation.cy: Ehangu cynhyrchu ynni adnewyddadwy gan gyrff cyhoeddus a grwpiau cymunedol yng Nghymru i lefel dros 100MW erbyn 2026.
translation.en: Expand renewable energy generation by public bodies and community groups in Wales by over 100MW by 2026.

translation.cy: Grymuso cymunedau i fod â mwy o ran mewn cynlluniau adfywio lleol.
translation.en: Empower communities to have a greater stake in local regeneration.

translation.cy: Lleihau biwrocratiaeth ddiangen i gefnogi arweinwyr ysgolion.
translation.en: Reduce unnecessary bureaucracy to support school leaders.

translation.cy: Ehangu ein darpariaeth Gymraeg yn y blynyddoedd cynnar.
translation.en: Expand our Welsh language early years provision.

translation.cy: Cadw’r cynnydd o 1% yn y Dreth Trafodiadau Tir a godir ar bryniannau ail gartrefi.
translation.en: Keep the 1% increase in Land Transaction Tax charged on second home purchases.

translation.cy: Ehangu ein rhaglen Mynediad i Swydd Etholedig.
translation.en: Expand our Access to Elected Office programme.

translation.cy: Gweithredu argymhellion Adlewyrchu Cymru wrth Redeg Cymru:
translation.en: Implement the recommendations of the Reflecting Wales in Running Wales:

translation.cy: Defnyddio’r holl bwerau sydd ar gael i wahardd pob agwedd ar therapi trosi LGBTQ+ sydd o fewn ein pŵer a cheisio datganoli unrhyw bwerau ychwanegol angenrheidiol.
translation.en: Use all available powers to ban all aspects of LGBTQ+ conversion therapy that are in our powers and seek the devolution of any necessary additional powers.

translation.cy: Cynnal ein cyllid i 500 o Swyddogion Cymorth Cymunedol yr Heddlu ac ehangu eu nifer o 100.
translation.en: Maintain our funding of 500 Police Community Support Officers and expand their number by 100.

translation.en: Those who believe in the benefits of union cannot take it for granted.

translation.en: Where the response to the pandemic has seen close and collaborative working between the four nations, it has demonstrated the effectiveness of joint working and the positive outcomes it can achieve, such as in respect of the vaccination programme.

translation.cy: Er ei fod yn ddefnyddiol mewn rhai ffyrdd, mae’r cyd-destun wedi newid ers i’r adolygiad gael ei gwblhau (2019) a’r dyddiad y cafodd ei gyhoeddi gan Lywodraeth y DU (24 Mawrth 2021).
translation.en: While helpful in some ways, the context in which the review was completed (2019) and date of issue by the UK Government (24 March 2021) has since changed.

translation.cy: Yn nyddiau cynnar datganoli, deallwyd ei fod yn darparu trefniadau llywodraethiant arbennig yn y tiriogaethau datganoledig, fel y gallai polisi “cenedlaethol”, fel y’i gelwir, gael ei ystwytho i ddiwallu amgylchiadau lleol.
translation.en: In the early days of devolution, it was understood to provide special governance arrangements in the devolved territories, so that so-called “national” policy could be flexed to meet local circumstances.

translation.cy: Ond mae angen newid ar fyrder yn awr.
translation.en: But the need for change is urgent now;

translation.cy: O safbwynt Llywodraeth Cymru, ni ddylid defnyddio unrhyw beth yn y papur hwn fel sail ar gyfer diystyru agwedd fwy radical eto tuag at ddiwygio cyfansoddiadol.
translation.en: from the Welsh Government’s standpoint, nothing in this paper should be taken as ruling out a yet more ambitious approach to constitutional reform.

translation.cy: Pe na fyddai hyn yn digwydd, mae’n bosibl y gallai cenedl fod yn rhwymedig i’r DU yn erbyn ei hewyllys, sefyllfa a fyddai yn annemocrataidd ac yn anghyson â’r syniad o Undeb sy’n seiliedig ar werthoedd a buddiannau a rennir.
translation.en: If this were not so, a nation could conceivably be bound into the UK against its will, a situation both undemocratic and inconsistent with the idea of a Union based on shared values and interests.

translation.cy: Mae’r cymhwysedd deddfwriaethol hwnnw sy’n perthyn i Senedd y DU yn gorgyffwrdd felly â chymhwysedd y deddfwrfeydd datganoledig, ac rydym yn ymhelaethu ar oblygiadau hyn yn ein trafodaeth o gynnig 5 isod.
translation.en: That Parliamentary legislative competence therefore overlaps with the competences of the devolved legislatures, and we say more about the implications of this in discussion of proposition 5 below.

translation.cy: Ar gyfer Cymru, gweler Deddf Llywodraeth Cymru 2006, a.A1, a fewnosodwyd gan Ddeddf Cymru 2017, a.1.
translation.en: See for Wales, Government of Wales Act 2006, s.A1, inserted by Wales Act 2017, s.1.

translation.cy: Yn dilyn y newidiadau i setliad datganoli Cymru a wnaed gan Ddeddf Cymru 2017, y model cadw pwerau, lle rhestrir materion penodol sy’n cael eu heithrio o gymhwysedd y deddfwrfeydd datganoledig a’u cadw gan San Steffan, yw’r model a ffefrir yn awr ar gyfer datganoli deddfwriaethol yn y DU (er bod ffurf benodol y model yng Ngogledd Iwerddon yn wahanol i’r hwn a geir yng Nghymru a’r Alban).
translation.en: Following the changes made to the Welsh devolution settlement by the Wales Act 2017, the reserved powers model, whereby a list of specific matters is excluded from the competences of the devolved legislatures and retained for Westminster, is now the preferred model for legislative devolution within the UK (although the particular form of the model in Northern Ireland differs from that in Wales and Scotland).

translation.cy: Yn ogystal â hyn, hyd yn oed pan nad yw materion yn cael eu cadw yn ôl gan San Steffan, mae’r gofyniad i gael cydsyniad Gweinidogion y DU ar gyfer deddfu mewn perthynas â darpariaethau penodol (mewn meysydd polisi y ceir dealltwriaeth gyffredinol eu bod wedi’u datganoli)12 yn gyfyngiad sy’n unigryw i setliad Cymru.
translation.en: In addition, even where matters are not reserved to Westminster, the requirement for UK Ministers’ consent to enact certain provisions (within policy areas universally understood to be devolved)12 is a restriction unique to the Welsh settlement.

translation.cy: Pennod 3
translation.en: Chapter 3

translation.cy: Nodwyd bod darpariaeth i’r perwyl hwn yn y ddeddfwriaeth sy’n ymwneud â datganoli ar gyfer Cymru a’r Alban, ar yr amod bod “uwchfwyafrif” o aelodau deddfwrfeydd datganoledig yn pleidleisio dros ddeddfwriaeth ar y rhan fwyaf o’r materion hyn.
translation.en: We noted that provision to this effect is now to be found in the devolution legislation for Wales and Scotland, subject to requirements for “super-majorities” of devolved legislature members voting for legislation on most of these matters.

translation.cy: Cytunodd y Pwyllgor fod y Senedd yn rhy fach ar hyn o bryd, ac argymhellodd y dylid ei hymestyn i rhwng 80 a 90 o Aelodau.
translation.en: The Committee agreed that the Senedd is currently too small, and recommended that it should be expanded to between 80 and 90 Members.

translation.cy: Dylai’r berthynas rhwng pedair deddfwrfa y Deyrnas Unedig barhau ar sail parch rhwng y naill a’r llall.
translation.en: The relations of the four legislatures of the United Kingdom should proceed on the basis of mutual respect.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, rydym yn dal i gydnabod hefyd y gall fod tyndra rhwng cynigion 4 a 6. Mewn egwyddor, byddai’r rhyddid a ddarperir i bob deddfwrfa ddatganoledig gan gynnig 4 i bennu ei maint a’i threfniant mewnol ei hun yn gallu golygu bod un ddeddfwrfa yn gwneud hawliad anghymesur ar gyfanswm yr adnoddau sydd i’w rannu rhwng y pedair deddfwrfa yn unol â chynnig 6.
translation.en: However, we also continue to recognise the potential tension between propositions 4 and 6, in that the freedom provided by proposition 4 for each devolved legislature to determine its own size and internal organisation might theoretically leave open a disproportionate claim being made by one legislature on the total of resources to be shared among the four legislatures in accordance with proposition 6.

translation.cy: Dylai Cymru, yr Alban a Gogledd Iwerddon oll barhau i gael eu cynrychioli yn Nhŷ’r Cyffredin.
translation.en: Each of Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland should continue to be represented in the House of Commons.

translation.cy: Yn ein barn ni, dylai nifer y seddi a ddyrennir i bob rhan o’r DU fod yn sefydlog.
translation.en: It is our view that the allocation of seats to each part of the UK should be fixed.

translation.cy: Y ddeddfwrfa berthnasol fydd yn atebol am arfer y swyddogaethau hynny, yn hytrach nag (yn achos y llywodraethau datganoledig) San Steffan.
translation.en: Their accountability for the exercise of those functions will lie to the relevant legislature, rather than (in the devolved governments’ case) to Westminster.

translation.cy: Ym marn Llywodraeth Cymru, mae’n dilyn hefyd na ddylai Llywodraeth y DU, hyd yn oed os caiff ei hawdurdodi drwy statud i wneud hynny, oni bai bod ganddi gydsyniad y llywodraeth ddatganoledig berthnasol ymlaen llaw, ysgwyddo gwariant cyhoeddus yng Nghymru, yr Alban na Gogledd Iwerddon mewn perthynas â materion y trosglwyddwyd y cyfrifoldeb amdanynt i’r llywodraethau datganoledig.
translation.en: In the Welsh Government’s view, it further follows that the UK Government, even if authorised by statute to do so, should not, save by prior agreement with the relevant devolved government, incur public expenditure in Wales, Scotland or Northern Ireland in respect of matters for which responsibility has been transferred to devolved governments.

translation.cy: Rhaid inni ailosod cysylltiadau rhynglywodraethol er mwyn creu Teyrnas Unedig wedi’i diwygio a’i chryfhau, lle mae’r holl lywodraethau’n trin ei gilydd â pharch ac yn gweithio gyda’i gilydd yn adeiladol, mewn ysbryd o gydweithredu a chydlafurio, er budd i’r ddwy ochr.
translation.en: We need to reset intergovernmental relations to create a reformed and strengthened United Kingdom, in which all the governments treat each other with respect and work together constructively, in a spirit of cooperation and collaboration, for our mutual benefit.

translation.cy: Mae’r rhaglen Fframweithiau Cyffredin wedi dangos y gall y llywodraethiant ar y cyd hwn fod yn llwyddiannus – y gall y pedair gwlad ddod at ei gilydd a chytuno ar ffyrdd o weithio ar draws ystod enfawr o faterion, lle mae ymrwymiad cyffredin i wneud hynny.
translation.en: The Common Frameworks programme has shown that this shared governance can be successful – that the four nations can come together and agree ways of working across a huge range of issues, where there is a shared commitment to doing so.

translation.cy: O dan y fforwm hwnnw byddai pwyllgorau sefydlog, gydag un ar gyfer busnes trawsbynciol ac un arall yn benodol i gyllid.
translation.en: Below that forum would be standing committees, with one for cross-cutting business and another specific to finance.

translation.cy: Bydd ymgysylltu rheolaidd ac wedi’i deilwra o fewn y fforymau hyn yn cryfhau uchelgais gyffredin y llywodraethau i weithredu newid diwylliant ar draws yr holl lywodraethau wrth iddynt gynnal cysylltiadau rhynglywodraethol.
translation.en: Regular and tailored engagement within these fora will strengthen the governments’ shared ambition to operate a culture change across all governments in their conduct of intergovernmental relations.

translation.cy: Mae’r mecanwaith arfaethedig ar gyfer osgoi anghydfodau a datrys anghydfodau yn ymgorffori hawl pob llywodraeth i gyfeirio ac uwchgyfeirio anghydfod.
translation.en: The proposed mechanism for dispute avoidance and resolution enshrines each government’s right to refer and escalate a dispute.

translation.cy: O ran cysylltiadau rhyngwladol a masnach y DU, dylid cynnwys Gweinidogion a swyddogion y llywodraethau datganoledig drwy fecanwaith rhynglywodraethol ffurfiol mewn trafodaethau â Llywodraeth y DU ynglŷn â llunio polisi’r DU, safbwyntiau negodi a threfniadau gweithredu ar faterion a all fod yn destun cytundebau rhyngwladol, yn arbennig lle y gallai fod gan y rhain oblygiadau pwysig ar gyfer materion sydd o fewn cymhwysedd datganoledig.
translation.en: In relation to the UK’s international relations and trade, Ministers and officials of the devolved governments should be engaged and involved through formal intergovernmental machinery in discussion with the UK Government about the formulation of the UK’s policy, negotiating positions and implementation arrangements on matters which may be the subject of international agreements, particularly where these could have important implications for matters within devolved competence.

translation.cy: O’u safbwynt hwythau, bydd angen i’r sefydliadau datganoledig ystyried yn ofalus bob tro a ddylid rhoi effaith i rwymedigaethau rhyngwladol newydd yng nghyd-destun y meysydd datganoledig, a sut y dylid gwneud hynny.
translation.en: For their part, the devolved institutions will need on each occasion to give careful consideration as to whether and how new international obligations in the devolved sphere should be given effect.

translation.cy: Dylai hyn gynnwys trefniadau sy’n ymwneud â llywodraethiant y corff, a’i drefniadau cyllido, yn ogystal â’r modd y goruchwylir ei weithgareddau ac y creffir arnynt.
translation.en: This should include arrangements relating both to a body’s governance and funding, and to scrutiny and oversight of its activities.

translation.cy: Mae’r amrywiol amgylchiadau a allai arwain at y mater hwn yn golygu na cheir un ateb sy’n briodol ym mhob achos.
translation.en: The variety of circumstances in which this issue can arise means that there is no single solution appropriate to every case.

translation.en: consent by devolved Ministers to appointments proposed by a Secretary of State;

translation.cy: Bydd angen cynnwys trefniadau atebolrwydd i ddeddfwrfeydd datganoledig hefyd wrth ystyried y mater hwn.
translation.en: Accountability arrangements to devolved legislatures will also need to feature in consideration of this issue.

translation.cy: Mae’n ofynnol yn aml i gyrff cyhoeddus anfon copïau o’u Hadroddiadau Blynyddol at Weinidogion y llywodraethau datganoledig i’w gosod gerbron y deddfwrfeydd datganoledig, er mwyn hwyluso’r gwaith craffu.
translation.en: It is commonly the case that public bodies are required to send copies of their Annual Reports to devolved Ministers for laying before devolved legislatures, to facilitate scrutiny.

translation.en: In Wales, this is sometimes referred to as the desirability of establishing a ‘single Welsh public service’.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru o’r farn y dylai pob llywodraeth yn y DU gytuno ar set o egwyddorion a nodau craidd a all fod yn gymwys i bob llywodraeth ond sydd hefyd yn caniatáu ar gyfer eu hamrywio yn ôl yr angen.
translation.en: The Welsh Government considers that all governments in the UK should agree a core set of principles and aims which can apply to all governments but also allow scope for necessary diversity.

translation.cy: Byddem yn disgwyl i’r cytundeb hwn, yn ei hanfod, fod yn seiliedig ar egwyddorion cyfranogiad cyfartal, cydweithio, a rhannu’r cyfrifoldeb dros ganlyniadau.
translation.en: At its core we would expect this agreement to be underpinned by the principles of parity of participation, collaborative working, and shared responsibility for outcomes.

translation.cy: Rydym yn credu bod angen diwygio’r broses bresennol o roi cymhwysedd deddfwriaethol ar gyfer trethi newydd.
translation.en: We believe the existing process for conferring legislative competence for new taxes needs to be reformed.

translation.cy: ni ddylai fod yn fater i Lywodraeth y DU na Senedd y DU asesu na dyfarnu ar rinweddau polisi datganoledig.
translation.en: it should not be a matter for the UK Government or the UK Parliament to assess or rule on the merits of devolved policy.

translation.cy: Mater i’r llywodraethau datganoledig yw pennu, yn unol â’r pwerau a’r adnoddau sydd ar gael iddynt, eu blaenoriaethau eu hunain ar gyfer trethiant a gwariant cyhoeddus sy’n gysylltiedig â’u cyfrifoldebau datganoledig, a rhoi eglurhad o’u penderfyniadau i’w deddfwrfeydd eu hunain.
translation.en: It is for the devolved governments to determine, within the powers and resources available to them, their own priorities for taxation and public expenditure relating to their devolved responsibilities, and to account for their decisions to their own legislatures.

translation.cy: Ein barn ni o hyd yw bod angen ystyried diwygio cyfansoddiadol yn y dyfodol o safbwynt y DU gyfan, ond nid oes ymrwymiad eto gan Lywodraeth y DU ar gyfer y drafodaeth genedlaethol ledled y DU y mae’n amlwg bod ei hangen.
translation.en: It continues to be our view that future constitutional reform needs to be considered from a UK-wide perspective, but there is as yet no commitment from the UK Government for the national debate across the UK which is clearly needed.

translation.cy: Ein nod yw y bydd y Comisiwn a’r sgwrs ddinesig yn ymgysylltu mewn ffordd gynhwysol ag unigolion, cymunedau a phob rhan o gymdeithas ddinesig.
translation.en: Our aim is that the Commission and the civic conversation will engage inclusively with individuals, communities and all parts of civic society.

translation.cy: Dylid cydnabod bod yr egwyddorion sy’n sail i ddatganoli yn sylfaenol i gyfansoddiad y DU.
translation.en: The principles underpinning devolution should be recognised as fundamental to the UK constitution.

translation.en: The agri-food sector also makes a significant contribution to the rural economy, with many jobs dependent on primary production and the wider supply chain.

translation.cy: Ar ôl cael rhagor o gyngor gan yr UKCCC ym mis Rhagfyr 2020, byddwn yn gofyn i Senedd Cymru ddiweddaru’r llwybr statudol ar gyfer gostwng allyriadau Cymru ym mis Mawrth 2021.
translation.en: Following further advice from the UKCCC in December 2020, we will ask the Senedd to update Wales’s statutory emissions reduction pathway in March 2021.

translation.cy: Er bod gwaith da wedi’i wneud i ostwng allyriadau amaethyddol, mae’r gostyngiad yn y gorffennol diweddar wedi arafu.
translation.en: Although progress has been made in reducing agricultural emissions, this has stalled in the recent past.

translation.cy: Er mwyn taclo’r newid yn yr hinsawdd a gostwng allyriadau amaethyddiaeth, bydd yn rhaid wrth newidiadau i rai arferion ffermio a ffefrir ac sydd wedi hen ennill eu plwyf.
translation.en: Tackling climate change and reducing emissions from agriculture will require changes to be made to some currently preferred and firmly established farming practices.

translation.cy: Mae llawer o waith i’w wneud yn y maes hwn ac rydym yn cydnabod bod angen cydweithio os ydym am weld datrys rhai o’r problemau sy’n gysylltiedig ag allyriadau o’r sector rheoli tir.
translation.en: There is much work to do in this area and we recognise the need to work in partnership if we are to resolve some of the issues associated with emissions from the land management sector.

translation.cy: Fel y dywedir yn ein Cynllun Aer Glân i Gymru, mae mwyafrif llethol ein ffermwyr o ddifri ynghylch eu cyfrifoldebau amgylcheddol, ond wnawn ni ddim cwrdd â tharged y Gyfarwyddeb Terfyn Uchaf Allyriadau Cenedlaethol ar gyfer amonia heb ragor o welliannau.
translation.en: As set out in our Clean Air Plan for Wales, the vast majority of farmers take their environmental responsibilities seriously but we will not meet the National Emissions Ceiling Directive target for ammonia emission without more improvements.

translation.cy: Mae amonia yn amharu ar ecosystemau hefyd.
translation.en: 1.24 Ammonia also interferes with ecosystems.

translation.cy: Byddai gwobrwyo ffermwyr am wireddu’r amcanion hyn trwy Gynllun Ffermio Cynaliadwy yn helpu i greu sector amaethyddol cynaliadwy a chryf yng Nghymru ar gyfer cenedlaethau’r dyfodol.
translation.en: Rewarding farmers for achieving these goals through our proposed Sustainable Farming Scheme would help create a sustainable and resilient agriculture sector in Wales for future generations.

translation.cy: Wrth adael yr UE, bydd nifer o resymau pwysig pam mae angen adolygu’n rheoliadau presennol:

translation.cy: Mae parhau i reoleiddio’n bwysig i ddiogelu’r amgylchedd yr ydym i gyd yn dibynnu arno, i gynnal safonau Cymreig ac i hybu masnach.
translation.en: Continued regulation is important to protect the environment upon which we all depend, to maintain Welsh standards and to facilitate trade.

translation.cy: Rydym am ddefnyddio cyngor ac arweiniad clir gymaint ag y medrwn i annog pobl i gydymffurfio â rheoliadau.
translation.en: We aim to encourage regulatory compliance as much as possible through clear advice and guidance.

translation.cy: Ond, mae’n bwysig bod anogaeth a chosb gymesur a chyson i atal pobl rhag torri’r rheolau trwy sicrhau bod rheoleiddwyr yn gallu defnyddio cosb sy’n briodol i’r tramgwydd.
translation.en: However, it is important we can deter and enforce non-compliance proportionately and consistently by ensuring regulators can use an appropriate sanction for the offence.

translation.cy: Fel y dywedwn yn Adran 2, mae’r cynigion ar gyfer gorfodi rheoliadau amaethyddol ar wahân i’r sancsiynau ar gyfer y Cynllun Ffermio Cynaliadwy.
translation.en: As described in Section 2, the proposals for enforcement of agricultural regulation are separate from sanctions for the Sustainable Farming Scheme.

translation.en: The type of civil sanctions would be broadly based upon those currently used by Natural Resources Wales and Environmental Regulators in England, as outlined in the Regulatory Enforcement and Sanctions Act 2008.

translation.en: Detailed consideration and consultation will be needed on the scope and application of civil sanctions and how these interact with scheme requirements.

translation.en: Providing regulators with the flexibility to use civil sanctions, as well as the existing criminal sanctions, will allow regulators to apply a proportionate sanction to each individual case.

translation.en: 2.47  SLM has the potential to produce a range of benefits -economic, environmental and social - to farm businesses, the wider agricultural sector and the public.

translation.cy: Dylai’r CFfC wobrwyo ffermwyr yn briodol am gynhyrchu canlyniadau (pridd iachach, aer glân, dŵr glân, bioamrywiaeth gyfoethocach, camau i leihau twymo’r ddaear) ar lefel uwch na’r hyn y gofynnir amdani gan y rheoliadau, trwy ac yn sgil cynhyrchu bwyd mewn ffordd gynaliadwy.
translation.en: The SFS should reward farmers appropriately for the production of outcomes (healthier soils, clean air, clean water, improved biodiversity, actions to reduce global warming) at levels above those set by regulation, through and alongside the production of food in a sustainable way.

translation.cy: Bydd ein cynigion yn ei gwneud yn bosibl i’r sector amaeth ddatgarboneiddio a chynyddu dalfa garbon Cymru i gefnogi’r targed sero-net erbyn 2050.
translation.en: Our proposals also enable the agriculture sector to decarbonise and take action to increase the size of Wales’ carbon sink in support of our ‘net zero by 2050’ ambition.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn helpu ffermwyr i fod yn gynhyrchiol a chynaliadwy ac i wneud y defnydd gorau o’u hadnoddau naturiol gan wneud y cynhyrchu cynaliadwy hwnnw yn fwy effeithiol o fewn terfynau’r fframwaith SLM.
translation.en: We will seek to enable farms to become sustainably productive, with farmers making the best use of their natural resources and improving the efficiency of that sustainable production within the bounds of the SLM framework.

translation.cy: Mae’n bwysig bod ffermwyr a rheolwyr tir yn deall y berthynas rhwng y cynllun a’r newidiadau i’r drefn reoleiddio.
translation.en: 2.69 It will be important for farmers and land managers to understand how the proposed regulatory reform and the scheme fit together.

translation.en: We would expect all farmers who apply for the scheme to comply with the law and continued compliance would be essential in order to justify continued payments for environmental outcomes.

translation.en: It would also enable regulators to more effectively refer non-compliance to the relevant body to take enforcement action. We propose information should be centrally collected and shared between regulators, therefore reducing the number of documents farmers need to complete.

translation.en: A dataset could be coordinated centrally and shared with other public bodies who currently request this data directly from farmers.

translation.en: Whilst regulators currently use a range of data to assess the risk of non-compliance on individual farms, we want to enable more effective collaboration between regulators to avoid duplication of monitoring and data requirements.
